Matthew: Bai aa ndo at'u a lukolo arilombola Jesu Masihi. Jesu Masihi wambola kahi za lukolo lwa Daudi, na Daudi naye akimbola kahi za lukolo lwa Burahemu.
Burahemu wamuzhala Isaka. Isaka akimuzhala Jakobu. Jakobu akimuzhala Juda na nduguze a kilume.
Juda akimuzhala P'erezi na Zera (mameye P'erezi na Zera were anaifwa T'amari). P'erezi, akimuzhala Hezironi. Hezironi, akimuzhala Aramu.
Aramu, akimuzhala Aminadabu. Aminadabu, akimuzhala Nashoni. Nashoni akimuzhala Salimoni,
Salimoni akimuzhala Boazi (mameye Boazi were anaifwa Rahabu). Boazi, akimuzhala Obedi (mameye Obedi were anaifwa Ruth'u). Obedi, akimuzhala Jese,
babaye muthawali Daudi. Daudi akimuzhala Selemani, (ho kwandza mameye Selemani wakala ni mukaza Uria).
Selemani naye akimuzhala Rehoboamu. Rehoboamu akimuzhala Abija. Abija akimuzhala Asafu.
Asafu akimuzhala Jehoshafati. Jehoshafati akimuzhala Joramu. Joramu akimuzhala Uzia.
Uzia akimuzhala Jothamu. Jothamu akimuzhala Ahazi. Ahazi akimuzhala Hezekia.
Hezekia akimuzhala Manase. Manase akimuzhala Amoni. Amoni akimuzhala Josia.
Josia akimuzhala Jekonia na nduguze a kilume makathi Ayahudi marihokala manahalwa mateka kwenda Babiloni.
Bada ya kuhalwa mateka kwa Ayahudi kugoma, Jekonia akimuzhala Salathieli. Salathieli akimuzhala Zerubabeli.
Zerubabeli akimuzhala Abiudu. Abiudu akimuzhala Eliakimu. Eliakimu akimuzhala Azori.
Azori, akimuzhala Zadoki. Zadoki akimuzhala Akimu. Akimu akimuzhala Eliudi.
Eliudi akimuzhala Eliazari. Eliazari akimuzhala Mathani. Mathani akimuzhala Jakobu.
Na Jakobu akimuzhala Josefu. Josefu nde ariyekudzakala mulume wa Maryamu, mameye Jesu. Na Jesu nde iye Masihi.

Kwa vizho kula Burahemu hatha muthawali Daudi, kwakala na vizhazi kumi na vine. Na kula Daudi hatha kuhalwa mateka kwa Ayahudi kuhirikwa Babiloni, kukikala na vizhazi kumi na vine kaheri. Na kula wakathi wa kuhalwa mateka kwa Ayahudi kuhirikwa Babiloni hatha kuzhalwa kwa iye Masihi, nako kukikala na vizhazi kumi na vine.
Vikara kuzhalwa kwa Jesu Masihi kwakala vivi: Maryamu ariye were andakala mameye Jesu were analolwa ni Josefu, ela kabila k'adzamuhala, akimanywa kukala ana mimba kwa nguvu za Roho Mweri.
Bai kwa kukala Josefu were ni mut'u muhachi k'ahendzeze kumugwiza aibu muchewe mbere za at'u bule, waona ni baha amuriche kisiri-siri.
Vikara arihokala achere kuviaza, lola malaika wa Bwana akimwambolera ndosoni akimwamba, “Josefu mwana wa Daudi,
sogohe kumuhala mucheo Maryamu, mana yo mimba ariyo nayo be waipata kwa nguvu za Roho Mweri.
Naye andazhala mwana mulume, na mwana iye undamwiha Jesu, mana iye nde andeaokola at'ue kula kahi za dambi zao.”
Bai vivi zhosi zhakala ili ro neno ririronenwa ni Bwana kukira kwa nabii rithimire. Kwani nabii wanena akiamba,
“Lolani, bikira andahenda mimba
na andazhala mwana mulume
na dzinare andaifwa Imanueli,
yani Mulungu hamwenga naswi.”
Vikara Josefu ariholamuka, akihenda vizho arizhokala adzalagizwa ni ye malaika. Wamuhala Maryamu,
ela k'alalire naye hatha akimuzhala ye mwana wa kilume. Na Josefu akimwiha Jesu.
Jesu wazhalwa mudzi wa Beth'elehemu, uriwo kahi za jimbo ra Judea, makathi ga muthawali Herode. Vikara Jesu arihozhalwa, lola kwakudza at'u alachu
kuko mudzi mubomu wa Jerusalemu. At'u aa were madzambola ts'i za mwambolero wa dzuwa.
Bai marihofika Jerusalemu mauza, “Yuno muthawali wa Ayahudi ariyezhalwa a hiko? Kwani fwayona yo nyenyezi ya kwakwe kuko mwambolero wa dzuwa, naswi hudzire humuvoye.”
Bai muthawali Herode hamwenga na at'u osi a Jerusalemu mabudzyika sana marihosikira uv̱oro uwo.
Na kwa ut'u uwo, Herode akiaiha alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria a Kiyahudi, akiauza kala Masihi were andazhalwa hiko.
Makiamba, ni Beth'elehemu, mudzi uriwo Judea. Kwani vizho ndo nabii arizhoora akiamba,
“Mudzi wa Beth'elehemu kahi za ts'i ya Juda,
si mudzi muthithe kamare kahi za athawali a Juda;
kwani kula kuko kundambola muthawali
andiyekala murisa wa at'u a kwangu, Aiziraeli.”
Herode arihosikira viryahu, akiavuha k'anda aryahu at'u alachu akiauzat'o wo wakathi irihombolera yo nyenyezi. Nao marihogonya kumwambira,
akiahuma ko Beth'elehemu, akiamba, “Kauzeni-uzeni hatha mumone. Mukikala mudzamona, ndzoni munambire, ili nami nende nikamuvoye.”

Bai Herode arihogonya kunena nao, o at'u alachu makigwira ngira ya kwenda Beth'elehemu. Na lola mo ngirani, yo nyenyezi mariyoyona ko mwambolero wa dzuwa ikiambolera kaheri, nao makifwahirwa zhomu kuyona kaheri. Bai nyenyezi iyo yaalongoza hatha ichendaima haho arihokala ye mwana mutsanga.

Bai Herode arihogonya kunena nao, o at'u alachu makigwira ngira ya kwenda Beth'elehemu. Na lola mo ngirani, yo nyenyezi mariyoyona ko mwambolero wa dzuwa ikiambolera kaheri, nao makifwahirwa zhomu kuyona kaheri. Bai nyenyezi iyo yaalongoza hatha ichendaima haho arihokala ye mwana mutsanga.
Bai marihongira mo nyumbani machendamona ye mwana mutsanga na mameye, makimuzamira makimuvoya. Gonya makivugula mikoba yao, makimunosa dhahabu, na uvumba, na manemane.
Bai marihokala madzagonya kumunosa, Mulungu akiaonya kahi za ndoso kukala masiuye kwa Herode bule. Kwa vizho makiuya kwao na ngira nyingine.

Vikara marihokala aryahu at'u alachu madzakwenda, lola malaika wa Bwana akimwambolera Josefu ndosoni akimwamba, “Herode, anamumala ye mwana amwalage. Kwa vizho, uka umuhale ye mutsanga na mameye, muchimbirire Misiri. Kakaleni kuko vivii hatha ho nindihomwamba muuye.”
Josefu ariholamuka, akimuhala ye mutsanga na mameye, makigwira ngira na usiku, sio, machenda Misiri.

Bai makala kuko Misiri hatha Herode akifwa, ndo makiuya. Na vivi zhosi zhakala ili riryahu neno ririronenwa ni Mulungu kukirira kwa nabii rithimire. Kwani nabii wanena akiamba, “Namwiha Mwanangu kula Misiri.”

Vikara Herode arihoona kukala aryahu at'u alachu mamuv̱urya, watsukirwa zhomu na akihuma shikari Beth'elehemu na midzi iriyo k'anda-k'andaze makalage ahoho osi a kilume a kula miaka miri kwenda ts'ini. Vivi wavihenda kulingana na haho nyenyezi irihombolera, here arizhoambirwa ni o at'u alachu.
Vivi zhahendeka kwamba ro neno ririronenwa ni nabii Jeremia rithimire. Kwani Jeremia wanena akiamba,
“Kwasikirwa k'ululu kuko Rama;
mut'u anarira zhomu na kuthapathapa,
Raheli anakakwa ni anae.
Atsosha kunyamazwa k'anyamala,
andanyamaladze bai, naye k'andaaona kaheri?”
Bai Josefu wakala Misiri vivii hatha Herode anafwa, lola malaika wa Bwana akimwambolera ndosoni
akimwamba, “Uka umuhale ye muhoho na mameye muuye ts'i ya Iziraeli kwani o mariokala manamala roho ya ye muhoho mafwa.”
Kwa vizho Josefu akiuka akimuhala ye mwana na mameye makiuya Iziraeli.

Arihofika Iziraeli, Josefu akisikira kukala Arikelao mwana wa Herode nde athawalaye Judea hat'u ha babaye. Kwa vizho akigoha kuuya ko kwao Judea. Bai Mulungu akimwambolera kahi za ndoso akimwamba ende jimbo ra Galilaya, naye akihenda vizho.

Arihofika Galilaya, Josefu wakwendatoa kahi za mudzi uifwao Nazareth'i. Vivi zhakala ili ro neno ririronenwa ni manabii dzulu za iye Jesu, rithimire. Kwani manabii manena makiamba, “Andaifwa Munazareth'i.”
Bai bada ya miaka ya kuthala, kwambola mwanamulume ariyekala anaifwa Johana Mubat'izaji. Johana wahubiri ko nyika ya Judea na kuamba,
“Thubuni, kwani uthawali wa mulunguni udzafika hehi.”
Yuyu Johana ndiye ariyeambwa ni nabii Isaya haryahu arihonena akiamba,
“Mut'u analuta mumirowe ko nyika na kuamba,
‘Mutengezereni ngira Bwana,
Mutengezereni ngira ya kugoloka.’ ”
Valo ra Johana were ni ra nyoga za ngamira. Na wakala akidzifunga ukanda wa k'ingo chununi mwakwe. Chakuryache were ni kw'eth'eth'e na uchi wa nyuchi.
K'uzhona zho, at'u osi a Jerusalemu na a midzi mingine yosi ya Judea, na at'u osi mariokala makitoa kahi za midzi iriyo k'anda-k'anda za muho wa Jorodani marihovisikira, bagabaga makimuthuwa.
Nao maziungama dambi zao, na Johana akiabat'iza kahi za wo muho wa Jorodani.

Ela arihokala anaenderera kubat'iza, kukidza Mafarisayo na Masadukayo anji, nao makikala madzirebat'izwa. Bai Johana arihoaona, akiadumulira akiamba, “H'enwi kizhazi cha nyoka nwi! Ni h'ani ariyemwambira kukala muzichimbire zo k'oro za Mulungu zidzazo?
H'aya mahendo genu naganyese kukala mudzathubu dambi jeri.
Na musidzikenge bule mukaamba mu ana a Burahemu. Kwani namwambira kamare kukala, Mulungu anadima kumuumbira ana Burahemu hatha kula kwa gaga mawe!
Na vivi be tsoka ri ho kolo kare, na kila muhi usiwozhala matunda madzo, undathemwa utsufwe mohoni.

Mino ninamubat'iza kwa madzi kamwe, kunyesa kukala mudzathubu dambi zenu, ela ye andiyekudza nyuma zangu ni mubomu kukira mimi. Kwandza mosi sifika hatha mut'u wa kumuvula virahuzhe. Iye andamubat'iza kwa Roho Mweri na kwa moho.
Na adzagwirira lungo anahehet'a ngano. Akigonya kuhehet'a andahala yo ngano ayangize lutsagani, gonya ahale wo wiswa autsuhe kahi za moho usiwozima.”
Bai makathi garyahu Johana arihokala anabat'iza at'u, Jesu wambola jimbo ra Galilaya achenda Jorodani ili naye akabat'izwe ni Johana.
Vikara Johana arihoona kukala Jesu naye anamala kubat'izwa akimwamba, “Mino namala nibat'izwe ni uwe, we unadza kwangu?” Kwa vizho akikala anamala kukahala kumubat'iza.
Ela Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Vihende kwa rero, kwani vizho ndo hundakala hunathimiza hachi yosi.” Johana arihosikira viryahu akikubali kumubat'iza Jesu.
Bai, Jesu arihokala adzagonya kubat'izwa wambola mo madzini. Bai arihombola thu, lola ko mulunguni kukigunuka, na akiona Roho wa Mulungu anatharamuka here giya hatha akidzamuthulama.
Na lola haho henye mumiro uchambola kula ko mulunguni ukiamba, “Yuyu ni Mwanangu muhendzwi, anifwahizaye.”
Bai Jesu akilongozwa ni Roho na achenda nyika kwendajezwa ni Shethani.
Wafunga kwa siku mirongo mine, usiku na mutsana na badaye akisikira ndzala.
Shethani akimuthuwa akimwamba, “Chamba u Mwana wa Mulungu jeri, gambire gaga mawe gakale mikahe.”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Zhaorwa kukala, ‘Mudamu k'andakala moyo kwa mukahe thu, ela kwa kila neno rimbolaro kanwani mwa Mulungu.’ ”
Shethani akimuhala hatha kuko mudzi mueri wa Jerusalemu, akimukweza dzulu za wo munara wa ro Hekalu,
akimwamba, “Chamba u Mwana wa Mulungu jeri, dzitsuhe ko ts'i, kwani zhaorwa kukala, ‘Andaalagiza malaikae makurinde, mandakwanula na mikono yao, p'ore ukakwala iwe.’ ”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Zhaorwa kaheri kukala, ‘Usimujeze Bwana Mulunguo bule!’ ”
K'uzhona anambola haho, Shethani akimuhala Jesu achenda naye hatha dzulu za murima mure zhomu. Akimwanyesa ts'i zosi za urumwengu na ngumaze.
Akimwamba, “Ukinizamira ukinivoya, vivi zhosi uzhonazho nindakup'a.”
K'ona Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Hauke Shethani, kwani zhaorwa kukala, ‘Muvoye Bwana Mulunguo na umuhumikire iye h'akeye!’ ”
Ndo Shethani akimuricha, na lola kukidza malaika makidzamuhumikira.
Bai Jesu wakala ko jimbo ra Judea, ela arihosikira kukala Johana Mubat'izaji wagwirwa achangizwa jela, akikumbola kuko, akiuya Galilaya.
Arihofika Galilaya, kuko Nazareth'i akikwambola, achendatoa Kaperinaumu. Mudzi uwo, were u k'anda-k'anda ya ziya ra Galilaya, kahi za muhaka wa lalo ra Zabuloni na lalo ra Nafutali.
Bai Jesu wakwendatoa kuko, ili riryahu neno ririronenwa ni nabii Isaya rithimire. Kwani Isaya wanena akiamba,
“Lalo ra Zabuloni na lalo ra Nafutali,
kulaizira k'anda-k'anda za ziya ra Galilaya,
kwenda hatha kuthalala muho wa Jorodani,
na ts'i ya Galilaya, kuriko pia kunatoa at'u mario si Ayahudi,
at'u mariokala ma kizani,
vivi madzaona mulangaza munji.
Na at'u mariokala manatoa kahi za lalo ra kivurivuri cha kifwa
mulangaza udzang'ala kahikahi zao.”
Bai kula haho Jesu akikwatya kuhubiri akiamba, “Thubuni, mana uthawali wa mulunguni udzafika hehi.”

Siku mwenga, Jesu arihokala anatsembera k'anda-k'anda za ziya ra Galilaya, wakwendamuthekeza mut'u na nduguye manatsuha vimia zhao mavuhe makumba, kwani were ni avuhi. Mumwenga were anaifwa Simoni, ariye were pia anaifwa P'et'ero. Ye mungine ye were anaifwa Anderea.
K'uzhona arihoaona akiambira, “Nithuwani, nami nindamuhendya mukale avuhi a at'u.”
Marihosikira vizho thu, Simoni na Anderea makigwaga kare zho vimia zhao makimuthuwa.

Anala haho achenda hatha anafika ho mbere, achendamuthekeza mut'u na nduguye kaheri. Mumwenga were anaifwa Jakobu, na ye mungine akikala anaifwa Johana. At'u aa were ni ana a Zebedayo. Hatha zho Jesu anendaathekeza, be were manafuma-fuma vimia zhao hamwenga na babiyao mo dauni mwao. Bai Jesu arihoaiha thu,
Jakobu na Johana makimuricha ye babiyao hamwenga na ro dau makimuthuwa Jesu.

K'uzhona zho Jesu ariholaa haho, wadengereka Galilaya yosi, kuhubiri na kufundisha at'u kahi za masinagogi gao dzulu za Uv̱oro Udzo wa uthawali wa mulunguni. Kidza akihoza at'u anji mariokala na makongo na manyonge ga kila namuna.
Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, Jesu akihenda nguma kahi za ts'i yosi ya Siria. Na lola at'u makimurehera akongo na anyonge a kila namuna. A p'ep'o, a vitsala, na akuholoza, na osi Jesu akiahoza.
Bai wathuwiwa ni rikundi ribomu ra at'u kila arikokwenda. Kula mumo Galilaya hatha Midzi Kumi. Kula Jerusalemu na Judea yosi na hatha kuvuka muho wa Jorodani.
Lola siku mwenga, at'u anji makala manamudzalira Jesu. Vikara arihoona viryahu, akikwera dzulu za murima akikelesi. Bai anafundzie makimuthuwa kuko.
Marihofika kuko Jesu wakelesi na akikwatya kuafundisha akiamba,
“Baha ao akiya kahi za roho,
mana uthawali wa mulunguni ni wao.
Baha ao mario na huzuni,
mana mandafarijiwa.
Baha ao mario ni ap'eho,
mana ts'i indakala yao.
Baha ao mario na ndzala na k'ihu ya hachi,
mana mandakushwa.
Baha ao maaonerao mbazi andziyao,
mana nao mandaonerwa mbazi.
Baha ao mario ni aeri mioyoni mwao,
mana mandamona Mulungu.
Baha ao magwizanyao at'u,
mana mandaifwa ana a Mulungu.
Baha ao mateswao kwa ut'u wa kuhenda hachi mbere za Mulungu,
mana uthawali wa mulunguni ni wao.
Baha ninwi mundiohukanwa, na kuteswa, na kusingizirwa kila namuna ya maut'u mai kwa ut'u wangu mimi.
Fwahirwani zhomu na kulika, mana zawadi yenu ni bomu kuko mulunguni. Mana vizho ndizho ao at'u marizhoahendera o manabii mariomuthangulia.”
“Ninwi be mu munyu wa urumwengu. Vikara munyu ukikala udzauya k'aukoza, undahendwadze hatha ukoze kaheri? Jibu ni k'aufwaha kit'u bule, hatha kazi ni kutsufwa uzhogwe-zhogwe ni at'u.
Ninwi be mu mulangaza wa urumwengu. Mudzi uriwoakwa hat'u kirimani k'aufitsika bule.
Kidza mut'u k'adima kugwiza taa gonya akaribiningiza na muvure, ela nikurika nyambaroni, ili riang'alire at'u osi mo nyumbani.
Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi here mulangaza, ng'alirani kila mut'u, ili at'u magaone mahendo genu madzo na mamulike Babiyenu wa mulunguni.”
“Sioneni kukala nakudzagaluza Sheria ya Musa, na mafundisho ga manabii, hatha! Sidziregagaluza bule, nakudza nigathimize.
Na jeri wenye, kabila mulunguni na ts'i kukira, k'ahana hatha kadono kamwenga ka yo Sheria kandikokira bila kuthimira.

Na mut'u yoyosi andiyekoseza yo Sheria th'ith'e ya zosi, na aafundishe andziye mahende dzazho arizhohenda iye, andakala mut'u muthithe sana kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni. Ela mut'u andiyethuwa na kuzigwira sheria zosi, na kuafundisha andziye ili nao mazithuwe na kuzigwira, andakala mut'u mubomu sana kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni.
Namwambira kamare, kala uhachi wenu k'aundashinda uryahu wa Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria, uthawali wa mulunguni k'amundawangira bule.”
“Mwasikira kukala haho kapindi at'u maambwa, ‘Usalage’ na ‘Ukilaga undahukumiwa.’

Ela mimi ninamwambira kukala, mut'u andemutsukirirwa mwandziwe andahukumiwa. Mut'u andiyemuv̱udhya mwandziwe andashithakiwa kwa ro Baraza ra athumia. Na mut'u andiyemuhukana mwandziwe amwambe, ‘Mut'u u mujinga zhomu uwe!’ andatsufwa kahi za moho wa Jehanamu.
Kwa vizho ukikala mwenye udzakwendamboza sadaka dzulu za cho kijaja cha kulazhira sadaka kiricho kahi za ro Hekalu, na ukumbukire kukala wamuhendera vii mwandziyo,
iriche haho kijajani yo sadaka, wende ukapatane na iye mwandziyo kwandza ndo udze uyamboze.
Mut'u akikala anakuhirika kotini, baha mugamarigizire mo ngirani, mana usihohenda vizho, andakufisha kwa jaji, na iye jaji andakulazha kwa shikari wangizwe ndani.
Nami nakwambira ujeri wenye, k'undarichirwa uwe hatha umarigize kuriha p'esa zosi.”
“Mwasikira zhanenwa kukala, ‘Usizinge.’
Ela vivi ninamwambira kukala, mut'u yoyosi andiyemulola mwanamuche na kumumizira mahe, andakala moyoni mwakwe adzagonya kare kuzinga naye.
Dzitsoro ra mukono wa kurya rikikala rinakuhendya uhende dambi, rishukule uritsuhe. Kwani hatha baha kutsowa kilungo kimwenga kuriko mwiriwo wosi utsufwe Jehanamu.
Mukonowo wa kurya, ukikala unakuhendya uhende dambi utose uutsuhe. Kwani ni baha kutsowa kilungo kimwenga kuriko mwiriwo wosi utsufwe Jehanamu.”
“Kahi za Sheria ya Musa zhaambwa kaheri kukala, ‘Mut'u andehendza kumuricha muchewe naamup'e cheti cha kunyesa kukala madzarichana.’

“Ela vivi be namwambira kukala, mut'u andemuricha muchewe kwa sababu yoyosi nyingine, hasihokala uzindzi, anamuhendya ahende dambi ya uzindzi, ahalwaho kaheri. Na kila andiyemuhala ye muche wa kumbola kwa mulume ni muzindzi.”
“Mwasikira kukala haho kapindi at'u maambwa, ‘Ukiapa mbere za Bwana usilahe ulongo bule, thimiza kila kit'u undichokala udzakiapa.’
Ela vivi ninamwambira kukala musiape kamare. Musiape dzulu mulunguni kwa kukala kuko ndo Mulungu ariko, kahi za kihiche cha uthawali.
Na musiape dzulu za ts'i, kwani ndo hat'uhe ha kuika magulu. Musiapire Jerusalemu, mana ni mudzi wa muthawali mubomu.
Kidza musiape dzulu za kwenu enye kwa kukala k'amudima kuhenda changari ludzere lumwenga lukakala lwiru hedu lwaruhe.
Kwa vizho ukiamba, ‘Ee,’ navikale ndozho jeri. Na ukiamba, ‘Hatha,’ vikale sozho. Zaidhi ya vizho vilaa kwa ye Mui.”
“Mwasikira zhaorwa kukala, ‘Mut'u akikubola dzitso nawe mwabole. Akikung'ola dzino nawe mung'ole.’
Ela vivi be namwambira kukala mut'u akikuhendera vii, usimurihize bule. Mut'u akikupiga kofi nyendze ya mukono wa kurya, mugaluzire yo nyendze nyingine nayo apige.
Mut'u akikushithaki akuhoke k'andzuyo, ro amba naro murichire.
Mut'u akikulazimisha mwende mwendo wa maili mwenga, enda naye maili mbiri zenye.
Mwandziyo akidzakuvoya kit'u hedu akidzakumala p'asha, mup'e, usimulashe bule.”
Bai Jesu akienderera kufundisha akiamba, “Mwasikira zhanenwa kukala, ‘Muhendze mwandziyo, ela hadhuio mumene.’
Ela vivi be ninamwambira kukala ahendzeni mahadhui enu, na muavoyere ao mamutesao,
ili mukale ana a Babiyenu wa mulunguni. Kwani, iye nikurihendya dzuware rikaang'alira adzo na ai na kuarehera v̱ula ahachi hamwenga na athiriri.
Kwani mukiahendza kare o mamuhendzao ninwi, ni ut'u wani udzo mundokala mudzahenda? Kwani hatha athozi a kodi kidza ndo mahendazho.
Kwa vizho ukimulamusa ye nduguyo kare, kurya hadhui ye umuzire, undakala k'uhendere ut'u usha bule, kwani hatha at'u masiomumanya Mulungu nao ndo mahendazho.
Kwa vizho kalani akamilifu, dza zho Babiyenu wa mulunguni arizho mukamilifu.”
Jesu akienderera kufundisha akiamba, “Ukihenda ut'u udzo, usinyese at'u kukala udzahenda ut'u udzo, kwani ukidzanyesa Babayo wa mulunguni k'andakunosa chochosi.

Usendemwaviza mukiya, gonya ukapiga gunda, dza vizho at'u a kudzihendya mahendazho mumo ngira-ngira na masinagogini. Vizho zhosi manavihenda kwa manamala kulikwa, nami namwambira ujeri wenye kukala manoso gao gosi magonya kare kugapata.
Ela uchendamup'a kit'u mut'u mukiya be hatha wo mukonowo wa kumots'o kidza usimanye zho mukonowo wa kurya udzizhohenda.
Naye Babayo aonaye ga sirini andakunosa.”
“Muvoyaho, musikale here at'u a kudzihendya mahendazho. Kazi yao ni kuima mathanoni hedu masinagogini ili maonewe ni at'u. Bai ujeri wenye at'u dza ao magonya kare kupata mariho gao.
Ela bai, uvoyaho, ngira nyumbani mwako ufunge muryango na umuvoye Babayo ariye sirini, naye kwa kukala anaona ga sirini, andakup'a zawadiyo.
Muvoyaho musihaye-haye bule, here at'u masiomumanya Mulungu mahendazho. Kwani o manaona makinena maneno manji ndo Mulungu andaasikira.
Hatha, musihende vizho bule. Kwani ye Babiyenu be anamanya zho mumalazho hatha kabila k'amudzavoya.
Bai muvoyaho, voyani vivi:
Babiyehu uriye ko mulunguni,
dzinaro narikale rieri,
Uthawaliwo naudze.
Mahendzogo nagahendeke kuku ts'i,
here gahendekazho ko mulunguni.
Hup'e vivi rero chakurya chehu cha kuhuthosha.
Na uhusamehe makosa gehu,
here zho huasamehazho ao mahukoserao.
Na usihuhirike majezoni,
ela huokole na ye Mui.
“Kwani mukiasamehe at'u mamukosao, na Babiyenu wa mulunguni naye andamusamehe makosa genu.
Ela kala o at'u mamukoserao k'amundaasamehe, ye Babiyenu wa mulunguni naye k'andamusamehe bule.”

“Mufungaho musinyese kukala k'amuna furaha dza zho at'u a kudzihendya mahendazho. Kwani o be ni kukundza uso, ili mamanywe kukala madzafunga. Bai namwambira jeri wenye kukala ao mahokera manoso gao kare.
Ela ufungaho, oga uso, gonya udzihake mafuha,
ili at'u masimanye kukala udzafunga, isihokala Babayo ariye sirini. Bai kwa kukala iye anaona kahi za siri andakup'a zawadi.”
“Musiike akiba zenu kahi za urumwengu uu, zikariwa ni p'oho, na zikagwira k'anga, hedu aivi makadzaziiya.
Hatha bule, ikani akiba zenu mulunguni. Mana kuko k'akuna p'oho a kuzirya, hedu k'anga ya kuzononga-nonga. Kidza k'akuna aivi madimao kubanda na kuziiya.
Kwani haho handihokala akibayo, ndo handihokala moyowo.”
Bai Jesu waenderera kufundisha akiamba, “Matso ndo taa ra mwiri. Kwa vizho kala matsogo ni madzo, mwiriwo wosi nikudzala mulangaza.
Ela kala matsogo ni makongo, mwiriwo wosi nikwadzala kiza. Bai kala wo mulangaza ndani yenu udzagaluka kiza, kiza kicho be hatha k'akina mwandziwe bule.

K'akuna adimaye kuahendera kazi mathajiri airi. Kwani akihenda vizho, andamuhendza mumwenga ela ye mungine andamumena. Mumwenga andamuhendera kaziye t'ot'ot'o, ela ye mungine andamuv̱udhya. K'amudima kumuhumikira Mulungu na kuno munahumikira mali.”

“Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, ninamwambira kukala musihende wasiwasi dzulu za maisha genu na miri yenu, kala mundaryani, hedu mundanwani, hedu mundavalani. Samba uzima udzakira chakurya, na mwiri nawo udzakira nguwo?
Munawona wo unyama wa kubururuka? K'aurima, na k'auvuna ukangiza lutsagani bule, kidza Babiyenu wa mulunguni anaurisa. H'e seze ninwi murio muna kima kibomu kuukira uwo?
Ni h'ani kahi zenu adimaye kuhenda wasiwasi hatha akangeza ngaa saa mwenga kahi za maishage?
Na ni kwanoni muna wasiwasi dzulu za nguwo? Hedu lolani go maluwa ga vuweni zho gamerazho. K'agahenda kazi, hedu hatha kudzifumira nguwo.
Ela ninamwambira kukala, hatha Selemani na ushahawe wosi, kidza k'avwaliret'o dza gago maluwa.
H'enwi at'u a kuluhiro thithe nwi! Kala Mulungu anadima kuzipamba zo nyasi za vuweni ambazo rero zi haha na machero zinatsufwa mohoni zishe, h'e seze nwi. Samba Mulungu andamuvika zaidhi?
Kwa vizho bai, musithapethape kuamba mundaryani, mundanwani, hedu mundavalani,
kwani gago gosi ndo mamalago at'u masiomumanya Mulungu. Ela ninwi musithapethape, kwani Babiyenu wa mulunguni anamanya kare kukala maut'u gago gosi munagamala naye andamup'a.
Ela umaleni uthawali wa kwakwe hamwenga na uhachiwe kwandza, na zho vingine zhosi mundangezezwa.
Bai kwa ut'u uwo wenye, musihende wasiwasi dzulu za maut'u ga machero, kwa kukala siku iyo ya machero be indadzihendera wasiwasi yenye. Kwani kila siku ina thabuze za kuthosha.”
Bai Jesu waenderera kufundisha akiamba, “Musiahukumu andziyenu, p'ore nanwi mukahukumiwa.
Kwani zho mundizhohumira kuahukumira andziyenu, ndo vindizhohumirwa kumuhukumira ninwi. Cho kipimo mupimiracho andziyenu, ndicho mundichopimirwa ninwi.
Mbona unaona kinyalu kiricho dzitsoni mwa mwandziyo, ela gogo ririro dzitsoni mwako k'urisikira?
Vidze, unadimadze kumwamba mwandziyo ‘Huma nikwamboze kinyalu,’ na kuno una gogo zima dzitsoni mwako?
Kudzihendyako we! Andza kuromboza ro gogo ririro mo dzitsoni mwako kwandza, ndo undihoonat'o hatha udime kumboza cho kinyalu kiricho dzitsoni mwa mwandziyo.”
“Usihale vit'u vieri ukavip'a k'uro, kwani mandakugalukira makutharure-tharure. Kidza usihale lulu be ukazitsuhira nguluwe, kwani mandazizhoga-zhoga.”
“Voyani nanwi mundagerwa, malani nanwi mundaona, bishani nanwi mundasundulirwa.
Mana kila avoyaye, nikugerwa; kila amalaye, nikuona; na kila abishaye nikusundulirwa.
Vidze ni h'ani kahi zenu ariye mwanawe akimumala mukahe andamup'a iwe?
Hedu akimuvoya kumba andamup'a nyoka?
Bai kala ninwi at'u ai thu, kidza munamanya kuap'a ana enu vit'u vidzo, h'e seze Babiyenu wa mulunguni, ye si zaidhi? Samba ye andamup'a vit'u vidzo kila andiyemuvoya.”
“Ahendereni at'u osi dza zho muhendzazho mamuhendere ninwi, kwani gago ndo mafundisho kahi za Sheria ya Musa, na Maoro ga manabii.”
“Ngirani na muv̱irya mufufu, kwani muv̱irya wa kwangirira wangamikini ni mwalamu, na ngiraye i rahisi, na at'u anji ndo mangirirawo.
Muv̱irya wa kwangirira uzimani ni mufufu na ngiraye nayo ni k'omu, na ni achache madimao kuyona ngira ii.”
Bai Jesu waenderera kuafundisha anafundzie akiamba, “Dzitsundzeni na manabii a ulongo madzihendyao ap'ore here ng'ondzi, kudzi mioyoni mwao ni athiriri here mbawa av̱ara.
Ela vidze unadima kuhuta zabibu, kula kwa mihi ya miya? Hedu unadima kuhuta t'ini kula kwa mibaruthi? Kwa vizho ao nao mundaamanya kwa matunda gao,
kwa kukala muhi mudzo nikuzhala matunda madzo, na muhi mui nawo, nikuzhala matunda mai.
Muhi mudzo k'audima kuzhala matunda mai, hedu muhi mui ukazhala matunda madzo.
Bai kila muhi usiwozhala matunda madzo, nikuthemwa-themwa ukakundywa moho.
Ndosa namwambira kukala mundaamanya kwa mahendo gao.”
Bai Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Si osi maniambao, ‘Bwana! Bwana!’ mandangira kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni, ela ni kila andiyehenda mahendzo ga Baba ariye dzulu mulunguni.
Kwani siku iyo ya mwisho anji mandaniamba, ‘Bwana, samba sino fwamboza unabii, na fukimboza p'ep'o kidza fukihenda miujiza minji kwa dzinaro?’
Nami nindaadzigidzya niambe, ‘Nihaukirani, simumanya bule ninwi ahendi a mai.’ ”
Jesu akienderera kufundisha akiamba, “Mut'u andiyesirikiza gaga maneno gangu na kugagwira, adzahalana na mut'u mumwenga mulachu ariyeaka nyumbaye iweni.
Bai makathi ga v̱ula garihofika, v̱ula ikinya gojogojo, muretho ukidza, gonya luv̱utho nalo lukikira na haho, lukiipiga yo nyumba, ela kwa kukala yatsimbirwa musinji iweni k'aigwere bule.
Ela mut'u andesikira maneno gangu na akale k'andagagwira, adzahalana na mut'u muzuzu ariyeaka nyumbaye dhangadhini.
Bai makathi ga v̱ula garihofika, v̱ula ikinya gojogojo, na muretho ukidza, gonya luv̱utho nalo lukikira na haho lukiipiga. Bai luv̱utho lurihopiga, iryahu nyumba ikigwa na musindo mubomu.”
K'uzhona Jesu arihomarigiza kufundisha maneno gaga, ro kundi ra at'u rangalazwa ni go mafundishoge,
kwani were k'afundisha dza here alimu a Sheria mafundishazho, ela were anafundisha here mut'u mwenye wadimi.
Vikara Jesu arihokala adzagonya kufundisha, watharamuka kula ho dzulu murimani, na go makundi ga at'u gakikwatya kumuthuwa.
Bai lola hachambola mut'u mumwenga ariyekala ana mahana, akidzapiga mavindi ho mbere za Jesu akiamba, “Bwana, ukihendza unadima ukanihoza!”
Jesu akigoloza mukono akimugut'a akimwamba, “Ninahendza, hola.” Na haho na haho kare, ye mut'u akihola.
Bai Jesu akimwamba, “Vivi be usizhambire mut'u bule, ela enda ukamwanyese mulombi, gonya umboze sadaka ya ko kuholako, iryahu ariyolagiza Musa, ili kila mut'u amanye kukala udzahola jeri.”
Vikara, Jesu arihokala anangira mudzini Kaperinaumu, mubomu mumwenga wa jeshi ra Kirumi wamwendera, akimuvoya akimwamba,
“Bwana, muhumiki wangu ni mukongo sana. Vilungozhe zhaholoza na analumwa k'azhadimikika.”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Nidzasikira, nadza nimuhoze.”
Ye mubomu wa shikari akimwamba Jesu, “Bwana, mimi siv̱irya kukala udze wangire nyumbani mwangu, ela nena neno thu, na muhumiki wangu andahola.

Kwani mimi nami ni ts'ini za abomu angu, kidza nina shikari mario ts'ini zangu. Nikimwamba mumwenga, ‘Enda hat'u hasiku,’ anenda. Na yoyosi nindiyemwamba ‘Ndzo,’ anadza. Nikimwamba muhumiki wangu ‘Henda ut'u usiku’ anauhenda.”
Jesu arihomusikira wangalala, gonya akinena na o at'u mariokala manamuthuwa akiamba, “Ninamwambira ujeri, sidzangwe kuona mut'u mwenye kuluhiro dza riri hatha kahi za ts'i ya Iziraeli.
Nami namwambira kukala, at'u anji mandambola mwambolero wa dzuwa, na mutserero wa dzuwa, madze makelesi hamwenga na Burahemu, na Isaka, na Jakobu chakuryani kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni.
Ela o mariotengezerwa wo uthawali enye, mandatsufwa ko ndze kizani, na kuko kundakala na kurira na kwafuna meno.”
Arihogonya kunena viryahu, Jesu wamugalukira ye mubomu wa shikari akimwamba, “Enda, navikale here udzizhokuluhira.” Na wakathi uwo wenye ye muhumikiwe akihola.
Jesu arihombola haho, wakwenda hatha nyumbani kwa P'et'ero, achendamuthekeza mutsedza wa P'et'ero wa kiche a kitandani, ana homa.
Bai, Jesu wamugut'a wo mukono, na haho henye ro homa rikimuricha, hatha akiuka akimuhikirahikira.
K'uzhona dzulo riro, Jesu akireherwa at'u anji mariokala mana p'ep'o. O p'ep'o akiachemera makimbola, na akihoza akongo osi.
Bai gaga gahendeka, ili garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii Isaya gathimire. Kwani Isaya waamba, “Wagahala manyonge gehu, na akigahoza makongo gehu.”
Jesu arihoona ro kundi ra at'u mariokala madzamudengereka, akiaamurisha anafundzie kukala mavuke ro ziya mende nyangamo nyingine.
Kabila k'amadzaandza kuvuka, mwalimu mumwenga wa Sheria akidzamwamba kukala, “Mwalimu, mimi nindakuthuwa kila undikokwenda.”
Ela Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Makala gana p'anga, na unyama una vitsunji zhao, ela Mwana wa Mudamu k'ana hat'u ha kuika mbavu.”
Kumbola iye, mwanafundzi mungine akiamba, “Bwana, niricha nikamuzike baba kwandza be nidze nikuthuwe.”
Ela Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Nithuwa. Ariche at'u mariofwa mazike nyufu zao.”
Bai arihogonya kunena, Jesu akingira dauni na anafundzie makimuthuwa.
Marihofika kahikahi ya ro ziya, lola kukidza luv̱utho lukali, maimbi gakikala ganamala kuridzaza madzi ro dau. Vinakala vizho, Jesu ye tha were arere.
Bai o anafundzi marihoona viryahu machendamulamusa Jesu makimwamba, “Huthizhe Bwana, hunahoha!”
Jesu akiamba, “H'enwi at'u a kuluhiro thithe mbona mu aoga.” Akirungarara akiluchemera lo luv̱utho na go maimbi, nazho hu vikihurira.
Bai marihoona vizho, o anafundzi makingalala zhomu makiamba, “Ni mut'u ariyedze yuno! Hatha luv̱utho na maimbi kidza nazho vinamusikira!”

Jesu na anafundzie marihothima yo nyangamo nyingine, iriyo kahi za ts'i ya Agadari, wadhanwa ni anaalume airi mariokala na p'ep'o. At'u ao were makala makaburini, kidza were ni av̱ara hatha yo ngira ya kuko were k'aikirirwa kaheri kwa ao.
Bai marihomona Jesu anadza, lola makipiga k'ululu makimwamba, “Unani naswi h'ewe Mwana wa Mulungu? Hedu udzire uhutese kare, na wakathi k'audzafika?”
Vikara ho kimberembere, kure nao vichache, were hanarisa ribadhi ra nguluwe.
Bai, o p'ep'o makimuvoya Jesu makimwamba, “Kala undafwamboza, furiche fukaangire aryahu nguluwe.”

Jesu akiadzigidzya, akiamba, “H'aya, endani.” Bai o p'ep'o makiambola o at'u na machendaangira o nguluwe. Lola ro badhi rosi ra nguluwe rikitharamuka malo kula ko ngokani, rikivoromoka mo ziyani, rikifwa.
Kuona vizho, o arisa makichimbira, machangira mumo mudzini, makisema gosi garigokala gadzahendeka kwa o at'u mariokala na p'ep'o.
Na lola at'u osi kula ko midzini bagabaga makidzamulola Jesu. Bai marihomona makimuvoya kukala akulae kuko kwao.
Vikara Jesu arihombola kuko, wakwera dau akivuka ro ziya akiuya kwao Kaperinaumu.
Arihofika kuko lola at'u makimurehera mut'u wa kuholoza ariyekala arere kitandani mwakwe. Bai Jesu arihoona ro kuluhiro rao, akimwamba ye mukongo, “Dzip'e moyo mwanangu, dambizo zidzasamehewa.”
Jesu arihonena vizho, lola angine kahi za o alimu a Sheria makikwatya kunena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Mut'u yuyu be ananena kufuru.”
Ela Jesu akimanya maazo gao, na akiamba, “Mbona muna maazo mai zho?
Kwani, virizho rahisi ni hizho? Ni kumwamba mut'u, ‘Dambizo zidzasamehewa,’ hedu ni kumwamba, ‘Uka wanende?’
H'aya manyani bai, kukala Mwana wa Mudamu ana wadimi wa kusamehe dambi haha dhuniani.” Arihogonya kunena vizho, akimwamba ye mut'u wa kuholoza, “Uka uhale kitandacho wende kwenu.”
Na ye mut'u akiuka, achenda kwao.
Vikara aryahu at'u marihomona viryahu makiogoha zhomu, na makimulika Mulungu kwa kuap'a anadamu wadimi dza uwo.
Vikara Jesu arihombola haho, wakwendamona mut'u ariyekala anaifwa Math'ayo. Mut'u yuyu were akelesi kahi za ofisi ya kodi. Bai Jesu arihomona, akimwamba, “Nithuwa.” Math'ayo akirungarara akimuthuwa.
Badaye Jesu na anafundzie, makwendarya chakurya nyumbani kwa Math'ayo. Na lola athozi a kodi anji na at'u angine mariokala manaonewa kukala ni enye dambi, makudzarya hamwenga nao.
Vikara Mafarisayo marihoona viryahu, makiauza o anafundzie, “Mbona ye mwalimu wenu anarya chakurya na athozi a kodi hamwenga na enye dambi?”
Jesu arihosikira vizho akiamba, “Mukongo nde mwenye haja na muganga, ela muzima k'ana haja na muganga bule.
Hedu garya Maoro gaambago, ‘Sadaka zenu sizendzi, nimalazo ni mbazi,’ manaye ni noni? H'aya kagashomeni mugamanye manaye. Mimi nakudzaaiha enye dambi, sidzireaiha enye hachi!”
Siku mwenga, anafundzi a Johana makwenda kwa Jesu, machendamuza makimwamba, “Ni kwanoni sino na Mafarisayo hunafunga, ela anafundzio o k'amafunga?”
Bai Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Vidze ajeni a harusini nikukala na sumazi wakathi bwana harusi manaye haho? Ela siku zinadza, ambazo ye bwana harusi andauswa kahikahi zao, na haho mandafunga.
K'ahana mut'u adimaye kuhala nguwo ya kapindi akayangiza kiraka kisha, mana cho kiraka kindayamola yo nguwo chambole, na kindaihendya ikale na t'undu bomu kukira iyo ya chaho.

Kidza, divai mbisha k'aingizwa kahi za viriba zha kapindi. Kwani ikingizwa, indavipashula zho viriba imwagike. Bai zho viriba vindakala vidzanongeka, na yo divai nayo indakala idzamwagika. Ela divai mbisha ingizwa kahi za viriba visha, na k'ahana kindichonongeka.”
Bai Jesu arihokala achere kunena, lola mubomu mumwenga wa Kiyahudi, akidzamupigira mavindi akimwamba, “Bwana, musichana wangu ala kufwani, hinde ukamuikire mukono naye andafufuka.”
Jesu arihosikira vizho, iye hamwenga na anafundzie makiuka makimuthuwa.

Vikara lola, kahi za ro kundi ra at'u mwere muna mwanamuche mumwenga ariyekala adzakala mukongo wa kumbola milatso kwa miaka kumi na miri. Bai mwanamuche yuyahu wamuthuwa Jesu ko nyuma kuno ananena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Nikigut'a ro valore thu, nindahola.” K'ona akigut'a wo mutsa wa ro valore.

Vikara lola, kahi za ro kundi ra at'u mwere muna mwanamuche mumwenga ariyekala adzakala mukongo wa kumbola milatso kwa miaka kumi na miri. Bai mwanamuche yuyahu wamuthuwa Jesu ko nyuma kuno ananena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Nikigut'a ro valore thu, nindahola.” K'ona akigut'a wo mutsa wa ro valore.
Bai ye mwanamuche arihogut'a ro valo, Jesu akigaluka, na arihomona akimwamba, “Dzip'e moyo mwanangu, kuluhiro ra kwako ridzakuhoza.” Na ye mwanamuche akihola haho na haho.
Jesu arihofika ko nyumbani kwa ye mubomu wa sinagogi, wakwendathekeza at'u anji. Arya manarira, na arya manapiga vivoti. Bai akiamboza mumo nyumbani akiamba,
“Mbolani, kwani ye musichana k'afwere bule, arere thu.” Kusikira vizho at'u makimutseka.
Bai aryahu at'u marihokala madzagonya kumbola, Jesu achangira ndani, na achendamugwira mukono iye mufwa, naye haho na haho kare akiuka.
Na lola uv̱oro uwo ukitsamuka lalo zima.
Vikara Jesu arihokala anambola kuko, wathuwiwa ni anaalume airi vipofu, makiluta mimiro yao makimwamba, “Mwana wa Daudi, huonere mbazi!”
Bai Jesu wathuwa kwenda hatha anangira nyumbani, vipofu nao thia. Akiauza akiamba, “Vidze munakuluhira kukala nadima kumuhoza?” Makiamba, “Ee, funakuluhira Bwana.”
Bai Jesu akiagut'a go matso, gonya akiamba, “H'aya navikale here mukuluhirazho.”
Na lola arihonena vizho thu, matso ga o vipofu gakigunuka na makikwatya kuona. Bai Jesu akiakokot'era zhomu zhenye kukala masizhambire mut'u.
Ela marihouka haho, machendavitsamusa kahi za lalo zima.
Vikara marihokala makuukani, lola Jesu akireherwa mut'u ariyekala wapagawa ni p'ep'o. Mut'u yuyu were ni bwibwi.

Bai, Jesu akimwamboza ye p'ep'o na ye bwibwi akikwatya kunena. Bai zhaangalaza at'u anji sana hatha makikwatya kunena h'akiyao na kuamba, “Zho zha bwibwi kunena k'ahudzazhona bule kahi za ts'i ya Iziraeli!”
Ela Mafarisayo makiamba, “Yuyu anamboza p'ep'o kwa kuhumira nguvu za mubomu wa p'ep'o.”
Bai Jesu wadengereka kurya na kurya, kahi za midzi mibomu na mithithe, kufundisha kahi za masinagogi, na kuhubiri Uv̱oro Udzo wa uthawali wa mulunguni, na kuhoza akongo na anyonge a kila namuna.
Ela arihoona go makundi ga at'u, waalola na akiaonera mbazi, kwa viryahu marizhokala manasirima na k'amamanya mahendedze, here ng'ondzi zisizo na murisa.
Bai akiagalukira anafundzie akiambira, “Mavuno ni manji, ela ahendzi a kazi ni achache.
Kwa vizho bai muvoyeni ye Bwana wa mavuno, ahume ahendzi a kazi madze mavune.”
Bai Jesu akiaiha aryahu anafundzie kumi na airi na akiap'a wadimi wa kumboza p'ep'o na kuhoza makongo na manyonge ga kila namuna.
Ahumwi ao were ni Simoni ariyekala akiifwa P'et'ero na nduguye aifwaye Anderea. Angine were ni Jakobu na Johana, ambao were ni ana a Zebedayo,
Filipu, Bath'olomayo, T'omasi, na Math'ayo ariyekala muthozi wa kodi. Angine mere ni Jakobu mwana wa Alifayo, na Th'adayo,
na Simoni Muhehezi, na Juda Isikariote ariye nde ariyemusaliti Jesu.
Vikara Jesu waahuma aa anafundzie kumi na airi akiamba, “Musendeni kwa at'u mario si Ayahudi, hedu hatha kahi za midzi ya Asamaria.
Ela endani kwa Aiziraeli, ziryahu ng'ondzi zangu zirizongamika.
Endani mukihubiri mukiamba, uthawali wa mulunguni udzafika hehi.
Hozani mahana na makongo mangine, fufulani nyufu, na mbozani p'ep'o. Gaga gosini gahendeni bule renye, mana zo nguvu za kuhendera maut'u gaga hatha ninwi mwazigerwa bule.
Vikara kala munenda, musitsukule akiba yoyosi ya p'esa mabindoni mwenu.
Musitsukule mukoba, hedu k'andzu mbiri, hedu virahu zha kugaluza, hedu mudhath'a mo charoni.”
“Muhendzi wa kazi av̱irya kupata p'oshoye.
Mundihongira kahi za mudzi wowosi, lolani mut'u mudzo andiyemukaribisha na mukale ho hakwe hatha muuke vizho.
Na mundihongira kahi za mudzi wowosi, lamusani muambe, ‘Dheri narikale kahi za mudzi uu.’
Na kala mudzi uwo ni mudzo jeri, dheri renu narikale kahi za mudzi uwo. Ela kala mudzi uwo si mudzo, dheri renu narimuuyire.
Na mudzi wowosi, hedu mut'u yoyosi andiyekahala kumukaribisha, hedu hatha kusikiza gago mundigokala munamala kuganena, kut'ani-kut'ani nyayo zenu, gonya muhauke.
Kwani namwambira kamare kukala yo siku ya hukumu vindakala vii-vii zhomu kwa mudzi uwo, kukira zho vindizhokala kwa midzi ya Sodomu na Gomora.”
“Lolani, ninamuhuma here ng'ondzi kahikahi za mbawa. Kwa vizho bai kalani alachu here nyoka, na mukale ap'eho here magiya.
Dzimanyirireni kwani at'u mandamugwira mamuhirike manenoni na mamupige mo masinagogini mwao.
Mundagwirwa muhirikwe mbere za maluwali na mbere za athawali kwa ut'u wangu, nanwi mundakwenda mukamboze ushuhuda dzulu zangu mbere zao, na mbere za at'u mario si Ayahudi.
Mushithakiwaho, musithapethape bule kupanga maneno ga kwendanena, kwani gago mundagagerwa wakathi uwo wa kudzihehera.
Kwani sinwi mundionena bule, Roho wa Babiyenu ndiye andenena kwa milomo yenu.”
“Mut'u andamulazha nduguye mwenye hedu mwanawe mwenye alagwe. Ana nao mandaagalukira azhazi ao enye, maalazhe malagwe.
Nanwi mundamenwa ni at'u osi kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu. Ela andiyevumirira hatha mwisho andaokoka.

Mukiteswa kahi za mudzi uu, chimbirani mwende mudzi mungine, kuko nako mukiteswa, chimbirani mwende mungine. Nami namwambira kamare kukala k'amundaigot'ya bule yo midzi ya Iziraeli kabila Mwana wa Mudamu kudza.”
“Mwanafundzi k'adima kumukira mwalimuwe, na mutumwa k'adima kumukira bwanawe.
Vinathosha kare zho zha mwanafundzi akale here mwalimuwe, hedu mutumwa akale here bwanawe. Vikikala mwenye nyumba mwenye thu, kisha manamwiha Belizebuli,
h'e seze nwi adamue?”
“Musiogohe bule, kila kit'u kidzichobiningizwa kindagunulwa, na kila kit'u kidzichofitswa kindaonewa.
Kila nindiromwambira kizani, rineneni lwazu mulangazani. Na kila mundirosikira njamani, ritangazeni zhomu zhenye.
Musiagohe ao madimao kuwalaga wo mwiri h'akeye, ela roho yo, k'amayadima bule. Mwagoheni iye adimaye kuuhala wo mwiri hamwenga na yo roho, na akavinonga-nonga kahi za Jehanamu.
Utsongo wiri samba unaguzwa rahisi renye, kidza ko k'ahana hatha kamwenga kadimako kufwa bila Babiyenu kuhendza.
Na hatha zo nyere zenu kidza Mulungu anazimanya isabuye.
Kwa vizho bai musogohe bule, mana ninwi muna th'amani bomu kukira iho ra utsongo.
“Kila andiyenikubali mbere za at'u, mimi nami nindamukubali mbere za Baba ariye mulunguni.
Ela kila mut'u andiyenikahala mbere za at'u, nami nindamukahala mbere za Baba ariye mulunguni.”
“Sioneni kukala nakudzareha dheri haha dhuniani, hatha bule, nakudzareha k'ondo.
Kwani nakudzaahendya ana a kilume mathengane na babizao, ana a kiche mathengane na mamizao, na akaza ana mathengane na mizhala zao.
Mahadhui a mut'u mandakala o at'u a nyumbani mwakwe.”
“Kila amuhendzaye babaye hedu mameye kunikira mimi, hedu amuhendzaye mwanawe wa kiche hedu wa kilume kunikira mimi, k'av̱irya kukala wangu bule.
Mut'u yoyosi ariye k'andahala musalabawe na kunithuwa, k'av̱irya kukala wangu bule.
Kwani kila andiyeyona rohoye andayangamiza, na andiyeyangamiza rohoye kwa ut'u wangu, andayona.”
“Kila mut'u amuhokeraye ninwi, ananihokera mimi, na iye anihokeraye mimi, anamuhokera iye ariyenihuma.
Kila mut'u amuhokeraye nabii kwa kukala ni nabii, andapata zawadi ya nabii, na kila mut'u andiyemuhokera mut'u muhachi, kwa kukala ni muhachi, andapata zawadi ya mut'u muhachi.
Na kila mut'u andiyemup'a mumwenga wa aa at'u athithe, ngaa kikombe cha madzi ga p'eho kwa kukala ni mwanafundzi wangu, jeri wenye mut'u iye k'andakosa zawadiye bule.”
Vikara Jesu arihokala adzagonya kualagiza o anafundzie kumi na airi, akihauka haryahu arihokala, achangira kahi za midzi mingine ya Galilaya, kuhubiri na kufundisha kuko.
Wakathi uryahu, Johana Mubat'izaji were a jela. Bai arihosikira gago maut'u gosi arigokala akigahenda ye Masihi, wahuma anafundzie makamuze Jesu mamwambe,
“Vidze, we ndiwe yuyahu huriyekala hunamuthariza hedu hutharize mungine?”
K'uzhona marihouza viryahu, Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Uyani mukamwambire Johana gago musikirago na kugaona.
At'u masoona manaona, vidende mananenda, akongo a mahana manahozwa, at'u masio na masikiro manasikira, nyufu zinafufulwa, na masikini manahubiriwa Uv̱oro Udzo.
Na baha iye ariye k'andakala na tashwishi dzulu zangu.”

Bai aryahu anafundzi a Johana marihokala makuukani, Jesu akigalukira ro kundi ra at'u akinena dzulu za Johana akiamba, “Harya murihokwenda kurya nyika were mudzakwendalolani? Vidze were mudzakwendalola kirungurungu kinafuswa-fuswa ni lupeho?
Hedu mwakwendalola mut'u adzevala nguwo mbidzo? Hatha, mavalao nguwo mbidzo k'amakala nyika bule, makala kahi za madzumba ga athawali.
H'aya nambirani bai cho murichokwendalola ko nyika. Vidze mwakwendamulola nabii? Ee, ni vizho mwakwendamulola nabii. Nami ninamwambira kamare kukala mwakwendamulola mut'u ariye ni zaidhi ya nabii.
Kwani iye Johana ndiye ariyenenwa kahi za Maoro kukala, ‘Lola ninahuma mujumbe wangu mberezo, andiyekutengezera ngirayo kimbere.’
Nami namwambira kamare kukala haha urumwenguni be k'ahadzazhalwa mut'u mubomu kumukira Johana, ela ye muthithe mwenye kamare kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni be ni mubomu kumukira ye Johana.
Na hangu Johana aandze kuhubiri na kubat'iza at'u, wo uthawali wa mulunguni be udzakala ukipigwa viha, na ni o masitao ndo mandiowangira kwa nguvu.
Sheria za Musa na mafundisho ga manabii osi hatha kumufikira Johana ganena dzulu za wo uthawali.
Kwa vizho ahendzaye kukuluhira naakuluhire kukala Johana nde iye Elija ariyekala anatharizwa.
Mwenye masikiro, naasikire.”
Bai Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Kizhazi kino be tha ndakihalanisha na noni mino? Kidzahalana na ahoho makeresio sokoni. Asena ao manaamba,
‘Fudzamupigira vivoti, ela k'amuvinire, hudzamuimbira wira wa hanga, ela k'amuririre kamare.’
Johana wakudza haha, akikala k'arya na k'anwa mukiamba kukala ana p'ep'o.

Vino Mwana wa Mudamu wakudza, anarya na ananwa munamwamba kukala adzatona, kidza ni murevi na musena wa athozi a kodi, na enye dambi angine. Ela ulachu wa Mulungu unamanywa ni wa ujeri, kukirira kwa mahendo ga ao maukubalio.”
Vikara Jesu akikwatya kuidumulira iryahu midzi ariyo were wakwendahenda miujiza mibomu-mibomu, ela at'u a kuko hatha bada ya kuona miujiza iyo, makikahala kuthubu vizho.

Bai waamba, “Shauri yenu ninwi at'u a Korazini na Beth'isaida. Kwani kala yo miujiza niriyoihenda ko kwenu be naihenda kahi za midzi ya Tiro na Sidoni be o andziyenu ngere mavala nguwo za magunia, na kukala ivuni kapindi kunyesa kuthubu kwao.
Nami vivi namwambira kamare kukala yo siku ya hukumu vindakala baha o at'u a Tiro na Sidoni kaheri kuriko ninwi.

Nwi at'u a Kaperinaumu nanwi, munaona mundanulwa hatha mulunguni? Hatha bule. Ninwi mundatserezwa hatha kuzimu. Kwani kala yo miujiza iriyohendwa mo mudzini mwenu be yahendwa kahi za mudzi wa Sodomu, ngere Sodomu ichereko hatha rero.
Nanwi vivi namwambira kamare kukala, haho siku ya hukumu be vindakala vii-vii zhomu kwenu ninwi kuriko kwa at'u a Sodomu.”
K'uzhona wakathi uwo vizho, Jesu akiamba, “Nakulazhira muv̱era h'ewe Baba, Bwana wa dzulu na ts'i, kwa kukala maut'u gaga wagafitsa alachu na enye akili, ukigagunulira madanga ga ana.
Ni karakara Baba kwa kukala vizho were ndo urizhohendza.”

Bai arihogonya kulazha muv̱era akiagalukira o at'u akiamba, “Maut'u gosini gaikwa mikononi mwangu ni Baba. K'akuna mut'u amumanyaye ye Mwana asihokala ye Baba, na k'akuna mut'u amumanyaye ye Baba asihokala ye Mwana na aryahu ambao ye Mwana anahendza kuang'azira ye Baba.”
“Ndzoni kwangu ninwi nyosi musirimao, na murio mudzaremererwa ni mizigo nami nindamuoyeza.
Rivaleni gogo rangu, mudzifundishe kwangu, kwa kukala mimi ni mup'eho na mup'ore, nanwi mundaoya kamare kahi za maroho genu.
Kwani gogo rangu ni shushu na muzigo wangu k'auremerera.”

Vikara makathi garyahu, Jesu hamwenga na anafundzie makala manakira kahikahi za minda ya ngano siku ya Sabato. Bai marihokala makukirani, o anafundzie makikala manasikira ndzala, kwa vizho makikwatya kuhuta masuche ga ngano na kwafuna.
Mafarisayo marihoona viryahu makimwamba, “Lola! O anafundzio manahenda ut'u uriwo k'auhendwa siku ya Sabato.”
Bai Jesu arihosikira vizho akiadzigidzya o Mafarisayo akiamba, “Muthawali Daudi wahendadze harya arihokala iye na o at'u ariokala nao mana ndzala? Hedu k'amudzavishoma?
Samba wangira kahi za nyumba ya Mulungu, na akirya yo mikahe ya sadaka, iriyo kulengana na Sheria, iye hedu hatha ao ariokala nao k'amav̱irya kuirya, hasihokala o alombi thu-thu-thu.
H'aya zho mbai, yo Sheria ya Musa samba inaamba kukala alombi manabanda Sheria ya Sabato kila siku ya Sabato kahi za Hekalu, kidza k'amana makosa gogosi. Zho nazho k'amudzavishoma?
Vivi be manyani kukala haha hana mut'u mubomu kukira riro Hekalu.
Na kala munamanya mana ya go Maoro gaambago kukala, ‘Sadaka zenu sizendzi, nimalazo ni mbazi,’ k'amungaahukumire at'u mario k'amana makosa.
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu nde Bwana wa yo siku ya Sabato.”
Bai arihombola haho Jesu wakwendangira kahi za ro sinagogi rao.

Na lola muryahu sinagogini, were muna mut'u mwenye mukono wa kuholoza. Na kwa kukala o Mafarisayo were manamala chausa cha kumushithakira Jesu, mamuza makimwamba, “Vidze, ni karakara kumuhoza mut'u siku ya Sabato?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ni h'ani kahi zenu ariye ng'ondziye ikivoromoka winani siku ya Sabato andairicha mumo kwa kukala ni siku ya Sabato?
Vidze mudamu anadima kulinganishwa na ng'ondzi? Kwa vizho bai ni karakara kamare kisheria kuhenda madzo siku ya Sabato.”
Kugonya kunena vizho, akimwambira ye mut'u, “Goloza wo mukonowo hedu.” Naye arihogoloza thu, ukiuyat'o na ukikala dza uwo mungine.
Vikara o Mafarisayo marihoona kukala Jesu adzamuhoza ye mut'u, machambola machendapanga zho mandizhomwalaga Jesu.
Bai Jesu arihoipata p'eho yo njama yao, akihauka achenda kungine. Ela hamwenga na vizho, at'u anji mamuthuwa na akiahoza at'u osi mariokala ni akongo.
Ela akiakokot'era kukala masimuhendye akamanywa iye ni h'ani.
Bai wahenda vivi ili garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii Isaya gathimire. Kwani Isaya waamba,
“Lolani ye muhumiki wangu niriyemutsagula.
Ninamuhendza na ananifwahiza.
Nindamwangiza nguvu za Roho wangu
ili atangazire at'u mario si Ayahudi, kukala hukumu indakala ya hachi.
K'andapigana k'anani na at'u hedu kupiga k'ululu.
Kidza k'andanena zhomu-zhomu bule mo ngira-ngira.
At'u mario k'amana nguvu
k'andaabanda moyo bule.
Naye andaenderera vizho muhaka ahakikishe
kukala hachi idzashinda.
Na kukirira na dzinare,
at'u mario si Ayahudi mandahendywa makale na th'amaa ya hakika.”

Vikara kahi za wakathi uwo, Jesu akireherwa mut'u ariyekala wapagawa ni p'ep'o. Mut'u yuyu were ni kipofu, na ni bwibwi. Ela arihorefwa kwa Jesu, Jesu akimuhoza na ye bwibwi akikwatya kuona na kunena.
Bai aryahu at'u marihoona viryahu osi makingalala zhomu, makiamba, “Yuno ela si iye Mwana wa Daudi?”
Ela Mafarisayo marihosikira vizho makiamba, “Hatha bule! Yuyu anamboza p'ep'o kwa kuhumira nguvu za Belizebuli, mubomu wa p'ep'o.”

Ela Jesu akigamanya go maazo gao na akiambira, “Ts'i yoyosi, o at'ue makidzigazha makundi-makundi, gahehanago, be ts'i iyo indanongeka. Na mudzi wowosi hedu hatha nyumba yoyosi, at'u makikala k'amagwirana milomo, mudzi uwo hedu nyumba iyo, k'aindatoa.
Na Shethani akimboza Shethani mwandziwe, andakala adzadzigazha. Vidze uthawaliwe undatoa jeri?
Chamba mino namboza p'ep'o kwa nguvu za Belizebuli, o afuasi enu o manaamboza kwa nguvu za h'ani? Bai ao ndo mandiomuhukumu ninwi.
Ela nikimboza p'ep'o kwa Roho wa Mulungu, be wo uthawali wa Mulungu udzamudzirira.
Kwani k'akuna mut'u adimaye kungira kahi za nyumba ya mut'u mwenye nguvu na kumuhoka vit'uzhe hasiho kumufunga ye mwenye kwandza, ndo adime kumuhoka zho vit'uzhe.”
“Kila mut'u ariye k'ahamwenga nami, a kinyume nami. Na iye ariye k'anaviza kukundzumanya hamwenga, kaziye ni kutsamula.
Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, ninamwambira kamare kukala, kila dambi na kila kufuru indasamehewa, ela kufuru dzulu za Roho Mweri, k'aindasamehewa bule.

Mut'u andiyenena ut'u wowosi kinyume cha Mwana wa Mudamu andasamehewa. Ela kila andiyenena ut'u wowosi kinyume cha Roho Mweri k'andasamehewa ng'o, kahi za urumwengu uu, na hatha kahi za urumwengu udzawo.”
“Kila muhi umanyikana kwa gago matundage uzhalago. Muhi ukiutengezerat'o undazhala matunda madzo. Ela kala k'aundatengezerwat'o undazhala matunda mai-mai.
H'enwi kizhazi cha nyoka! Munadimadze kunena madzo kuno mioyo yenu i thele uthiriri? Mana kanwa ka mut'u kanena garyahu gadzigowadzala moyowe.
Mut'u mudzo, nikuzhala madzo kula kahi za akibaye mbidzo. Na mut'u mui naye, nikuzhala mai, kula kahi za akibaye mbii.
Ela mino namwambira kukala, kila neno risirofwaha, andironena mut'u andakudza arisemet'o haho siku ya hukumu.
Kwani siku iyo, mulomowo mwenye ndo undokuhendya ugerwe hachi, hedu uhukumiwe.”
Vikara Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, badhi ra Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria makimwamba, “Mwalimu, funamala fuone muujiza kula kwako.”
Jesu akiamba, “Kizhazi kithiriri kisokuluhira! Kinamala kwanyeswa muv̱ano, bai k'akindanyeswa muv̱ano wowosi, isihokala uryahu wa nabii Jona h'akeye.
Na here Jona arizhomizwa ni nyangumi, na akikala ndanini mwakwe siku t'ahu, usiku na mutsana, Mwana wa Mudamu naye andakala mitsangani siku t'ahu, usiku na mutsana.

Nami namwambira kukala, siku iryahu ya hukumu at'u a mudzi wa Ninawi mandarungarara mamupige ulongo, kwa kukala marihosikira mahubiri ga Jona, mathubu dambi zao. Na lola vivi thiyuno mut'u mubomu kumukira Jona.

H'aya zho mbai, siku iyo ya hukumu vizho, muthawali muche wa ts'i ya kwa Mwaka, andarungarara amupige ulongo ninwi, kwa kukala iye wambola kure sana, akidza ts'i ya Iziraeli kudzasirikiza ulachu wa Selemani. Vino lola thiyuno mut'u mulachu kumukira Selemani, ela k'amumusirikiza.”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “P'ep'o amwambolaho mut'u, nikundengereka kut'u kuriko k'akuna madzi ili apate hat'u ha kuoya, ela akikosa,
nikunena kimoyo-moyo akaamba, ‘Mut'u mimi nindauya iryahu nyumba niriyombola.’ Bai auyaho nikuithekeza yo nyumba ni t'uhu, yasherwat'o na ikipangwat'o.

Vikara aonaho vizho nikwendahala p'ep'o angine afungahe, ai kumukira ye mwenye, akadza nao, makadzangira, makatoa mumo. Bai hali ya mut'u iye ni kukala mbii-mbii hatha kukira zho arizhokala chaho. Na vizho ndo vindizhokala kwa kizhazi kiki kithiriri.”
Vikara Jesu arihokala achere kunena na riryahu kundi ra at'u, lola mameye, na nduguze Jesu a kilume poo! Makiima ko ndze, makikala manamala kunena naye.
Bai mut'u mumwenga akimwamba Jesu, “Mameyo na nduguzo manakumala ko ndze.”
Jesu arihosikira vizho akiuza, “M'ama na ndugu zangu ni hio?”
Arihouza vizho, akienderera kunena kuno anaaloha o anafundzie akiamba, “Aa be ndo m'ama na ndo ndugu zangu.
Kwani kila ahendaye mahendzo ga Baba ariye mulunguni, nde m'ama na nde ndugu yangu.”
Bai siku iyo vizho, Jesu achambola mumo nyumbani arimokala na achendakelesi k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya ra Galilaya.
K'uzhona arihokwendakelesi kuko, rikundi ribomu ra at'u rikimudzalira hatha akiona ni baha akwere dauni akelesi mumo. Bai wakelesi dauni kuno at'u angine osi makiima ko k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya.
Akiambira maut'u manji kwa kuhumira mafumbo. Akiamba, “Mut'u mumwenga wauka kwendamwaga-mwaga mbeyu mundani kwakwe.
Vikara arihokala akuzimwagani-mwagani, mbeyu nyingine zikigwa k'anda-k'anda ya ngira. Unyama ukidzazit'ot'a.
Nyingine zikigwa kahi za mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, harihokala hana mutsanga muchache. Bai zikimera malo-malo kwa kukala were hana mutsanga muchache.
Ela zirihopigwa ni dzuwa thu zikinyala kare, kwa kukala were k'azina miziji ya kwenda kure.
Mbeyu nyingine zikigwa miyani. Zirihomera, miya iryahu ikikula na ikizizia-zia hatha k'azipatire nafasi ya kumbola ndze bule.
Ela mbeyu nyingine zo zikigwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo, na zikizhalat'o sana. Nyingine zazhala gana-gana, nyingine mirongo mihandahu, na nyingine zo zikizhala mirongo mihahu.”
Arihogonya kunena viryahu akiamba, “Mwenye masikiro, naasikire.”
Bai, ariholaa haho, o anafundzie makimuza makimwamba, “Kwanoni unahendza kuhumira mafumbo kala unanena na o at'u?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ninahenda vizho kwa kukala ninwi mwajaliwa kumanya siri za uthawali wa mulunguni, ela aryahu k'amajaliwirwe bule.
Kwani kila ariye nacho andangezwa, akale na vinji, ela ariye k'ana kit'u kamare, hatha cho kichache aricho nacho kidza andakihokwa.
At'u aryahu ninanena nao kwa mafumbo, kwa kukala manalola, ela k'amaona bule, kidza manasikiza, ela k'amasikira hedu kuelewa.
Na garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii Isaya haho kapindi vivi gadzathimira kwao. Kwani Isaya wanena akiamba,
‘Mundasirikiza na kusirikiza
ela k'amundang'alirwa bule.
Mundalola na kulola
ela k'amundaona bule.
Mana mioyo ya at'u aa idzakala mikomu,
masikiro gao madzagagandiza,
matso gao madzagafinya,
masidze makaona na go matso gao,
makasikira na go masikiro gao,
makang'alirwa na yo mioyo yao,
makanigalukira mimi, nikaahoza.’
Baha ninwi, kwani masikiro genu ganasikira na matso genu ganaona.
Kwani be namwambira kamare kukala, manabii anji na at'u ahachi angine, mathamani kuona gaga mugaonago, ela k'amagaonere, kidza mathamani masikire gago mugasikirago, ela k'amagasikirire bule.”
Jesu akienderera kunena na anafundzie akiamba, “Vikara, sirikizani nimwambire mana ya ro fumbo ra mulayi.
Kila mut'u ariye akisikira neno ra Mulungu k'arielewa, ye Mui nikudza na kurusa ho moyoni ririholaywa. Bai mut'u dza iye nde iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa haryahu k'anda-k'anda ya ngira.
Ziryahu mbeyu zirizogwa mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, ni mut'u ariye akisikira neno thu, anarihokera kare mara mwenga, kidza anarihokera na raha.
Ela kwa kukala neno riryahu k'arina miziji moyoni mwakwe, mut'u yuyahu k'atoa naro bule. Kwani thabu, hedu mateso gakimudzirira kwa ut'u wa ro neno, k'avumirira bule, anaviricha kare.
Mungine ye ni here iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa miyani. Mut'u iye nikusikira ro neno ra Mulungu, ela v̱ata za urumwengu, na ukengi wa mali, nikurikonya-konya ro neno hatha rikakala k'arindazhala kit'u.

Ela mut'u mungine ye ni here iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo. Mut'u yuyu nikurisikira ro neno ra Mulungu, akarielewat'o. Bai at'u mario dza vizho yuyu, nikuzhala matunda. Yuno gana, yuya mirongo mihandahu, na mungine mirongo mihahu.”
Bai kula haho, Jesu akiambira o at'u fumbo ringine akiamba, “Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na mut'u ariyekwendalaya ngano mundani kwakwe.
Vikara siku iyo vizho, hadhui wa kwakwe naye, akithariza hatha at'u machangira ndazini, achendamwaga-mwaga ngano ya vuweni kahi za yo ngano yenye.
Bai, mbeyu zizi zamera na zikikula hatha ngano inaamba inafumula, yo ngano ya vuweni nayo ikifumula.
K'uzhona aryahu ahumiki marihoona viryahu machendamuza ye mwenye munda makiamba, ‘Bwana, samba walaya ngano yenye we murya mundani mwako! Be mbona vino muna ngano ya vuweni?’
Ye mwenye munda akiamba, ‘Hadhui ndiye ariyekudzailaya.’ O ahumiki makimwamba, ‘Vikara vino hukaing'ole hedu huhendedze?’
Ye mwenye munda akiadzigidzya akiamba, ‘Hatha, musendeing'ola bule. Kwani muchendaing'ola munadima kung'ola hatha yo ngano yenye nayo.

Ut'u uwo uricheni ukule hamwenga, hatha wakathi wa kuvuna. Haho nindaambira o avuni kukala, “Ihaleni yo ngano ya vuweni yosi kwandza, muifunge mabutsa-mabutsa mugaike k'anda gaochwe. Mukigonya vizho, halani yo ngano yenye muyangize lutsagani mwangu.” ’ ”

Bai Jesu arihogonya kuambira ro fumbo riro, akihamboza fumbo ringine kaheri akiamba, “Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na katembe kathithe ka haradali, kariko mut'u mumwenga wakahala achendakalaya mundani mwakwe.
Katembe kaka ni kathithe kukira t'embe zosi. Ela kakimera, nikukula zhomu hatha kakakira mimera mingine yosi ya mundani. Kidza nikukala muhi mubomu hatha unyama ukadzaaka vitsunji zhao mo vitaini.”
Jesu akiambozera fumbo ringine, akiamba, “Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na ts'ats'u iriyohalwa ni mwanamuche akivugira p'ishi t'ahu za unga wa ngano na ukikutuka wosi.”
Bai kila kit'u arichokifundisha Jesu kwa o at'u, wakifundisha kwa kuhumira mafumbo, k'akuna kit'u hatha kimwenga arichokifundisha bila kuhumira mafumbo.
Bai wahenda vivi ili maneno garigonenwa ni nabii mumwenga ho kapindi gathimire. Kwani nabii iye wanena akiamba, “Nindahumira mafumbo kunena maut'u garigofitswa hangu kuumbwa kwa urumwengu.”

Vikara Jesu arihogonya kunena akiaricha o at'u na akiuya ko nyumbani arikokala adzambola. Bai arihofika kuko anafundzie makimuthuwa makimwamba, “Bwana, rirya fumbo ra ngano ya vuweni manaye ni noni? Fambire.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “K'amuona h'e, mulayi wa yo mbeyu mbidzo ni Mwana wa Mudamu.
Wo munda ni uu urumwengu. Mbeyu mbidzo ni ana a Uthawali, na ngano ya vuweni ni ana a ye Mui.
Iye nde mulayi wa yo ngano ya vuweni. Wakathi wa kuvuna ni siku ya mwisho, na avuni ni malaika.
Siku ya mwisho vindakala dza vizho zhenye, zha ngano ya vuweni kung'olwa na kwangizwa mohoni.
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu andaalagiza malaikae makundzumanye ahendi a mai osi, hamwenga na aryahu maahendyao andziyao mahende mai, na maamboze ndze ya uthawali wa kwakwe.
Makila haho maahale makaatsuhe mohoni. Na kuko mandarira na kufuna meno.
Ela ahachi o, mandang'ala here dzuwa kahi za uthawali wa Babiyao. Mwenye masikiro, naasikire.”

Jesu akienderera kumboza mafumbo mangine akiamba, “Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na ushaha uriwokala wafitswa hat'u mundani vivi. Vikara mut'u mumwenga arihokwendaupesa akikaza kuufitsa. Na kwa ro fwahiro bomu arirokala naro achendaguza vit'uzhe zhosi, akidzagula wo munda.”
Bai Jesu akihamboza fumbo ringine kaheri akiamba, “Uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na mut'u mumwenga, ariyekala kaziye ni kumala lulu na kwendaguza.
K'ona siku mwenga achendaona lulu ya kima kibomu sana. Bai achendaguza vit'u zhosi arizhokala nazho, akidzaigula.”
Kidza Jesu akimboza fumbo ringine, akiamba, “Pia uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na nyavu bomu sana, iriyogwagwa ziyani na ikigwira makumba ga kila namuna.
Bai irihokala idzadzala o avuhi makiimboza ndze, gonya makikelesi kutsagula makumba ga kuriwa na gasigoriwa. Garyahu ga kuriwa makigangiza k'ahuni mwao, garya gasoriwa makigatsuha.
Na siku ya mwisho vindakala dza vizho zhenye. Malaika mandaathenga at'u, ai lwao, na ahachi lwao.
Makigonya vizho, mandaahala at'u ai osi maatsuhe mohoni, na kuko mandarira na kufuna meno.”
Jesu arihogonya kuathalira mafumbo gaga akiauza akiamba, “Vidze mudzagasikira gano nidzigomwambira?” Na anafundzie makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Ee hudzagasikira.”

Bai marihokala madzadzigidzya, Jesu akiambira, “H'aya bai, kila mwalimu wa sheria adziyefundishwa ujeri dzulu za uthawali wa mulunguni, a karakara na mut'u ariye na akibaze nyumbani mwakwe. Ni kwangira akamboza mbisha na za kapindi.”
Bai arihokala adzagonya kumboza go mafumbo gago, Jesu wauka haho arihokala

achenda kwao. Vikara arihofika kuko, achangira kahi za sinagogi ra at'u a kuko na akikwacha kufundisha. K'uzhona o at'u makingalala zhomu makiamba, “Uno ulachu be tha waupatahi? Na zino nguvu za kutengezera miujiza nazo wazilazhahi?
Yuno si yuyahu mwana wa fundhi wa kutsonga bule yuno? Samba tha mameye ni Maryamu yuno. Hatha nduguze osi a kilume hunaamanya: Jakobu, na Josefu, na Simoni, na Juda.
H'e o nduguze a kiche, samba osi ma haha! Vikara maut'u gano gosi wagapatahi?”
Bai k'aviafahire. Jesu arihoona viryahu akiamba, “Nabii anaishimiwa kila hat'u isihokala kahi za ts'i ya kwao, na mudzini kwao.”
Bai kwa ut'u wa ko kutsakuluhira kwao, Jesu k'akuhendere miujiza minji kuko.
Vikara makathi garyahu muthawali Herode, ariyekala akiifwa Anitipasi wasikira nguma ya go maut'u mabomu arigokala akigahenda Jesu.
Akiambira ahumikie, “Iye ni Johana Mubat'izaji iye, wafufuka, ndo hatha ana wadimi wa kuhenda maut'u mabomu-mabomu.”
Herode were wamugwira Johana akimufunga minyororo akimwangiza jela. Vivi wavihenda kwa ut'u wa Herodia, mwanamuche ariyekala Herode wamuhoka nduguye ariyekala akiifwa Filipu
Johana Mubat'izaji akimwambira Herode kukala, “Si hachi bule kumuhala mukaza nduguyo.”
Lengo ra Herode were ni amwalage ye Johana, ela k'avihendere kwa ut'u wa kuagoha o Ayahudi, kwani ao were manamona Johana kukala ni nabii.
Siku mwenga, Herode were anausa sherehe ya kukumbukira siku ariyozhalwa, na musichana wa Herodia akidzaavinira ajeni. Bai Herode wafwahirwa zhomu
hatha akilaha kukala chochosi andichomala ye musichana andamup'a.
Bai kwa kufundishwa ni mameye, ye musichana akiamba, “Ningizira kitswa cha Johana Mubat'izaji kahi za riri bunguu.”
Arihosikira vizho, Herode washononeka zhomu, ela kwa were adzalaha mbere za ajeni kukala kila andichomalwa andalazha, akilagiza kukala agerwe.
Akilagiza mut'u achenda ko jela, achendamutosa kitswa Johana.
Bai akichangiza bunguuni akimurehera ye musichana, naye akikihala akimuhirikira mameye.
Anafundzi a Johana marihovisikira, makidzamuhala machendamuzika, gonya machendamwambira Jesu.

Vikara Jesu arihousikira wo uv̱oro wa kwalagwa kwa Johana, akikwera dau kwenda kut'u kwa iye h'akeye, kure na at'u. Ela at'u marihovisikira makimbola midzini, makundi-makundi, makimuthuwa na magulu hatha makifika ko arikokala anenda.
Bai arihothima mo dauni, akirona ro kundi bomu ra at'u ririrokala ridzamuthuwa, naye akiaonera mbazi na akiahoza akongo ao.

Vikara kurihokala kunaenderera kutswa, o anafundzie mamwendera makimwamba, “Bwana, hat'u haha be ni nyika zhomu, nako kunakaza kutswa, kwa vizho baha uafumule aa at'u mangire mo midzini makadzigulire zhakurya.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha, k'avimala bule, ap'eni chakurya ninwi.”
Vikara marihosikira vizho o anafundzi makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Fundaarisadze sino naswi funa mikahe mitsano na makumba mairi thu-thu-thu?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Vireheni kuno hedu.”

Akiambira o at'u makeresi ho nyasini. Marihogonya kukelesi, akihala yo mikahe mitsano na go makumba mairi, akilola dzulu mulunguni, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akivimogola-mogola akiap'a anafundzie maagazhire o at'u.
Nao osi makirya hatha makivilola. Bai marihogonya kurya, o anafundzi makitsola-tsola zho visiku-visiku virizhokala vidzasala na makidzaza k'ahu kumi na mbiri.
Isabu ya o at'u mariorya were ni here alifu ts'ano, hasiho kuthala ache na ahoho.
Bai o at'u marihogonya kurya thu, Jesu waambira o anafundzie mangire dauni mathangulie kwenda nyangamo ya hiri kuno ye anaafumula o at'u.
Bai, arihokala adzagonya kuafumula, wakwera dzulu kirimani kwendavoya hatha akitsererwa h'akeye kuko.
Wakathi uwo ro dau were ridzafika kure zhomu, kidza were rinaheha na maimbi, kwani lupeho lwere lunambola ko mendako.
Bai urihofika wakathi wa jogolo ra kwandza kuika akiambolera kuno ananenda dzulu za madzi.
Ela o anafundzi marihomona ananenda dzulu za madzi, makihondoka zhomu, makipiga k'ululu kwa woga, kwa kukala were manaona ni p'ep'o.
Jesu akinena nao haraka akiamba, “Sogoheni, ndimi musihondoke.”
P'et'ero akiamba, “Kala ndiwe jeri Bwana, nambira nami ninende dzulu za gaga madzi nikuthuwe kuko uriko.”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Ndzo.” K'ona P'et'ero akithima kula mo dauni akinenda dzulu za go madzi kumuthuwa Jesu.
Ela arihosikira lo luv̱utho zho lupigazho na nguvu achangirwa ni woga na akikwacha kuhoha. Akipiga k'ululu akiamba, “Bwana, nokola!”
Na haho henye Jesu akigoloza mukono akimugwira gonya akiamba, “Mut'u wa kuluhiro thithe we, kwanoni udzahenda k'ai-k'ai mo moyoni?”
Arihonena vizho, iye na P'et'ero machangira mo dauni na lo luv̱utho lukihurira.
Na o at'u osi mariokala mo dauni makimuzamira makiamba, “Ujeri wenye uwe u Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Bai Jesu na anafundzie makivuka ro ziya na makifika ts'i ya Genezarethi.
Vikara at'u a kuko marihomanya kukala ni Jesu, makivitsamusa kare lalo rosi kukala Jesu adzire. K'uzhona makimurehera Jesu akongo osi,
na makimuvoya mahende kugut'a ro pindo ra ro valore thu, na osi mariorigut'a mahola.
Siku mwenga, Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria, mambola Jerusalemu machenda hatha kuko arikokala Jesu. Manafika kuko makimwamba,
“Mbona o anafundzio manaribanda ro adha ra kuoga mikono hurirorichirwa ni akare ehu? Kwani kala manarya k'amaoga mikono.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Mbona nwi munabanda malagizo ga Mulungu ili muthuwe maadha genu enye?
Mulungu walagiza kukala, ‘Muishimu babayo na mameyo.’ Kidza akiamba, ‘Ye andemuhukana babaye hedu mameye, kumala kwalagwa naalagwe.’
Ela nwi munafundisha kukala, mut'u akihala kit'u adimacho kumup'a babaye hedu mameye na akakala adzamwaviza, na hat'uhe akilazhe kwa Mulungu,
andakala k'ana haja ya kuaishimu bule. Mbona munarihenda neno ra Mulungu kutsakala na nguvu, kwa muthuwe maadha genu enye?
Munadzihendya sana ninwi. Nabii Isaya wanenat'o sana dzulu zenu. Kwani waamba,
‘At'u aa mananogoha kwa makanwa gao,
ela mioyo yao i kure nami.
Hatha makanivoya ni bule,
kwa kukala manahala maadha ga anadamu,
na kugafundisha here malagizo gangu.’ ”
Bai Jesu arihogonya kunena na o Mafarisayo, akiaiha o at'u akiambira, “Nisirikizani na mung'alirwe;
Changiracho kanwani mwa mut'u, k'akimuhendya mukolo. Kimuhendyacho mut'u akakala mukolo, ni kiryahu chambolacho kanwani mwakwe.”
K'uzhona zho marihombola haho, anafundzi makimwamba kukala, “Unamanya kukala virya udzizhovinena harya vidzaatsukiza o Mafarisayo?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Kila mumera uriwo k'aulayirwe ni Baba ariye ko mulunguni, undang'olwa.
Aricheni, ao ni vipofu malongozao vipofu andziyao. Na kipofu akimulongoza kipofu mwandziwe, k'amafikahi bule, osi mandavoromoka winani.”
Ela P'et'ero akimwamba Jesu, “Fambire mana ya rirya fumbo hedu.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha ninwi nanwi k'amung'alirwa bule?
Samba ukirya kit'u kinenda ndanini mwako, gonya uchenda chandze unenda ukachamboze.
Ela maut'u mai gambolago kanwani nikukala gala moyoni, na gago ndo gamuhendyago mut'u kukala mukolo.
Kwani moyo ndo udimao kumboza maazo mai gamuhendyago mut'u akalaga, akazinga, akaiya, akamboza ushahidhi wa ulongo, na akahukana mut'u.
Gaga ndo maut'u gamuhendyago mut'u kukala mukolo. Ela kurya bila kuoga mikono dza zho mahendzazho ao, k'avidima kumuhendya mut'u yoyosi akale mukolo.”
Bai Jesu akimbola jimbo ra Galilaya na achendakala kahi za eneo ra midzi ya Tiro na Sidoni.
Arihofika kuko, lola mwanamuche mumwenga Muk'anani ariyekala akitoa p'ande zizo, akimuthuwa na akiluta mumiro akimwamba, “Nionera mbazi h'ewe Bwana, Mwana wa Daudi!
Musichana wangu ana p'ep'o, be a vii-vii zhomu sana.”
Jesu k'amudzigidzyire kit'u. Bai o anafundzi makimwamba Jesu, “Bwana, mwambe ariche kuhuthuwa-thuwa, kwani be anahupigira londzo.”
Jesu akiamba, “Mimi nahumwa kwa Aiziraeli h'akeye, ng'ondzi zirizongamika.”
Ela ye mwanamuche akidzamupigira mavindi akiamba, “Naviza Bwana.”
Jesu akimwamba, “Si karakara bule nihale chakurya cha ahoho nikitsuhire k'uro.”
Ye mwanamuche akidzigidzya akiamba, “U mujeri, ela hatha ye k'uro naye nikurya magande gadzigogwagwa ni ye mwenye k'uro.”
Jesu akimwamba, “Mwanamuche uwe be una kuluhiro bomu sana. Bai vizho umalazho navikale.” Na wakathi uwo wenye ye musichanawe akihola kare.
Vikara Jesu arihombola haho, wakira na k'anda-k'anda za ro ziya ra Galilaya, akipanda kuko dzulu virimani, achendakeresi kuko.
Bai at'u anji makidza na akongo ao, virema, vidende, vipofu, mabwibwi na akongo angine anji. Akongo aa makudzaikwa mbere za Jesu, naye akiahoza osini.
O at'u marihoona viryahu Jesu ahozazho akongo, machangalala na makimulika Mulungu wa Iziraeli. Maona mabwibwi gananena, at'u enye virema mananenda, vidende manahola na vipofu manaona.

Vikara Jesu akiaiha anafundzie akiamba, “At'u aa be mananishononesa zhomu. Hangu makale nami haha, rero ni hahu, na vivi k'amana ut'u wowosi wa kurya, nami ts'endzi niafumule na ndzala, p'ore makendagwa na mutsare mo ngirani.”
K'uzhona o anafundzie makimuza makimwamba, “Bwana, cho chakurya cha kuarisa at'u ano osi hano nyika hundachambozahi?”
Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Kwani muna mikahe mingahi?” Makiamba, “Mifungahe, na vikumba zha kuthala.”
Bai Jesu akiambira o at'u makelesi ho ts'i.
Marihogonya kukelesi, Jesu akihala yo mikahe mifungahe na zho vikumba, akilazha muv̱era gonya akivimogola-mogola akiap'a o anafundzie maagazhire o at'u.
Lola at'u osini marya vivii hatha makivilola, kidza o anafundzi makidzaza k'ahu fungahe za visiku-visiku virizhokala vidzasala.
Na murongo wa o at'u mariorya were unafika alume alifu ne, bila kuthala ache na ahoho.
Bai Jesu arihokala adzagonya kuafumula o at'u, wakwera dau achenda jimbo ra Magadani.
Siku mwenga Mafarisayo na Masadukayo makwendamujeza Jesu makimwamba aanyese muujiza wa kula mulunguni.
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, [“Mukiona dzuwa rinapothoka, na mulunguni ni kuthune, munaamba, ‘Machero kundasindat'o.’

Mukiona kudzagit'ana na madzach'a na mulunguni ni kuthune, munaamba ‘Rero kundanya v̱ula ya luv̱utho.’ Munamanya kulola mulunguni na mukamanya kundakalani, ela miv̱ano ya makathi hurigo k'amumanya kuilola?]
Kizhazi kithiriri kisokuluhira! Kinamala kwanyeswa muv̱ano, bai k'akindanyeswa muv̱ano wowosi, isihokala uryahu wa Jona.” Naye arihogonya kunena vizho, akihauka.
Vikara marihombola haho Jesu na anafundzie makwera dauni na makivuka kwenda nyangamo ya hiri ya ro ziya ra Galilaya. O anafundzi mere madzasahau kutsukula mikahe kamare.
Jesu akinena nao akiamba, “Dzichungeni sana. Dzimanyirireni na ts'ats'u ya Mafarisayo na ya Masadukayo.”
K'uzhona marihosikira viryahu, o anafundzi makiuzana-uzana makiamba, “Ni zho hurizho k'ahutsukulire mikahe.”
Ela Jesu ye akivimanya, akiamba, “At'u a kuluhiro thithe nwi! Mbona munauzana-uzana dzulu za kukosa mikahe?
Vidze muchere k'amudzang'alirwa? Hedu mudzasahau kare zho nirizhoarisa at'u alifu ts'ano na mikahe mitsano hatha mukidzaza k'ahu nyinji zenye za masaza?
H'e zho nirizhoarisa at'u alifu ne na mikahe mifungahe. Zho samba mwadzaza k'ahu nyinji zenye za masaza mino!
Vino mbona k'amung'alirirwe hatha munaamba nanena dzulu za mikahe? Ninanena kaheri, dzimanyirireni na ts'ats'u ya Mafarisayo na ya Masadukayo.”
Bai charo kiki, o anafundzi makielewa kukala Jesu were k'anena dzulu za ts'ats'u, ela were anaamba madzimanyirire na mafundisho ga Mafarisayo na ga Masadukayo.
Vikara Jesu na anafundzie marihofika p'ande za Kaisaria Filipi, Jesu akiauza anafundzie akiamba, “At'u manaamba Mwana wa Mudamu ni h'ani?”
Makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Angine manaamba u Johana Mubat'izaji, angine manaamba u Elija, na angine manaamba u Jeremia, hedu mumwenga kahi za o manabii.”
Jesu akiauza kaheri akiamba, “Nwi enye munaamba ni h'ani?”
Simoni aifwaye P'et'ero akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Uwe u Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu ariye moyo.”
Jesu akimwamba P'et'ero, “Baha uwe Simoni wa Jona, kwa kukala zho udzizhovinena be k'uzhambirirwe ni mut'u bule, udzazhambirwa ni Baba ariye ko mulunguni.
Nami nakwambira kukala uwe ndiwe P'et'ero,
nami nindajenga kanisa rangu dzulu za iwe riri, na hatha miryango ya kuzimu kidza k'aindadima kurishinda.
Nindakup'a funguo za uthawali wa mulunguni. Na kila undichokifunga haha dhuniani, hatha ko mulunguni nako kindafungwa. Na kila undichokivugula haha dhuniani, hatha ko mulunguni nako kindavugulwa.”
Bai arihogonya kunena vizho, Jesu akiakokot'era anafundzie masimwambire mut'u yoyosi kukala iye nde Masihi.

Vikara kulaiza wakathi uwo, Jesu akikwacha kuambira anafundzie lwazu-lwazu dzulu za maut'u gandigokala. Bai waamba kukala, ni lazima ende Jerusalemu akateswe sana kahi za mikono ya athumia a Kiyahudi, na alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria, na alagwe, na siku ya hahu afufulwe.
P'et'ero akimuvuha k'anda akikwacha kumuchemera akimwamba, “Hatha Bwana, vizho uambazho k'avindakala kamare.”
Jesu akimugalukira P'et'ero akimwamba, “Hauke Shethani, unaniziza ngira, kwani maazogo k'agambolere kwa Mulungu bule, gadzambola kwa mudamu.”
Bai arihogonya kunena vizho akiagalukira o anafundzi akiamba, “Mut'u akihendza kunithuwa mimi, suthi adzikane mwenye, na adzihike musalabawe anithuwe.
Kwani kila amalaye kuthizha rohoye andayangamiza, na kila andiyeyangamiza kwa ut'u wangu mimi andaipata.
Kwani vindamufwahani mut'u akipata vit'u zhosi zha urumwengu, gonya rohoye yangamike? Hedu mut'u anadima kugula rohoye?
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu andakudza na malaikae kahi za nguma ya Babaye, naye andakudzamuriha kila mut'u kulengana na maut'u arigogahenda mwenye.
Nami ninamwambira ujeri wenye kukala haha hana at'u mario k'amandafwa kabila kumona Mwana wa Mudamu anadza kahi za uthawaliwe.”
Vikara siku t'andahu bada ya kunena dzulu za kudzakwe, Jesu wamuhala P'et'ero, na Jakobu, na Johana nduguye Jakobu, na akikwera nao dzulu za murima mure, kure na at'u.
Bai marihokala ma kuko, Jesu akigaluka sura kamare kuno manalolera. Usowe ukikala unang'ala-ng'ala here dzuwa na nguwoze zikikala nyaruhe tse-tse-tse.
Na lola haho henye, Musa na Elija makiambolera makikala mananena naye.
Bai P'et'ero arihoona viryahu akimwamba Jesu, “Bwana, ni vidzo zho zha fu haha. Ukihendza nadima kumuakira vibanda vihahu mino. Kimwenga chako, kimwenga cha Musa, na kimwenga cha Elija.”
Lola P'et'ero were k'adzatosa, kuchambola ingu ra kung'ala rikidzaafinikira. Na sauthi ikimbola mo inguni ikiamba, “Yuyu nde Mwanangu muhendzwi anifwahizaye, musirikizeni iye.”
K'ona o anafundzi marihosikira vizho machangirwa ni woga zhomu makigwa na moyo.
Ela Jesu akidzaagut'a akiamba, “Musigohe bule, ukani.”
Nao marihotsuha matso gao makimona Jesu thu h'akeye, k'amaonere mut'u mungine bule.

Badaye marihokala manatharamuka kula ko dzulu ya wo murima, Jesu akiakokot'era o anafundzie akiamba, “Viryahu mudzizhozhona kuryahu, be musizhambire mut'u kamare, muhaka haho Mwana wa Mudamu andihofufulwa.”
O anafundzi makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Mbona o alimu a Sheria manaamba ni lazima Elija adze kwandza?”
Akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Zho ni vizho, Elija ni lazima athangulie kuthayarisha kila kit'u.
Ela namwambira kukala, Elija wakudza kare, ela at'u k'amamanyire ndeye bule, makimuhenda kila marichoona ni karakara. Na vizho zhenye ndizho mandizhomutesa Mwana wa Mudamu.”
Jesu arihogonya kunena, o anafundzi makimanya kukala were ananena dzulu za Johana Mubat'izaji.
Vikara marihouya ko at'u marikokala, mwanamulume mumwenga akimudhana Jesu na akidzapiga mavindi ho mbereze
akiamba, “Bwana, muthana wangu ana vitsala vikali na vinamup'a thabu sana. Mara nyinji nikumugwaga mohoni na hatha madzini. Kwa vizho muonere mbazi Bwana.
Nidzaarehera aryahu anafundzio mamuhoze ela k'amazhadimire bule.”
K'uzhona Jesu arihosikira viryahu akidzigidzya akiamba, “H'enwi at'u a kizhazi cha kwangamika ngira, musio na kuluhiro, nindakala nanwi hatha rini? Nindamuvumirira hatha rini? Murehe kuno ye muhoho.”
Naye arihorefwa, Jesu akimuchemera yuyahu p'ep'o wa vitsala akimwambola, na ye muhoho akihola kare.
Vikara badaye, o anafundzi makimuthuwa Jesu kinjama machendamuza makiamba, “Bwana, kwanoni sino k'ahudimire kumwamboza ye p'ep'o?”

Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Kuluhiro renu ni thithe ndosa k'amuzhadimire. Ela namwambira ujeri siku mundihokala na kuluhiro thithe renye here katembe ka haradali, mundadima kuwambira uu murima uhauke wende kut'u kungine, nawo undakwenda. K'akuna kit'u kindichokala k'achadimikika. [
Ela p'ep'o dza yuyu k'ambola rahisi-rahisi bule, isihokala kwa kufunga na kuvoya.”]
Bai siku mwenga, marihokala madzakundzumanyikana hamwenga ko Galilaya, Jesu akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, “Suthi Mwana wa Mudamu alazhwe mikononi mwa at'u.
Nao mandamwalaga, ela siku ya hahu andafufuka.” Marihosikira vizho, o anafundzi mashononeka sana.
Vikara marihofika mudzi wa Kaperinaumu, athozi a kodi ra Hekalu makimuthuwa P'et'ero makimuza, “Yuno mwalimu wenu kisha nikuriha kodi ra Hekalu?”

P'et'ero akiamba, “Ee nikuriha.” Gonya thiye achenda ko nyumbani kwendamwambira Jesu. Ela kabila P'et'ero k'adzanena, Jesu akimuza swali akiamba, “Simoni kuno dhuniani, athawali nikuthoza kodi at'u a kwao enye, hedu at'u a kula ts'i nyingine?”
P'et'ero akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Mathoza at'u a ts'i nyingine.” Jesu akiamba, “Kwa vizho at'u a kwao ma huru.

Ela kwa kukala k'afwendzi kuaudhi, enda vivi hatha ko ziyani ukatsuhe kiloo. Ro kumba ra kwandza undirorigwira rigunule mo kanwani undaona shekeli mwenga, ihale yo shekeli udze nayo urihe kodi rangu na rako.”
Vikara wakathi uryahu, anafundzi makimuthuwa Jesu makimwamba, “Kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni mubomu ni hiye?”
Bai kabila Jesu k'adzadzigidzya, akiiha muhoho muthithe akimuimisha ho mbere zao.
Akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri wenye, kala k'amundagaluka na kukala here ahoho athithe, k'amundawangira ng'o wo uthawali wa mulunguni.
Kila andegaluka na kudzitsereza dza zho zha yuyu muhoho, iye nde mut'u mubomu kukira osi kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni.
Na mut'u yoyosi amuhokeraye muhoho dza yuyu kwa dzina rangu ananihokera mimi.”
“Ela mut'u yoyosi andiyemuhendya mumwenga wa aa athithe manikuluhirao ahende dambi, ni baha afungwe lwalwa lwa singo atsufwe ko kahikahi ya bahari kwenye.
“Shauri yao ao mandioahendya andziyao mahende dambi. Majezo ni hatha gakale mumu dhuniani, ela shauriye iye andiyegareha.

Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, mukonowo ukikuhendya uhende dambi, utose uutsuhe. Hedu kigulucho kikikuhendya uhende dambi, kitose ukitsuhe. Kwani baha wangire uzimani na mukono mumwenga hedu na kigulu kimwenga, kuriko utsufwe kahi za moho wa kare na kare na mikono miri hedu magulu mairi.
Na dzitsoro rikikuhendya uhende dambi, rishukule uritsuhe. Kwani baha wangire uzimani na ch'ongo kuriko utsufwe kahi za moho wa Jehanamu.
“Dzimanyirireni sana p'ore mukaadharau ahoho athithe, kwani malaika a kwao ko mulunguni ma mbere za Baba ariye mulunguni.” [
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu wakudzaokola kirichongamika.]

Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Mut'u akikala ana ng'ondzi gana mwenga gonya mwenga ikangamike, munaona nikuhendadze? Samba nikuziricha zo mirongo chenda na chenda akendaimala yo idziyongamika hatha akayona?
Na ninamwambira ujeri, akiyona andakala na raha nayo zhomu hatha kukira zo mirongo chenda na chenda zirizo k'azingamikire.
Na vizho ndo virizho hatha kwa Mulungu Babiyehu wa mulunguni. Iye, k'endzi aa ahoho athithe mangamike hatha mumwenga.”
“Ndugu akikukosera, muthuwe wiri wenu, ukamuzhagazhe umwambire makosage. Akigakubali ni vidzo, undakala udzamupata.
Kala k'andagakubali, mala mut'u mumwenga hedu airi mwende nyosini ili kila neno rindironenwa rikale na mashahidhi airi hedu ahahu.
Akikala k'andakubali, enda ukariambire kanisa. Akikubali, vidzo, k'akubalire, muhalire mut'u yuyahu dza ungazhomuhalira mut'u asiyemumanya Mulungu hedu here muthozi wa kodi.
Nami namwambira ujeri kukala kila mundichokifunga haha dhuniani hatha ko mulunguni nako kindakala kidzafungwa, na kila mundichokivugula haha dhuniani hatha ko mulunguni nako kindakala kidzavugulwa.
Kidza at'u airi kahi zenu makikubaliana dzulu za ut'u wowosi mandiwouvoya haha dhuniani, Babiyenu wa mulunguni andaahendera.
Kwani at'u airi hedu ahahu mathungananaho kwa dzina rangu nindakala hamwenga nao.”
