Jesu arihogonya kunena, P'et'ero akimuza akimwamba, “Bwana, mwandzangu akinikosera kwenda-kwenda, nimusamehe hatha k'ana nyingahi? Vidze nimusamehe k'ana fungahe?”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Hatha bule, simusamehe k'ana fungahe thu, musamehe k'ana mirongo mifungahe mara fungahe.”
Kidza Jesu akiamba, “Ndo hatha uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na muthawali mumwenga ariyekala anamala kuhenda isabu za p'esa arizoap'a ahumikie.
K'ona shuhuli iyo irihoandza thu, akireherwa muhumikiwe mumwenga ariyekala anamwisa t'alant'a alifu kumi.
Na kwa kukala were k'adima kuziriha, ye muthawali akiamuru kukala aguzwe hamwenga na adamue osi, na vit'uzhe zhosi, ili zo p'esa zindizopatikana zirihe ro dheni.
Ela ye muhumiki akimugwerera maguluni ye muthawali, akimuvoya akiamba, ‘Bwana, kala radhi nami unip'e muda nami ndakuriha p'esazo zosi.’
K'uzhona ye muthawali moyo ukimutika madzi hatha ro dheni akimusamehe, na akimuvugula akimurichira.
Ela kula haho kare, achendamona muhumiki mwandziwe ariyekala anamwisa dinari gana mwenga thu. K'uzhona akimugwavukira kare, gwa, akimugwira mumiro. Cha ‘Niriha p'esa zangu.’
Bai ye mwandziwe akimugwerera maguluni akimwamba, ‘Kala radhi nami unip'e muda nami ndakuriha p'esazo,’
ela akikahala kamare. Akimuhala akimuhirika jela achendafungwa muhaka ho andihomarigiza kuriha.
Vikara ahumiki andziye marihoona viryahu mashikithika zhomu hatha machendamusema kwa muthawali.
Bai, muthawali arihosikira uv̱oro uryahu, wamwiha mara mwenga yuyahu muhumiki ariyekala wamusamehe akimwamba, ‘We kumba u muthiriri vivi we! Waniririra nami nikikusamehe dheniro rosi,
ela mbona we ye mwandziyo k'umuonerere mbazi dza vizho nirizhokuonera mbazi?’
K'uzhona ye muthawali akitsukirwa zhomu hatha akiaiha shikari a jela madze mamuhale makamufunge muhaka ho andihomarigiza kuriha ro dhenire.
Na vizho zhenye ndizho andizhohenda Baba wa mulunguni, kala k'amundaasamehe andziyenu na moyo mumwenga.”
Vikara Jesu arihogonya kufundisha anafundzie dzulu za kusameheana, wambola Galilaya achenda hatha achangira jimbo ra Judea, kuvuka muho wa Jorodani.
Bai makundi-makundi ga at'u makimuthuwa kuko, naye akiahoza akongo ao.
Bai Mafarisayo makidzamujeza makimuza, “Vidze ni hachi mut'u kumuricha muchewe kwa sababu yoyosi?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Vidze k'amudzashoma kukala ye ariyeaumba ho chaho waaumba muche na mulume.
Kidza akiamba, ‘Kwa ut'u uu mut'u andamuricha babaye na mameye agwirane na muchewe, na ao airi mandakala mwiri mumwenga.’
Bai, madzauya si airi kaheri, ni mwiri mumwenga. Kwa vizho adzichokigwizanya Mulungu, mudamu asikitose bule.”
Marihosikira vizho o Mafarisayo makiamba, “Ni kwanoni Musa walagiza kukala, kala unamala kumuricha mucheo niumup'e cheti cha kurichana gonya umuriche?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Musa wamuruhusu muriche ache enu kwa kukala mu at'u a singo nyomu, ela ho kwandza were si vizho bule.
Na vivi ninamwambira kukala mut'u yoyosi amurichaye muchewe, isihokala kwa kosa ra uzindzi, na kuhala muche mungine, anazinga.”
Bai o anafundzie marihosikira viryahu makimwamba Jesu, “Kala ni vizho be hatha si baha kuthuwa kukala mudhaka kamare bai.”
Ela Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Munaona kila mut'u anadima kukala mudhaka nwi? Hatha, ni aryahu mariojaliwa ni Mulungu makale vizho ndo mazhadimao.

Kwani kuna at'u mario k'amadima kuhala ache kwa kukala mazhalwa kare k'aviamba kit'u. Angine o k'amadima kuhala kwa kukala mathulwa. Ela angine o, k'amahala kuhendza kwao kare, ili madzilazhe kamare-kamare kahi za uhumiki wa uthawali wa mulunguni. Bai azhadimaye naavihende.”
Wakathi mumwenga, at'u mareha ahoho athithe kwa Jesu ili adze aaikire mikono aavoyere, ela anafundzie makiadumulira.
Ela Jesu akiamba, “Hatha, musiazizeni bule o ahoho, aricheni madze kwangu, kwa kukala wo uthawali wa mulunguni be ni wa at'u dza vizho ao.”
Nao marihokudza akiaikira mikono gonya akihauka.
Siku mwenga, mwanamulume mumwenga wakwenda kwa Jesu achendamuza akiamba, “Mwalimu, ni ut'u wani udzo nidimao kuuhenda hatha nami nangire uzima wa kare na kare?”
Bai Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Kwanoni unanuza mimi dzulu za udzo? Kuna mudzo mumwenga thu, ela ukimala kwangira uzimani, gwira malagizo gosi nawe undawangira.”
Iye mwanamulume akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Malagizo higo?” Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Usalage, usizinge, usiiye, usimboze ushahidhi wa ulongo,
aishimu babayo na mameyo, na muhendze mwandziyo here udzihendzazho mwenye.”
Ye muvulana akiamba, “Gago be nagagwira hangu kapindi. Vino nahungukirwa ni noni?”
Jesu akimwamba, “Kala unamala ukamilike, kaguze vit'uzho zhosi na zo p'esa uap'e akiya. Nawe undakala na akiba ko mulunguni. Na ukigonya kuhenda vizho, ndzo unithuwe.”
Ye muvulana arihosikira vizho akihauka k'ana raha, mana were ana mali nyinji zhomu.
Vikara ye mwanamulume arihouka, Jesu akinena na o anafundzie akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri, vindakala vikomu sana kwa thajiri kwangira kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni.
Ninanena kaheri, ni rahisi ngamira kukira kahi za t'undu ya shindano kuriko thajiri kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.”
Marihosikira vizho, o anafundzie makingalala zhomu makiamba, “Hatha ni h'ani adimaye kuokoka be zho?”
Marihouza vizho, Jesu akialola gonya akiamba, “Kwa nguvu za mudamu, vizho k'azhadimikika, ela kwa Mulungu, kila kit'u kinadimikika.”
P'et'ero akimwamba, “Lola, fwaricha zhosi hukikuthuwa uwe, vino hundapatani?”

Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri, haho Mwana wa Mudamu andihokudza kelesi dzulu za kihi cha endzi kahi za wo urumwengu musha, ninwi mundakelesi dzulu ya vihi kumi na viri zha endzi na muhukumu zo kabila kumi na mbiri za Iziraeli.
Na kila ariyericha nyumbaze, na azhazie, na nduguze, na adamue, na mundawe, kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu, zho arizhoviricha andarifwa mara gana, kidza andapata uzima wa kare na kare.
Ela anji mario vivi ni a kwandza, mandakala a mwisho, na a mwisho, mandakala a kwandza.”
“Kwani uthawali wa mulunguni udzahalana na mwenye nyumba ariyekala na munda wa mizabibu. Mut'u iye warauka madzach'a maitsi genye kwendamala vibaruwa mende makamuhendere kazi mundani kwakwe.
Bai arihoapata makisikizana kukala andaariha dinari mwenga kutswa. Marihogonya kusikizana akiahirika ko mundani kwakwe.
Inapiga saa t'ahu achendathekeza at'u angine mariokala makelesi ho sokoni thu na kazi ya kuhenda k'amana.
Ye mwenye munda akiambira, ‘Hatha ninwi nanwi hindeni mukanihendere kazi kuryahu mundani kwangu, nami nindamurihat'o.’ Nao machenda jeri.
Bai vivi wavithuwa hatha mara mbiri, murongo wa saa t'andahu na murongo wa saa chenda.
Saa kumi na mwenga irihokala i hehi achenda ko sokoni kaheri, na achendadulukiza at'u mariokala madzadzikelesira thu. Akiauza, ‘Kwanoni hangu kudzecherera mukelesi thu?’
O at'u makimudzigidzya makimwamba, ‘Fundakosadze kukelesi naswi k'ahudzaona mut'u wa kuhup'a kazi?’ Ye mwenye munda akiamba, ‘Andziyenu kinawaka kare ko mundani, kwa vizho endani mukagwirane nao.’

“Bai, at'u aryahu mahenda kazi vivii hatha kukitswa. K'ona yuyahu mwenye munda akimulagiza munyaparawe akaihe o ahendzi a kazi adze aarihe. Bai, waandza na aryahu arioapata mwisho, hatha akimarigiza na aryahu arioapata kwandza.
Vikara aryahu at'u mariohirikwa ko mundani saa kumi na mwenga marihokudza, makirifwa dinari mwenga-mwenga.
Aryahu at'u mariohirikwa ko mundani kwandza marihokudza, makiona here kwamba mandangezwa, ela k'avikalire vizho bule, ao nao makirifwa dinari mwenga-mwenga.
Vikara marihoona kukala madzarifwa karakara na o angine, machendamulalamikira ye mwenye munda makiamba,
‘Siswi fudzahenda kazi hangu madzach'a hatha vivi. Dzuwa rosi ridzagomera mwirini mwehu, gonya unafuriha karakara na aa madziohenda kazi kwa saa mwenga thu-thu-thu.’
Ye mwenye munda akimudzigidzya mumwenga wao akiamba, ‘Musena, ro kosa nidziromuhendera nwi ni hiro? Samba fudzasikizana kukala nimurihe dinari mwenga kutswa nwi?
Mimi mwenye nidzaona nimurihe ninwi a kwandza karakara na o a mwisho, kwa vizho halani p'esa zenu mwende.
Namanya muna wivu kwa wo udzo nidziwouhenda. Ela ni lazima mumanye kukala nina uhuru wa kuhumira p'esa zangu nihendzazho.’ ”
Bai Jesu arihogonya kuthala ro fumbo riro akiamba, “Kwa vizho bai a kwandza mandakala a mwisho, na a mwisho mandakala a kwandza.”
Vikara Jesu na anafundzie marihokala ma ngirani kwenda Jerusalemu, waavuha k'anda o anafundzie kumi na airi akiamba,
“Lolani, vivi hunenda Jerusalemu. Na kuko Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa kwa alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria, nao mandamuhukumu kwalagwa.
Kidza ao nao mandamulazha kwa at'u mario si Ayahudi mamusholere, mamupige, gonya mamusulubishe, ela siku ya hahu andafufulwa.”
Vikara kahi za wakathi uryahu, mameye Johana na Jakobu ana a Zebedayo, wakwenda kwa Jesu hamwenga na anae. Anafika kuko, akimupigira mavindi Jesu akimwamba, “Bwana, nifwaha na ut'u umwenga.”

Jesu akimuza akimwamba, “Nikufwahe na noni?” Ye mwanamuche akimwamba, “Undihokwacha kuthawala, nakuvoya, uruhusu kukala, mwanangu mumwenga akelesi mukonowo wa kurya na mungine akelesi mukonowo wa kumots'o.”
Ela Jesu akimugalukira Jakobu na Johana akiamba, “Ninwi be tha k'amukimanya bule cho mukivoyacho. Vidze cho kikombe
ninwacho munadima kukinwa nwi?” Nao makiamba, “Ee funadima.”

Bai marihonena vizho Jesu akiamba, “Ee kikombe changu mundakinwa. Ela kumutsagula yuya akelesi mukono wa kurya, yuya mukono wa kumots'o, sina wadimi nazho bule. Kwani kuko, Baba wakutengezera at'ue, na ao ndo mandiokala kuko.”
Vikara o anafundzi kumi marihovisikira, makiatsukirirwa o ndugu airi.

Ela Jesu akiaiha osini akiamba, “Munamanya kukala athawali a at'u mario si Ayahudi manahendza kuthawala at'u ao na ukali munji. Na aryahu abomu mario ts'ini zao nao, manahendza kuhumira wadimi wao wosi kuatumisha o at'u.
Ela ninwi musikale vizho bule. Iye ahendzaye kukala mubomu suthi akale muhumiki wenu.
Na kila ahendzaye kukala kitswa kahi zenu, suthi akale mutumwa wenu.
Kwani hatha Mwana wa Mudamu naye k'adzire haha urumwenguni adze ahumikirwe, ela wakudza ahumike na alazhe uzimawe aakombole at'u anji.”
Badaye, Jesu na anafundzie marihokala manambola mudzi wa Jeriko, kundi bomu ra at'u rambola hamwenga nao rikiathuwa.
Vikara were kuna vipofu airi mariokala makelesi k'anda za yo barabara. Lola marihosikira kukala Jesu anakira, maluta mimiro makiamba, “Mwana wa Daudi huonere mbazi!”
O at'u makiadumulira makiamba manyamale, ela o hatha makikaza kuluta mimiro makiamba, “Bwana, mwana wa Daudi huonere mbazi!”
Jesu akiima, akiaiha akiamba, “H'aya munamala nimuhendereni?”
O vipofu makiamba, “Bwana, funamala ugunule matso gehu.”
Bai Jesu akiaonera mbazi akiagut'a go matso gao, na haho henye makikwacha kuona na makimuthuwa.
Vikara Jesu na anafundzie marihokala ma hehi na Jerusalemu, mafika Beth'ifage, kuko Murima wa Mizeituni. Bai marihofika kuko, Jesu akihuma anafundzie airi akiamba,
“Endani hatha mwangire ko kadzidzi mudzikoerekezana nako. Mukifika thu mundaona ndzowe na mwanawe madzafungwa. Avuguleni munirehere.
Mut'u yoyosi akimuza mwambireni kukala, ‘Bwana ana haja nao.’ Naye andaarichira mara mwenga.”
Bai gosi gahendeka ili garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii gathimire. Kwani nabii mumwenga wanena akiamba,
“Ambireni at'u a mudzi wa Sayuni kukala,
‘Lolani, muthawali wenu anamudzirira.
Ni mup'ore na adzakwera dzulu za ndzowe,
kidza mwana wa ndzowe.’ ”
K'uzhona o anafundzi makiuka na machendahenda here marizhokala madzalagizwa ni Jesu.
Makimureha ye ndzowe na mwanawe, makihala maamba gao makihandika ho dzulu zao na Jesu akikwera.
At'u anji makihala maamba gao makigahandika mo ngirani, angine o makithema vitai zha mihi makivihandika mo ngirani.
Bai go makundi ga at'u mariokala mbere na mariokala nyuma osi makikwacha kuimba kwa nguvu makiamba,
“Naalikwe ye mwana wa Daudi!
Naahaswe iye adzaye kwa dzina ra Bwana!
Naalikwe ye Mulungu ariye dzulu!”
Jesu arihongira Jerusalemu, mudzi wosi wadudumuka na at'u makiuza, “Ni h'ani ye?”
Bai o at'u mariokala na Jesu makidzigidzya makiamba, “Ni Jesu, yuyahu nabii wa kula Nazareth'i kuko Galilaya.”
Jesu arihongira kahi za ro Hekalu, waainga at'u osi mariokala makigula na kuguza vit'u mo Hekaluni. Kidza akihala zo meza za abandi a p'esa, na vihi zha aguzi a magiya, akivipetula-petula zhosi.
Gonya akiamba, “Zhaorwa kukala, ‘Nyumba yangu indaifwa nyumba ya mavoyo,’ ela ninwi munaihendya p'anga ya kuzama aivi.”
Bai at'u anji mariokala k'amaona, na vidende makimuthuwa Jesu mo Hekaluni, naye akidzaahoza.

Ela vikara o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria marihoona go maut'u mabomu arigokala akigahenda Jesu, na zho ahoho marizhokala manapiga londzo na kuamba, “Mup'eni nguma Mwana wa Daudi!” mo Hekaluni makitsukirwa sana.

Bai makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Unaasikira o ahoho zho manenazho?” Akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ee ninaasikira. Ela go Maoro gaambago, ‘Wapata nguma kwa makanwa ga ahoho athithe na ana atsanga’ k'amudzagashoma?”
Naye arihogonya kunena vizho akimwambola mumo Jerusalemu achendalala mudzi wa Beth'ania.
Kunadzacha, Jesu warauka na madzach'a akikwacha kuuya Jerusalemu. Bai mumo ngirani akisikira ndzala.

Akiona mutini ho k'anda-k'anda za ngira. Achendaulola chamba una matunda, ela k'apatire, mana were u gi makodza mahuhu. Jesu akiulani uryahu muhi akiamba, “Nawe k'undazhala matunda kaheri.” Nawo haho na haho kare ukiuma.
K'uzhona o anafundzi marihoona viryahu machangalala zhomu, makiamba, “Muhi uno be tha udzanyaladze haraka vino?”

Ela Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ninamwambira ujeri kukala, mukikuluhira bila kukala na k'ai-k'ai mundahenda ut'u dza uu nidziwouhenda, na hatha zaidhi. Mundadima hatha kuwambira uu murima, ‘Ng'oka ukagwe baharini.’ Na vindakala vizho zhenye.
Mukikala na kuluhiro mundahokera kila mundichokivoya.”

Bai Jesu akiuya kahi za ro Hekalu na akikwatya kufundisha. Arihokala akufundishani, alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi makidzamuza makimwamba, “Unahenda maut'u gano kwa wadimi wani? Na ni h'ani ariyekup'a wadimi uno?”
Jesu akiamba, “Hatha mimi nindamuza swali, mukiridzigidzya, nindamwambira ni wadimi wani nihenderao maut'u gaga.

Wo wadimi ariohumira Johana kubat'izira at'u walahi? Wala kwa Mulungu hedu wala kwa anadamu?” O alombi abomu na o athumia makiojana makiamba, “Fukiamba wala kwa Mulungu, andafuza, ‘Kwanoni k'amumukuluhirire?’
Na hukiamba, ‘Wala kwa mudamu,’ fu hatharini, mana aa at'u osini manakuluhira kukala Johana were ni nabii.”
Kwa vizho makimwamba Jesu, “K'ahumanya.” Jesu naye akiamba, “Hatha mimi nami sindamwambira wo wadimi nihumirao kuhendera maut'u gaga.”

Jesu arihogonya kuadzigidzya o alombi abomu na o athumia, waambozera mufano akiamba, “Nambirani ut'u umwenga hedu. Kwakala na mut'u mumwenga ariyekala na athana airi. Siku mwenga akimwamba ye muthana mukulu, ‘Rero enda ukarime ko munda wa mizabibu.’
Mwana anambola kunena akiamba, ‘Aa sindakwenda mino.’ Ela gonya ye mukulu akigalukwa ni moyo hatha achenda.
Kula haho, ye bimut'u achenda kwa ye wa hiri achendamwamba, ‘Rero enda ukarime ko munda wa mizabibu.’ Ye mwana akiamba, ‘H'aya ndakwenda.’ Ela k'endere bule.

Vikara kahi za ano airi ni hiye ariyehenda malagizo ga babaye?” Makiamba, “Ni iye mukulu.” Jesu akiamba, “H'aya, hatha mimi nami namwambira ujeri wenye kukala athozi a kodi na malaya manangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu mbere zenu.

Kwani Johana Mubat'izaji wakudzamwanyesa ngira ya hachi, ela k'amumukuluhirire, athozi a kodi na malaya o makimukuluhira. Nwi ng'o kamare, hatha bada ya kuona kukala andziyenu madzamukuluhira kidza nwi k'amugalukirwe ni mioyo.”

Bai Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho akiamba, “Sirikizani nimwambire fumbo ringine bai. Kwakala na mwenye nyumba mumwenga ariyerima mundawe akiulaya mizabibu, akiudengereshera wiyo, akitsimba wina wa kukamulira zabibu, gonya akiaka uringo wa kurindira. Kugonya vizho, akiukodisha kwa ak'urima, gonya ye mwenye achenda ts'i nyingine.
Makathi ga mavuno garihofika, waahuma ahumikie mende makagerwe muthalowe wa zabibu ni o ak'urima.
Bai o ak'urima marihoaona o ahumiki, mahala mumwenga makimupiga, mumwenga makimukot'a mawe, na mumwenga makimwalaga.
Bai, ye mwenye munda akihuma ahumiki angine, anji kukira o arioahuma kwandza. Ela hatha ao nao k'amapatire kit'u, kwani mahendwa dza zho zha andziyao.
Ye mwenye munda arihoona vizho akiamba, ‘Charo kiki huriza nimuhume mwanangu. Bila shaka iye mandamuishimu.’
Ela o ak'urima marihomona ye mwana akudzani, makiamba, ‘Yuno be hatha se andiyeuhala ufwa uno munda? Alume nahumwalage yuyu, uu munda ukale wehu.’
Makimuhala kare makimwamboza ndze ya wo munda makimwalaga.
Vikara, munaona ye mwenye munda akidza andaahendadze arya ak'urima?”
Makidzigidzya makiamba, “Andaahala o ak'urima aalage, gonya wo munda aap'e ak'urima angine mandiokala makimup'a muthalowe wa zabibu kila mavunaho.”
Jesu akiamba, “Hedu k'amudzangwe kugashoma go Maoro gaambago,
‘Ro iwe ririrokahalwa ni aaki
vivi be ridzagaluka ndo iwe bomu ra p'embeni.
Ut'u uwo wahendwa ni Bwana,
Na fukiulola unafwangalaza?’
Kwa vizho be namwambira kamare kukala, wo uthawali wa Mulungu mundauhokwa na ugerwe at'u mandioishi maisha ga kumufwahiza Mulungu.
Na iye andiyerigwerera iwe riro andabandika-bandika. Ela mut'u yoyosi rindiyemugwerera, rindamusaga tikitiki.”
O alombi abomu na o Mafarisayo marihosikira go mafumbo ga Jesu, makimanya kukala manaambwa ao.
Kwa vizho makijeza kumugwira mamushithaki, ela makishindwa kwa kukala were manaagoha o at'u. Kwani o at'u were manamona Jesu ni nabii.
Bai Jesu akienderera kufundisha at'u kwa kuhumira mafumbo. Akimboza fumbo ringine kaheri akiamba,
“Uthawali wa mulunguni, udzahalana na muthawali mumwenga ariyekala anamuusira harusi muthanawe.
Bai arihokala a thayari, waahuma ahumikie makaaihe aryahu at'u ariokala waasunga, ela k'amendere.

Vikara arihoona viryahu, akihuma ahumikie angine akiamba, ‘Kaambireni kukala nidzatsindza ndzao zangu kare, hamwenga na vidzao zhangu zha kunona, na nidzathayarisha kila kit'u hatha masere ao madze marye harusi.’
Marihokwendaambirwa mavihalira madhe-madhe. Kila mut'u akithuwa shuhulize. Mumwenga akigwira ngira achenda mundani, mungine achenda biasharani kwakwe.
Angine o makiagwira o ahumiki makiahendera makuruhu na makialaga.
“Muthawali arihosikira vizho akidzalwa ni k'oro, akihuma shikarie machendaalaga osi o alagi, na wo mudzi wao makiuocha.
“Bai bada ya vizho, ye muthawali akiahuma ahumikie kaheri akiamba, ‘Lolani harusi i thayari ela o nirioasunga tha were k'amav̱irya kamare.
Kwa vizho endani ko ngira-ngira na kila mut'u mundiyemona musungeni adze. Rehani at'u anji zhadimikikazho.’
O ahumiki machenda mo ngira-ngira, makireha kila namuna ya at'u, adzo na ai. Hatha vinatululia, yo nyumba ya harusi ikidzala thele at'u.
“Vikara wakathi arihokwendaalola o ajeni, akipesa mut'u mumwenga ariyekala k'avalire nguwo ya harusi bule.
Akimuza akimwamba, ‘Musena, udzangiradze muno bila kuvala nguwo ya harusi?’ Ye mut'u akisala wa kanwa ngh'aa.
Bai ye muthawali akialagiza ahumikie akiamba, ‘Muhaleni mumufunge mikono na magulu mumutsuhe ko ndze kizani. Na kuko kundakala na kiriro na kwafuna meno.’
“Kwani ni anji masungwao, ela o matsagulwao ni achache.”
Ndo o Mafarisayo machenda njama, ili makapange viryahu mandizhomuhega Jesu na maneno ga kwakwe hatha mapate ut'u wa kumushithakira.

Bai marihogonya kupanga, makiahuma anafundzi ao, na at'u a Herode. Bai, at'u ao makwenda hatha kwa Jesu machendamwamba, “Mwalimu, hunamanya kukala uwe u mujeri. Unafundisha at'u zho Mulungu ahendzazho maishi, kwa ngira ya ujeri kamare. K'ugoha mut'u yoyosi hatha kala ana cheo chani. Mana k'ulola at'u kwa uso.
Bai fwambire. Kuriha kodi kwa Kaisari ni karakara hedu si karakara?”
Jesu arihosikira vizho, akiimanya kare yo njama yao mbii mariyokala madzapanga, akiamba, “H'enwi adzihendyi! Kwanoni munanihega?
Nanyesani yo p'esa murihirayo kodi hedu.” Makimboza dinari makimup'a.
Bai Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Ino sura iriyo muno p'esani na ro dzina ni zha h'ani?”
Makiamba, “Ni zha Kaisari.” Jesu akiambira, “Kwa vizho, zha Kaisari mup'eni Kaisari mwenye, na zha Mulungu nazho mup'eni Mulungu.”
Nao marihosikira vizho, makingalala sana gonya sio, makimuricha haho makihauka.
Siku iyo vizho, Masadukayo nao makidza kwa Jesu. At'u aa Masadukayo, k'amakuluhira kukala kuna kufufuka. Makimuthuwa Jesu makimwamba,
“Mwalimu, Musa waamba kukala, mut'u akifwa kabila kupata ahoho, ye muchewe ahalwe ufwa ni nduguye ili amuzhalire ahoho ye mufwadzi.
Vikara wakathi mumwenga hatoa ndugu afungahe haha. Ye mukulu akihala muche na akinongeka kabila kupata ahoho. Kwa vizho ye muche akihalwa ufwa ni nduguye.
Iye naye akifwa bila kupata ahoho. Bai zhaenderera vizho hatha o ndugu afungahe osini makigoma kufwa hatha akisala ye muche.
Iye naye akiathuwa.
Vikara at'u mandihofufuka, yuno mwanamuche andakala mukaza h'ani na kila ndugu wamuhala?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Munahenda makosa kwa kukala k'amumanya Maoro, kidza k'amumanya nguvu za Mulungu zirizho.
Kwani makathi at'u makifufuka, kundakala k'akuna kuhala hedu kuhalwa. At'u osi mandakala here malaika a mulunguni marizho.
Na dzulu za at'u kufufulwa, k'amudzahashoma harya hat'u Mulungu arihonena nanwi akiamba,
‘Ndimi Mulungu wa Burahemu, na Isaka, na Jakobu?’ Mulungu ni Mulungu wa at'u mario moyo, si wa at'u mariofwa!”
Na o at'u marihosikira zho Jesu afundishazho, makingalala kamare.
Ela Mafarisayo marihosikira kukala Jesu adzaanyamaza o Masadukayo, makithunganana kaheri.
Bai mumwenga wao, ariye were ni mwalimu wa Sheria akimuza Jesu swali ra kumujeza.
Akiamba, “Mwalimu, amuri bomu kukira zosi ni hiyo kahi za Sheria?”
K'uzhona Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “ ‘Muhendze Bwana Mulunguo na moyowo wosi, na rohoro rosi, na akilizo zosi.’
Ii ndo amuri ya kwandza na bomu kukira zosi.
Na ya hiri yenye mana dza iyo, ni, ‘Muhendze mwandziyo here udzihendzazho mwenye.’
Amuri zizi mbiri, ndo musinji wa Sheria zosi za Musa, na mafundisho gosi ga manabii.”
Vikara o Mafarisayo marihokala machere kahi za wo muthunganano wao, Jesu akiuza swali akiamba,
“Yuno Masihi nwi, munamona ni mwana wa h'ani?” Makiamba, “Ni mwana wa Daudi.”
Jesu akiamba, “Kala ni vizho, mbona Daudi arihokala adzadzalwa ni nguvu za Roho Mweri, wamwiha ye Masihi ‘Bwana’? Kwani Daudi waamba,
‘Bwana Mulungu wamwamba Bwana wangu,
“Kelesi mukono wangu wa kurya,
muhaka mahadhuio niathambaraze kamare
ts'ini za magulugo.” ’
“Bai kala Daudi wamwiha Masihi, ‘Bwana,’ anadimadze kukala mwanawe?”
Swali riri rikiashinda kamare. Na kula siku iyo, k'ahana mut'u hatha mumwenga ariyedzambozeza kumuza swali Jesu kaheri.
Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, akiambira o anafundzie hamwenga na ro kundi ra at'u akiamba,
“Alimu a Sheria, na Mafarisayo ndio mariohala hat'u ha Musa. Manamufundisha na kumueleza Sheria ziambazho.
Kwa vizho gagwirenit'o go mafundisho gao, ela mahendo gao musigathuwe bule. Mana zho mafundishazho si zho mahendazho bule.
Kazi yao ni kufunga mizigo miziho-miziho isiyotsukulika na kuabagaza at'u angine maitsukule bila hatha kwangiza mukono.

Kila kit'u mandichokihenda manakihenda ili maonewe. Lolani zho vidude zhenye Maoro maeri mo vidhanguni na mikononi mwao, ni vibomu kukira zha at'u angine. H'e yo mitsa ya zo k'andzu zao, samba ni mire kukira ya andziyao.
Hat'u hajani manahendza kukelesi kuko mbere-mbere kwenye ajeni a ishima. Kahi za masinagogi ko, undaaona makelesi kuko mbere.
Makifika masokoni, manahendza kulamuswa-lamuswa na ishima ni at'u na kuifwa ‘Alimu.’
Ela mino ninamwambira kukala, musikubali kuifwa ‘Alimu’ kamare, kwa kukala ninwi mu ndugu na mwalimu wenu ni mumwenga.
Musihale mut'u yoyosi haha dhuniani mukamwiha ‘Baba’ kwa kukala Babiyenu ni mumwenga thu, naye a dzulu mulunguni.
Kidza p'ore mukaifwa ‘Abomu’ bule, mana mubomu wenu ninwi ni mumwenga, naye ni Masihi.
Ela ye mut'u mubomu kumukira nyosi suthi akale muhumiki wenu.
Kwani kila andiyedzinula andatharamushwa, ela andiyedzitharamusha andanulwa.”

“Shauri yenu ninwi Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Munaafungira at'u masingire kahi za uthawali wa mulunguni. Ninwi enye k'amwendzi kwangira, na hatha aryahu mamalao kwangira nao munaaziza. [

Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Munaahoka ache magungu vit'u zhao. Gonya mukila haho, munadzihendesha kwa kuvoya mavoyo mare-mare. Adhabu yenu indakala k'ali zaidhi.]

Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Mu thayari kuvuka bahari na kwenda ts'i za kure, kwa kumala mwanafundzi mumwenga thu. Ela mukimupata, munamuhendya akale mui zaidhi na zo nafasi za kwangira Jehanamu zikale k'ana mbiri ya zo zenu.”
“Shauri yenu ninwi vilongozi vipofu. Mut'u akilaha kwa Hekalu munaamba kuko si kulaha, ela munaamba kulaha jeri ni kwa mut'u adziyelaha kwa dhahabu ya Hekalu.
Vipofu ajinga nwi! Kibomu ni hicho? Ni yo dhahabu hedu ni ro Hekalu? Samba ro Hekalu ndiro rihendyayo yo dhahabu ikale eri!
Munaamba kukala mut'u akilaha kwa cho kijaja cha kwambozera sadaka k'alahire kit'u. Ela akilaha kwa yo sadaka iriyo ho kijajani munaamba kuko ndo kulaha jeri.
Vipofu nwi, cho kijaja na yo sadaka kibomu ni hicho? Samba cho kijaja ndo kihendacho yo sadaka ikale eri!
Kwa vizho mut'u alahaye kwa cho kijaja, analaha kwa kicho kijaja hamwenga na vit'u zhosi vindizhombozwa haho.
Na mut'u akilaha kwa Hekalu, analaha kwa riro Hekalu na kwa Mulungu ariye anakala mumo.
Na mut'u akilaha kwa dzulu mulunguni, analaha kwa kihi cha uthawali cha Mulungu na kwa Mulungu ariye ndiye akikeresiraye cho kihi kicho.”

“Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Munamboza fungu ra kumi hatha ra vilungo vithithe-vithithe here makodza ga kunuk'at'o na bizari, ela go maut'u mabomu-mabomu kahi za Sheria go k'amugathuwa bule. K'amuhenda hachi. Mbazi na kuluhiro nazho k'amuna. Munav̱irya mukale na hachi, na mbazi, na kuluhiro, na gago mangine nago musigariche.
Vilongozi vipofu nwi! Munatsudza indzi, ela ngamira ye munamumiza.”
“Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Munahala kikombe na sahani munavigesa ko kwa ndze, ela ko ndani kuthele unyang'anyi na ndani nyalamu.
Mafarisayo vipofu nwi! Vigeseni ko ndani kwandza na ko kwa ndze kundakala kusafi.”

“Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Mu here mbira zidzizohakwa ch'ok'aa. Ukizilola ko ndze zinafwahiza, ela ko ndani kuthele misoza ya at'u a kufwa na kila namuna ya ukolo.
Ninwi nanwi mu here zizo mbira. At'u makimulola manamona mu ahachi hatha k'azhadimikika, kudzi mu thele dambi na kudzihendya kunji.”
“Shauri yenu ninwi alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, kudzihendya kwenu nwi! Munahala mbira za manabii na za at'u ahachi, munazijengera na kuzidona
na kuamba, ‘Kalaho ndiswi furioishi wakathi uwo wa akare ehu, k'afungaalagire bule o manabii.’
Na vizho muhendazho be munadzifunga enye, mana munakubali kukala munambola kahi za lukolo luriloalaga o manabii.
H'aya imarigizeni iyo kazi iriyoandzwa ni akare enu.
Nyoka nwi! Kidza enye munaona mundathia kula kwa hukumu ya Jehanamu, k'amundathia bule.

Mana hatha ninamurehera manabii, na alimu, na at'u angine alachu. Ela ninwi mundaahala mualage, angine muasulubishe, na angine muapige vikotho kahi za masinagogi genu. Kidza muainge muamboze kahi za kila mudzi mandiwongira.

Kwa ut'u uwo bai, milatso ya at'u ahachi osi mariolagwa haha dhuniani indakala dzulu zenu. Kuandzira iryahu ya Abeli hatha ya Zakaria mwana wa Barakia, muriyemwalaga kahikahi za ho hat'u haeri na cho kijaja cha kwambozera sadaka.
Nami namwambira ujeri kukala, adhabu ya vifwa vizho zhosi indamugwerera ninwi at'u a kizhazi kiki.”

Bai Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, akikwatya kuashikithikira at'u a Jerusalemu. Akiamba, “H'enwi at'u a Jerusalemu. Kazi yenu ni kualaga manabii na kuakot'a mawe ahumiki a Mulungu mahumwao kwenu. Ni mara nyingahi nidzizomala kumukundzumanya hamwenga here k'uk'u aafinikirazho anae na mahahage, ela mudzakahala?
Lolani nyumba yenu idzarichwa ikale gandzo.
Nami namwambira kamare kukala, k'amundanona kaheri muhaka haho mundihokudzaamba, ‘Naahaswe iye adzaye kwa dzina ra Bwana.’ ”
Vikara Jesu arihokala adzambola kahi za ro Hekalu akwendani, anafundzie mamwanyesa go majengo ga ro Hekalu.
Ela Jesu akiambira kukala, “Amba munagaona gano majengo gosi zho? Be namwambira ujeri wenye k'ahana iwe hatha mwenga rindirosala dzulu za mwandziwe, kila kit'u kinadzabandwa-bandwa.”

Bai Jesu arihombola haho, wakwendakelesi kahi za Murima wa Mizeituni. Vikara arihokala akelesi, anafundzie mamuza kinjama makiamba, “Maut'u gano gandahendeka rini? Vidze ni muv̱ano wani undiwonyesa kukala u hehi na kudza na mwisho wa dhunia udzafika?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Dzimanyirireni hasidze mut'u akamukenga.
Kwani kuna anji mandiokudza kwa dzina rangu na kuamba ao ndo Masihi, na mandakenga at'u anji.
Na mundasikira uv̱oro wa viha vihefwazho hehi na vingine mundahenda kuvisikira uvumi, ela sogoheni, kwani ni hatha gakale gago, ela wo mwisho wa urumwengu undakala uchere mbere.
Kabila rindauka kwendapigana na kabila ringine. Uthawali undapigana na uthawali mungine. Kundakala na ndzala na ts'i indathethema hat'u-hat'u.
Ela gago gosi gandakala ni mwandzo wa utsungu thu.”
“Mundagwirwa muteswe na mwalagwe. Kila mut'u andamumena haha urumwenguni kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu.
Kahi za wakathi uwo, at'u anji mandauya nyuma na makwatye kuguzana na kutsukirirwana enye kwa enye.
Kundambola manabii anji a ulongo na mandakenga at'u anji.
Na kwa kukala uthiriri undakala udzakaza zhomu, at'u mandaricha kuahendza andziyao.
Ela iye andiyevumirira hatha mwisho ndiye andiyeokoka.
Na Uv̱oro uu Udzo wa uthawali wa mulunguni undahubiriwa urumwengu muzima, ili ukale ushahidhi kwa makabila gosi, ndo wo mwisho udze.”
“Mundaona kit'u cha kutsukiza na cha kwanonga, kirichonenwa ni nabii Danieli kapindi, kiimire kahi za ho hat'u haeri. (H'ewe mushomi, shomat'o ung'alirwe.)
Bai mundihoona vizho, at'u osi mandiokala Judea namachimbirire ko mirimani.
Mut'u andiyekala a dzulu za nyumba ya kwakwe asiuye mo nyumbani kwendahala kit'u chochosi.
Mut'u andiyekala a mundani asiuye mudzini kwendahala nguwoye.
Wakathi uwo vindakala vii-vii zaidhi kwa ano m'ama mandiokala mana mimba na mandiokala manaamwisa.
Na voyani uwo wakathi mundihokala munachimbira, usikale ni wakathi wa p'eho, hedu siku ya Sabato.
Kwani wakathi uwo kundakala na mateso mabomu garigo k'agadzaonewa na k'agandaonewa kaheri haha urumwenguni.
Siku zizo za mateso Mulungu wazihunguza kwa ut'u wa at'u arioatsagula, ela kala si vizho, k'ahana hatha mut'u mumwenga angayeokoka.”
“Bai mut'u akimwamba, ‘Lola thiyuno ye Masihi!’ hedu, ‘Thiyuya kurya,’ sikuluhireni bule.
Mana kundambola ano Masihi anji a ulongo, na manabii anji a ulongo. At'u ao osi mandahenda miv̱ano mibomu ili vichadimikika maakenge hatha o at'u mariotsagulwa ni Mulungu.
Lolani, nidzamwambira maut'u gaga kimbere.”
“Kwa vizho mut'u yoyosi andiyekudzamwambira kukala, ‘Masihi a nyika bewe!’ hedu ‘Masihi adzazama kuryahu ndani!’ hatha thuwani shuhuli zenu, musimugwire gakwe kamare.
Mana Mwana wa Mudamu andihokudza, andaonewa ni kila mut'u, dza viryahu lumethe lumethazho mwambolero wa dzuwa na lukaonewa hatha mutserero wa dzuwa.
Kwani ‘Hadzihogwa kimba, ndo nderi mathungananaho.’ ”
“Bada ya siku ziryahu za mateso kukira thu, dzuwa rindangira kiza, na mwezi k'aundaala kaheri. Nyenyezi zindagwa ts'i, na nguvu za dzulu mulunguni zindathukuswa.

Na vikigoma vizho, ko dzulu kundambola muv̱ano wa kunyesa kukala Mwana wa Mudamu akudzani. At'u a makabila gosi ga urumwengu mandarira, kidza mandamona Mwana wa Mudamu anatharamuka kuno a dzulu za maingu. Naye andatharamuka na nguvu na nguma nyinji.
Andaahuma malaikae mapige gunda zhomu zhenye, na maakundzumanye o at'u osi mariotsagulwa ni Mulungu kula kila p'embe ya dhunia.”
“Bai dzifundisheni kula kwa mutini. Mutini t'aize zikikala nyolovu na kukwatya kumboza makodza, munamanya kare wakathi wa mavuno udzafika hehi.
Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi mukiona maut'u gaga gosi, manyani kukala wakathi wa kudza Mwana wa Mudamu udzafika hehi.
Nami namwambira kamare, kizhazi kiki k'akindakira kabila maut'u gaga gosi kuthimira.
Mulunguni na ts'i, zhosi vindahenda mwisho, ela maneno gangu k'agana mwisho bule.”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Ela k'ahana mut'u amanyaye ni siku yani na saa yani gandihokalira maut'u gaga, hatha o malaika na ye Mwana wa Mudamu k'amaimanya bule, Baba h'akeye nde aimanyaye.”
“Kudza kwa Mwana wa Mudamu kundakala dza zho virizhokala wakathi wa Nuhu.
Kwani siku zizo za Nuhu kabila v̱ula ya muretho k'aidzanya, at'u mathuwa kuishi here kawaida thu. Makala makirya na kunwa, na kuhala na kuhalwa hatha Nuhu achangira safinani.
At'u ao mathuwa kuishi bila kumanya kundakudzani, hatha muretho ukidzaahala vizho. Na vizho ndo vindizhokala hatha yo siku andihokudza Mwana wa Mudamu.
Siku iyo alume airi mandakala ma mundani, mumwenga andahalwa na ye mungine arichwe.
Anaache airi mandakala manasaga, mumwenga andahalwa na ye mungine arichwe.
Kwa vizho, kalani matso, mana k'amumanya Bwana wenu andakudza siku yani.
Sirikizani bai, kala mwenye nyumba ni kumanya mwivi andakudza usiku wa saa nyingahi, k'angakubalire nyumbaye ibandwe bule, angachesa matso kuirinda.
Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi dziikeni thayari wakathi wosi, kwani Mwana wa Mudamu andakudza wakathi musiwoudhania.”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Muhumiki mwaminifu na mulachu ni yuyahu ariye akirichirwa ahumiki andziye ni bwanawe aatsundze na kuap'a chakurya here vimalikanazho, andahenda vizho.
Baha iye muhumiki iye ariye bwanawe andakudzamuthekeza anahenda vizho.
Kwani namwambira jeri wenye kukala, andamuhala na amuhendye akale muimirizi wa zho vit'u zhosi arizho nazho.
Ela ye muhumiki mui akiamba kimoyo-moyo, ‘Naona ye bwana wangu k'andauya vikara,’
akwache kuapiga o ahumiki andziye, na kurya na kunwa hamwenga na arevi.
Bai ye bwana wa muhumiki yuyu andauya siku asiyodhania na saa asiyoimanya.
Naye afikaho andakudzamuhala na amutose visiku-visiku, gonya amutsanganye na at'u a kudzihendya. Na kuko at'u mandarira na kwafuna meno kwa utsungu.”
“Haho siku andihokudzirira Mwana wa Mudamu, uthawali wa mulunguni undahalana na asichana kumi marioasha mataa gao mende makamutsangire bwana harusi.
Kahi za o asichana kumi, asichana atsano were ni azuzu, na atsano were ni alachu.
Vikara aryahu asichana azuzu, mamanya ko kutsukula go mataa kare ela k'amatsukulire akiba yoyosi ya mafuha.
Ela arya alachu o makitsukula mataa hamwenga na mafuha ga akiba.
Bai kwa kukala ye bwana harusi k'adzire haraka, o asichana osi makunukira na makilala.
Ela usiku wa manane, makihenda kusikira, ‘Thiye bwana harusi ukani mwende mukamutsangire.’
Aryahu asichana osi makivumbuluka kare makikwacha kuthayarisha mataa gao.
Vikara aryahu asichana azuzu marihoona kukala mataa gao k'agana mafuha, makiavoya o alachu makiamba, ‘Huthanyizeni naswi go mafuha, mana mataa gehu ganazima.’
Ela o asichana alachu makidzigidzya makiamba, ‘Go mafuha hurigo nago be k'agadima kuhuthosha hosi bule, kwa vizho kot'ani malo madhukani mukagule genu.’

K'uzhona o asichana azuzu marihokala makwendani ko madhukani, kuno ye bwana harusi akidza. Aryahu asichana atsano mariokala ma thayari, machangira hamwenga naye kahi za yo nyumba ya harusi na muryango ukifungwa.”
“Bada ya muda, o asichana angine makidza kula ko mafuhani. Makidzabisha zhomu zhenye makiamba, ‘Bwana, bwana, huvugulire!’
Ela ye bwana harusi akiadzigidzya akiamba, ‘Kunena wo ujeri, simumanya bule ninwi.’ ”
Jesu arihomarigiza ro fumbo riro akiamba, “Kwa vizho, kalani thayari wakathi wosi, mana k'amumanya maut'u gaga gandakala siku yani na saa yani.”

Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Wakathi uwo be udzahalana na mut'u mumwenga ariyekala anamala kufunga charo cha kwenda ts'i za kure. Bai kabila k'adzauka, waaiha ahumikie akiap'a malize mamutsundzire.
Waaiha hamwenga, na kila mut'u akimup'a t'alant'a kulengana na wadimiwe. Wa kwandza wamup'a t'alant'a ts'ano. Wa hiri akimup'a mbiri, na wa hahu akimup'a mwenga. Arihogonya vizho akiuka achenda.
Vikara arihokala adzakwenda, ye muhumiki ariyegerwa t'alant'a ts'ano, akizihendera kazi na zikizhala ts'ano nyingine.
Yuya ariyegerwa mbiri naye, akizihendera kazi hatha zikizhala mbiri nyingine.
Ela ye muhumiki ariyegerwa t'alant'a mwenga, akiihala yo p'esa ya bwanawe achendaitsimbira wina akiizika.”
“Vikara bada ya muda mure, ye bwana wa aryahu ahumiki akiuya na akidzapiga hesabu na o ahumikie.

Bai yuyahu muhumiki ariyegerwa t'alant'a ts'ano, akimboza zo ts'ano nyingine akiamba, ‘Bwana, mut'u uwe wanirichira t'alant'a ts'ano, nami nikizihendera kazi hatha zikizhala zizi ts'ano nyingine, thizi.’

Ye bwanawe akimwamba, ‘U muhumiki mudzo na mwaminifu, uriyehenda kazi ya kunifwaha moyo wangu. Wakala mwaminifu dzulu za maut'u mathithe, na vivi ndakuhendya uimirire maut'u mabomu zaidhi. H'aya ndzo kuno wangire kahi za raha ya bwanao.’
“Kula iye, akithuwirizwa ni yuyahu wa t'alant'a mbiri. Iye naye akiamba, ‘Bwana, uwe wanip'a t'alant'a mbiri, nami nikizihendera kazi hatha zikizhala zizi t'alant'a mbiri nyingine, thizi.’

Ye bwanawe akiamba, ‘U muhumiki mudzo na mwaminifu, uriyehenda kazi ya kunifwaha moyo wangu. Wakala mwaminifu kwa maut'u mathithe nami nindakuhendya uimirire maut'u mabomu. H'aya ndzo kuno wangire kahi raha ya bwanao.’
Kula iye, akidza ye wa t'alant'a mwenga. Akiamba, ‘Bwana, uwe be ninakumanyat'o sana mino. U mut'u mwomu. Unahendza kuvuna hat'u uriho k'uhalayire, na kuzola mutsere uriwo k'uuhululire.
Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, yo t'alant'ayo nikigoha kuihendera kazi. Nikiihala nikiitsimbira wina nikiizika. Kwa vizho yo t'alant'ayo thii hala mwenye.’
K'ona ye bwanawe anambola kunena akiamba, ‘Muhumiki muthiriri na mukaha we. Be hatha navikale unanimanyat'o sana kukala nivuna hat'u niriho silayire, na kuzola mutsere hat'u niriho sihululire.
Were k'udima kwendazika bengi zo p'esa zangu changari zikanizhalira faidha?
H'aya muhokeni kare yo t'alant'a mumup'e ye ariye na kumi.
Kwani kila ariye na kit'u andagerwa akale na vinji. Ela ariye k'ana kit'u, andahokwa hatha cho aricho nacho.
H'aya muhaleni yuyu muhumiki asiye mana mumutsuhe ko ndze kizani. Na kuko kundakala na kurira na kwafuna meno.’ ”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Haho Mwana wa Mudamu andihokudza na malaika osi kahi za nguma ya kwakwe, andakelesi dzulu za kihi cha kwakwe cha kithawali, kihi chenye nguma.
Bai andihokala yukelesi, at'u a makabila gosi mandakudzaima mbereze, naye andaathanya k'ana mbiri dza viryahu murisa athanyazho mbuzi na ng'ondzi.
At'u enye hachi andaaika mukono wa kurya. At'u athiriri o andaaika mukono wa kumots'o.
Gonya ye Muthawali andaambira aryahu mandiokala mukono wa kurya, ‘Ndzoni kuno nwi at'u muriohaswa ni Baba. Ndzoni muhale uthawali muriwothayarishirwa ni Baba hangu urumwengu k'audzaumbwa.
Kwani nirihokala nina ndzala, ninwi mwanip'a chakurya nikirya. Nirihokala nina k'ihu, mukinip'a madzi nikinwa. Na nirihokala ni mujeni mukinikaribishat'o.
Nirihokala nina wira mwanip'a nguwo nikivala. Nirihokala ni mukongo mukidzanilola, na nirihokala ni jela nazho dzazho.’
O ahachi mandauza maambe, ‘Bwana, unaamba kukala urihokala una ndzala fwakup'a chakurya ukirya. Urihokala una k'ihu fukikup'a madzi ukinwa.
Urihokala u mujeni fukikukaribishat'o. Urihokala una wira fukikup'a nguwo ukivala.
Urihokala u mukongo fukidzakulola, na urihokala u jela nazho dzazho. Be hatha fwakona rini sino hatha fukikuhendera maut'u gano gosi?’
Ye Muthawali andaadzigidzya aambe, ‘Namwambira kamare kukala, zho murizhoahendera aa ndugu zangu athithe be mwanihendera mimi.’
“Gonya andaambira o at'u mandiokala mukono wa kumots'o, ‘Nihaukirani nwi at'u muriolaniwa. Endani kahi za moho wa kare na kare, kut'u kurikotengezerwa Shethani na malaikae!
Kwani nirihokala nina ndzala, k'amunip'ere chakurya nikarya. Nirihokala nina k'ihu k'amunip'ere madzi nikanwa.
Nirihokala ni mujeni k'amunikaribishire. Nirihokala nina wira k'amunip'ere nguwo nikavala. Nirihokala ni mukongo k'amudzire nilola, na nirihokala jela nazho dzazho.’
Nao mandamuza mamwambe, ‘Bwana, ni rini ho furihokona una ndzala, hedu una k'ihu, hedu u mujeni, hedu u mukongo, hedu u jela gonya sino k'afukwavizire fukikuricha vizho?’
Ye andaadzigidzya aambe, ‘Ninamwambira kamare kukala, zho murizho k'amuahenderere aa ndugu zangu athithe, be hatha mimi nami k'amunihenderere.’
Nao mandihoambwa vizho, mandakwendangira kahi za hukumu ya kare na kare, ela ahachi o, mandangira kahi za uzima wa kare na kare.”
Vikara Jesu arihokala adzagonya kunena maneno gaga gosi, waambira anafundzie,
“Here mumanyazho, muhondo ni sikuk'uu ya P'asaka. Na Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa ili asulubiwe.”
Wakathi uwo, alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi mathunganana nyumbani kwa Kayafa. Mut'u yuyu Kayafa were nde Mulombi mubomu mwenye wakathi uwo.
Bai at'u ao mathunganana kuko ili mamale ngira ya kilachu ya kumugwirira Jesu na mamwalage.
Ela marihothunganana, mapatana kukala masimugwire Jesu wakathi wa P'asaka bule, p'ore at'u makathinya bugwa.
Bai siku mwenga, Jesu wakwenda nyumbani kwa mwanamulume mumwenga ariyekala akiifwa Simoni Mahana. Mwanamulume yuyu were anatoa kahi za kadzidzi ka Beth'ania.

Bai arihokala haho, mwanamuche mumwenga akidza na th'up'a iriyokala i thele mafuha ga marashi kidza ga gali sana. Th'up'a ii yere yatengezwa na iwe ra alabasita. Bai arihofika haho, akimumwagira Jesu go mafuha mo kitswani kuno Jesu mwenye anahumira chakurya.
Bai o anafundzi marihoona viryahu, k'aviafwahire bule, maamba, “Kuno be tha si kwanonga kuno?
Mafuha gaga kala gadzaguzwa gakambola p'esa nyinji zenye na makagerwa masikini?”
Jesu arihovimanya akiamba, “Mbona munamubudzya ye mwanamuchengwa? Iye adzanihendera kit'u kidzo.
Masikini munao siku zosini, ela mimi k'amundakala nami siku zosini bule.
Ut'u uu wa kunimwagira mafuha, yuyu mwanamuche adzauhenda ili anithayarishe kwa kuzikwa kwangu.
Nami namwambira ujeri, zho adzizhohenda mwanamuche yuyu vivi rero, nazho vindathalwa na kukumbukirwa kila undihohubiriwa wo Uv̱oro Udzo kahi za urumwengu muzima.”
Bai wakathi uwo, mumwenga wa aryahu anafundzi kumi na airi a Jesu aifwaye Juda Isikariote, wauka achenda kwa alombi abomu.
Anafika kuko akiamba, “Vidze mut'u yuno nikimulazha kwenu, mundanip'ani?” K'ona arihonena vizho, aryahu alombi abomu makimuthalira visiku mirongo mihahu zha fedha makimup'a.
Na kulaizira haho, Juda akikala anamala nafasi mbidzo ya kumusalitira Jesu.
Vikara siku ya kwandza ya sikuk'uu ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u, anafundzi makwendamuza Jesu makiamba, “P'asaka ino undairyahi, fukakuthayarishire?”

Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Ngirani wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu mwende hatha kwa yuyu mut'u yuyu. Mukifika kuko mwambeni kukala, ‘Mwalimu anaamba wakathi wangu u hehi, kwa vizho nindarya P'asaka na anafundzi angu kwako nyumbani.’ ”
Bai o anafundzi makihenda here marizhokala madzalagizwa ni Jesu. Manafika kuko makithayarisha yo P'asaka.
Kurihofika dziloni, Jesu na anafundzie kumi na airi makelesi marye chakurya.
Marihokala makuryani Jesu akinena akiamba, “Ninamwambira ujeri wenye kukala mumwenga wenu haha andanisaliti.”
O anafundzi marihosikira vizho makishikithika sana na makikwacha kumuza Jesu mumwenga-mumwenga makiamba, “Vidze ni mimi, Bwana?”
Ela Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Iye atsotsaye nami kahi za muvure mumwenga nde andiyenisaliti.
Mwana wa Mudamu anenda kare kamwe here Maoro gaambazho, ela shauriye iye mut'u amusalitiye! Vingakala baha kala k'azhalirwe.”
Vikara Jesu arihonena viryahu, ye musaliti wa kwakwe naye akiuza akiamba, “Vidze ni mimi Mwalimu?” Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Udzanena.”
Bai marihokala makuryani, Jesu wahala mukahe, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiumogola-mogola akiap'a o anafundzie akiamba, “Halani murye, uu ndo mwiri wangu.”
Na arihogonya kuap'a wo mukahe, akihala cho kikombe cha divai, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiap'a o anafundzie akiamba, “Halani kikombe kiki mutsumbulirane,
kwani ii ndo milatso yangu ya cho kilagane, imwagwayo ili at'u anji madime kusamehewa dambi zao.
Nami namwambira ujeri, sindanwa divai ii kaheri muhaka siku iyo nindihonwa divai mbisha hamwenga nanwi kahi za uthawali wa Baba.”
Gonya makiimba wira na makiuka kwenda Murima wa Mizeituni.
Jesu akiambira kukala, “Usiku wa rero, ninwi nyosi mundaniricha h'akiyangu. Kwani Maoro ganaamba, ‘Nindamupiga ye murisa na zo ng'ondzi zosi zindatsamukana.’
Ela haho nikikala nidzafufulwa, nindamuthangulia kwenda Galilaya.”
P'et'ero akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha kala osi mandakuricha, mimi sindakuricha ng'o.”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Nakwambira ujeri, usiku wa rero kabila jogolo k'aridzaika, undanikana k'ana t'ahu.”
P'et'ero akimwamba Jesu, “Hatha kala ni kufwa nanifwe, ela sindakukana ng'o!” Na o anafundzi angine nao makinena dza vizho.
Gonya Jesu na anafundzie makwenda hat'u haifwaho Geth'isemane. Marihofika kuko, akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, “Kelesini haha munitharize nami nasongera mbere vichache nikavoye.”
Arihokala akwendani akimuhala P'et'ero na o ana airi a Zebedayo, Jakobu na Johana achenda nao. Naye wakathi uwo washononeka zhomu na kubudzyika moyo.
Bai makwenda hatha manafika ko mbere, akiambira kukala, “Ninashononeka zhomu moyoni mwangu hatha ni here nindiyefwa. Bai kalani haha muchese nami.”

Gonya Jesu akiaricha ano P'et'ero haho na akisongera mbere vichache. Achendagwa na moyo akivoya akiamba, “Baba, chamba vinadimikika mateso gaga naganiukire, gasinipate bule. Ela navikale here uhendzazho uwe, visikale here nihendzazho mimi bule.”
Kula haho akiauyira o anafundzie, naye akidzaaona marere. Akimwamba P'et'ero, “Yani k'amudimire kuchesa nami hatha ngaa saa mwenga?
Chesani na muvoye sidze mukangira majezoni, kwani roho inahendza kamare, ela mwiri ni munyonge.”

Naye arihogonya kunena, akiaricha haho kaheri na achendavoya dza vizho zha kwandza akiamba, “Baba, chamba vinadimikika, mateso gaga gasinipate bule. Ela visikale here nihendzazho mimi, navikale here uhendzazho uwe.”
Arihogonya kuvoya vizho, akiauyira o ano P'et'ero. Anafika kuko, achendaathekeza marere kaheri. K'amadimire kukala matso kwa wo uts'indzizi mariwokala nawo.
Bai Jesu akiaricha kaheri, na achendavoya mara ya hahu, dza vizho zha mara ya kwandza.
Arihogonya kuvoya, akiauyira o anafundzie akiambira, “Muchere kulala na kudzioyeza? Lolani wakathi wa Mwana wa Mudamu kusalitiwa kwa enye dambi udzafika.
Lamukani fwende, kwani ye andiyenisaliti akudzani.”

Bai arihokala achere kunena, lola Juda mumwenga wa o anafundzie kumi na airi akidza na kundi bomu ra at'u mariokala madzatsukula mishu na njogoma. At'u aa were mala kwa alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi.
Iye musaliti were waap'a muv̱ano kukala, “Ye nindiyemudonera nde mumumalaye, mugwireni.”
Juda achenda mara mwenga na akiamba, “Dheri narikale kwako Mwalimu,” gonya akimudonera.
Jesu arihoona viryahu, akimwamba Juda, “Henda zho vidzizhokufisha musenangu.” Bai o at'u makimwangiza magandzani Jesu.
Lola mumwenga kahi za o at'u mariokala na Jesu, akitsolola mushuwe na akimuthema muhumiki wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akimutosa sikiro.
Jesu arihoona viryahu, akimwamba ye mwenye mushu, “Wudzye chowani mwakwe wo mushuwo. Kwani kila ahumiraye mushu, andalagwa kwa mushu.
K'umanya kukala nikamwambira Baba anirehere maalifu ga malaika madze mafuhehere, ananirehera mara mwenga?
Ela nikihendazho, go Maoro gaambago kukala ni hatha vivi vikale gandathimiradze?”

Bai Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, akiagalukira o at'u akiamba, “Mbona mudzambola na mishu na njogoma kudzanigwira dza here mudzaogwira jambazi? Kila siku nidzakala nikikelesi kahi za ro Hekalu kufundisha na k'amunigwirire?
Ela gaga gosi ganakala kwamba garyahu garigoorwa ni manabii gathimire.” Bai o anafundzie osi makimuricha makichimbira.
Bai aryahu at'u mariomugwira Jesu, mamuhala vivii hatha nyumbani kwa Kayafa, ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, mana kuko ndo o alimu a Sheria, na athumia marikokala madzathunganana kumuthariza.
Marihokala makwendani, P'et'ero wamuthuwa Jesu kwa kure. Wakwenda hatha achendangira muhalani ha ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, akikelesi na o arindzi ili alolere chamba vindakaladze.
Bai aryahu alombi abomu na ro Baraza ra athumia, majeza zhomu kumala ushahidhi wowosi wa ulongo wa kuthosha kumwalagira Jesu,
ela k'amaupatire. At'u anji majeza kumboza ushahidhi wao wa ulongo, ela k'aufwahire kit'u. Mwisho kamare, kuchambola anaalume airi
makiamba, “Mwanamulume yuyu waamba kukala ro Hekalu ra Mulungu anadima kuribanda-banda na akariaka kwa siku t'ahu.”
Bai ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akirungarara, na akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Mbona k'udzigidzya kit'u. Zho manenazho ano at'u ni jeri?”
Ela Jesu akinyamala zii. Ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akinena kaheri akiamba, “Ninakulahiza kahi za dzina ra Mulungu ariye moyo, ufwambire chamba uwe ndiwe Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Jesu akimwamba, “Udzanena. Nami namwambira ujeri, kula vivi mundamona Mwana wa Mudamu akelesi mukono wa kurya wa Mulungu mwenye nguvu, na anadza kuno a dzulu za maingu.”

Kusikira vizho thu, ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akigwira nguwo za kwakwe akizitharura kwa kutsukirwa, kuno ananena na kuamba, “Iyo ni kufuru kamare iyo. K'amudzamusikira zho? Vino funa haja ya mashahidhi angine?
Hedu munaambadze nwi?” Na osini makiamba, “Anav̱irya kwalagwa.”
Ndo makimutsuhira mahe ga uso na kumupiga makonde. Angine makimupiga makofi,
kuno manamwamba, “We Masihi, fwambire adzekupiga ni h'ani kala u nabii jeri!”

Wakathi uu wosi P'et'ero were akelesi ko muhalani. Bai arihokala kuko muhendzi wa kazi wa kiche wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye wakudzamwamba P'et'ero, “We nawe samba were u hamwenga na yuyu Jesu wa Galilaya?”
P'et'ero akikana mbere zao akiamba, “Maneno gago mino sigamanya.”
Kula haho, P'et'ero akimbola achenda ko muv̱iryani. Anafika kuko, musichana mumwenga akimona na akiambira o at'u mariokala haho kukala, “Yuyu naye were a hamwenga na Jesu wa Nazareth'i benwi.”
P'et'ero akikanaiza kaheri kwa kuapa akiamba, “Mwanamulume iye simumanya kamare.”
Ela k'avitoere, o at'u mariokala maimire haho makimwamba P'et'ero, “Uwe be unakana ulongo, ela u mumwenga waho. Hatha yo minenereyo inanyesa t'i.”
P'et'ero akikwatya kulani na kulaha, akiamba, “Mwanamulume iye be simumanya.” Na haho henye jogolo rikiika.
P'et'ero akikumbukira viryahu arizhoambwa ni Jesu kukala, “Kabila jogolo k'aridzaika undanikana k'ana t'ahu.” Bai achambola ko ndze achendarira na utsungu munji.
Kurihocha, o alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi mathunganana kaheri makipanga viryahu mandizhohenda hatha mamwalage Jesu.
Bai mamuhala makimufunga, na makimuhirika kwa luwali P'ilato.
Juda arihoona kukala ro Baraza ratosa kukala mamwalage Jesu, wadziutha sana, hatha akihala zho visiku mirongo mihahu zha fedha achenda nazho kuko kwa alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi ili akaaujire.
Arihofika kuko waagololeza akiamba, “Nahenda dambi bomu kumusaliti mut'u asiye dambi na mut'u.” O makimwamba, “Gago be ni gako gago, sino k'ahugamanya.”
Naye kusikira vizho, akihala zho visiku zha fedha akivitsuha mo Hekaluni, achambola achendadzifunga lugwe.
Vikara o alombi abomu makivitsola-tsola viryahu visiku zha fedha gonya makiamba, “P'esa zizi be zina kilatso, na Sheria yehu k'aihuruhusu kuika p'esa dza zizi kahi za akiba ya mumu Hekaluni.”
Kwa vizho bada ya kuojana-ojana makivihala machendagula hat'u harihokala hakiifwa Munda wa Muumbi wa Nyungu, hakale hat'u ha kuzikwa ajeni.
Na kulaiza siku iyo hatha rero munda uwo unaifwa Munda wa Milatso.

Kwa ut'u uwo wenye bai, garyahu maneno garigonenwa ni nabii Jeremia gakithimira. Kwani Jeremia wanena akiamba, “Mahala vizho visiku mirongo mihahu zha fedha, iriyo were ndo bei ya kugulira mut'u iriyoikwa ni o ana a Iziraeli,
makivigula wo Munda wa Muumbi wa Nyungu here Bwana arizhonilagiza.”
Vikara Jesu arihohirikwa kwa P'ilato, waimishwa haho mbereze na P'ilato akimuza akiamba, “Vidze we ndiwe muthawali wa Ayahudi?” Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Uwe udzanena.”
Ela o alombi abomu na athumia a Kiyahudi marihomushithaki, Jesu wanyamala zii kamare.
P'ilato arihoona viryahu, akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Go maut'u manji genye madzigoamba wagahenda unagasikira?”
Ela Jesu ye akithuwa kunyamala vizho bila kudzigidzya hatha ango mwenga, hatha ye P'ilato vikimwangalaza zhomu zhenye.
Kila sikuk'uu ya P'asaka, P'ilato were ana mazowera ga kuambozera Ayahudi mufungwa mumwenga mandiyemutsagula enye.
Bai kahi za wakathi uwo, kwere kuna mufungwa ariyekala adzaluta nguma, dzinare ni Baraba.
Kwa vizho o Ayahudi marihokundzumanyikana hamwenga, P'ilato akiauza akiamba, “Nimwambozere Baraba hedu nimwambozere Jesu aifwaye Masihi?”
Kwani P'ilato wamanya kukala o athumia a Kiyahudi madzamushithaki Jesu kwa sababu ya wivu thu.

Bai P'ilato arihokala anakeresi kahi za kihiche cha hukumu alamule, muchewe akilagiza uv̱oro akiamba, “Maut'u gago be usigangirire kamare, kwani mut'u yuyu be ni muhachi. Mana usiku nidzaloha ndoso mbii-mbii sana dzulu za kwakwe. Nayo ndoso iyo idzanisirinya.”
Ela o alombi abomu na o athumia a Kiyahudi makiangola-ngola o at'u kukala maambe mambozerwe Baraba, ela Jesu ye alagwe.
Kwa vizho P'ilato arihouza kaheri na kuamba, “Kahi za ano at'u airi munahendza nimwambozere h'ani?” O at'u makiamba, “Baraba.”
P'ilato akiauza akiamba, “Na yuno Jesu aifwaye Masihi ye nimuhendedze?” Nao makinena kwa umwenga makiamba, “Naasulubiwe!”
P'ilato akiauza kaheri akiamba, “Kwani adzakosani kibomu?” Ela o hatha makikaza kupiga k'ululu makiamba, “Naasulubiwe!”

Bai P'ilato arihoona kukala hatha akaenderera kunena nao kidza k'avindafwaha kit'u na kidza o at'u were madzakwacha kuhenda fujo, akihala madzi akioga mikono mbere za ro kundi ra at'u, akiamba, “Milatso ya mut'u yuyu k'aidzulu yangu bule, i dzulu zenu.”
Na lola o at'u makidzigidzya kwa umwenga makiamba, “Milatsoye naikale dzulu zehu siswi na dzulu za ana ehu.”
Kwa vizho P'ilato akiambozera Baraba, gonya akiamuru Jesu apigwe vikotho, ndo alazhwe akasulubiwe.
Jesu arihokala adzalazhwa akasulubiwe, o shikari a luwali P'ilato mamuhala machangira naye mumo nyumbani mwa luwali, na cho kikosi chosi cha shikari kikimudengereka.
Bai mamuhala makimuvula nguwo, gonya makimuvika k'andzu th'une.

Manambola haho makitengeza kiremba cha miya makimuvika. Gonya makihala kidhath'a cha mwandzi makimugwiza kahi za wo mukonowe wa kurya. Bai marihogonya vizho makikwacha kupiga mavindi na kumuv̱udhya Jesu na kumwamba, “K'una ut'u muheshimiwa muthawali wa Ayahudi?”
Bai mamutsuhira mahe, gonya makimunyagula cho kidhath'a makimupiga nacho mo kitswani.
Marihokala madzamuv̱udhya zha kuthosha, mamuvula yo k'andzu th'une, makimuvika zo nguwoze kaheri, makimuthongozha kwendamusulubisha.
Vikara marihokala madzambola kwa P'ilato makwendani, mumo ngirani mathungana mwanamulume mumwenga Muk'irene aifwaye Simoni. Bai o shikari makimulazimisha autsukule wo musalaba wa Jesu.
Bai makwenda vivii hatha hat'u haifwaho Gologoth'a, yani Ribeshe ra Kitswa.
Makimup'a Jesu divai ya kutsanganywa na ut'u wa utsungu sana, ela arihoithatha akikahala kuinwa.
Marihokala madzagonya kumusulubisha, mahala zo nguwoze makizigazha kwa kuhenda kuzipigira k'ura.
Gonya makikelesi haho kumurinda.
Dzulu za cho kitswa cha Jesu haikwa kibao kirichoorwa kosa mariromushithakira. Nacho chere kinaamba vivi:
Jesu wasulubiwa hamwenga na aivi airi. Mumwenga mukono wa kurya, na mungine mukono wa kumots'o.
At'u mariokira na haho arihosulubiwa Jesu, mamusholera, makithukusa vitswa zhao kikav̱udhye,
makiamba, “Kw'aamba undaribanda ro Hekalu na uriake kwa siku t'ahu vino? H'aya dziokole mwenye be vivi. Chamba u Mwana wa Mulungu jeri, thima kula ho musalabani.”
Na lola o alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria, na athumia a Kiyahudi nao makimusholera dza vizho zha akizi a ngira. Makiamba, “Waokola at'u angine, ela vino k'adima kudzakola mwenye.
Samba ni muthawali wa Iziraeli ye, naathime kula ho musalabani, naswi fundamuamini.
Amba ye were anamukuluhira Mulungu sana; hatha anaamba kukala ni Mwana wa Mulungu. H'aya kala ye Mulungu anamuhendza jeri, be vivi naamwakole.”
Hatha aryahu aivi airi mariosulubiwa hamwenga naye kidza nao mamusholera dza vizho zha o angine.
Bada ya Jesu kusulubiwa, ts'i yosi yagit'ana kiza kuandzira saa sitha muhadhi saa chenda.
Inafika mwendo wa saa chenda Jesu akirira kwa sauthi bomu akiamba,
Yani, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, mbona udzaniricha?”
Kusikira vizho, angine kahi za ao at'u mariokala maimire haho makiamba, “Sirikizani, anamwiha Elija benwi!”
Na haho na haho, mumwenga wao akikot'a malo achendavwika buwa kahi za siki, akiridunga mudhath'ani akimup'a Jesu anyunye.
Ela andziye makimwamba, “Richa hulole chamba Elija andakudzamuthizha.” [Na mumwenga wao akihala fumo akimudunga lubavuni, akimbola milatso na madzi.]
Bai Jesu akipiga k'ululu kaheri na akitoka roho.
Na lola yo p'azia kahi za ro Hekalu yapashuka ikigazhika p'ande mbiri, kula dzulu hatha ts'ini. Ts'i ikithethema na mawe gakibandika-bandika.
Mbira nyinji za at'u a Mulungu zikigunuka na o at'u enye makifufuka,
na machambola mo mbirani. Na lola Jesu arihofufuka, at'u aa mangira kahi za mudzi mueri wa Jerusalemu na makionewa ni at'u anji enye.

Bai o shikari mariokala manamurinda Jesu, hamwenga na ye mubomu wao marihoona zho ts'i irizhokala inathethema, hamwenga na go maut'u mangine gosi, mangirwa ni woga sana hatha makiamba, “Yuyu were ni Mwana wa Mulungu jeri.”
Kwere kuna anaache mariomuthuwa Jesu hangu Galilaya. Anaache aa ndo mariokala makimwaviza Jesu na mahitaji ga kwakwe. Bai makala maimire kure vichache kulolera kila kirichokala.
Kahi zao were hana Maryamu Magidalena, Maryamu mameye Jakobu na Josefu, na mameye Jakobu na Johana, ana a Zebedayo.
Kurihokala kunakala kidziloni, kukidza mwanamulume mumwenga wa kula Arimath'ea ariyeifwa Josefu. Mwanamulume yuyu were naye ni mwanafundzi wa Jesu na were ni thajiri.
Bai wakwenda hatha kwa P'ilato achendamuvoya P'ilato amup'e mwiri wa Jesu akauzike. Naye P'ilato akilagiza agerwe.
Kwa vizho Josefu akiuhala akiulinga-linga ts'andza ya kitani safi,
na achendauzika kahi za mbiraye mwenye, ariyokala waitsonga iweni. Mbira ii were ni mbisha yenye hatha were k'aidzazikwa mut'u. Bai wamwangiza mumo na akisukuma ro iwe akifunga, gonya akihauka.
Wakathi uwo Josefu arihokala anamuzika Jesu, Maryamu Magidalena na ye Maryamu mungine were makelesi kulolana na iyo mbira manalolera.
Siku ya hiriye, yani yo siku iriyothuwana na yo Siku ya Mathayarisho, o alombi abomu na Mafarisayo makwendathunganana na P'ilato.
Makimwamba, “Muheshimiwa, at'u siswi be fudzakumbukira ut'u umwenga siswi. Yuyahu mulongo arihokala achere moyo, waamba kukala, bada ya siku t'ahu andafufuka.

Kwa vizho bai, lagiza shikari makarinde yo mbira muhaka yo siku ya hahu. Kwani kala k'ahundahenda vizho, o anafundzi a kwakwe manadima kudzamwiya gonya makaambira at'u kukala adzafufuka. Na ulongo uwo undakala mui zhomu hatha uwo wa kwandza mbai.”
P'ilato akiamba, “Shikari munao, kwa vizho hakikishani kukala inarindwa zha kuthosha.”
Kwa vizho machendahala ro iwe ra ho muryangoni makiripiga muhuri. Gonya makiika shikari marinde.
Sabato irihokala idzakira, siku ya kwandza ya wiki na madzach'a maitsi genye, Maryamu Magidalena, na ye Maryamu mungine, marauka kwenda ko mbirani makailole.
Na lola haho henye ts'i ikithethema zhomu zhenye kwa kukala malaika wa Bwana watharamuka kula dzulu akidzaripingilisa ro iwe ra kusindikira yo mbira, akirikelesira.
Uso wa malaika iye were unang'ala here lumethe, na nguwo za kwakwe were ni nyaruhe tse-tse-tse.
Aryahu shikari mariokala manarinda yo mbira makivinwa ni miri kwa woga hatha makikala here at'u madziofwa.
Ela ye malaika akinena na o anaache akiamba, “Musigohe bule. Ninamanya kukala munamumala ye Jesu ariyesulubiwa,
bai k'aho bule haha. Adzafufuka here arizhonena. Hatha ndzoni muhalole ho ariholazwa.
Na mukila haha, yerani malo mukaambire anafundzie kukala, ‘Adzafufuka kula kifwani na lola anamuthangulia kwenda Galilaya nanwi mundakwenda mukamone kuko.’ H'aya nidzamwambira mino.”
Bai o anaache mahauka haraka haryahu mbirani, kuno mana raha jeri-jeri, idzaho wo woga were k'audzaambola. Mauka malo mende makaambire o anafundzi dzulu za maut'u gago.
Marihokala makwendani, lola Jesu akiambolera gafula mbere zao, akialamusa akiamba, “Voro.” Na lola o anaache makimusongerera makimugwira go magulu makimuvoya.
Jesu akinena akiamba, “Musigohe bule. Endani mukaambire o ndugu zangu mende Galilaya, nao mandanona kuko.”
Vikara marihokala o anaache makwendani, lola shikari angine kahi za aryahu mariokala manarinda yo mbira, mangira mumo Jerusalemu machendaambira o alombi abomu kila kit'u kirichokala kidzahendeka.
Bai aryahu alombi makithunganana na o athumia a Kiyahudi na makipanga kukala maahonge o shikari. Kwa vizho makiap'a p'esa nyinji zenye,
gonya makiambira kukala, “Ambani kukala usiku hudzihokala hurere, anafundzie madziremuiya makenda naye.
Na luwali akivisikira hundanena naye siswi hatha athosheke p'ore mukangira matatani.”
Bai o shikari makizihala zo p'esa na makihenda here marizholagizwa. Na lola ulongo uu watsamuka kahi za Ayahudi hatha vivi.
Badaye aryahu anafundzi kumi na mumwenga a Jesu mauka kwenda Galilaya. Makwenda vivii hatha makifika wo murima ariolagiza Jesu kukala mathunganane.
Bai marihomona, madzigwaga mbereze makimuvoya, idzaho angine were machere mana mioyo miri-miri.
Jesu akiasongerera hehi na akinena nao akiamba, “Mimi nagerwa wadimi wosi dzulu mulunguni na ts'i.
Kwa vizho endani mukaahendye at'u a makabila gosi makale anafundzi angu. Muabat'ize kahi za dzina ra Baba, na ra Mwana, na ra Roho Mweri.
Na muafundishe magagwire maut'u gosi nirigomulagiza. Na lola mimi nindakala hamwenga nanwi siku zosini muhaka mwisho wa dhunia.”
Mark: Uu ndo Uv̱oro Udzo wa Jesu Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu.
Uv̱oro uu Udzo waandza here arizhokala nabii Isaya waora kukala Mulungu waamba,
“Lola ninahuma mujumbe wangu mberezo,
andiyekutengezera ngirayo.
Mut'u iye analuta mumirowe ko nyika na kuamba,
‘Mutengezereni ngira Bwana,
Mutengezereni ngira ya kugoloka.’ ”
Bai muhumwa yuyu were ni mut'u mumwenga aifwaye Johana Mubat'izaji naye waonewa ko nyika akikala anahubiri na kuamba, “Thubuni mubat'izwe, na Mulungu andamusamehe dambi zenu.”
Na at'u anji makwendamusirikiza Johana. At'u aa mambola jimbo ra Judea na wo mudziwe mubomu uifwao Jerusalemu. Nao maziungama dambi zao, na Johana akiabat'iza kahi za wo muho wa Jorodani.
Johana were valore ni ra nyoga za ngamira naye wadzifunga mukanda wa k'ingo mo chununi. Naye wakala akirya kw'eth'eth'e na uchi wa nyuchi.
Naye kahi za kuhubirikwe waamba, “Kunadza mut'u mwenye cheo kuriko mimi nyuma zangu. Mimi sifika hatha mut'u wa kumuvula virahuzhe.
Mimi ninamubat'iza na madzi, ela iye andamubat'iza na Roho Mweri.”
Na kahi za siku zizo Jesu wakudza kula Nazareth'i kahi za jimbo ra Galilaya na Johana akimubat'iza kahi za wo muho wa Jorodani.
Na Jesu arihokala akumbolani mo madzini, akiona ko mulunguni kudzagunuka na Roho anatserera dzuluze here giya.
Na kukimbola sauthi kula ko mulunguni ikiamba, “Uwe u Mwanangu muhendzwi, unifwahizaye.”
Na mara mwenga ye Roho Mweri akimuhendya ende nyika.
Akikala ko nyika siku mirongo mine, na Shethani wakala akimujeza. Nao malaika makikala manamuhumikira. Jesu were a hamwenga na nyama a tsakani ko nyika.
Bada ya Johana Mubat'izaji kugwirwa na kwangizwa jela, Jesu wakwenda ko jimbo ra Galilaya na achendahubiri Uv̱oro Udzo wa Mulungu.
Na Jesu waambira at'u vivi, “Wakathi uriwoambwa udzathimira na uthawali wa Mulungu udzafika hehi. Kwa vizho thubuni dambi zenu na muukuluhire wo Uv̱oro Udzo wa Mulungu.”
Siku mwenga Jesu arihokala ananenda mo k'anda-k'anda ya ziya ra Galilaya, waona avuhi airi, ambao were ni Simoni na nduguye ariyeifwa Anderea. Nao were manatsuha vimia zhao mo ziyani mavuhe makumba.
Jesu akiambira, “Nithuwani, nami nindamuhendya mukale avuhi a at'u.”
Nao haho kwa haho, makiviricha zho vimia zhao na makimuthuwa.
Gonya Jesu akisongera ho mbere vichache na akiaona Jakobu na Johana, ana a Zebedayo ma dauni mwao manafuma vimia zhao.
Naye ko kuaona thu, akiaiha. Bai ye mut'u na nduguye makimuricha babiyao Zebedayo na o at'u a kuhenda kukodisha mo dauni na makimuthuwa Jesu.
Bai Jesu na o anafundzie machenda kahi za mudzi wa Kaperinaumu, na irihofika siku ya Sabato, Jesu achangira kahi za sinagogi na akiandza kufundisha.
Na lola o at'u mariomusikira mangalazwa zhomu ni go mafundishoge, kwani were k'afundisha dza here alimu a Sheria mafundishazho, ela were anafundisha here mut'u mwenye wadimi.
Saa iyo-iyo mumo sinagogini mukidza mut'u mwenye p'ep'o. Akipiga k'ululu,
akiamba, “Unani naswi we Jesu wa Nazareth'i? Vidze udzire uhunonge-nonge? Ninamanya uwe u h'ani. Uwe u Mweringwa wa Mulungu!”
Kusikira vizho, Jesu akimuchemera ye p'ep'o, akimwamba, “Hedu nyamala kare na umwambole.”
Ye p'ep'o akimuthukusa ye mut'u zhomu zhenye, kuno anapiga k'ululu na kumwambola ye mut'u.

Na o at'u osini mo sinagogini makingalala na makiuzana-uzana makiamba, “Ut'u uno ni ut'u wani? Mut'u yuyu ana wadimi wa kualagiza p'ep'o mambole, na o p'ep'o manahenda vizho zhenye! Ni mafundisho masha gano hedu dze!”
Kwa vizho uv̱oro wa Jesu ukitsamuka haraka kila hat'u kahi za jimbo ra Galilaya.
Bai Jesu, na Jakobu, na Johana na anafundzie angine marihombola kahi za ro sinagogi thu, makwenda kare hatha nyumbani kwa Simoni na Anderea.
Vikara kuko, mutsedza wa Simoni wa kiche were a kitandani ana homa. Bai marihofika thu, Jesu achambirwa kare dzuluze.
Jesu achenda hehi achendamugwira mukono, akimwaviza kurungarara. Na ro homa rikimuricha hatha akiandza kuahikirahikira.
Dzulo riro bada ya dzuwa kupothoka, akongo osi na o mariokala mapagawa ni p'ep'o marefwa kwa Jesu.
Na o at'u osi a wo mudzi wa Kaperinaumu makundzumanyika ho mulomoni ha yo nyumba.
Bai Jesu akiahoza anji mariokala na makongo ga kila namuna, na achamboza at'u p'ep'o anji. Kidza o p'ep'o k'aap'ere kadzanya ka kunena, kwa kukala mere manamanya iye ni h'ani.
Madzach'a maitsi siku ya hiriye, Jesu wambola, akiuka achenda hat'u nyika hariho k'ahana mut'u na achendavoya.
Ndo Simoni na andziye makikwatya kumudengereka.
Marihomona makimwamba, “At'u osi manakumala kuryahu”
Ela Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hindeni kahi za vidzidzi vingine virizho hehi na haha. Vinav̱irya nikahubiri mo vidzidzini namo, kwa kukala vizho ndo virizhonireha.”
Kwa vizho achenda kahi za Galilaya yosi, kuhubiri kahi za masinagogi na kumboza at'u p'ep'o.
Siku mwenga, hakidza mut'u wa mahana kwa Jesu, akipiga mavindi na akimuvoya akiamba, “Ukihendza unadima ukanihoza!”
Jesu akidzalwa ni mbazi na akigoloza mukono akimugut'a na akiamba, “Ninahendza, hola!”
Na go mahana gachangamika mara mwenga na akihola kamare.
Jesu akimwamba ye mut'u kukala ahauke kare na kidza akimukokot'era zhomu zhenye akimwamba,
“Vivi be usizhambire mut'u bule, ela enda ukamwanyese mulombi, gonya umboze sadaka ya ko kuholako, yo ariyolagiza Musa, ili kila mut'u amanye kukala udzahola jeri.”

Ela ye mut'u achenda, na achendakwacha kuuvumisha wo uv̱oro kila hat'u. Lola, wanena zhomu hatha Jesu akikala k'adima kwenda kahi za mudzi vivi-vivi, hat'u ha vizho akikala kut'u kungine-kungine kuriko k'akuna at'u, ela hamwenga na vizho at'u makimudzirira kula kila hat'u.
Siku ch'ach'e zirihokira, Jesu wauya Kaperinaumu kaheri, na uv̱oro ukivuma kare kukala adzire.
Makundi na makundi ga at'u, makiidzaza yo nyumba ariyokala Jesu. K'ahakalire na kadzanya hatha ko muryangoni mwa nyumba; naye Jesu were anaafundisha neno ra Mulungu.
Ana alume ane makidza kuno madzamutsukula mut'u wa kuholoza manamureha kwa Jesu.
Kwa wo unji wa at'u k'amadimire kwangira naye. Ndo makivomola ko dzulu ya yo nyumba, dzulu za ho arihokala Jesu, makimutharamusha na godhoro ye mut'u muhaka mbere za Jesu.
Jesu arihoona ro kuluhiro rao, akimwamba ye ariyeholoza, “Mwanangu, udzasamehewa dambizo!”
Bai alimu a Sheria mariokala were makelesi haho marihosikira vizho madziuza kimoyo-moyo makiamba,
“Anadimadze kunena vino yuno? Ni kufuru ii, Mulungu h'akeye nde adimaye kusamehe dambi!”
Haho henye Jesu kahi za rohoye, akigamanya go maswali gao, akiauza, “Mbona munadziuza maswali dza go?
Vidze virizho rahisi kumwamba yuno mut'u wa kuholoza ni hizho? Ni kumwamba, ‘Udzasamehewa dambizo,’ hedu ‘Uka, uhale godhororo wanende?’
Ela manyani bai, kukala Mwana wa Mudamu ana wadimi wa kusamehe dambi haha dhuniani.” Kugonya kunena vizho Jesu akimwamba ye mut'u wa kuholoza,
“Ninakwamba uka uhale godhororo wende mudzini.”
Ye mut'u akiuka kare, akihala godhorore kuno at'u osi manamulola, na achombola kwenda kwao. Na osi machangalala na makimulika Mulungu na kuamba, “K'ahudzangwe kuona ut'u dza uu kamare.”
Na siku mwenga Jesu akiuka kaheri achenda k'anda-k'anda ya ziya ra Galilaya na kundi ra at'u rikimudzirira kuko naye akikwatya kuafundisha neno ra Mulungu.
Badaye Jesu arihokala anatsembera-tsembera mo k'anda-k'anda za ro ziya, wamona mut'u mumwenga aifwaye Lawi wa Alifayo akelesi ndani za ofisi ya kodi. Akimwamba, “Nithuwa.”
Lawi akirungarara akimuthuwa.
Badaye Jesu na anafundzie, makwendarya chakurya nyumbani kwa Lawi. Na athozi a kodi anji na at'u angine mariokala manaonewa kukala ni enye dambi, makudzarya hamwenga nao.
Ela alimu a Sheria mario were ni Mafarisayo marihomona Jesu anarya hamwenga na at'u aa, maauza o anafundzie makiamba, “Mbona yuno anarya na athozi a kodi hamwenga na enye dambi?”
Bai Jesu arihogasikira gago akiambira, “Mukongo nde mwenye haja ya muganga, ela muzima k'ana haja ya muganga bule. Mimi nakudzaaiha enye dambi, sidzireaiha enye hachi!”
Anafundzi a Johana na Mafarisayo were makafunga, bai kukidza at'u kwa Jesu na makidzamuza makiamba, “Anafundzi a Johana na anafundzi a Mafarisayo ni kufunga, mbona o a kwako we k'amafunga?”
Jesu akiamba, “Vidze ajeni a harusini ni kufunga na hatha ye bwana harusi manaye haho? Hatha! Makalaho na iye bwana harusi k'amadima kufunga bule.
Ela siku zinadza, ambazo ye bwana harusi andauswa kahikahi zao, na wakathi uwo ukifika mandafunga.

K'ahana mut'u adimaye kuhala nguwo ya kapindi akayangiza kiraka kisha. Mana mut'u akihenda vizho, kiryahu kiraka kisha kindayamola yo nguwo ya kapindi chambole, na kindaihendya ikale na t'undu bomu kukira iyo ya chaho.
Na k'ahana mut'u adimaye kwangiza divai mbisha kahi za viriba zha kapindi. Kwani mut'u akihenda vizho, iryahu divai indavipashula zho viriba
na yo divai hamwenga na zho viriba zhosi andavikosa. Ela divai mbisha zhakwe ni viriba visha.”
Siku mwenga iriyokala ni Sabato, Jesu were anakira kahi za minda ya ngano, na o anafundzi mario were ma hamwenga naye makikwatya kuhuta masuche ga yo ngano.
Bai o Mafarisayo mario were ma ho hehi-hehi marihoona vizho makimwamba Jesu, “Kwanoni ano manahenda ut'u uriwo k'auhendwa siku ya Sabato?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Muthawali Daudi wahendadze harya arihokala iye na o at'u ariokala nao mana ndzala na manahitaji chakurya? Hedu k'amudzavishoma?

Daudi wakwenda kahi za nyumba ya Mulungu wakathi Abiathari arihokala nde mulombi mubomu mwenye, akiirya yo mikahe ya sadaka, gonya akiap'a aryahu andziye nao, makirya, vingahokala kulingana na sheria, were ni alombi h'akiyao ndo madimao kuirya.”
Jesu akisindikiza na kuamba, “Yo siku ya Sabato yaikirwa mudamu, ela mudamu k'aumbirwe kwa ut'u wa Sabato bule.
Bai Mwana wa Mudamu ni Bwana, hatha wa yo siku ya Sabato.”
Gonya kaheri siku mwenga iriyokala ni siku ya Sabato, Jesu achangira kahi za sinagogi na mumo mukikala muna mut'u mwenye mukono wa kuholoza.
Bai hakikala hana Mafarisayo mario were manamala chausa cha kumushithakira Jesu, kwa vizho makilolera maone chamba andamuhoza yo siku ya Sabato, makamushithaki.
Jesu akimwambira ye mut'u ariyeholoza mukono, “Ungarara ho kahikahi hedu.”
Gonya Jesu akiauza o Mafarisayo akiamba, “Vidze kisheria ni hiro ririro ni karakara kuhendwa siku ya Sabato? Vidze ni kuhenda madzo hedu mai? Ni kuthizha hedu ni kwalaga?” Ela makinyamala zii!
Jesu akialola o Mafarisayo kuno atsukirwe, akidzalwa ni kigondzi kwa ut'u wa kukosa mbazi kwao. Gonya akimwamba ye mut'u, “Goloza wo mukonowo hedu.” Akiugoloza nawo ukiuyat'o kare.
Ndo ao Mafarisayo machambola na machendathunganana na at'u a Herode kupanga mandizhomwalaga Jesu.
Bai Jesu hamwenga na anafundzie makiahaukira na machenda ko ziya ra Galilaya. Vikara arihokala anenda, ngororoki bomu ya at'u ikimuthuwa. At'u aa, angine mambola Galilaya, jimbo ra Judea,
na mudzi wa Jerusalemu, na jimbo ra Idumea, na kuvuka muho wa Jorodani. Angine mambola viv̱alo zha Tiro na Sidoni. Ao osi mamudzirira kwa kukala masikira go arigokala akigahenda Jesu.
Kwa ut'u wa wo muminyano wa o at'u anji, Jesu walagiza o anafundzie mamuikire dau thithe ili asihoshwe ni at'u.
Were adzahoza akongo anji, ndo anji angine mariokala k'amadima, makihendza makukume hatha mamugut'e kwamba mahole nao.
Na yoyosi ariyepagawa ni p'ep'o arihomona Jesu, wagolomokwa na akigwa mbereze akipiga k'ululu na kuamba, “Uwe ndiwe Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Ela Jesu akiakokot'era sana masihende akamanywa iye ni h'ani.
Bada ya gago Jesu akikwera dzulu murimani, na akiaiha aryahu arioahendza nao machenda ho arihokala.
Na gonya akitsagula kumi na airi na akiahendya makale ahumwie na makale hamwenga naye. Kidza aahume kwendahubiri,
na makale na wadimi wa kumboza at'u p'ep'o.
Gaga ndo madzina ga o kumi na airi mariotsagulwa ni Jesu: Simoni ambaye Jesu wamup'a dzina ra P'et'ero,
Jakobu na Johana, ana a Zebedayo ambao Jesu waaiha Boanerige, ambaro manaye ni “Ana a kigwaragwara,”
Anderea, Filipu, Bath'olomayo, Math'ayo, T'omasi, Jakobu mwana wa Alifayo, Th'adayo, Simoni Muhehezi,
na Juda Isikariote ariye nde ariyekudzamusaliti Jesu.
Arihogonya kuatsagula o ahumwie, achangira nyumbani. Bai ngororoki bomu ya at'u ikimwenderera kaheri, hatha Jesu na anafundzie k'amapatire mwanya wa kurya chakurya.
Ndo at'u a kwao marihosikira makiuka kwendamugwira, makiamba, “Ana vilalu.”
Nao alimu a Sheria mariombola Jerusalemu maamba, “Ana Belizebuli
na anamboza p'ep'o kwa zo nguvu za iye mubomu wa p'ep'o.”
Bai Jesu akiambira o at'u makundzumanyike, gonya akiambira kwa mafumbo akiamba, “Vidze Shethani anadima kumwamboza Shethani mwandziwe?
Ts'i at'ue makidzigazha makundi-makundi gahehago, ts'i iyo k'aindatoa.
Na mudzi ukigazhika na at'ue makikala k'amagwirana milomo, be mudzi uwo k'aundatoa.
Na Shethani akidzipinga na kudzigazha mwenye, k'andatoa, uwo ndo undokala mwishowe.
K'akuna mut'u adimaye kungira kahi za nyumba ya mut'u mwenye nguvu na kumuhoka vit'uzhe hasiho kumufunga ye mwenye kwandza. Niamufunge kwandza ndo adime kumuhoka zho vit'uzhe.
Namwambira ujeri wenye, anadamu mandasamehewa dambi zosi na kila kufuru mandiyonena.
Ela mut'u andiyemukufuru Roho Mweri, k'ana musamaha bule, andakala adzahenda dambi ya kare na kare.”
Jesu wanena vivi kwa kukala angine were madzamwamba ana p'ep'o.
Gonya mameye na nduguze Jesu a kilume makidza. Makiima ko ndze ya yo nyumba, makihuma mut'u akamwihe Jesu.
Wo muthunganano wa at'u mariokala makeresi, na madzamudengereka makimwamba Jesu, “Lola mameyo na nduguzo manakumala ko ndze.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “M'ama na ndugu zangu ni hio?”
Gonya akialolat'o o mariokala makeresi, kumudengereka, akiamba, “Aa be ndo m'ama na ndo ndugu zangu!
Kwani ahendaye mahendzo ga Mulungu, nde m'ama na nde ndugu yangu.”

Siku nyingine Jesu wakwenda kaheri k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya akikwatya kufundisha. Bai rikundi ribomu ra at'u rikimudzalira hatha akiona ni baha angire dauni akelesi mumo. Naye wakelesi mo dauni kuno o at'u osi makikala ma ko ts'i furufu.
Na Jesu waafundisha maut'u manji kwa kuhumira mafumbo. Kahi za mafundishoge akiambira,
“Sirikizani! Mut'u mumwenga wauka kwendamwaga-mwaga mbeyu mundani kwakwe.
Bai arihokala akuzimwagani-mwagani, mbeyu nyingine ikigwa k'anda-k'anda ya ngira na unyama ukidzait'ot'a.
Mbeyu nyingine ikigwa kahi za mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, harihokala hana mutsanga muchache. Bai ikimera malo-malo kwa kukala were hana mutsanga muchache.
Dzuwa ririhokola zhomu yo mitse ikinyala na ikifwa kwa kukala were k'aina miziji mire.
Mbeyu nyingine ikigwa miyani. Irihomera, miya iryahu ikikula na ikiizia-zia hatha k'aipatire nafasi ya kumbola ndze bule, bai kwa ut'u uwo k'aizhalire kit'u.

Ela nyingine zikigwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo nazo zikimerat'o, zikikula na zikizhala. Nyingine zazhala mirongo mihahu-mihahu, nyingine zikizhala mirongo mihandahu-mihandahu, na nyingine zikizhala gana-gana.”
Jesu akimarigiza na kuamba, “Mwenye masikiro ga kusikirira, naasikire.”
Badaye Jesu arihokala adzarichana na yo ngororoki ya at'u, aryahu anafundzie kumi na airi na angine kahi za ao mariokala madzagasikira go mafundishoge, mamuza Jesu kwamba mambirwe mana ya go mafumbo.
Jesu akiambira, “Ninwi mwajaliwa kuimanya yo siri ya uthawali wa Mulungu. Ela o mario ndze ya wo uthawali, manasikira kwa ngira ya mafumbo,
kwamba
malole na kulola, ela masione,
masirikize na kusirikiza, ela masing'alirwe.
Kwani kala makaona na kung'alirwa makamuuyira Mulungu,
naye akaausiza dambi zao.”
Gonya Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Fuambe k'amung'alirwa ni fumbo riri? Bai mundang'alirwadze ni mafumbo mangine?
Ye mulayi, analaya neno ra Mulungu.
At'u angine ma here ziryahu mbeyu zirizogwa k'anda-k'anda ya ngira. At'u aa makigonya kusikira neno ra Mulungu, Shethani nikudza mara mwenga na kurusa riro neno ririrolaywa mo mioyoni mwao.
Ziryahu zirizogwa kahi za mutsanga wa mawe-mawe, ni at'u mario makisikira neno thu, manarihokera kare mara mwenga, kidza manarihokera na raha.
Ela kwa kukala k'arina miziji ndani mwao k'amatoa naro bule. Thabu hedu mateso gaadziriraho kwa ut'u wa ro neno manaviricha kare.
Na at'u angine ma here yo mbeyu iriyogwa miyani. Aa ni kusikira ro neno ra Mulungu,
ela v̱ata za urumwengu, na ukengi wa mali, na th'amaa za maut'u mangine zikiangira, nikurikonya-konya ro neno hatha rikakala k'arindazhala kit'u.

Ela at'u angine ma dza here iryahu mbeyu iriyogwa kahi za mutsanga mudzo. At'u aa nikurisikira ro neno na kurikubali na kuzhala matunda. Yuno mirongo mihahu, yuya mirongo mihandahu na mungine gana zima.”
Jesu akienderera kufundisha akiamba, “K'akuna mut'u adimaye kugwiza taa gonya akaribiningiza na muvure hedu hatha kurika muvunguni! Nikurika dzulu ya nyambaro.
Mana kila kiricho hafufu kindambozwa halamu, na kila siri indamanywa.
Mut'u mwenye masikiro ga kusikirira, naasikire.”
Kidza akiambira, “Sirikizani zhomu na mugagwire gaga nimwambirago. Cho kipimo mupimiracho andziyenu ndicho mundichopimirwa ninwi, kidza hatha mwangezezwe.
Kwani kila ariye nacho andangezwa, na ariye k'ana kit'u, andahokwa hatha cho aricho nacho.”
Gonya Jesu akiamba, “Uthawali wa Mulungu u dza here viryahu mut'u amwagazho-mwagazho mbeyu mundani.
Usiku ukifika analala, mutsana anahenda makazige. Muda uu wosi t'embe zinamera na kukula, kuno ye k'amanya vinakuladze.
Wo mutsanga h'akeye unaihenda yo mimera ikule na kuzhala mazhalo, unambola wo mutse chaho, gonya ro suche, na kusindikiza na zo t'embe.
Suche rindihouma, mwenye munda ni kudzavuna kwa kukala wakathi wa kwakwe udzafika.”
Kidza Jesu akiamba, “Huambedze kaheri dzulu za kuhalanisha uthawali wa Mulungu? Fuhumire fumbo rani?
Tha ni here katembe ka haradali kariko nikulaywa. Katembe kaka ni kathithe kukira t'embe zosi haha urumwenguni.
Bada ya makathi fulani ni kumera na ukakala mumera mubomu kukira mimera yosi ya mundani, kwani ni kwamboza vitai ambazho unyama nikudza na kuaka vitsunji mumo.”
Bai Jesu waafundisha at'u kuhumira mafumbo mangine manji here gaga. Naye waafundisha here wadimi wao wa kung'alirwa urizhokala.
Jesu k'afundishire at'u bila kuhumira mafumbo, ela wakathi arihokala ana anafundzie were anaang'azira kila kit'u.
Bai dzulo ra yo siku iyo vizho Jesu akiambira anafundzie, “Nahuvuke ng'ambo.”
Kwa vizho o anafundzi makiaricha o at'u, na makipanda ro dau arirokala Jesu adzapanda na machenda naye. Kidza were kuna madau mangine ga nyuma-nyuma.
Ela k'avitoere kukidza luv̱utho lwa kitai na maimbi gakipiga ro dau hatha rikikwatya kudzala madzi.
Wakathi uu Jesu were hatha a ko mwisho wa ro dau, adzaika kitswache muthoni na arere. Bai o anafundzie makimuthukusa makiamba, “Mwalimu, hunahoha, k'ujali we?”
Bai Jesu akilamuka, akiluchemera lo luv̱utho na akirambira ro ziya, “H'aya hurira!” Na lo luv̱utho lukiricha na go madzi gakihurira hu.
Gonya Jesu akiauza anafundzie akiamba, “Mbona mu aoga? Hedu k'amuna kuluhiro?”
Nao makikala manavinwa ni miri k'azhadimikika. Makikwatya kuuzana-uzana na kuamba, “Ni h'ani yuno ariye hatha luv̱utho na maimbi vinamusikira?”
Jesu na anafundzie makivuka ziya ra Galilaya makifika ts'i ya Agerasi.
Na arihothima mo dauni thu akithunganana na mut'u ariyekala adzalaa makaburini, naye were ana p'ep'o.
Mut'u yuyu were siku zosi akala ko makaburini, kidza k'ahana mut'u ariyedima kumufunga hatha kwa minyororo.
Akwao mere majeza zhomu kumufunga magulu na mikono, ela kila marihomufunga waitosa yo minyororo na zho zhuma marizhomufunga maguluni. Mut'u yuyu were yuna nguvu zhomu hatha were k'ahana amwadimaye.
Usiku na mutsana wakala akidengereka ko makaburini na ko virimani kuno anapiga londzo na kudzikop'ola vii-vii na mawe ga maso.
