Bai arihomona Jesu kwa kure, achenda malo na akigwa mbereze,
na akipiga k'ululu akiamba, “Unani nami we Jesu Mwana wa Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi? Bai ninakuvoya kwa dzina ra Mulungu usinitese!”
Ye p'ep'o wanena vivi kwa kukala Jesu were anaamba, “P'ep'o mukolo mwambole mut'u yuyu!”
Jesu akimuza akiamba, “Dzinaro ndiwe h'ani?” Ye p'ep'o akiamba, “Dzina rangu ndimi majeshi kwa kukala hu anji mumu!”
Akimudhedheja zhomu ye Jesu kwamba asiainge kwenda ndze ya yo ts'i ya Agerasi.
Vikara haho were hana badhi bomu ra nguluwe rinarisa k'anda-k'anda ya karima.
O p'ep'o makimuvoya Jesu makiamba, “Fwambe fwende hukaangire aryahu nguluwe.”
Jesu akiaruhusu na o p'ep'o akolo makimwambola ye mwanamulume na machendaangira o nguluwe. Ro badhi ra nguluwe here alifu mbiri rikitharamuka malo kula ko ngokani rikivoromoka mo ziyani rikihoha.
Kuona vizho, o arisa makichimbira na machenda ko midzini na mindani machendasema go garigokala gadzahendeka. Na at'u duu makidzalola.
Makidza ho arihokala Jesu, na makimona ye ariyekala ana p'ep'o anji akilize ni ndzima na were adzavala nguwo na akelesi haho, na makingirwa ni woga.
Aryahu mariokala madzazhona zho virizhokala vidzahendeka, makiambira o at'u zho virizhokala vidzakala kwa ye mut'u na kwa o nguluwe.
Na o at'u marihosikira vizho makimuvoya Jesu akulae kuko kwao.
Vikara Jesu arihokala anangira mo dauni, ye mut'u ariyembozwa p'ep'o wavoya ende na Jesu.
Ela Jesu akimukahaza, akimwamba, “Enda kwenu ukaambirize asenao go adzigokuhendera Bwana, na viryahu adzizhokuonera mbazi.”
Kwa vizho ye mwanamulume akiuka, achangira kahi za ro jimbo ra Midzi Kumi, na akiambira at'u garyahu arigokala adzahenderwa ni Jesu. Osi mariosikira uv̱oro uu machangalala.
Jesu akivuka kaheri ro ziya muhaka ko nyangamoni. Na ngororoki bomu ya at'u ikidza ho k'anda-k'anda ya ro ziya na makikala madzamuzunguluka.
Mut'u mumwenga aifwaye Jairo ariyekala ni mumwenga kahi za abomu a masinagogi akidza haho. Arihomona Jesu wagwa mbereze,
na akimuvoya akiamba, “Musichana wangu akufwani. Bai vichadimikika nafwende ukamwikire mikono apate kuthia.”
Jesu akiuka kumuthuwa ye Jairo, na at'u anji makimuthuwa ko arikokala anenda. At'u aa were ni anji hatha angine were manamukwala-kwala kamare.
Bai mo kahi ya yo ngororoki ya o at'u mwere muna mwanamuche mumwenga ariyekala adzakala mukongo wa kumbola milatso, kwa miaka kumi na miri.
Wathapathapa kwa aganga kuzikifwa vivii hatha vikishinda. Hatha were malize zosi wazigonya kwa kuzikifwa, ela hat'u ha ahende kabaha, ye akikala tha anakazizwa.

Vikara mwanamuche yuyu were wasikira nguma ya Jesu, bai wamuthuwa Jesu ko nyuma, kuno ananena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Nikigut'a ngaa ro valore thu, nindahola.” Kwa vizho akirigut'a ro valo ra Jesu na yo milatso ikithuma kare saa iyo na akidzisikira adzahola.

Vikara mwanamuche yuyu were wasikira nguma ya Jesu, bai wamuthuwa Jesu ko nyuma, kuno ananena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Nikigut'a ngaa ro valore thu, nindahola.” Kwa vizho akirigut'a ro valo ra Jesu na yo milatso ikithuma kare saa iyo na akidzisikira adzahola.

Vikara mwanamuche yuyu were wasikira nguma ya Jesu, bai wamuthuwa Jesu ko nyuma, kuno ananena kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Nikigut'a ngaa ro valore thu, nindahola.” Kwa vizho akirigut'a ro valo ra Jesu na yo milatso ikithuma kare saa iyo na akidzisikira adzahola.
Haho henye Jesu akisikira nguvuze zidzamuhungukira. Akiahundukira o at'u na akiauza akiamba, “Ni h'ani adziyegut'a valo rangu?”
O anafundzie makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Unauza ni h'ani adzekugut'a, k'uona bule zho marizho at'u ni anji hatha manakukwala-kwala?”
Ela Jesu k'aadzigidzire akienderera kutsuha matso kuno na kuno aone ni h'ani adzevihenda.
Ye mwanamuche kuona zho vidzizhokala achenda mbere za Jesu kuno anathethemwa ni mwiri kwa woga na akidzigwaga mbereze na akimwambira Jesu gosi garigo were gadzahendeka.
Jesu akimwamba, “Mwanangu kuluhiro ra kwako ridzakuhoza. Enda na dheri ukale muzima na mashakago gadzagoma.”
Bai Jesu arihokala ananena gaga, poo at'u kula nyumbani kwa Jairo, makimwamba Jairo, “Ye musichanao be adzamarigizika, kwa vizho k'avimala umubudzye kaheri ye mwalimu.”
Jesu hatha k'agatiire shuhuli go maronena o at'u, ela wamwamba Jairo, “Tha usogohe bewe, kuluhira thuwe.”
Bai arihokala anenda kuko kwa Jairo, akiakahaza at'u masimuthuwe asihokala P'et'ero, Jakobu na Johana nduguye ye Jakobu.
Marihofika nyumbani kwa Jairo, makwendathekeza ha thele at'u mariokala manapiga k'ululu na kurira zhomu zhenye.
Jesu achangira mo ndani, akiambira o at'u, “Mbona munapiga k'ululu na kurira? Ye muhoho k'afwere bule, arere thu.”
O at'u kusikira vizho makimutseka. Bai Jesu akiambira o at'u osi mambole ko ndze, akiahala o azhazi a ye muhoho na o anafundzie ahahu na achenda mo chumbani arimokala ye muhoho.
Jesu akimugwira mukono ye muhoho akimwamba,
Ambazho manaye ni, “Musichana, nakwambira uka!”
Haho henye ye musichana arekala adzafwa akiungarara na akikwatya kunenda (iye were ni muhoho wa miaka kumi na miri). Bai o at'u marihoona zho vidzizhokala, machangalala zhomu.
Bai Jesu akiakokot'era zhomu, masimwambire mut'u. Gonya akiambira mamup'e ut'u wa kurya.
Jesu akiuka kuuya mudzi wa kwao Nazareth'i iye hamwenga na anafundzie.

Na irihofika siku ya Sabato, achangira sinagogini kufundisha. Anji mariomusikira mangalazwa ni go mafundisho hatha makikwatya kuuzana-uzana, “Maut'u gano gosi be tha wagapatahi? Na ni ulachu wani arougerwa mut'u yuno? Ni miujiza yani ariyothalwa aihende yuno?
Vidze yuno si yuyahu fundhi wa kutsonga, mwana wa Maryamu? Na samba nduguze ni Jakobu, Jose, Juda na Simoni? Na nduguze a kiche samba fu hosi haha hehu?” Bai k'aviafahire.
Ela Jesu akiambira, “Nabii anaishimiwa kila hat'u isihokala kahi za ts'i ya kwao, na kahi za amanyie, na mudzini kwao.”
Na kuko bai k'ahendere miujiza yoyosi, isihokala waaikira mikono at'u achache mariokala ni akongo na akiahoza.
Jesu achangalazwa zhomu ni kutsakuluhira kwao. Gonya akidengereka mo midzi-midzi kufundisha.
Siku mwenga Jesu waaiha aryahu anafundzi kumi na airi na akiahuma airi-airi. Akiap'a wadimi dzulu za p'ep'o akolo.
Akiambira masitsukule kit'u chochosi mo charoni, isihokala mudhath'a thu h'akeye. Masitsukule leu, hedu mukoba, hedu hatha p'esa zozosi mabindoni mwao.
Masivale k'andzu mbiri, ela mavale sapata.
“Hat'u mundihoambwa ‘Karibuni’ h'aya kalani kahi za nyumba iyo hatha mundihouka kut'u kuko.

Mwangiraho mudzini na o at'u masimwambe hatha ‘Karibuni’ hedu kumusirikiza bai hat'u haho haukeni kidza mukut'e-kut'e vumbi ra maguluni mwenu kunyesa kukala go gandigoapata k'amumo na mandamanya enye.”
Kwa vizho o anafundzi makiuka kwendahubiri na kuambira at'u mariche mahendo gao mai na mathubu.
Nao makwendamboza at'u p'ep'o anji na makiamwagira mafuha akongo anji na makiahoza.

Bai muthawali Herode akigasikira gosi gaga kwani dzina ra Jesu were ridzaenera kila hat'u hatha at'u angine were manaamba ni, “Johana Mubat'izaji, wafufuka, ndo hatha ana wadimi wa kuhenda maut'u mabomu-mabomu.”
Angine o makikala manaamba, “Ni Elija” na angine makiamba, “Ni nabii dza here mumwenga wa o manabii a ho kapindi.”
Ela Herode arihosikira vivi akiamba, “Iye ni Johana Mubat'izaji niriyemutosa kitswa, wafufuka!”
Kwani Herode were walagiza kukala Johana afungwe minyororo na angizwe jela. Vivi wavihenda kwa ut'u wa Herodia mwanamuche ariyekala Herode wamuhoka nduguye ariyekala anaifwa Filipu.
Kwani Johana Mubat'izaji wakala akimwambira Herode kukala, “Si hachi bule uwe kumuhala mukaza nduguyo.”
Vivi zhamuhendya Herodia akale na kitsukizi na akimala amwalage, ela k'azhadimire bule.

Kwani Herode wamwagoha Johana kwa kukala Johana were ni mut'u muhachi na mweri, kwa vizho akimurinda. Were kila arihomusirikiza anabudzyika moyo, ela hatha hamwenga na vizho were anahendza kusirikiza mafundishoge.

Mwishowe, Herodia wapata mwanya wa kumwalaga Johana. Herode waasunga asenae sherehe ya siku ya kukumbukira kuzhalwakwe. Bai mut'u iye waalika at'u osi a zheo uthawalini, abomu a majeshi na abomu a yo ts'i ya Galilaya.
Ndo musichana wa Herodia akidzaavinira. Bai wavinat'o zhomu hatha Herode na ajenie makifwahirwa. K'uzhona zho muthawali Herode akimwamba ye musichana, “Nambira chochosi uhendzacho nami nindakup'a.”
Akimulahira akimwamba, “Chochosi undichomala nindakup'a, hatha kala ni nusu ya uthawali wangu.”
Ndo ye musichana akiuka kwendamuza mameye. Akiamba, “Nimale ut'u wani m'ama?” Ye mimut'u akimwamba, “Mala kitswa cha Johana Mubat'izaji.”
Ye musichana akiuya malo ko kwa muthawali achendamwamba, “Nahendza vivi kare unip'e kitswa cha Johana Mubat'izaji ndani za bunguu.”
Kudzasikira vivi, Herode washononeka zhomu, ela kwa were adzalaha mbere za ajeni kukala kila andichomalwa andalazha k'adimire kumukahaza bule.
Kwa vizho bai akilagiza shikari mara mwenga achenda ko jela akakirehe cho kitswa cha Johana. Ye shikari achenda ko jela achendamutosa kitswa Johana,
akidza nacho ndani za bunguu, akidzamup'a ye musichana na ye musichana akikihala akimup'a ye mameye.
Badaye anafundzi a Johana marihosikira gaga makidzamuhala machendamuzika.
Vikara o ahumwi a Jesu makiuya kula charo chao cha kuhubiri nao makidzamwambira viryahu marizhohubiri na marizhohenda.

Kwa ut'u wa at'u anji, ano manadza arya manauya, Jesu na anafundzie k'amadimire kurya. Bai Jesu akiambira o anafundzie, “Nahumbole-mbole vichache hedu fwende kut'u kwa h'akiyehu hukapate ngaa kudzioyeza.”
Kwa vizho machangira dauni ao kare na makiuka kwenda hat'u ha h'akiyao, kure na at'u.
Ela hatha hamwenga na vizho at'u anji maaona marihokala makuukani na makiamanya. Ndo makiuka malo kula midzi yosi kwenda ko arikokala Jesu na anafundzie manenda, nao makifika na mbere.
K'uzhona Jesu arihothima kula mo dauni akirona ro kundi bomu ra at'u, naye akiaonera mbazi kwa viryahu marizhokala ni here ng'ondzi zisizo na murisa. Bai akikwatya kuafundisha maut'u manji.
Mutsana urihokala udzaenderera zhomu nako kunenda kutswani, o anafundzi makimwamba Jesu, “Hat'u haha be ni nyika zhomu nako kunatswa.
Kwa vizho baha uafumule aa at'u mende kahi za midzi na minda iriyo hehi na haha makadzigulire ut'u wowosi wa kurya.”

Naye Jesu arihombola kudzigidzya akiamba, “Ap'eni chakurya ninwi.” Ndo o anafundzie makimudzigidzya makimwamba, “Vidze unahendza hukagule mikahe ya kima cha dinari magana mairi at'u ano mathosheke kurya?”
Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Kwani vino muna mikahe mingahi? Hedu kaloleni,” machendalola na marihogonya kulola makimwambira, “Ni mitsano na makumba mairi.”
Bai Jesu akiambira o anafundzie, “Ambireni o at'u madzigazhe vithundhu-vithundhu na makelesi ho nyasini.”
Kwa vizho o at'u makikelesi, vithundhu-vithundhu zha at'u gana-gana na zha at'u mirongo mitsano-mitsano.

Gonya akihala yo mikahe mitsano na go makumba mairi, akilola dzulu mulunguni, akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiimogola-mogola yo mikahe na akiap'a o anafundzie maagazhire o at'u na go makumba mairi.
Nao osi makirya hatha makivilola.
Bai marihogonya kurya o anafundzi makitsola-tsola zho visiku-visiku zha mikahe na zha go makumba mairi virizhokala vidzasala, na makidzaza k'ahu kumi na mbiri.
Na isabu ya ao mariokala madzarya yo mikahe were ni at'u alifu ts'ano, alume.
Bai o at'u marihogonya kurya thu, Jesu waalagiza o anafundzie mangire dauni na mavuke mathangulie kwenda Beth'isaida, kuno ye anaafumula o at'u.
Arihogonya kulagana na o at'u, wakwenda murimani kwendavoya.
Dzulo ririhongira, dau rere ri kahikahi ya ro ziya, ela Jesu were achere ko ts'i furufu h'akeye.

Arihokala a kuko, akiaona o anafundzie manathabika kupiga makasia kwani lupeho lwere lunambola ko mendako. Bai urihofika wakathi wa jogolo ra kwandza kuika, akiambolera kuno ananenda dzulu za madzi. Akidzihendesha here anaakira.
Ela o anafundzi marihomona ananenda dzulu ya madzi, makiona ni p'ep'o be o, makipiga k'ululu.
Kwani osi mamona, na makihondoka. Jesu akinena nao mara mwenga akiamba, “Sogoheni ndimi, musihondoke.”
Gonya achangira mo dauni na lo luv̱utho lukihurira hu! O anafundzi makingalala kamare,
kwa kukala hatha bada ya kuona wo muujiza wa mikahe kidza were k'amadzangwe kung'alirwat'o bule kwani zo akili zao zere zidzaziywa.
Bai Jesu na anafundzie makivuka ro ziya na makifika ts'i ya Genezarethi makirifunga kuko ro dau.
Marihokala manathima mo dauni at'u makimumanya kare ye Jesu.
Makiuka malo kuvisema kila hat'u, makikwatya kumuhirikira akongo mariokala madzaatsukula na vitanda, kila marihosikira a haho.
Naye Jesu, wangira kila hat'u kula vidzidzini, midzini, mindani na masokoni na at'u makimurehera akongo, makimuvoya magut'e hatha chamba ni ro pindo ra ro valore, na osi mariorigut'a mahola.
Siku mwenga Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria mariokala madzambola Jerusalemu, makundzumanyikana mbere za Jesu.
Makiaona anafundzi angine a Jesu manarya chakurya hasiho kuoga mikono here malagizo ga akare ao gaambazho.
(Ndo virizho na Mafarisayo na Ayahudi osi, ao managwira mafundisho ga akare ao. Lola k'amadima kurya hasiho kuoga mikono yao karakara na malagizo gaga.

Kidza makidza kula sokoni k'amadima kurya kit'u, muhaka maoge mikono kwandza. Pia were makigathuwa malagizo mangine manji marigogahokera dza here ngira ya karakara ya kugesa vikombe, nyungu na mabunguu ga ng'andu.)

Kuona gago marigokala o anafundzi a Jesu managahenda, o Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Mbona ano anafundzio k'amarigwira ro adha ra kuoga mikono hurirorichirwa ni akare ehu? Manarya na mikono michafu.”
Jesu akiamba, “Nabii Isaya wanenat'o sana dzulu zenu ninwi at'u a kudzihendya, kwani Maoro ganaamba,
‘At'u aa mananogoha kwa makanwa gao,
ela mioyo yao i kure nami.
Hatha makanivoya ni bule,
kwa kukala manahala maadha ga anadamu,
na kugafundisha here malagizo gangu.’
Mudzagaika k'anda malagizo ga Mulungu na hat'u ha vizho munathuwa mafundisho ga at'u.”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Muna ulachu wa kukahalira malagizo ga Mulungu kwamba muthuwe maadha genu.
Kwani Musa waamba, ‘Muishimu babayo na mameyo.’ Kidza akiamba, ‘Ye andemuhukana babaye hedu mameye, kumala kwalagwa naalagwe.’
Ela ninwi munafundisha kwamba, mut'u akikala ana kit'u cha kuakola babaye na mameye, ela akiamba ‘Koribani’ ambazho manaye ni kuamba, (Cho niricho nikamup'a dzachamboza sadaka kwa Mulungu),
ni kukala ana chausa cha kuthosha cha kutsamwaviza babaye na mameye.
Nanwi kwa ngira ii munarihenda neno ra Mulungu kutsakala na nguvu, kwa go muafundishago andziyenu; na kuna manji mangine muhendago gadzigohalana na gaga.”
Gonya Jesu akiriha ro kundi ra at'u kaheri akiambira, “Nisirikizani nyosi na mung'alirwe.
K'akuna mut'u adimaye kuhendywa mukolo ni chakurya.” (Ela kidimacho kumuhendya mut'u kukala mukolo ni cho chambolacho mo moyoni mwa ye mut'u.) [
Mut'u mwenye masikiro, naasikire.]
Badaye Jesu arihokala adzaashalahukira o at'u, wakwenda kahi za nyumba, bai anafundzie makimuza dzulu za fumbo riri.
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha ninwi nanwi k'amung'alirwa bule? Chakurya k'akidima kumuhendya mut'u akale mukolo,
kwa kukala k'achenda mo moyoni, ela kinenda mo ndanini, na gonya endaho chandze cho adzichorya ni kwambola.” (Kwa kunena vivi, Jesu were ana mana kukala zhakurya zhosi ni visafi.)
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Cho chambolacho mo moyoni mwa ye mut'u ndo kimuhendyacho mut'u kukala mukolo,
kwa kukala kula mumo moyoni ni kumbola maazo mai gamuhendyago kuhenda maut'u gasigov̱irya ambago ni kuiya, kwalaga,
kuzinga, kutona, kila maazo mai, kukenga, kutsowa lau, kidzitso, kuhukana, kudzionya na uzuzu.
Gaga maut'u mai gosi ni kumbola kula moyoni mwa mut'u na ndo gadimago kumuhendya mukolo.”

Gonya Jesu akiuka ko Galilaya na achenda hatha sehemu za midzi ya Tiro na Sidoni. Kuko, achangira kahi za nyumba mwenga naye were k'endzi mut'u yoyosi amanye kukala a haho. Ela k'avidimikikire kwani uv̱oro wa kudzakwe wavuma kare kila hat'u.
Vikara kwere kuna mwanamuche mumwenga ariye were ana mwanawe wa kiche ana p'ep'o. K'uzhona zho arihosikira kukala Jesu adzire hat'u haho wakwenda na achendadzigwaga mbereze.
Naye ye mwanamuche were si Muyahudi, ela were wazhalwa ts'i ya Asirofonike. K'uzhona zho akimuririra Jesu kwamba apate kumwamboza ye p'ep'o ariyekala a ndani za ye musichanawe.
Ela Jesu akimudzigidzya ye mwanamuche akiamba, “Richa o ahoho makuhe kwandza, kwa kukala si karakara kuhala chakurya cha ahoho na kukitsuhira k'uro.”
Naye mwanamuche akimwambira Jesu, “U mujeri we, ela hatha o k'uro, ni kurya go magande ga cho chakurya cha ahoho gagwago ho ts'i.”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Kwa vizho udzizhonena, unadima kwenda mudzini, ye p'ep'o adzamwambola ye mwanao.”
Bai ye mwanamuche achenda ko mudzini kwakwe naye achendamuthekeza ye muhoho ahembelele kitandani na ye p'ep'o akikala adzamwambola.
Badaye Jesu akiuka kula ko sehemu za midzi ya Tiro na Sidoni, akikira na upande wa ziya ra Galilaya hatha achangira jimbo ra Midzi Kumi.
Bai at'u fulani makimurehera Jesu mut'u ariye were ni gwigwi kidza were masikiroge ni makoto. O at'u makimubembeleza Jesu kwamba amuikire mukono ahole.
K'uzhona zho Jesu akimuvuha k'anda ye mut'u, kure na o at'u anji, achangiza mala mo masikironi mwa ye mut'u gonya akitsuha mahe mo malani mwakwe na akimugut'a lo ludhimi.
Gonya Jesu akilola dzulu mulunguni na akisohera dzulu akiamba, “Efatha” ambazho manaye ni kuamba “Vuguka.”
Haho henye ye mut'u masikiroge gakivuguka, na kidza ludhimilwe lukirichizwa na akinena t'ot'ot'o.
Jesu akiakokot'era o at'u kukala masimwambire mut'u go adzigogahenda, ela kila arihoakokot'era makikaza kuvitsamula kila hat'u
Na lola o at'u mangalala kamare na makiamba, “Mut'u yuyu kila ahendaro ni ridzo, hatha anahenda magwigwi ganene na enye makoto mavuguke masikiro kamare!”
Siku mwenga ngororoki bomu ya at'u yakundzumanyika, na kwa kukala were k'amana ut'u wowosi wa kurya, Jesu waaiha hamwenga o anafundzie na akiambira,
“At'u aa be mananishononesa zhomu. Hangu makale nami haha, rero ni hahu, na vivi k'amana ut'u wowosi wa kurya.
Nikiamba ninaafumula mende kwao midzini bila kuap'a kit'u marye, mandagwa na mutsare mo ngirani kwani angine ao madzalaa kure.”
Ndo anafundzie makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Mut'u anadima kuarisadze at'u ano hano nyika?”
Ndo Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Kwani muna mikahe mingahi?” Makiamba, “Mifungahe.”

Bai Jesu akiambira o at'u, makelesi ho ts'i. Gonya akiihala yo mikahe mifungahe, akilazha muv̱era kwa Mulungu, na akiimogola-mogola akiap'a o anafundzie maagazhire o at'u, na o anafundzie makihenda vizho zhenye.
Kidza were mana vikumba vichache, vizho nazho Jesu akivihala akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, na gonya akiap'a o anafundzi kwamba mavigazhizhe at'u nazho.
Na lola o at'u marya hatha makivilola, kidza o anafundzi makidzaza k'ahu fungahe za visiku-visiku virizhokala vidzasala.
Naho were hana at'u mafikao alifu ne.
Bai Jesu akiafumula, gonya achangira dauni mara mwenga hamwenga na o anafundzie machenda ts'i ya Dalimanuth'a.
Bai arihokala kuko, Mafarisayo mamuthuwa makikwatya kupigana k'anani naye. Na kidza were manamala kumujeza, kwa vizho makimwamba Jesu aahendere muujiza wa kula mulunguni.
Jesu akishononeka moyoni akiamba, “Mbona kizhazi kinamala kuhenderwa miujiza? Namwambira jeri wenye kukala k'akindanyeswa muujiza wowosi.”
Bai Jesu akiahaukira o Mafarisayo, achangira dauni na achenda nyangamo nyingine ya ro ziya.
O anafundzi a Jesu mere madzasahau kutsukula mikahe ya kuthosha, mere mana mukahe mumwenga thu mo dauni.
Jesu akiaonya o anafundzie akiamba, “Dzichungeni sana. Dzimanyirireni na ts'ats'u ya Mafarisayo na ya Herode.”
K'uzhona bai o anafundzie makikwatya kuuzana-uzana makiamba, “Yuyu anaamba vivi kwa kukala k'ahuna mikahe.”
Jesu akikala anamanya zho marizhokala mananena, kwa vizho akiauza akiamba, “Kwanoni munauzana-uzana dzulu za kukosa mikahe? Vidze muchere k'amuona kidza k'amudzang'alirwa? Hedu muna mioyo miomu?
Muna matso, ela k'amuona! Muna masikiro, ela k'amusikira. Kidza k'amukumbukira bule.
Nirihoimogola yo mikahe mitsano na kuarisa at'u alifu ts'ano, vidze ni k'ahu nyingahi za masaza murizodzaza?” O anafundzi makiamba, “Kumi na mbiri.”
Jesu akienderera kuauza akiamba, “H'e zho nirizhoarisa at'u alifu ne na mikahe mifungahe, ni k'ahu nyingahi za masaza murizodzaza?” O anafundzie makiamba, “Fungahe.”
Jesu akiamba, “Vidze muchere k'amudzang'alirwa?”
Bai machenda hatha makifika Beth'isaida, na kuko at'u makimurehera Jesu mut'u ariyekala ni kipofu na makimungolangola Jesu amugut'e ye kipofu kwamba ahole.
Ndo Jesu akimugwira mukono ye kipofu na achenda naye ndze ya ko kadzidzi. Akimutsuhira mahe mo matsoni gonya akimuikira mikono na akimuza akiamba, “Vidze vino unaona?”
Ye mut'u akinula kitswa vichache akilola naye akimwambira Jesu, “Ee naona at'u manenda, ela ni here mihi.”
Jesu arihosikira vivi akimwikira mikono kaheri mo matsoni mwakwe, na ariholola kaheri nguvu za matsoge zikimuuyira naye akikwatya kuona kila kit'u t'ot'ot'o.
Jesu akimukokot'era ye mut'u akiamba, “Enda mudzini kwako, na siuye na mo kadzidzini.”
Badaye Jesu na o anafundzie machambola kwenda zho vidzidzi zha jimbo ra Kaisaria Filipi. Bai mo ngirani Jesu akiauza o anafundzie akiamba, “Vidze at'u manaamba mino ni h'ani?”
Makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Angine manaamba u Johana Mubat'izaji, na angine manaamba u Elija, kidza angine manaamba kukala u mumwenga kahi za o manabii.”
Naye akiuza akiamba, “Vidze nwi munaamba mino ni h'ani?” P'et'ero akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Uwe ndiwe ye Masihi.”
Jesu akiakokot'era akiambira masimwambire mut'u yoyosi dzuluze.
Ndo Jesu akikwatya kuafundisha anafundzie, akiamba, “Mwana wa Mudamu lazima ateswe sana na akahalwe ni athumia, na alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria, na andalagwa, ela bada ya siku t'ahu andafufuka.”
Jesu waganena maut'u gaga lwazu-lwazu. Bai P'et'ero akimuvuha k'anda akimuchemera.
Ela Jesu akihunduka kulola wo upande mariko o anafundzie na akimuchemera P'et'ero akimwamba, “Hauke Shethani! Maazogo k'agambola kwa Mulungu, ela ni ga kibinadamu.”
Gonya Jesu akiambira o anafundzie hamwenga na wo muthunganano wa at'u madze hehi naye. Gonya akiamba, “Mut'u akihendza kunithuwa mimi, suthi adzikane mwenye, na adzihike musalabawe anithuwe.
Mana kila amalaye kuthizha rohoye andayangamiza, ela kila andiyeyangamiza rohoye kwa ut'u wangu na kwa ut'u wa wo Uv̱oro Udzo wa Mulungu, iye andaithizha.
Kwani vindamufwahani mut'u akipata vit'u zhosi zha urumwengu, gonya rohoye yangamike?
Hedu mut'u anadima kugula rohoye?

Kwani mut'u anioneraye haya hamwenga na gaga mafundisho gangu kahi za kizhazi kiki cha dambi kisichokuluhira, Mwana wa Mudamu naye andamuonera haya siku iyo andihokudza kahi za nguma ya Babaye hamwenga na malaika aeri.”
Gonya Jesu akiamba, “Ninamwambira ujeri, haha hana at'u mario k'amandafwa hatha mawone uthawali wa Mulungu udzire na nguvu.”
Bada ya siku t'andahu, Jesu wamuhala P'et'ero, Jakobu na Johana machendakwera dzulu za murima mure, makikala kuko h'akiyao. Vikara marihokala ma kuko, ye Jesu akigaluka sura kuno manalolera.
Nguwoze zakala nyaruhe zhomu, kidza were zinang'ala-ng'ala hatha k'akuna mufuli yoyosi haha dhuniani adimaye kuzifula dza vizho.
Gonya Elija na Musa makiambolera na makikala mananena na Jesu.
P'et'ero akimwambira Jesu, “Mwalimu ni vidzo zho zha fu haha! Nahuake vibanda vihahu, kimwenga cha kwako, kimwenga cha Musa na kimwenga cha Elija.”
P'et'ero were tha k'amanya aneneni kwa wo woga ariokala nao iye na o andziye.
Gonya kukidza ingu rikidzaafinikira na sauthi ichambola mo inguni ikiamba, “Yuyu ni Mwanangu muhendzwi, musirikizeni iye.”
Haho kwa haho P'et'ero, Jakobu na Johana makitsuha matso kuku na kuku, ela k'amaonere mut'u mungine hamwenga nao isihokala Jesu h'akeye.
Badaye marihokala manatharamuka kula ko dzulu ya wo murima, Jesu akiakokot'era p'ore makambira mut'u go madzigogaona muhaka ho Mwana wa Mudamu andihofufuka.
Kwa vizho o anafundzie ahahu makisikira zho arizhoakokot'era ye Jesu, ela ko o enye na enye makiuzana-uzana, “Kufufuka kula kifwani manaye ni noni?”
Bai kahi za vizho o anafundzi makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Mbona alimu a Sheria manaamba ni lazima Elija adze kwandza?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ni jeri, Elija ni lazima athangulie kuthayarisha kila kit'u kwandza, ela hatha vizho zhaorwa kwamba ye Mwana wa Mudamu andapata mashaka na kukahalwa.
Ela namwambira bai, kukala Elija wakudza kare na o at'u makimuhenda kila marichoona ni karakara dza here Maoro garizhonena dzuluze.”
Badaye Jesu na o anafundzie ahahu marihoauyira o anafundzi angine makiona kundi ra at'u, na alimu a Sheria were manapigana k'anani na o anafundzi.
O at'u kumona Jesu akudzani thu, machangalala zhomu makikot'a malo machendamulamusa.
Jesu akiauza, “Ni ut'u wani udziwomuhendya hatha munapigana k'anani?”
Ndo mwanamulume mumwenga ariyekala a kahi za ro kundi ra o at'u achambola kumudzigidzya Jesu akiamba, “Mwalimu, mut'u mimi dzamureha mwanangu kwako, kwa kukala k'adima kunena, ana p'ep'o bwibwi.
Kila amugwagaho ni kumuhendya akambola fulo ra kanwani, akaluma meno na kidza akaumalala. Dzaambira aa anafundzio mamwamboze ye p'ep'o, ela k'amazhadimire.”
Kusikira vizho Jesu akiahundukira o anafundzie, akiamba, “H'enwi at'u musio na kuluhiro! Nindakala nanwi hatha rini? Nindamuvumirira hatha rini? Mureheni kuno ye muhoho.”
Bai makimureha ye muhoho kwa Jesu. Lola ye p'ep'o arihomona Jesu thu, akimugwaga ye muhoho, kuno anagalagala na kumbola fulo ra kanwani.
Jesu akimuza ye bimut'u akiamba, “Zhamuandza rini vino?” Ye babaye ye muhoho akidzigidzya akiamba, “Ni kula uhohowe.
K'ana nyinji ye p'ep'o adzajeza kumwalaga kwa kumutsuha mohoni hedu madzini. Fuonere mbazi ufwavize chamba undazhadima!”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Ati chamba ndazhadima? Gosi ganadimikika kwa ye akuluhiraye.”
Bai ye babaye ye muhoho akiluta mumiro akiamba, “Ninakuluhira, ela naviza kutsakuluhira kwangu.”
Jesu arihoona at'u anji manadza akimuchemera ye p'ep'o akimwamba, “We p'ep'o gwigwi na makoto, h'aya mwambole kare ye muhoho na usimwangire kaheri!”
Ye p'ep'o akipiga luchemi zhomu, akimupiga na ts'i ye muhoho ndo akimwambola. Naye wakala ni here adziyefwa ye muhoho. O at'u kuona vizho makikwatya kuamba, “Adzafwa benwi!”
Ela Jesu akigoloza mukono akimugwira ye muhoho na akimurungaraza.
Badaye Jesu arihokala adzangira nyumbani na o anafundzie, o anafundzie mamuza kinjama makiamba, “Kwanoni sino k'ahudimire kumwamboza ye p'ep'o?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “K'akuna mut'u adimaye kumwamboza p'ep'o dza yuyu hasiho kuvoya.”
Machambola kuko, makikira kahikahi ya Galilaya. Naye k'ahendzeze mut'u yoyosi amanye ko ariko,
kwa kukala were anaafundisha anafundzie. Were anaamba, “Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa kwa at'u nao mandamwalaga. Bai achalagwa andafufuka bada ya siku t'ahu.”
Ela o anafundzie k'amang'alirirwe ni gago arigokala Jesu anaambira, kidza makikala aoga na kumuza.
Bai machenda hatha makifika Kaperinaumu na marihokala madzangira nyumbani, Jesu waauza o anafundzie akiamba, “Kurya ngirani mudzakala munapigana k'anani za noni?”
O anafundzie makimunyamalira zii, kwa kukala mo ngirani mosi were madzapigana k'anani za mubomu ni h'ani kahi zao.
Vikara arihokala akeresi, Jesu waaiha o anafundzie kumi na airi akiambira, “Kila ahendzaye akale wa kwandza suthi adziike wa mwisho na akale muhumiki wa osi.”
Gonya akimuhala muhoho muthithe, akimwika kahikahi yao, na akiamba,
“Kila amuhokeraye muhoho muthithe dza yuyu kwa dzina rangu, ananihokera mimi, na ye anihokeraye mimi k'anihokera mimi bule, ela anamuhokera iye ariyenihuma.”
Kusikira vizho, Johana ariye ni mumwenga wa o anafundzi akiamba, “Mwalimu, fwaona mut'u anamboza p'ep'o kwa dzinaro, naswi hukimukahaza, kwa kukala si mumwenga wehu.”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Musimukahaze, kwani k'ahana ahendaye miujiza kwa dzina rangu gonya ko akanena mai dzulu zangu,
mana mut'u ariye k'akinyume chehu ni wehu.
Manyani vivi, kila andemup'a kikombe cha madzi kwa kukala mu at'u a Masihi, mut'u iye k'andakosa zawadiye.”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Ela mut'u yoyosi andiyemuhendya mumwenga wa aa athithe manikuluhirao ahende dambi, ni baha afungwe lwalwa lwa singo atsufwe baharini.
Na mukonowo ukikuhendya uhende dambi, utose. Kwani ni baha wangire uzimani na mukono mumwenga, kuriko kwenda na mikono yosi miri ko Jehanamu, kuriko mohowe k'auzima hatha kare na kare. [
Fundza a kuko k'amafwa bule na wo moho nawo k'auzinyika.]
Na kigulucho kikikuhendya uhende dambi, kitose, kwani baha wangire uzimani na kigulu kimwenga kuriko utsufwe Jehanamu na magulugo mairi. [
Fundza a kuko k'amafwa bule na wo moho nawo k'auzinyika.]
Dzitsoro rikikuhendya uhende dambi, rishukule. Kwani ni baha wangire kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu na ch'ongo, kuriko utsufwe Jehanamu na matso mairi,
murimo muna mabulu gasofwa na moho usiwozima.
Kwani kila mut'u andahendywa mueri kukirira na moho.
Munyu ni mudzo, ela chamba k'aukoza kaheri, k'ahana ngira idimayo kuuhendya ukakoza. Kalani na munyu ndani mwenu na muishi na dheri na at'u angine.”
Gonya Jesu akiuka kuko achenda jimbo ra Judea, na kuvuka muho wa Jorodani. Makundi-makundi ga at'u gakidza ho arihokala. Naye akiafundisha here garizhokala mazowerage.
Bai Mafarisayo makimwenderera makamujeze, makimuza, “Vidze ni karakara mut'u kumuricha muchewe?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Kwani Musa wamulagizadze?”
Makiamba, “Musa walazha ruhusa mut'u aore cheti cha kurichana gonya umuriche.”
Jesu akiamba, “Musa wamuorera malagizo gaga kwa kukala mu at'u a singo nyomu.
Ela hangu chaho cha kuumbwa urumwengu, ‘Mulungu waaumba muche na mulume.’
Kwa ut'u uu mut'u andamuricha babaye na mameye agwirane na muchewe,
na ao airi mandakala mwiri mumwenga. Bai madzauya si airi kaheri, ni mwiri mumwenga.
Kwa vizho adzichokigwizanya Mulungu, mudamu asikitose bule.”
Badaye marihongira nyumbani kaheri, o anafundzie mamuza Jesu dzulu za ut'u uu kaheri.
Jesu akiambira, “Mut'u amurichaye muchewe na kuhala muche mungine nikukala anazinga.
Na muche amurichaye mulumewe na kuhalwa ni mulume mungine nikukala anazinga.”
Gonya at'u mere manamurehera Jesu ahoho athithe aagut'e, ela o anafundzi makiadumulira o at'u.
Jesu arihoona viryahu, akitsukirwa akiamba, “Aricheni ahoho athithe madze kwangu, musiakahaze bule, kwani uthawali wa Mulungu ni wa at'u dza vizho aa.
Namwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u ariye k'andauhokera uthawali wa Mulungu dza here muhoho muthithe, k'andawangira ng'o.”
Gonya Jesu akiahala o ahoho akianula, akiaikira mikonoye akiahasa.
Badaye Jesu arihouka kwenda mo ngirani, mut'u mumwenga akidza malo, akimupigira mavindi akimuza akiamba, “Mwalimu mudzo, nihendedze hatha nipate uzima wa kare na kare?”
Jesu akimwamba, “Kwanoni unaniha mudzo? K'akuna mudzo, asihokala Mulungu h'akeye.
Uwe unamanya malagizo ga Mulungu: Usalage, usizinge, usiiye, usimboze ushahidhi wa ulongo, usikenge, aishimu babayo na mameyo.”
Ye mut'u kusikira vivi akiamba, “Mwalimu, gaga gosi nagagwira hangu nichere muhoho.”

Jesu akimulola kwa mahendzo, gonya akimwamba, “Udzahungukirwa ni kit'u kimwenga nacho ni kiki. Enda ukaguze kila kit'u uricho nacho, gonya zo p'esa uap'e akiya, nawe undakala na akiba ko mulunguni. Ukigonya kuhenda vizho ndzo unithuwe.”
Ye mut'u kudzasikira vizho, uso gii, akihauka k'ana raha mana were ana mali nyinji zhomu.
Jesu akitsuha matso kuno na kuno, akiambira o anafundzie, “Vindakala vikomu kwa mashaha kwangira uthawali wa Mulungu.”
O anafundzi makingalala zhomu marihosikira maneno gago. Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Anangu ni vikomu zhomu kwa ao makuluhirao ushaha
kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.
Ni rahisi ngamira kukira kahi za t'undu ya shindano, kuriko shaha kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.”
Kusikira vizho, o anafundzi makingalala zhomu, makimwamba, “Hatha ni h'ani adimaye kuokoka be zho?”
Jesu akialola gonya akiamba, “Kwa nguvu za mudamu k'azhadimikika, ela si kwa Mulungu bule, mana kwa Mulungu kila kit'u kinadimikika.”
Ndo P'et'ero akimwamba Jesu, “Lola, fwaricha zhosi fukikuthuwa uwe.”
Jesu akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri, k'akuna mut'u ariyericha nyumbaye, nduguze, babaye, mameye, anae hedu minda kwa ut'u wangu mimi na kwa ut'u wa Uv̱oro Udzo,

ariye k'andarifwa kahi za wakathi uu kare. Andapata mara gana ya vit'uzhe zhosi: nyumba, ndugu, mameze, ana, minda hamwenga na mateso nago. Na kidza andapata uzima wa kare na kare kahi za urumwengu udzawo.
Ela anji mario vivi ni a kwandza, mandakala a mwisho, na a mwisho, mandakala a kwandza.”

Vikara makikala ma ngirani manenda Jerusalemu. Jesu were nde ariye mbere na o anafundzie makingalala, na ao at'u mariokala nyuma zao were mathele woga. Jesu akiavuha k'anda kaheri o anafundzi kumi na airi na akiathalira garyahu maut'u gandigomupata.
Akiamba, “Lolani, vivi hunenda Jerusalemu. Na kuko Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa kwa alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria. Ao mandamuhukumu kwalagwa na mamulazhe kwa at'u mario si Ayahudi.
Mandamusholera mamutsuhire mahe, mamupige na mamwalage, ela bada ya siku t'ahu andafufuka.”
Jakobu na Johana ana a Zebedayo makimwenderera Jesu, makimwamba, “Mwalimu, huna ut'u humalao uhuhendere.”
Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Munamala nimuhendereni?”
Makimwamba, “Hunamala haho kala udzire kahi za ngumayo, uhuruhusu mumwenga wehu akeresi mukonowo wa kurya na mungine akeresi mukonowo wa kumots'o.”
Jesu akiambira, “Ninwi be tha k'amukimanya bule cho mukivoyacho. Vidze cho kikombe ninwacho munadima kukinwa nwi?
Hedu munadima kubat'izwa na wo ubat'izo nibat'izirwao?”
O ana a Zebedayo makiamba, “Ee hunadima.” Jesu akiambira, “Cho kikombe ninwacho nanwi mundakinwa, na wo ubat'izo nibat'izirwao nanwi mundabat'izwa na uwo.
Ela kukeresi mukono wangu wa kurya hedu mukono wa kumots'o, sina wadimi nazho bule. Kwani kuko Baba wakutengezera at'ue, na ao ndo mandiokala kuko.”
K'uzhona aryahu anafundzi angine kumi marihosikira, makiatsukirirwa Jakobu na Johana.

Ela Jesu akiaiha, akiambira, “Munamanya kukala ao mav̱iryao kuathawala at'u mario si Ayahudi manahendza kuthawala at'u ao na ukali munji. Na aryahu abomu mario ts'ini zao nao, manahendza kuhumira wadimi wao wosi kuatumisha o at'u.
Ela ninwi musikale vizho bule. Iye ahendzaye kukala mubomu be suthi akale muhumiki wenu.
Na kila ahendzaye kukala kitswa kahi zenu suthi akale mutumwa wa osi.
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu naye k'adzire ahumikirwe, ela wakudza ahumike na alazhe uzimawe aakombole at'u anji.”

Badaye Jesu na anafundzie makwenda mudzi wa Jeriko. Bai arihokala anambola Jeriko na anafundzie hamwenga na kundi bomu ra at'u, haho k'anda-k'anda za ngira, were hakelesi kipofu mumwenga ariyekala kaziye ni kuvoya-voya. Kipofu yuyu were anaifwa Bat'imayo, yani mwana wa T'imayo.
Arihosikira kukala ni Jesu wa Nazareth'i nde ariyekala anakira, wakwatya kuluta mumiro akiamba, “Jesu mwana wa Daudi, nionera mbazi!”
Na at'u anji makimudumulira makimwamba anyamale, ela ye tha akikaza kuluta mumiro akiamba, “Mwana wa Daudi, nionera mbazi!”
Jesu akiima akiamba, “Hedu mwiheni hano.” Bai makimwiha ye kipofu makiamba, “Sikale moga uka, anakwiha.”
Akiritsuha ro ambare, akiuka haraka, akimwendera Jesu.
Jesu akimuza akiamba, “Vidze unamala nikuhendereni?” Ye kipofu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Bwana, namala nione!”
Jesu akimwamba, “Enda, kuluhiroro ridzakuhoza.” Na haho henye, akikwacha kuona na akimuthuwa Jesu mo ngirani.
Na marihokala hehi na Jerusalemu makiona kwa kure Beth'ifage na Beth'ania, kahi za Murima wa Mizeituni, ndo akiahuma anafundzie airi
akiambira, “Endani hatha mwangire ko kadzidzi mudzikoerekezana nako. Mukikala munangira thu, mundaona mwana wa ndzowe ariye k'adzapandwa ni mut'u adzafungwa. Muvuguleni mumurehe.
Mut'u yoyosi akimuza, ‘Kwanoni munahendazho?’ mwambeni, ‘Bwana ana haja naye, na andamudzya kare.’ ”
Kwa vizho machenda na machendaona mwana wa ndzowe adzafungwa ndze ya mulomo wa nyumba ho ngirani. Makimuvugula.
O at'u mariokala haho makiauza makiamba, “Mbona munamuvugula ye mwana wa ndzowe kaheri?”
O anafundzie makiambira zho arizhokala adzaalagiza Jesu, na o at'u makiarichira machenda.
Bai machenda naye ye mwana wa ndzowe hatha kwa Jesu, makihandika maamba gao mongoni mwakwe na Jesu akikelesi dzuluze.
At'u anji makihandika maamba gao mo ngirani, angine o makitandaza viv̱ungo marizhovitosa mo mindani.
Na at'u mariokala ma mbere, na ao mariokala nyuma zao mapiga k'ululu makiamba,
“Hosana!
Naalikwe iye adzaye kwa dzina ra Bwana!
Nauhaswe wo uthawali udzawo wa mukare wehu Daudi.
Hosana kwakwe iye ariye dzulu!”

Bai Jesu achangira Jerusalemu na achenda kahi za ro Hekalu, akimulolat'o sana mo ndani, ela kwa kukala dzuwa were rinenda kutswani, akihambola haho na achenda Beth'ania hamwenga na o anafundzie kumi na airi.
Siku ya hiriye, marihokala madzaombola Beth'ania, Jesu akisikira ndzala mo ngirani.
Kwa kure akiona mutini uriwokala u gi makodza. Bai achendalola chamba andapata matunda. Ela arihoufikira akiwona u gi makodza mahuhu, kwani gere si makathige ga kuzhala matunda.
Jesu akiulani wo muhi akiamba, “K'undazhala matunda kaheri.” Na o anafundzie makisikira zho arizhonena.

Marihofika Jerusalemu, Jesu achangira ndani za ro Hekalu, akikwatya kuainga aryahu mariokala makiguza na kugula muryahu Hekaluni. Kidza akihala zo meza za abandi a p'esa, na vihi zha aguzi a magiya, akivipetula-petula zhosi,
k'amuruhusire mut'u hatha mumwenga kutsukula kit'u chochosi kukirira wo muhala wa ro Hekalu.
Gonya akikwatya kuafundisha akiamba, “Zhaorwa kukala, ‘Nyumba yangu indaifwa nyumba ya mavoyo kwa at'u osi!’ Ela ninwi mudzaihendya p'anga ya kuzama aivi.”
Bai o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria makivisikira na makikwatya kumala ngira ya kumwalagira, kwani mamwagoha kwa kukala kundi rosi ra at'u rere rinangalazwa ni mafundishoge.
Kurihokala kunatswa Jesu na anafundzie makiwombola wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu.
Madzach'age marihokala manakira ngira iryahu ya dzana, makiwona uryahu mutini, nao were udzanyala kula ko kirereni hatha ko koloni.
Kuona vivi P'et'ero akikumbukira, na akimwambira Jesu, “Mwalimu, lola bewe wo mutini uriwoulani udzanyala.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Kalani na kuluhiro kwa Mulungu.
Namwambira ujeri, mut'u andewambira murima uu, ‘Ng'oka na ukagwe baharini,’ na kala k'andaamba, ‘Ela vindakala?’ moyoni mwakwe, ela akuluhire kukala zho adzizhoamba vindakala, be andahenderwa jeri.
Kwa vizho namwambira, kila mundichokivoya, kuluhirani kukala mudzakihokera, nanwi mundakipata.
Nanwi kila muimaho kuvoya, na kumbe muna neno na mut'u, musameheni, kwamba na Babiyenu ariye mulunguni apate kumusamehe makosa genu. [
Ela musihosamehe, ye Babiyenu ariye mulunguni naye k'andamusamehe makosa genu.”]
Bai makifika Jerusalemu kaheri. Na Jesu arihokala anatsembera kahi za ro Hekalu, o alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria na athumia makimwendera.
Makimuza makiamba, “Unahenda maut'u gano kwa wadimi wani? Hedu ni h'ani ariyekup'a wadimi wa kugahenda?”
Jesu akiambira, “Nindamuza swali. Mukinidzigidzya, nindamwambira ni wadimi wani nihenderao maut'u gaga.
Vidze wo wadimi ariohumira Johana Mubat'izaji kubat'izira at'u, wala kwa Mulungu hedu wala kwa anadamu? Nidzigidzyani.”
O alombi abomu na o athumia makiojana makiamba, “Fukiamba wala kwa Mulungu, andafuza, ‘Kwanoni k'amumukuluhirire?’
Na hukiamba, ‘Wala kwa anadamu,’ be fu hatharini, kwani at'u osi mandahutsukirirwa.” (Manena vivi kwa kukala were ni aoga na at'u, kwa kukala o at'u osi mamona Johana kukala ni nabii jeri.)
Kwa vizho makimwamba Jesu, “K'ahumanya.” Jesu naye akiamba, “Hatha mimi nami sindamwambira wo wadimi nihumirao kuhendera maut'u gaga.”

Gonya Jesu akikwatya kunena nao na mafumbo akiamba, “Kwere kuna mut'u mumwenga ariyerima mundawe akiulaya mizabibu, akiudengelezera wiyo, akitsimba wina wa kukamulira zabibu, kidza akiaka uringo wa kurindira. Kugonya vizho, wo munda akiukodishira ak'urima, ye mwenye achenda ts'i nyingine.
Makathi ga mavuno garihofika akihuma muhumikiwe ende kwa aryahu ak'urima, akagerwe fungu ra zo zabibu.
Ye muhumiki arihofika, o ak'urima makimuhala makimupiga, gonya makimuja kihuhu.
Kuona vizho, ye mut'u akihuma muhumiki mungine. Iye naye makimwangiza ranga ra kitswa na makimuhendera makuruhu.
Akihuma mungine, na o ak'urima makihenda kumwalaga kamare, na angine anji mariohumwa mapigwa na angine makilagwa.
“Vikara ariyekala asere wa kumuhuma were ni mumwenga thu. Naye were ni mwanawe mwenye amuhendzaye. Bai akimuhuma akale wa mwisho, akiamba kimoyo-moyo, ‘Bila shaka mandamuishimu.’
“Ela o ak'urima marihomona ye mwana, makiambirana, ‘Yuno be hatha se andiyeuhala ufwa uno munda? Alume nahumwalage yuyu, na uu munda undakala wehu.’
Bai makimugwavukira makimwalaga, gonya makimwamboza ndze ya wo munda.
“Vidze munaona ye mwenye munda andahendadze?” Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Ye mwenye munda andakudzaalaga o ak'urima na wo munda aap'e at'u angine.
Vidze k'amudzagashoma gano Maoro gaambago,
‘Ro iwe ririrokahalwa ni aaki
vivi be ridzagaluka ndo iwe bomu ra p'embeni.
Ut'u uwo wahendwa ni Bwana,
Na fukiulola unafwangalaza?’ ”
Marihosikira vizho o athumia a Kiyahudi makijeza kumugwira Jesu, kwani mamanya kukala ro fumbo ridzanenwa kwao ao, ela makigoha wo muthunganano wa o at'u. Kwa vizho makimuricha makihauka.
Ndo gonya makiahuma angine kahi za o Mafarisayo na at'u a Herode, mende makamuhege na maswali.

Hatha marihofika makimwamba, “Mwalimu, hunamanya kukala uwe u mujeri. K'ugoha mut'u yoyosi hatha kala ana cheo chani, mana k'ulola at'u kwa uso. Unafundisha ngira ya Mulungu jeri. Bai fwambire. Kuriha kodi kwa Kaisari ni karakara hedu si karakara?”
Jesu akikumanya kare ko kudzihendya kwao, akiamba, “Kwanoni munanijeza? Nip'ani yo p'esa hedu niilole.”
Bai makiireha na makimup'a Jesu. Na Jesu akiuza akiamba, “Ino sura iriyo hano na ro dzina ni zha h'ani?” Makiamba, “Ni zha Kaisari.”
Jesu akiambira, “H'aya bai, zha Kaisari mup'eni Kaisari mwenye, na zha Mulungu nazho mup'eni Mulungu.” Nao machangalazwa zhomu ni zho arizhodzigidzya.
Gonya Masadukayo ambao manaamba k'akuna kufufuka makimudzirira Jesu makiamba,
“Mwalimu, Musa wafuorera kukala, mut'u akifwererwa ni nduguye, na akisiya muche ela asisiye ahoho, ye nduguye mut'u ni amuhale ufwa ili amuzhalire ahoho ye mufwadzi.
Vikara kwere kuna ndugu afungahe, ye mukulu wao akihala muche, ela akifwa bila kuzhala naye.
Ye wa hiri akimuhala, naye akifwa bila kusiya ahoho, na wa hahu naye dzazho.
Osi afungahe makigoma kufwa bila kusiya ahoho. Mwisho ye muche naye akiathuwa.
Vidze makathi at'u mandihofufuka, andakala mukaza h'ani? Kwani o ndugu osi afungahe mamuhala.”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Ndo sababu munahenda makosa, kwa kukala k'amumanya Maoro, kidza k'amumanya nguvu za Mulungu zirizho.
Kwani wakathi at'u mandihofufuka kundakala k'akuna kuhala hedu kuhalwa, kwani mandakala here malaika a mulunguni.

Bai dzulu za at'u kufufuka, naamba, k'amudzashoma kahi za chuwo cha Musa dzulu za kitsakuzi kirichokala kinaaka na viryahu Mulungu arizhonena na Musa akiamba, ‘Ndimi Mulungu wa Burahemu, na Isaka, na Jakobu’?
Vivi vinanyesa kukala Mulungu ni Mulungu wa at'u mario moyo si wa at'u mariofwa. Ninwi Masadukayo munakosa sana.”

Bai mumwenga wa aryahu a alimu a Sheria were a haho na akisikira zho marizho were manauza-uza na akimanya kamare kukala Jesu adzadzigidzyat'o. Kwa vizho naye akimuza rakwe akiamba, “Amuri ya kwandza ya zosi ni hiyo?”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Bomu ni ii iambayo, ‘Sirikizani h'enwi Aiziraeli, Bwana wehu Mulungu ni mumwenga na nde Bwana h'akeye.
Muhendze Bwana Mulunguo na moyowo wosi, na rohoro rosi, na akilizo zosi, na nguvuzo zosi.’
Amuri ya hiri ni ii, ‘Muhendze mwandziyo here udzihendzazho mwenye.’ K'akuna amuri bomu kukira zizi mbiri.”
Ye mwalimu wa Sheria akimwamba, “Udzadzigidzyat'o mwalimu. U mujeri here udzizhoamba kwamba Mulungu ni mumwenga na k'akuna mungine hasihokala iye.
Na mut'u ni amuhendze na moyowe wosi na akilize zosi na nguvuze zosi na aahendze andziye dza zho adzihendzazho mwenye. Kugwira malagizo gaga kudzakira kumboza sadaka za kuocha na nyingine-nyingine.”
Jesu arihomona kukala ye mwalimu wa Sheria adzadzigidzyat'o kilachu, akimwamba, “Uwe k'ukure na uthawali wa Mulungu.” Bada ya gago k'ahakalireho na mut'u ariyedzisikira amuze swali.
Badaye Jesu arihokala anafundisha kahi za ro Hekalu, waauza swali o at'u akiamba, “Alimu a Sheria manadimadze kuamba kukala ye Masihi ni Mwana wa Daudi?
Daudi mwenye kahi za nguvu za Roho Mweri waamba,
‘Bwana Mulungu wamwamba Bwana wangu,
“Kelesi mukono wangu wa kurya,
muhaka mahadhuio niathambaraze kamare
ts'ini za magulugo.” ’
Vikikala Daudi mwenye amwiha ‘Bwana,’ anadimadze kukala mwanawe?” Bai wo muthunganano mubomu ukimusirikiza na raha zhomu.
Jesu arihokala anafundisha waamba, “Dzimanyirireni na alimu a Sheria mahendzao kutsembera kuno madzavala miguwo mire kwamba malamuswe kwa ishima mo masokoni,
na kidza manahendza kugerwa vihi zha mbere kahi za masinagogi na kahi za sherehe.
Kidza ao nikuahoka ache magungu vit'u zhao, na kudzihendesha kukala ni adzo kwa kuvoya mavoyo mare-mare. Adhabu yao indakala k'ali zaidhi.”
Gonya Jesu achenda kahi za ro Hekalu na achendakelesi hehi na cho kiya cha kwangizira sadaka na akilolera viryahu at'u magwagazho p'esa. Vikara akiona mashaha managwaga nyinji-nyinji.
Na hakidza mwanamuche ariye were ni gungu kidza mukiya na akigwaga vipeni viri.
Jesu akiaiha hamwenga o anafundzie na akiambira, “Namwambira ujeri, yuyu mwanamuche gungu adzagwaga nyinji kukira osi.
Mana o angine madzamboza kafungu thu ka wo ushaha mario nao, ela yuno ye, ni masikini nyasi, ela adzagwaga zhosi arizho nazho. Adzamboza zhosi arizho were angaishira.”
Bai arihokala anambola kula kahi za ro Hekalu, hakimbola mumwenga wa o anafundzie akiamba, “Mwalimu, lola zho garizho madzo go mawe ga ro Hekalu! Lola wo mujengo nawo!”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Munagaona gano majengo mabomu gosi? Be namwambira ujeri wenye k'ahana iwe hatha mwenga rindirosala dzulu za mwandziwe, kila kit'u kinadzabandwa-bandwa.”
Bai Jesu arihombola haho wakwendakelesi kahi za Murima wa Mizeituni uriwo unalolana na ro Hekalu, hakidza P'et'ero, Jakobu, Johana na Anderea, makimuza kinjama makiamba,
“Maut'u gano gandahendeka rini? Vidze ni muv̱ano wani undiwonyesa kukala makathi gadzafika ga maut'u gaga kuhendeka?”
Jesu akiambira, “Dzimanyirireni hasidze mut'u akamukenga.
Kwani at'u anji mandakudza kwa dzina rangu, na mandadziamba kukala ao ndo ye Masihi na mandakenga at'u anji.
Na mundasikira uv̱oro wa viha vihefwazho hehi na vingine mundahenda kuvisikira uvumi, ela sogoheni, kwani ni hatha gakale gago, ela wo mwisho wa urumwengu undakala uchere mbere.
Kabila rindauka kwendapigana na kabila ringine. Uthawali undapigana na uthawali mungine. Ts'i indathethema hat'u-hat'u na kundakala na ndzala. Ela gago gosi gandakala ni mwandzo wa utsungu thu.
“Nanwi dzimanyirireni kwani at'u mandamugwira mamuhirike manenoni. Mandamupiga kahi za masinagogi na mundaima mbere za maluwali na athawali kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu, na mwamboze ushahidhi mbere zao.
Nawo Uv̱oro Udzo suthi kwandza wambirizwe at'u osi a kila samupuli kabila wo mwisho k'audzafika.
Na mandihomugwira kwenda nanwi manenoni, musikale na wasiwasi dzulu za zho mundizhoadzigidzya, ela nenani gago mundigogerwa. Kwa kukala gago mundigoadzigidzya gandakala si genu, ela ni ga Roho Mweri.
“Mut'u andamulazha nduguye mwenye hedu mwanawe mwenye alagwe. Ana nao mandaagalukira azhazi ao enye, maalazhe malagwe.
Nanwi mundamenwa ni at'u osi kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu. Ela andiyevumirira hatha mwisho andaokoka.
“Mundaona kit'u cha kutsukiza na cha kwanonga kiimire hat'u ambaho k'akiv̱irya kuima. (H'ewe mushomi, shomat'o ung'alirwe.) Bai mundihoona vizho, at'u osi mandiokala Judea namachimbirire ko mirimani.
Mut'u andiyekala a dzulu za nyumba ya kwakwe asiuye mo nyumbani kwendahala kit'u chochosi.
Mut'u andiyekala a mundani asiuye mudzini kwendahala valore.
Wakathi uwo vindakala vii-vii zaidhi kwa ano m'ama mandiokala mana mimba na mandiokala manaamwisa.
Bai voyani kwamba gaga gasihendeke makathi ga p'eho.
Kwani wakathi uwo kundakala na mateso mabomu garigo k'agadzaonewa hangu Mulungu aumbe urumwengu na k'agandaonewa kaheri haha urumwenguni.
Siku zizo za mateso Bwana wazihunguza kwa ut'u wa at'u arioatsagula, ela kala si vizho k'ahana hatha mut'u mumwenga angayeokoka.
Bai makathi gago mut'u akimwamba, ‘Lola thiyuno ye Masihi!’ hedu, ‘Thiyuya kurya,’ sikuluhireni bule.
Mana kundambola ano Masihi anji a ulongo, na manabii anji a ulongo. At'u ao osi mandahenda miv̱ano na maajabu ili vichadimikika maakenge hatha o at'u mariotsagulwa ni Mulungu.
Bai ninwi kalani matso, nidzamwambira maut'u gaga kimbere.”
“Siku zizo bada ya mateso garyahu kukira, dzuwa rindangira kiza, na mwezi k'aundaala kaheri.
Nyenyezi zindagwa ts'i na nguvu za dzulu mulunguni zindathukuswa.
Ndo mandihomona Mwana wa Mudamu akudzani kahi za maingu, hamwenga na nguvu nyinji na nguma.
Naye andaahuma malaikae maakundzumanye o at'u osi mariotsagulwa ni Mulungu kula kila p'embe ya dhunia.
“Bai dzifundisheni kula kwa mutini. Mutini t'aize zikikala nyolovu na kukwatya kumboza makodza munamanya kare wakathi wa mavuno udzafika hehi.
Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi mukiona maut'u gaga gosi, manyani kukala wakathi wa kudza Mwana wa Mudamu udzafika hehi.
Nami namwambira kamare, kizhazi kiki k'akindakira kabila maut'u gaga gosi kuthimira.
Mulunguni na ts'i, vindahenda mwisho, ela maneno gangu k'agana mwisho bule!
“Na k'ahana mut'u amanyaye ni siku yani hedu saa yani gandihokalira maut'u gaga, hatha o malaika na ye Mwana wa Mudamu k'amaimanya bule, Baba h'akeye nde aimanyaye.
Kwa vizho musilale, kalani thayari wakathi wosi, mana k'amumanya maut'u gaga gandakala rini.

Vindakala ni here mut'u aukaye charo cha kure, ariyehala nyumbaye akiarichira ahumikie mamutsundzire. Kidza kila mumwenga akimup'a kaziye ya kuhenda, gonya akimulagiza ye murindzi akale matso muhaka andihouya.
Bai hatha ninwi kalani matso, mana k'amumanya andakudza rini ye bwana mwenye nyumba. Anadima akadza na dziloni, hedu usiku ukulu hedu akadza jogolo rinaika hedu hatha akadza na madzach'a.
Bai akihenda poo hasiho kukala na mbadha naye, asidzemudulukiza murere.
Gaga namwambira ninwi na hatha at'u osi. Kalani matso.”
Bai were zisere siku mbiri ndo iryahu sikuk'uu ya P'asaka na ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u ifike, nao o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria makikala manamala ngira ya kilachu ya kumugwirira Jesu na mamwalage.
Makiambirana vivi, “Ut'u uu be nifusiuhende wakathi uu wa ii sikuk'uu, p'ore at'u makathinya bugwa.”

Makathi gago Jesu were a nyumbani mwa mut'u ariyeifwa Simoni Mahana ko Beth'ania. Vikara marihokala makuryani hakidza mwanamuche kuno adzatsukula ts'azi iriyotengezwa kula kwa iwe ra alabasita ya mafuha masafi ga marashi, nago were ni ga gali sana. Ye mwanamuche akihala yo ts'azi akibanda cho kifundiroche na akimumwagira Jesu go mafuha mo kitswani.
At'u angine mariokala haho kudzaona vizho, k'aviafwahire bule kwani maamba, “Kuno be si kwanonga kuno?
Mafuha gaga kala gadzaguzwa gangambola zaidhi ya dinari magana mahahu na makagerwa masikini.” K'uzhona o at'u makikwatya kumudumulira ye mwanamuche.
Ela Jesu arihoona vizho akiakanya akiamba, “Muricheni ye mwanamuche, mbona munamubudzya? Iye adzanihendera kit'u kidzo.
Masikini munao siku zosini. Bai kila muhendzaho munadima kuahendera zho muhendzazho, ela mimi bai k'amundakala nami siku zosini bule.
Adzahenda here adzizhodima, kwani adzahenda vizho anithayarishe kwa kuzikwa kwangu.
Nami namwambira ujeri kukala, zho adzizhohenda mwanamuche yuyu vivi rero, be vindathalwa na kukumbukirwa kila undihohubiriwa wo Uv̱oro Udzo kahi za urumwengu muzima.”
Ndo Juda Isikariote, mumwenga wa aryahu anafundzi kumi na airi a Jesu akiuka na achendaambira o alombi abomu viryahu mangazhodima kumugwira Jesu kirahisi.
Na o alombi abomu marihosikira vivi makifwahirwa sana na makilagana naye kumup'a p'esa. Kwa vizho Juda Isikariote akiandza kumala nafasi mbidzo ya kumusalitira Jesu.
Bai siku ya kwandza ya sikuk'uu ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u, ambayo ndo siku ya kutsindza ng'ondzi za sikuk'uu ya P'asaka, o anafundzi mamuza Jesu makiamba, “P'asaka ino undairyahi, fukakuthayarishire?”
Arihosikira vizho Jesu akiahuma anafundzie airi akialagiza akiamba, “Endani hatha mumo mudzini nanwi mundathungana mwanamulume adzatsukula muthanga wa madzi. Vikara mundihomona, muthuweni nyuma
muhaka yo nyumba andiyongira. Muchangira mwambeni ye mwenye nyumba vivi, ‘Mwalimu adzaamba, cho chumba cha ajeni ambacho iye na anafundzie mandarya sikuk'uu ya P'asaka ni hicho?’
Andihosikira vizho andamwanyesa chumba kibomu cha gorofani kiricho kina kila kit'u. Bai mukichona kwatyani kupanga-panga mumo.”
Kwa vizho o anafundzi airi machenda mo mudzini na makiona vizho arizho were Jesu adzaamba zhenye. Ndo makipanga-panga kwa ut'u wa yo sikuk'uu ya P'asaka.
Na kurihokala kudzakala dziloni, Jesu achenda mo mudzini hamwenga na o anafundzie kumi na airi.
Marihokala madzakelesi na makuryani, Jesu akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri, mumwenga wenu ariye tha hunarya naye haha, andanisaliti.”
Kusikira vizho o anafundzi makidzalwa ni kigondzi na makiuza mumwenga-mumwenga makiamba, “Vidze, ni mimi mwalimu?”
Jesu akiambira, “Iye ni mumwenga wa ninwi kumi na airi, iye atsotsaye muvureni hamwenga nami.
Ni jeri Mwana wa Mudamu anenda kare kamwe here Maoro gaambazho, ela shauriye iye mut'u amusalitiye! Vingakala baha kala k'azhalirwe.”
Vikara marihokala makuryani, Jesu wahala mukahe akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiumogola-mogola akiap'a o anafundzie, akiamba, “Halani, uu ndo mwiri wangu.”
Arihogonya kuap'a wo mukahe, akihala cho kikombe cha divai akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu, gonya akiap'a makinwa osini.
Akiambira, “Ii ndo milatso yangu imwagikayo kwa ut'u wa at'u anji na inanyesa kilagane kisha kahi za Mulungu na mudamu.
Nami namwambira ujeri, sindanwa divai ii kaheri muhaka siku iyo nindihonwa divai mbisha kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.”
Gonya makiimba na makiuka kwenda Murima wa Mizeituni.
Jesu akiambira anafundzie akiamba, “Usiku wa rero ninwi nyosi mundaniricha h'akiyangu. Kwani Maoro ganaamba, ‘Nindamupiga ye murisa na zo ng'ondzi zosi zindatsamukana.’
Ela haho nikikala nidzafufulwa, nindamuthangulia kwenda Galilaya.”
P'et'ero akimwamba, “Hatha kala osi mandakuricha, mimi sindakuricha ng'o!”
Jesu akimwambira P'et'ero, “Simoni nakwambira ujeri, usiku wa rero kabila jogolo k'aridzaika k'ana mbiri, undanikana k'ana t'ahu.”
P'et'ero arihosikira vizho akinena kwa nguvu akiamba, “Hatha kala ni kufwa nanifwe, ela sindakukana ng'o!” Na o anafundzi angine nao makinena dza vizho.
Gonya Jesu na anafundzie machenda hat'u haifwaho Geth'isemane. Marihofika haho, akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, “Kelesini haha nami ninavoya haryahu.”
Akimuhala P'et'ero, Jakobu na Johana achenda nao. Wakathi uwo washononeka zhomu na kubudzyika moyo.
Akiambira o ahahu akiamba, “Ninashononeka zhomu moyoni mwangu hatha ni here nindiyefwa. Bai kalani haha muchese.”
Gonya Jesu akiaricha o ano P'et'ero haho, ye akisongera mbere vichache. Achendagwa na moyo akivoya kwamba vichadimikika mateso gago gakire na k'anda.
Akiamba, “Aba! Baba! K'akuna ut'u usiwodimikika kwako. Bai navoya uniusire mateso gaga, ela navikale here uhendzazho uwe, visikale here nihendzazho mimi bule.”
Gonya akiauyira o anafundzie na achendaathekeza marere. Kuona vizho akimwamba P'et'ero, “Simoni hatha urere kamare! Yani k'udima kukala matso ngaa saa mwenga?
Chesani na muvoye sidze mukangira majezoni, kwani roho inahendza kamare, ela wo mwiri ni munyonge.”
Gonya akiuka kaheri kwendavoya, naye wavoya mavoyo dza gago ga chaho.
Naye arihoauyira achendaathekeza marere kaheri. K'amadimire kukala matso kwa wo uts'indzizi mariwokala nawo. Nao k'amapatire ra kumudzigidzya.
Arihouka na kudza kaheri lwa hahu akidzaambira, “Muchere kulala na kudzioyeza? Vinathosha. Lolani wakathi wa Mwana wa Mudamu kusalitiwa kwa enye dambi udzafika.
H'aya ukani fwende. Siyu kare iye anisalitiye!”

Bai arihokala achere kunena, poo, Juda mumwenga wa o anafundzi kumi na airi na kundi bomu ra at'u. Angine were madzatsukula mishu na angine were madzatsukula njogoma. At'u aa were mala kwa alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria na athumia a Kiyahudi.
Bai ye musaliti were adzaap'a muv̱ano kukala, “Ye nindiyemudonera nde mumumalaye, mugwireni na mwende naye ts'ini za urindzi mukali.”
Bai arihokudza achenda mara mwenga na akiamba, “Mwalimu,” gonya akimudonera.
Kudzaona vizho o at'u makimwangiza magandzani Jesu.
Na mumwenga wa aryahu mariokala maimire haho, akitsolola mushuwe na akimuthema muhumiki wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akimutosa sikiro.
Jesu akiauza o at'u akiamba, “Mbona mudzambola na mishu na njogoma kudzanigwira dza here mudzaogwira jambazi?
Kila siku nidzakala nikiima mbere yenu kahi za ro Hekalu kufundisha na k'amunigwirire? Ela gaga ganakala kwamba Maoro gathimire.”
Bai o anafundzie osi makimuricha makichimbira.
Vikara hakikala hana muvulana mumwenga ariyekala adzadzikut'a shuka ya kitani naye wakala anamala kumuthuwa Jesu, o at'u makijeza kumugwira naye,
ela akidziv̱itha, akiitsulusiza yo shuka ya kitani akichimbira huhu.
Bai makimuthongozha Jesu hatha ko kwa Mulombi mubomu mwenye, kuriko were ndo kudzikokundzumanyika o alombi abomu, alimu a Sheria, na athumia angine a Kiyahudi.
Naye P'et'ero akimuthuwa nyuma kwa kure hatha haryahu muhalani ha ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, bai akikelesi hamwenga na o arindzi a ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye na akikwatya kuoha moho.
O alombi abomu na ro Baraza rosi ra athumia, mamala kosa ra kumwalagira Jesu, ela k'amapatire bule.
Anji mamboza ushahidhi wa ulongo, ela hatha vizho wo ushahidhi wao k'augwiranire kamare.
Angine maungarara makimboza ushahidhi wa ulongo dzulu za Jesu makiamba,
“Famusikira anaamba vivi, ‘Nindaribanda-banda riri Hekalu ririroakwa ni at'u, nami nindaaka ringine risiroakwa ni at'u kwa siku t'ahu thu.’ ”
Hatha wo ushahidhi uwo nawo k'augwiranire bule.
Ndo ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akirungarara mbere za ro Baraza ra athumia na akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Mbona k'udzigidzya kit'u. Zho manenazho ano at'u ni jeri?”
Ela Jesu akinyamala zii, k'adzigidzyire kit'u. Ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akimuza kaheri, akiamba, “We ndiwe ye Masihi Mwana wa Mulungu?”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Ee ndimi. Nanwi mundamona Mwana wa Mudamu akelesi mukono wa kurya wa Mulungu mwenye nguvu, na anadza kuno a dzulu za maingu ga ko dzulu.”
Kusikira vizho ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye akitharura nguwoze kwa kutsukirwa, akiamba, “Vino funa haja ya mashahidhi angine?
Nyosi mudzasikira zho amukufuruzho Mulungu. Vidze munaona baha humuhendedze be vino?” Na osi makikira luhande lumwenga lwa kuamba anav̱irya alagwe.
Angine o hatha makikwatya kumutsuhira mahe na makimufunga kizuzu, makimupiga makonde kuno manamwamba, “H'aya nena ni h'ani ye adziyekupiga?” Na o shikari makimuhala na makimupiga mahi.
P'et'ero were achere ko muhalani kwa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye, hakidza muhendzi wa kazi wa kiche wa ye Mulombi mubomu.
Bai arihomona P'et'ero anaoha moho, wamulolat'o gonya akimwamba, “Uwe nawe udzakala u hamwenga na Jesu wa Nazareth'i?”
P'et'ero akikanaiza akiamba, “Simumanya, kwandza hatha go unenago k'aganing'alira.” Naye tw'ee achambola ko ndze ko muv̱iryani, na jogolo rikihenda hee.
Ye musichana akimona haho naho na akikwatya kuambira ao mariokala maimire haho, akiamba, “Yuyu naye ni mumwenga waho.”
P'et'ero akiakanaiza kaheri, ela k'avitoere ao mariokala haho makimwamba P'et'ero, “Uwe be u mumwenga waho kamare, kwandza hatha kwenu ni Galilaya t'i.”
Ndo P'et'ero akiandza kulani na kuapa, akiamba, “Hachi ya Mulungu kamare yuyu mut'u mumuhadzaye be simumanya.”

Haho henye jogolo rikiika lwa hiri na P'et'ero akikumbukira zho Jesu arizhokala adzamwambira kukala, “Kabila jogolo k'aridzaika k'ana mbiri, undanikana k'ana t'ahu.” P'et'ero arihoririkana vizho akiandza kurira kare kwa utsungu.

Vikara kurihocha na madzach'a maitsi genye, o alombi abomu, alimu a Sheria, athumia a Kiyahudi hamwenga na baraza rosi, mahenda mipango yao. Bai makimuhala, makimufunga na makimuhirika kwa P'ilato ariye were nde luwali wa jimbo riro.
Marihofika kuko P'ilato akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Vidze we ndiwe muthawali wa Ayahudi?” Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Uwe udzanena.”
O alombi abomu makimusingizira maut'u manji gasigofwaha. Ela iye Jesu mwenye tha k'ajibire kit'u, wanyamala zii.
Ye P'ilato akimuza kaheri akiamba, “Udzagasikira go maut'u manji madzigokushithakira?”
Na here ho chaho Jesu akithuwa kumunyamalira. Vivi vikimumasha P'ilato.
Bai here adha ra P'ilato were kila makathi ga sikuk'uu ya P'asaka ni kuavugulira mufungwa mumwenga mandiyemutsagula enye.
Vikara kwereko mut'u mumwenga kifungoni ariyeifwa Baraba. Iye na andziye mere mapatikana na makosa ga kugwaga rabusha na kwalaga kwa ut'u wa kukahala uthawali wa Kirumi.
Ndo at'u marihokala madzadzala ndii ho ha P'ilato, makikwatya kumwambira ye P'ilato aahendere here aahenderazho siku zosi.
Bai P'ilato akiauza akiamba, “Vidze munahendza nimuvugulire yuno muthawali wa Ayahudi?”
Kwani P'ilato wamanya kukala o alombi abomu madzamushithaki Jesu kwa sababu ya wivu thu.
Ela o alombi abomu makiavuga akili o at'u kwamba hat'u ha kuamba arichizwe Jesu, maambe mavugulirwe Baraba.
P'ilato akiauza kaheri o at'u akiamba, “Vikara yuno mumwihaye muthawali wa Ayahudi nimuhendedze?”
O at'u makipiga k'ululu kaheri na kuamba, “Musulubishe!”
P'ilato akiauza akiamba, “Kwani adzakosani kibomu?” Ela o hatha makikaza kupiga k'ululu kuamba, “Musulubishe!”
Vikara kwa kukala P'ilato were anamala kufwahiza ro kundi ra at'u waambozera Baraba, gonya akiamuru Jesu apigwe vikotho, ndo akimulazha ende akasulubiwe.
Bai Jesu akihalwa ni shikari na machenda naye muryahu muhalani mwa nyumba ya luwali ambamo mumo ndo k'ambi ya jeshi, gonya makiaiha o andziyao osi.
Makihala riguwo ra rangi ya zambarau makimuvika, makitengeza kiremba cha miya makimuvika kitswani.
Gonya makikwatya kumuv̱udhya na kumulamusa makiamba, “K'una ut'u muheshimiwa muthawali wa Ayahudi!”
Kidza makimupiga kitswani na mudhath'a, makimutsuhira mahe, makidzihendesha kupiga mavindi na makizama mbereze hatha vidhangu zhao vikigut'a ts'i.
Marihokala madzamuv̱udhya zha kuthosha, mamuvula ro riguwo ra zambarau, makimuvika zo nguwoze kaheri, makimuthongozha kwendamusulubisha.
Marihokala makwendani, makimuthungana mut'u aifwaye Simoni Muk'irene ala mashambani, naye makimulazimisha autsukule wo musalaba wa Jesu. Yuyu Simoni nde babaye Alekizanda na Rufo.
H'aya ndoo vivi hatha makimufisha Jesu hat'u haifwaho Gologoth'a, ambaho manaye ni Ribeshe ra Kitswa.
Na haho bai makimup'a divai ya kutsanganywa na manemane anwe, ela Jesu akiikahala.
Marihogonya kumusulubisha, mahala zo nguwoze makizigazha kwa kuhenda kuzipigira k'ura maone ni h'ani andahala hiyo.
Wakathi manamusulubisha were ni saa t'ahu za madzach'a.
Ho dzulu za wo musalaba makihala kibao makindhika ro kosa mariromushithakira:
Na kidza makiasulubisha aivi airi hamwenga na Jesu, mumwenga mukono wa kurya, na mungine mukono wa kumots'o. [
Kahi za ngira ii go Maoro gakithimira garigoamba,
“Wathalwa jao mwenga na enye dambi.”]
Bai o at'u mariokira na haho arihosulubiwa Jesu, mamusholera, makithukusa vitswa zhao kikav̱udhye, makiamba, “H'aya, kw'aamba undaribanda ro Hekalu na uriake kwa siku t'ahu vino?
H'aya dziokole mwenye be vivi. Thima kula ho musalabani.”
Na o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria nao makimusholera dza vizho zha akizi a ngira. Makiamba, “Waokola at'u angine, ela vino k'adima kudzakola mwenye.

Vikara nahulole chamba ye Masihi muthawali wa Iziraeli, andathima kula ho musalabani. Akithima fundaona na fundamuamini.” Na o at'u airi mariosulubiwa hamwenga naye kidza nao mamusholera dza vizho zha o angine.
Bai bada ya Jesu kusulubiwa, ts'i yosi yagit'ana kiza kuandzira saa sitha muhadhi saa chenda.
Inafika saa chenda, Jesu akirira na sauthi bomu akiamba,
Ambazho manaye ni kuamba, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, mbona udzaniricha?”
Kusikira vizho angine kahi za ao at'u mariokala maimire haho makiamba, “Sirikizani, anamwiha Elija benwi!”
Ndo mumwenga wao akikot'a malo achendavwika buwa kahi za siki, akiridunga mudhath'ani akimup'a Jesu anyunye. Akiamba, “Richani hulole chamba Elija andakudzamuthinya.”
Jesu akipiga k'ululu na akimarigizika.
Na yo p'azia iriyokala kahi za ro Hekalu yapashuka ikigazhika p'ande mbiri, kula dzulu hatha ts'ini.
Ye mubomu wa shikari ariyekala aimire haho hehi naye, arihoona viryahu adzizhorira na kumarigizika akiamba, “Mut'u yuyu were ni Mwana wa Mulungu jeri.”
Na haho were hana anaache manavilolera kwa kure. Kahi za ao mariokala haho were ni Maryamu Magidalena, na Maryamu mameye Jakobu muthithe na Jose, na mwanamuche mungine aifwaye Salome.
Aa na anaache angine anji makala makimuthuwa na kumuhumikira Jesu arihokala ko Galilaya, nao mambuka na Jesu muhaka ko Jerusalemu.
Siku iyo were ni siku ya kuthayarishira Sabato. Vikara kabila dzuwa k'aridzatswa,

mut'u mumwenga ariyeifwa Josefu wa Arimath'ea wakwenda kwa P'ilato bila woga kwendaumala mwiri wa Jesu, akauzike. Josefu yuyu were anagofwewa ni ro Baraza rosi na kidza were anauthariza uthawali wa Mulungu.
P'ilato wamashwa ni zho zha kukala adzafwa kare. Kwa vizho akimwiha ye mubomu wa shikari akimuza chamba adzamarigizika kare.
Arihoambirwa ni ye shikari kukala ni jeri adzafwa, akimuruhusu Josefu ahale wo mwiri.

Josefu akigula ts'andza ya kitani, akiuthinya na akiulinga-linga iryahu ts'andza ya kitani na achendaulaza kahi za mbira iriyohenda kutsongwa iweni. Gonya akihala iwe bomu akiripingilisa rikifinikira wo mulomo wa yo mbira.
Maryamu Magidalena na Maryamu mameye Jose mahaona ho arihozikwa.
Vikara siku ya Sabato irihokala idzakira, Maryamu Magidalena, Salome na Maryamu mameye Jakobu machendagula mavumba kwamba makamumwagire.
Bai madzach'a maitsi siku ya kwandza ya wiki, dzuwa ririhokala ridzapashula ingu, machenda ko mbirani.

Mo ngirani makiuzana-uzana makiamba, “Ni h'ani andehupingilisira ro iwe kula ho mulomoni ha yo mbira?” Naro be were ni iwe bomu. Marihofika na kutsuha matso makiona kumbe rere ro iwe ridzagonya kare kupingiliswa k'anda.

Mo ngirani makiuzana-uzana makiamba, “Ni h'ani andehupingilisira ro iwe kula ho mulomoni ha yo mbira?” Naro be were ni iwe bomu. Marihofika na kutsuha matso makiona kumbe rere ro iwe ridzagonya kare kupingiliswa k'anda.
Bai machangira mo ndani ya mbira makiona muvulana akelesi luhande lwa mukono wa kurya na adzavala valo raruhe tse! Vikiangalaza kare.
Ela ye muvulana akiambira, “Visimwangalaze, amba munamumala Jesu wa Nazareth'i ariyesulubiwa, k'aho haha adzafufuka. Lolani, samba maulaza haha mino!
Vikara vivi uyani mukaambire o anafundzie haswa P'et'ero maneno gaga, ‘Andamuthangulia kwenda Galilaya, kuko ndiko mundikomona here arizhomwambira.’ ”
Kwa vizho machambola haraka zhomu mo mbirani kuno miri inaavina ut'u wa kwangalaza kwa wo woga. Makimbola malo genye. Ngira yosi k'amanenere na mut'u kwani woga were udzaadzala zhomu.
Arihokala adzafufuka yo siku ya kwandza ya wiki na madzach'a, bai kwandza kamare wamwambolera Maryamu Magidalena ariyekala wamwamboza p'ep'o afungahe ho nyuma-nyuma.
Naye Maryamu achendaambira aryahu mariokala osi, nao were madzadzalwa ni kigondzi na were manarira.
Marihomusikira Maryamu Magidalena anaamba Jesu a moyo hatha adzamona na dzitsore, k'amakuluhirire bule.
Kidza badaye waambolera lwazu anafundzi airi, naye umbore were ridzakala ringine. Ao mariombolerwa ni Jesu mere ma ngirani manenda mashambani.
Kuona vizho makiuya machendaambira o andziyao ela hatha vizho ao nao k'amakuluhirire.

Mwisho kamare akiambolera lwazu o anafundzi kumi na mumwenga, nao were makeresi makungizani riziki. Naye Jesu akiadumulira kwa kutsakuluhira kwao, na mioyo yao mikomu mana k'amaakuluhirire aryahu mariokala madzamona arihokala adzafufuka.
Akiambira, “H'aya bai endani kahi za urumwengu wosi mukauhubiri Uv̱oro Udzo wa Mulungu kwa at'u a kila samupuli.
Iye andiyekuluhira na kubat'izwa yundaokoka, na iye ariye k'andakuluhira yundahukumiwa.
Na ao makuluhirao mandagerwa miv̱ano ii ya wadimi. Kwa dzina rangu mandamboza p'ep'o na mandanena na luga nyingine.
Mandagwira nyoka na k'amandaaluma, na hatha makinwa ut'u wa kwalaga, k'amandafwa kamare, mandaaikira mikono akongo nao mandahola.”
Bai Bwana Jesu arihogonya kunena nao, akinulwa achenda dzulu mulunguni, akikelesi mukono wa kurya wa Mulungu.

Ndo o anafundzi machenda kila hat'u, kuhubiri Uv̱oro Udzo wa Mulungu, kuno Mulungu anahenda kazi hamwenga nao. Na lola ye Mulungu wahenda wo uv̱oro uonewe kukala ni wa jeri kwa kuagera wadimi wa kuhenda miujiza.]
Luke: Kwa muheshimiwa Th'eofilo. At'u anji majeza here madimazho kundhika garyahu maut'u ambago gahendeka kahikahi zehu.
At'u ao maora go hurigoambirwa ni ao mashudhia a maut'u gaga na mario pia were ni alimu a wo Uv̱oro.
Kwa vizho muheshimiwa Th'eofilo, kwa kukala mimi mwenye nami navichunguza zhosi na nikivithuwa t'ot'ot'o kula chaho, naona ni vidzo nami nikuorere t'ot'ot'o here maut'u garizhokala,
kwamba udime kumanya ujeri wosi wa maut'u urigofundishwa.

Bai wakathi muthawali Herode anathawala Judea, kwakala na mulombi ariyekala anaifwa Zakaria. Zakaria yuyu were anambola kahi za lukolo lwa kilombi lwa Abija. Muchewe were anaifwa Elizabeth'i kidza naye were anambola kahi za lukolo lwa kilombi lwa Haruni.
Osi airi, mut'u na muchewe were manaishi maisha ga kumufwahiza Mulungu, kidza were manazigwira amuri zosi na malagizo gosi ga Bwana hasiho kaila.
Ela ko were k'amana ahoho bule, kwani Elizabeth'i were ni t'asa, kidza visithoshe, osi airi were madzakala athumia jeri-jeri.
Vikara siku mwenga Zakaria were anaenderera na kaziye ya ulombi mumo kahi za ro Hekalu. Jaore kahi za maut'u ga ulombi were ndo ririro isani kahi za wakathi uwo,
Kwa vizho marihopiga k'ura
kulengana na adha rao, ikimugwerera Zakaria kwamba angire haryahu hat'u haeri kahi za ro Hekalu ra Bwana na afukize uvumba.
Vikara wakathi wa kufukiza uvumba urihofika, aryahu at'u angine osi makala manavoya ko ndze ya haryahu hat'u haeri.
Ndo hachambola malaika na akikala aungerere luhande lwa mukono wa kurya wa cho kijaja cha kufukizira uvumba.
K'uzhona zho Zakaria arihomona ye malaika wangalala na akikwatya kwadzalwa ni woga.
Kuona vizho, ye malaika akimwamba Zakaria, “Usogohe Zakaria! Kwani Mulungu adzasikira mavoyogo. Mucheo Elizabeth'i andakuzhalira muthana na undamwiha Johana.
Mwana yuyu andihozhalwa undahenda raha kidza undanyeth'a, na hatha anji angine mandahenda raha haho akizhalwa.
Kwani mwana yuyu andakala mut'u mubomu mbere za Bwana, kidza bai asinwe divai hedu kinywaji chochosi cha kurezha hatha vichache, na andadzala Roho Mweri hatha kabila k'adzazhalwa.
Mut'u yuyu andaahendya Aiziraeli anji mamuuyire Bwana Mulungu wao.

Kidza andamuthangulia Mulungu kahi za roho na nguvu here arizhokala Elija. Na lola andaahendya o ano biat'u madziomena ana ao, maahendze, na andaagaluza o at'u masiosikira makale na ulachu dza uryahu wa at'u enye hachi. Mut'u yuyu andamuthayarishira Mulungu at'u.”
Zakaria arihosikira vizho, akimuza ye malaika akiamba, “Ut'u uno be nindamanyadze ni wa jeri? Kwani mimi nidzakala muthumia na muchangu naye adzathumika.”
Ye malaika akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Mimi ni Gaburieli, nikalaye mbere za Mulungu kumuhumikira, nami nidzahumwa kwako nidze nikwambire uv̱oro uu udzo.

Ela ko udzawona uu uv̱oro wangu uriwo undathimira kwa wakathiwe kukala si wa jeri, na lola kwa kukala k'ugakuluhirire maneno gangu, be undafungika sauthi muhaka siku gandihothimira gaga nidzigokwambira.”
Wakathi uu o at'u mariokala manamuthariza Zakaria ambole madangana kwa viryahu arizhokala anatoa zhomu mo Hekaluni.

Bai arihombola akikala k'adima kunena nao bule, na o at'u marihoona vizho makimanya kare kukala suthi akale adzaona maono mo Hekaluni. Vikara kwa kukala were k'adima kunena wahenda kuap'a miv̱ano na yo mikonoye.
Zakaria waenderera kukala kahi za ro Hekalu muhaka zamuye ikigoma ndo akidziudzya kwakwe mudzini.
K'avitoere Elizabeth'i mukaza ye Zakaria akifunga mimba. Bai arihokala adzafunga mimba k'ambolere mo nyumbani hatha miezi mitsano pu.
Kidza akiamba, “Bwana adzanaviza kahi za ngira ii. Lola adzaniusira kusholerwa nirikokala nikisholerwa!”
Bai kahi za mwezi wa handahu wa mimba ya Elizabeth'i, Mulungu wamuhuma ye malaika Gaburieli muhaka mudzi mumwenga uifwao Nazareth'i kahi za jimbo ra Galilaya.
Mulungu wamuhuma ende kuko akalazhe uv̱oro kwa musichana mumwenga aifwaye Maryamu. Musichana yuyu were analolwa ni mut'u aifwaye Josefu, ariye were anambola kahi za lukolo lwa Daudi.
Kwa vizho ye malaika achenda kwa Maryamu na akiamba, “K'una ut'u? Mulungu a hamwenga nawe uwe, kidza adzakuhasa zhomu sana!”
Maryamu arihosikira maneno gago, wabudzyika mo moyoni mwakwe na akidziuza, “Ut'u uno be manaye ni noni?”
Ye malaika akimwamba, “Usogohe bule Maryamu, kwa kukala udzapata nema kwa Mulungu.
Na lola undafunga mimba na undazhala mwana mulume. Mwana yuyu undamup'a dzina umwihe Jesu.
Yuyu andakala mut'u mubomu kidza andaifwa Mwana wa Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi. Bwana Mulungu andamup'a kihi cha uthawali cha mukarewe Daudi.
Naye andakala muthawali wa Aiziraeli hatha kare na kare. Wo uthawaliwe be k'aundahenda mwisho bule.”
Kusikira vizho Maryamu akimwamba ye malaika, “Maut'u gano be gandakaladze, nami sidzakala na mulume?”

Ye malaika akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Roho Mweri andakudzirira, na kidza nguvu za Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi zindakufinikira dza here kivurivuri. Kwa ut'u uu bai, iye mwana andiyezhalwa andakala mueri, na andaifwa Mwana wa Mulungu.
Na lola yuyahu mumanyio Elizabeth'i naye andazhala mwana mulume idzaho adzakala muthumia. Ye ariyekala akiambwa ni t'asa, be lola vivi ana mimba ya miezi mihandahu,
mana k'akuna kisichodimikika kwa Mulungu.”
Kusikira vizho Maryamu akiamba, “Mimi ni muhumiki wa Mulungu, kwa vizho bai maut'u gaga naganikalire here udzizhoamba uwe.” Gonya ye malaika akimuhaukira ye Maryamu.
Bada ya gago, k'avitoere Maryamu achenda haraka kahi za kadzidzi kamwenga kariko kahi za mirima ya Judea.
Naye wakwenda hatha mudzini kwa Zakaria na achendamulamusa Elizabeth'i.
Iye Elizabeth'i arihosikira wo uvoro wa Maryamu thu, ye mwana mo ndanini akisumba zhomu zhenye na lola ye Elizabeth'i akidzalwa ni Roho Mweri.
K'uzhona zho Elizabeth'i akinena na sauthi bomu akimwamba Maryamu, “Uwe ndiwe udziyehaswa ni Mulungu kukira anaache osi na kidza adzahaswa iye mwana undiyemuzhala!
Ela be mino hatha be ni h'ani hatha ye mameye Bwana wangu anitsemberere?
Kwani lola nidzihosikira wo uvorowo thu, ye mwana mo ndanini mwangu adzasumba zhomu zhenye kwa fwahiro.
Bai haswa kwa kukala wakuluhira kukala go maneno arigokwambira ye Bwana gandathimira jeri.”
Ndo Maryamu akiamba,
“Moyo wangu unamulika Bwana.
Kidza roho yangu ina raha kwa ut'u wa Mulungu mwokoli wangu,
mana adzanionera mbazi
mimi muhumikiwe niriye hatha si chochosi!
Kwani lola kula vivi rero
vizhazi zhosi vindaniha mut'u nidziyehaswa,
kwa ut'u wa go maut'u mabomu ambago ye Mulungu mwadimi adzanihendera.
Dzinare iye ni rieri.
Naye ana mbazi kwa ao mario manamwagoha,
kula kahi za vizhazi zhosi.
Iye waugoloza wo mukonowe wa nguvu
na akiatsamula-tsamula o at'u madzionyao
hamwenga na go maazo gao garigo mo vitswani mwao.
Kidza waathinya athawali kula kahi za vihi zhao zha endzi,
na akianula at'u mario hatha k'amaonewa kit'u ni mut'u.
Waakusha o enye ndzala na vit'u vidzo-vidzo,
ela o mario ni mashaha akiauja kihuhu chenye.
Kidza iye vizho adzathimiza kilaganeche na akare ehu
na adzire aviza Aiziraeli, ahumikie.”
Kidza iye vizho adzathimiza kilaganeche na akare ehu
na adzire aviza Aiziraeli, ahumikie.”
Maryamu wakala na Elizabeth'i kuko kwa muda wa miezi mihahu vivi, ndo akiuya kwao mudzini.
Vikara wakathi urihofika wa ye Elizabeth'i kudzivugula, wahagwaga muthana.
Na lola majiranige na amanyie mafwahirwa naye marihosikira kukala Bwana adzamuonera mbazi nyinji na akamujalia Elizabeth'i mwana.
K'uzhona zho ye mutsanga arihofisha siku nane hakidza at'u kwamba mamwangize lwembeni, nao o at'u were madzapanga kumup'a dzina ra Zakaria ambaro ndo dzina ra babaye mwenye.
Ela ye mimut'u kusikira vizho akiamba, “Hatha bule! Dzinare yuyu andaifwa Johana.”
O at'u makimwamba, “Mbona kaheri, samba k'ahana mukwenu yoyosi aifwaye Johana?”
Ndo makiona baha mamuze ye bimut'u chamba angahendza ye mwana agerwe dzina rani. Kwa vizho makimuza kwa kuhenda kuhumira miv̱ano.
Bai ye bimut'u akilagiza agerwe kibao cha kuorera, na ye here kitai akiora vivi, “Dzinare nde Johana.” O at'u osi machangalala kamare.
Na haho henye sauthiye ikirichirwa na akikala anadima kunena kaheri, naye akimulika Mulungu.
O majirani ao osi makihondoka na lola kahi za mirima yosi ya Judea be were kila mut'u uv̱oro ni uu.
Kila mut'u ariyesikira uv̱oro uu wadziuza kimoyo-moyo na kuamba, “Muhoho yuno andakala muhoho wa samupuli yani?” Kwani were vi lwazu kamare kukala nguvu za Bwana zi hamwenga naye.
Gonya Zakaria, babaye Johana wadzalwa ni Roho Mweri na akinena maneno gaga ga Mulungu akiamba,
“Naalikwe Bwana Mulungu wa Iziraeli
kwa kukala iye wakudzaalola at'ue na kuakombola.
Kidza wahurehera mwokoli mwenye nguvu
wa kula kahi za lukolo lwa muhumikiwe Daudi.
Here arizholaga haho kapindi
kukirira na maneno gao o manabii a kwakwe aeri,
kwamba huthie kula kwa mahadhui ehu
na kula kwa at'u osi madziohumena.
Bai anaaonera mbazi o akare ehu
na kidza anathimiza kilaganeche kieri,
arichomulahira mukare wehu Burahemu
kukala andahuthizha kula kwa mahadhui ehu
kwamba hudime kumuhumikira hasiho woga.
arichomulahira mukare wehu Burahemu
kukala andahuthizha kula kwa mahadhui ehu
kwamba hudime kumuhumikira hasiho woga.
Kidza humuhumikire kahi za ngira
ambayo ni ya ueri na ya hachi mbereze
kahi za maisha gehu gosi.
“Na uwe mwanangu, bai undaifwa nabii wa Mulungu ariye dzulu ya zhosi kwani undamuthangulia Bwana kwamba umutengezere ngiraye,
na kidza uamanyise o at'u kukala Mulungu andaasamehe dambi zao na kwa ngira ii mandaokolwa.
Kwani Mulungu wehu ana mbazi nyinji na kukirira kwa zizo mbazize, dzuwa ra wokolwi rindahumbolera kula mulunguni.
Naro dzuwa riro rindaang'alira aryahu mario manaishi kizani na mario kahi za kivurivuri cha kifwa. Naro rindang'ala kwamba rilongoze nyayo zehu zizhoge kahi za ngira yendayo dherini.”
K'uzhona zho yuyahu muhoho akikula na akikala ana nguvu nyinji za kiroho. Lola mut'u yuyu wakala anatoa nyika muhaka uryahu wakathi wa kuambolera Aiziraeli lwazu-lwazu urihofika.
Kahi za siku zizo Kaisari Augusito ariye were ni muthawali wa Kirumi, wamboza amulo kukala at'u osini matoao kahi za ts'i yosi mathalwe.
(Kuthala at'u kuku were ndo kwa kwandza kamare kuhendeka. Bai kahi za uwo wakathi, Kurenio were ni luwali wa ts'i ya Siria.)
Kila mut'u wakwendadzindhikisha kahi za uwo mudzi ambolawo.

Ndo Josefu naye akiuka kula mudzi wa Nazareth'i uriwo kahi za jimbo ra Galilaya na akimbuka kwenda mudzi wa Beth'elehemu ambawo u kahi za jimbo ra Judea. Kuko Beth'elehemu were ndo kurikozhalwa muthawali Daudi, kwa vizho Josefu wakwenda kuko kwa kukala iye were anambola kahi za mbari iyo na lukolo lulo lwa Daudi.
Naye wakwendadzindhikisha na Maryamu ariye were andakala muchewe kwani were anamulola, kidza Maryamu wakathi uu were ana mimba.
Vikara marihokala ma kuko Beth'elehemu, wakathi wa kudzivugulakwe Maryamu ukifika,

na lola akidzivugula mwanawe wa kwandza, naye were ni muthana. Bai akimuhala ye mwana na akimufunga nguwo za kihoho na akimuhambalaza kahi za kidau cha kuririra ng'ombe. Vivi wavihenda kwa kukala were zo nyumba za kulala ajeni zi thele zosi.
Vikara kwereko na arisa kahi za luhande lwa ts'i iyo. Arisa aa were manarinda mifugo yao wakathi wa usiku ko urisani.
Ndo poo malaika wa Bwana akiambolera na kidza mulangaza wa Bwana ukiang'alira. Kuona vizho o arisa madzalwa ni woga jeri-jeri.
Ela ye malaika kuona vizho akiambira o arisa, “Musihondoke, lolani nidzamurehera Uv̱oro Udzo undioafwahiza sana at'u osi.
Kwani vivi rero kahi za mudzi wa Daudi mudzazhalirwa mwokoli wenu, naye nde Masihi Bwana.
Nanwi mundihokwenda, mundamumanya kwa muv̱ano uu: Mundamona mwana mutsanga adziyefungwa viguwo zha kihoho na adzalazwa kahi za kidau cha kuririra ng'ombe.”
Ndo haho henye hachambola kundi bomu ra malaika na makigwirana na yuyahu malaika mungine na makimulika Mulungu na kuamba,
“Nguma nayende kwa Mulungu ko dzulu,
na dheri narikale dhuniani kwa o at'u ario Mulungu anafwahirwa nao!”

Bai aryahu malaika marihoahaukira aryahu arisa na kuuya mulunguni, o arisa maambirana enye kwa enye makiamba, “At'u siswi nafwende ko Beth'elehemu fukachone cho kit'u fudzichombirwa ni Bwana kukala kidzahendeka.”
Kwa vizho makihenda haraka na makiuka machenda. Marihofika kuko makidengereka makimona Josefu na Maryamu na ko kadzanake katsanga. Nako were kadzalazwa kahi za kadau ka kuririra ng'ombe.
O arisa marihomona ye mwana, maambira at'u viryahu marizhokala madzambirizwa ni malaika dzulu za ye mwana.
Na lola kila ariyesikira zho marizhoamba o arisa wangalazwa ni wo uv̱oro wao.
Ela Maryamu ye arihosikira maut'u gaga wagaika moyoni na akikala anagaaza kwenda-kwenda.
