At'u mandambola mwambolero wa dzuwa, na mutserero wa dzuwa, na kwa vuri na kwa mwaka, madze makeresi chakuryani kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.
Nanwi lolani, hana at'u ambao ni a mwisho, mario mandakala a kwandza, na ao a kwandza mandakala a mwisho.”
Bai wakathi uwo-uwo vizho, Mafarisayo angine makudzamwambira Jesu, makiamba, “Hauke haha, na wende hat'u hohosi hangine, kwa kukala Herode anamala akwalage be vivi.”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Endani mukarambire ro kala kukala, ‘Ninamboza p'ep'o na kuhoza at'u vivi rero na machero, na indihofika siku ya hahu ndagonya kazi yangu.’
Ela hatha vizho suthi nienderere na charo changu vivi rero na machero na muhondo, kwa kukala k'azhadimikika nabii afwe hat'u hangine hohosi hasihokala Jerusalemu!”

Bai Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, akikwacha kuashikithikira at'u a Jerusalemu. Akiamba, “H'enwi at'u a Jerusalemu. Kazi yenu ni kualaga manabii na kuakot'a mawe ahumiki a Mulungu mahumwao kwenu. Ni mara nyingahi nidzizomala kumukundzumanya hamwenga here k'uk'u aafinikirazho anae na mahahage, ela mudzakahala?
Lolani mudzarichirwa enye nyumba yenu ikale gandzo. Nami namwambira kamare kukala, k'amundanona kaheri muhaka wakathi mundihokudzaamba, ‘Naahaswe iye adzaye kwa dzina ra Bwana.’ ”
Siku mwenga iriyokala ni Sabato, Jesu wakwendarya chakurya kahi za nyumba ya mut'u ariye were ni kahi za o abomu a Mafarisayo. Vikara o Mafarisayo makikala manamulola kala andahenda ut'u wani.
Na lola ho mbere za Jesu were hana mwanamulume ariyekala ana ukongo wa magulu na mikono kwadzala.
Jesu akiauza o alimu a Sheria na o Mafarisayo akiamba, “Vidze Sheria yehu inaruhusu kuhoza mut'u siku ya Sabato?”
O at'u hat'u ha kumudzigidzya o makimunyamalira zii. Kwa vizho Jesu akimugwira mukono ye mukongo akimuhoza gonya akimwamba ende mudzini.

Gonya Jesu akiagalukira o alimu a Sheria na Mafarisayo, akiauza akiamba, “Ni h'ani hano ariye anadima kuricha ndzowewe hedu ng'ombeye idziyogwa ndani ya kisima asiyamboze kwa kukala ni siku ya Sabato?”
Nao k'amapatire ra kumudzigidzya bule.
Jesu arihoona viryahu marizhokala o ajeni manawaniira vihi zha ishima ho chakuryani, waaadha kivivi,
“Mut'u akikusunga harusi, usende ukakelesi zho vihi zha ishima p'ore hakakala were hadzasungwa mut'u aishimiwaye kukira uwe,
kwani ye mwenye mudzi adziyemusunga anadima akadza akaamba, ‘Hedu ungarara umuhise yuyu cho kihi,’ nawe ugwirwe ni haya ukakeresi zho vihi zha ts'ini.

Ela bai usungwaho harusi, enda ukakeresi zho vihi zha ts'ini ili iye adziyekusunga akikona haho anadima kuamba, ‘Musena, hinde ukakeresi kahi za vihi vidzo zaidhi hedu.’ Na vivi vindakup'a ishima mbere za o ajeni andziyo osi.
Mana iye ahendzaye kudzanula andatserezwa, na iye adzitserezaye bai andanulwa.”

Gonya Jesu akimwamba ye mwenye mudzi, “Uikaho sherehe ya chakurya cha mutsana hedu cha dzulo, usiasunge asenao, hedu nduguzo, hedu mbarizo, hedu majiranio mashaha, kwa kukala ukihenda vizho, ao nao mandakusunga na vindakala ni here madziokuriha.
Ela uusaho sherehe, bai asunge at'u akiya, vidende, virema, na atsowi a matso.
Ukihenda vizho undahaswa haho wakathi at'u a Mulungu mandihofufulwa, kwani ao akiya, vidende, virema na atsowi a matso k'amadima kukuriha bule, ela Mulungu anadima kukuriha.”
Mumwenga kahi za ao mariokala haho arihosikira maneno gago wamwamba Jesu, “Be k'amana raha sana ao mandioirya yo sikuk'uu kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu!”
Ela Jesu akimwamba, “Kwereko na mut'u mumwenga ariyekala anamala kuusa sherehe bomu sana, naye akisunga at'u anji jeri-jeri.”
Bai wakathi irihokala yo haja i thayari kamare, yuyahu mut'u wahuma muhumikiwe akaambire o asungwa kukala maut'u be ga thayari.

Ela osi makimboza visingwa kukala k'amandadima kufika bule ko hajani. Ye wa kwandza akiamba, “Mut'u mimi dzagula hat'u na kwa zhozhosi suthi nende nikahalole, kwa vizho nashikithika sindadima kudza bule.”
Na wa hiri akiamba, “Mimi be dzagula ndzao kumi za kuhendera kazi hatha vivi unonazho be dzakala ninenda nikazijeze, kwa vizho nashikithika sindadima kudza bule.”
Na mungine ye akiamba, “Dzahala muche, kwa vizho ko kudza be ni vikomu.”

Ye muhumiki akiuya ko kwa bwanawe achendamwambira gosi marigo were o asungwa madzamwambira. Kusikira vizho, ye mwenye haja watsukirwa zhomu sana, akimwamba ye muhumikiwe, “Enda mara mwenga hatha kahi za wo mudzi na udze na o akiya, vidende, virema na hatha atsowi a matso mario kahi za barabara za wo mudzi na zho vigira-vigira kahi za go madzumba.”
Ye muhumiki akihenda vizho na arihouya akidzaamba, “Viryahu udzizhonihuma be dzavihenda, ela kuchere na nafasi.”
Bai ye mwenye yo sherehe akimwamba ye muhumiki, “Enda kuko mabarabarani na vigira zha magulu na ukaasitire at'u madze ili ii haja yangu idzale.
Kwani namwambira kamare k'ahana hatha mumwenga kahi za ao nirioasunga sherehe chaho andekudzathatha kiki chakurya changu.”
Na arihokala Jesu akwendani, kwereko na kundi bomu ra at'u ririro were rinamuthuwa. Bai Jesu akiagalukira na akiambira,
“Mut'u yoyosi ahendzaye kunithuwa mimi, suthi anihendze mimi kukira viryahu aahendzazho babaye na mameye, muchewe na anae, nduguze na hatha ye mwenye, ndo akale mwanafundzi wangu.
Na mut'u yoyosi ariye k'adima kuhala musalabawe na kunithuwa k'adima kukala mwanafundzi wangu.
Vidze, mumwenga wenu kala anamala kuaka munara, andaandza kuaka hasiho kukelesi na kugwaga kitswa amanye kala ana p'esa za kuthosha kuakira wo munara?
Kwani akidziakira hasiho kuaza anadima akakala k'andauivisha bule bada ya kuika wo musinji, na kila andekira na kuona zho virizho, andamutseka.
Kwani o at'u mandaamba, ‘H'aya, wadzihendesha kuaka vino zhamuremeza.’

Na muthawali endaho na shikari alifu kumi, kupiga k'ondo muthawali mwandziwe ariye ana shikari alifu mirongo miri, jeri wenye iye ni kukelesi kwandza akaoja kala anadima kumudhima ye mwandziwe na o shikari alifu kumi.
Akiona kukala k'andamwadima, bai andahuma athumia mende makamone ye muthawali kabila k'adzafika hehi, ili madime kurya amani.
Bai kahi za ngira iyo nanwi, k'ahana adimaye kukala mwanafundzi wangu, asihoandza kuricha maut'u gosi arigo nago.”
“Munyu ni mudzo, ela ukikala udzauya k'aukoza kaheri, k'ahana ngira idimayo kuuhendya ukakoza,
hatha virizho haho ni kutsufwa thu, kwa kukala k'auna faidha kwa wo mutsanga, hedu hatha kwa mbolea. Mwenye masikiro, naasikire.”
Vikara athozi a kodi na at'u angine anji mario k'amahendzwa ni at'u makala makidza makimusirikiza Jesu wakathi arihokala anafundisha.
Ela o Mafarisayo na alimu a Sheria makikwatya kunung'unika na kuamba, “Ii, mut'u yuno hatha anakaribisha at'u mario k'amahendzwa ni at'u na hatha anarya hamwenga nao!”
Jesu arihosikira gago waambozera fumbo akiamba,
“Vidze mumwenga wenu akikala ana ng'ondzi gana mwenga gonya angamize mwenga, nikuhendadze? Samba nikuziricha zo mirongo chenda na chenda, akendaidengereka yo idziyongamika hatha akayona.
Bai ayonaho nikuhenda raha zhomu, akayanula,
akenda nayo mudzini. Gonya akifika ko mudzini ni kuaiha asenae na majiranige madze hamwenga, naye ni kuambira, ‘Asena, nafusherehekee hosi mana yo ng'ondzi iriyongamika be nidzayona.’
Namwambira kahi za ngira iyo vizho, kundakala na fwahiro bomu kuko mulunguni, dzulu za mwenye dambi mumwenga adziyethubu, kukira dzulu za at'u ahachi mirongo chenda na chenda masiomala kuthubu.
“Kwani ni mwanamuche hiye adimaye kukala ana shilingi kumi za fedha
na angamize mwenga akatsailola? Mut'u iye andagwiza taa, gonya aishere yosi yo nyumba na aimale yo shilingi muhaka ayone.
Na ayonaho yo shilingi, ni kuaiha asenae na majiranige hamwenga na kuamba, ‘Lolani benwi iryahu shilingi iriyokala yangamika dzayona. Kwa vizho hatha ndzoni fusherehekee kwa iyo raha niriyo nayo.’
Na vizho ndo virizho hatha ko mulunguni, wakathi mwenye dambi adziuthaho na kuziricha dambize, be malaika a Mulungu ni kudzalwa ni fwahiro sana.”
Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Kwakala na mut'u mumwenga ariyekala na ana airi a kilume.
Yuyahu muvaha akimwamba babaye, ‘Baba hugazhire wo ufwa wehu.’ Kwa vizho ye bimut'u akihala yo mali akiagazhizha o anae.
K'avihalire siku nyinji yuyahu muvaha akihala yo mali yosi akiiguza. Thiye akiuka achenda. Wakwenda hatha ts'i ya kure na kwao, kuko achendanonga-nonga p'esaze zosi kwa kuishi maisha ga uzindzi.”
“Arihokala adzagonya kuzirya zosi zo p'esa, kukigwa ndzala bomu kahi za ts'i iyo. Naye akikala atsululu.
Kwa vizho achendagwirana na mut'u mumwenga wa ts'i iyo na achandhikwa kibaruwa cha kurisa nguluwe.
Naye were ana ndzala, hatha go makanda garigokala ganariwa ni o nguluwe akigamizira mahe. K'ahambolere mut'u ariyemup'a kaut'u kokosi ka kurya.
“Bai mwishowe arihokeresi na kudziuza akiamba, ‘Ni ahumiki angahi a baba maryao kutsuha, mino nalaha haha!
Mut'u mimi ndahauka haha nende kwa baba na nikamwambe vivi, “Baba, mimi namukosera Mulungu na nikikukosera uwe nawe.
Nadzona siv̱irya kamare kuifwa mwanao, kwa vizho nihendya here muhendzio wa kazi.” ’
“Gonya akiuka akikwatya kwenda kwa babaye. Bai arihokala achere kure na ho mudzini, babaye akimona na akidzalwa ni mbazi, akimudhana achendamudzagamira akimudonera.
Haho ndo ye mwana akimwambiriza babaye vivi, ‘Baba, mut'u mimi namukosera Mulungu na nikikukosera uwe nawe, kwa vizho siv̱irya kuifwa mwanao bule.’
Ela ye bimut'u akiaiha ahumikie akiamba, ‘H'aya hendani haraka, murehe nguwo mbidzo kahi za zosi mumuvike, gonya muhale p'ehe na virahu mumuvike.
Gonya kakihaleni kiryahu kidzao cha kunona mukitsindze fusherehekee.
Mana mwanangu yuyu were ni here ariyefwa vino adzauya moyo, kidza were ni here ariyengamika, vino adzaoneka.’ Nao makikwatya kusherehekea jeri-jeri.
“Ganakala gaga ye mukulu were a mundani, bai arihokala akuuyani anafika hehi na ho mudzini, anasirikiza vivi, akisikira londzo lwa ngoma na misindo ya at'u manavina.
Bai akiiha muhumiki mumwenga akimuza akiamba, ‘Kunani ko mudzini?’
Ye muhumiki akimudzigidzya akiamba, ‘Ye muvahao adzire, kwa vizho babayo adzamutsindzira kiryahu kidzao cha kunona mana adzamuhokera muzima.’
Kusikira vizho ye mukulu wa mut'u akitsukirwa vii-vii hatha akikahala kuhangira ho mudzini. Ndo babaye achendamungolangola,
ela ye mwana akidzigidzya akiamba, ‘Lola, miaka ii yosi nidzakuhumikira uwe dza here mutumwa, sidzabanda amuriyo hatha lumwenga, nawe k'udzanip'a hatha kabuzi nikausa sherehe na asenangu.
Ela mwanao yuyu, arenonga-nonga maliyo na malaya adzihokudza udzamutsindzira cho kidzao cha kunona.’
Ye bimut'u akimudzigidzya akimwamba, ‘Mwanangu, uwe siku zosi u haha nami, na kila kit'u changu ni chako hatha uwe.
Ela ni karakara kuusa sherehe na kuhenda raha mana nduguyo yuyu were ni here ariyefwa, ela vino adzauya moyo kaheri, were wangamika, ela vino adzaoneka.’ ”
Jesu akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, “Kwereko mut'u mumwenga ariyekala ni shaha naye were ana muimiriziwe wa kazi ariye were anaambwa kukala ananonga-nonga mali za thajiriwe.
Kwa vizho ye thajiriwe akimwiha akimuza akiamba, ‘Ni maut'u gani gano nisikirago dzuluzo? H'aya namala nimanye isabu yosi, kwani k'udima kukala muimirizi wangu kaheri.’
Ye muimirizi akiaza, ‘Mut'u mimi, yuyu thajiri wangu be andanifuta, be hatha ndahendadze? Sina nguvu za kugwira jembe, na kuvoya-voya be na haya nako.
Bai nindizhohenda navimanya, ili nifutwaho kazi kisha nikale na asena mandionikaribisha kwao midzini.’
Kwa vizho akiaiha o at'u osi mariokala manaiswa ni thajiriwe. Marihokudza akimuza ye wa kwandza akiamba, ‘Thajiri wangu anakwisa kiasi chani?’
Akiamba, ‘Ananisa madebe gana ga mafuha ga muzeituni.’ Ye muimirizi akimwamba, ‘H'aya hala ro karatasi rinyesaro dheniro. Keresi mara mwenga na uore madebe mirongo mitsano.’
Gonya akimugalukira ye wa hiri akimwamba, ‘H'aya we nawe unaiswa ut'u wani?’ Akiamba, ‘Magunia gana ga ngano.’ Ye muimirizi akimwamba, ‘H'aya hala yo risitiyo na uore magunia mirongo minane.’
Na bai ye thajiri akimulika ye muimirizi mujanja kwa kukala wahumira ujanja, kwani at'u a urumwengu uu ni alachu kala manahumikirana kukira at'u maumanyao ujeri.”
Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Bai namwambira dzimalireni asena kwa kuhumira ushaha wa haha urumwenguni, ili hatha wo ushaha ugomaho, mudime kukaribishwa kahi za mudzi wa kare na kare.
Mut'u ariye ni mwaminifu kwa maut'u machache, andakala mwaminifu hatha kwa maut'u mabomu na mut'u ariye ni mulongo kwa maut'u mathithe andakala mulongo hatha kwa maut'u mabomu.
Bai kala k'amudima kukala aaminifu kwa ushaha wa haha urumwenguni ni h'ani ye andiyemuikira ushaha wa jeri?
Na kala k'amudima kuaminika na kit'u cha mut'u, vidze ni h'ani andemukuluhira na amup'e vit'u virizho zhenu enye?

K'akuna muhumiki adimaye kuahendera kazi mathajiri airi. Kwani akihenda vizho, andamuhendza mumwenga ela ye mungine andamumena. Mumwenga andamuhendera kaziye t'ot'ot'o, ela ye mungine andamuv̱udhya. K'amudima kumuhumikira Mulungu na kuno munahumikira mali.”
Bai o Mafarisayo makigasikira gaga gosi na makimutseka, kwa kukala ao be were manahendza p'esa sana.

Jesu arihosikira vizho akiambira, “Ninwi ndinwi mudzihendeshao kukala mu at'u adzo mbere za at'u, ela Mulungu be anamanya virizho kahi za mioyo yenu, kwani kuhendza p'esa kunadima kuonekana kukala ni kit'u sana, ela ko mbere za Mulungu k'avimufwaha bule.

“Sheria ya Musa na Maoro ga manabii zhakalako na kidza vikihakira wakathi wa Johana Mubat'izaji. Bai kula wakathi uwo hatha vivi be Uv̱oro Udzo dzulu za uthawali wa Mulungu unaambirizwa at'u na kila mut'u anajeza zhadimikikazho awangire.
Ela ni rahisi mulunguni na ts'i kukira, kuriko kuhala hatha kadono kamwenga ka yo Sheria na kukausa.
“Kila amurichaye muchewe na kuhala muche mungine, hedu mut'u ahalaye muche wa kurihira, nikukala anazinga.”
Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Kwereko mut'u mumwenga ariyekala ni thajiri sana naye were avala nguwo za zambarau na za kitani safi. Chakuryache chere ni cha hali ya dzulu.
Ho muryangoni hakwe were ni kuikwa mukiya ariyeifwa Lazaro, naye were wo mwiriwe wosi ni vironda vihuhu.
Iye were a ho mulomoni th'amaaye ni kwamba arye go magande gandigogwa kula kahi za yo meza ya ye thajiri. Zho mbai were k'uro ni kudza na makamulamba-lamba zho virondazhe.
Bai yuyahu mukiya akidza akifwa, na malaika makimuhala na machendamwika lagani mwa Burahemu ko mulunguni. Yuyahu thajiri naye akifwa na akizikwa.
Bai arihokala ako kuzimu na anateseka, achanula matsoge na akimona Burahemu kwa kure, na Lazaro a ho hehi na ye Burahemu.
Bai akipiga k'ululu akiamba, ‘Baba Burahemu, nionera mbazi umuhume Lazaro athobe chalache kahi za madzi naadze anizizinye ludhimi lwangu kwa kukala ninalumira kahi za uu moho.’

Ela Burahemu akimudzigidzya akiamba, ‘Mwanangu, kumbukira kukala uwe kahi za maishago were una maut'u madzo-madzo, ela Lazaro ye akikala ana go mai-mai mahuhu, vivi vikara bai ye Lazaro ana raha nawe unateswa.
Hamwenga na vizho kahi za siswi na ninwi hana ridzina ribomu, ili ao mamalao kuthalala kula kuku kudza kwenu masidime, na ao a kuko nao masidime kuvuka na kudza kuku kwehu furiko.’
Ye thajiri akidzigidzya akiamba, ‘Baba Burahemu nakuvoya bai umuhume Lazaro ende ko mudzini kwehu
mana nina ndugu zangu atsano kuko, ende akaakanye kimbere ili masidze kahi za hat'u haha ha mateso.’
Burahemu akimudzigidzya akiamba, ‘Kuko kuna Musa na manabii, bai ni maasikize ao.’
Ye thajiri akiamba, ‘Hatha bule Baba Burahemu k'amandasikira bule muhaka mut'u ambole kula kuku kifwani aaendere ndo mandathubu.’
Burahemu akimudzigidzya akiamba, ‘Kala were k'amandaasikiza Musa na o manabii, be k'amandasikira hatha kukafufuka mut'u kula kifwani.’ ”
Gonya Jesu akiambira anafundzie akiamba, “Maut'u gahendago at'u makahenda dambi k'agana budhi kudza, ela andamanya mwenye iye agarehaye.
Mut'u dza iye ni baha afungwe lwalwa lwa singo atsufwe baharini, kuriko kumuhendya mumwenga wa aa athithe ahende dambi.
Kwa vizho at'u ninwi dzimanyirireni!
“Nduguyo akikuhendera dambi, muchemere na akiamba adzathubu musamehe.
Na hatha akikukosera k'ana fungahe yo siku mwenga, na kila akukoseraho adze kwako aambe, ‘Dzathubu, sindavihenda kaheri,’ bai vinakuv̱irya umusamehe.”
O ahumwi makimwamba Jesu, “Rihende kuluhiro rehu ringezeke.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Kala muna kuluhiro thithe renye here katembe ka haradali
be mungadima, kuwamba uu mukuyu, ‘Ng'oka na wende ukalayike ko baharini,’ na ukamusikira.”
Jesu akienderera kuamba, “K'udima kukala na muhumiki akurimani hedu anarisa ng'ondzi naye akidza kula ko mundani umwambe, ndzo vikara ukeresi urye chakurya.
Hatha! K'udima kuhenda vizho, hat'u ha vizho undamwamba, ‘Nigit'ira chakurya unambozeze nirye na kidza ninwe nindihogonya, h'aya nawe unadima kurya na ukanwa.’
Ye muhumiki k'adima kugerwa muv̱era kwa kuhenda here adzizholagizwa, hedu munaona ni kugerwa muv̱era ye?
Bai hatha ninwi muhendaho zhosi mudzizhombirwa mutengeze, ambani vivi, ‘Siswi hatha, fu ahumiki a kawaida thu, na fudzahenda garyahu gahuv̱iryago.’ ”
Vikikala Jesu arihokala akwendani ko Jerusalemu wakirira kahikahi za mihaka ya Samaria na Galilaya.
Naye were akwendani kahi za kadzidzi kamwenga, bai arihokala achere kwenda, akithunganana na at'u kumi mariokala mana mahana.
Bai o at'u makiima kure na makipiga londzo makiamba, “Jesu! We Bwana! Fuonere mbazi!”
Jesu arihoaona akiambira, “Endani hatha ko kwa alombi mukaambire mamulole kala mudzahola jeri.” Bai marihokala machere makwendani makihola
kare.
Bai mumwenga wao arihodziona kukala adzahola wauya kwa Jesu kuno anamulika Mulungu na mumiro mubomu.
Akidza, akidzadzigwaga ho mbere za Jesu kuno anamwambozera muv̱era na mut'u yuyu were si Muyahudi, ela were ni Musamaria.
Jesu akiamba, “O madziohozwa samba were ni kumi, vidze arya chenda ma hiko?
Yani k'ahaonekanire mut'u wakudzalazha muv̱era na kumulika Mulungu, hatha ni yuyu Musamaria h'akeye ambaye hatha si Muyahudi kamare?”
Bai Jesu akimwambira ye mut'u “Rungarara wende, kwani kuluhiroro ndo ridzirokuhendya uhole.”
Mafarisayo angine makimuza Jesu mamanye ni rini uthawali wa Mulungu undihokudza. Bai Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Wo uthawali wa Mulungu k'audza kwa ngira ambayo mut'u anadima kuwona na matso,
hedu hatha mut'u yoyosi kuamba, ‘Lolani si uno vino!’ hedu ‘Thiurya kurya!’ kwa kukala wo uthawali wa Mulungu u ndani mwenu.”
Gonya Jesu akiambira o anafundzie akiamba, “Wakathi unadza ambaho mundathamani muone angaa siku mwenga yaho kahi za siku za Mwana wa Mudamu, ela ko k'amundayona bule.
Ma kuko mandiomwamba ninwi, ‘Lolani thiyuya kurya!’ hedu ‘Thiyuno hano!’ ela musikiraho vizho musendeni, hedu hatha kuathuwa.
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu andihokudza andaonewa ni kila mut'u dza viryahu lumethe luonewazho lwazu-lwazu kila hat'u.
Ela kwandza ni suthi apate thabu nyinji na akahalwe ni at'u a kizhazi kiki.
Kudza kwa Mwana wa Mudamu kundakala dza zho virizhokala wakathi wa Nuhu.

Kwani siku zizo za Nuhu kabila v̱ula ya muretho k'aidzanya, at'u mathuwa kuishi here kawaida thu. Makala makirya na kunwa, na kuhala na kuhalwa hatha Nuhu achangira safinani. Gonya ndo uwo muretho ukidza ukialaga osi.
Na kidza vindakala dza vizho virizhokala wakathi wa Lutu. At'u osi mathuwa kurya na kunwa, kugula na kuguza vit'u, kurima na kuaka nyumba.
Ela siku Lutu arihombola Sodomu thu, be moho na baruthi vikihenda kunya here v̱ula kula mulunguni na vikialaga osi.
Bai vindakala dza vizho zhenye kahi za siku ya kunyeswa lwazu kwa Mwana wa Mudamu.
Siku iyo bai, mut'u andiyekala a dzulu za nyumba
asithime bule na kwendakolokothanya vit'uzhe virizho mo nyumbani, na pia mut'u andiyekala a mundani, ni asiuye bule ko mudzini kwendahala kit'u chochosi.
Munakumbukira zho zha kukala mukaza Lutu walola nyuma na akigaluka kisiki cha munyu?
Mut'u yoyosi amalaye kuthizha rohoye andayangamiza, ela kila andiyeyangamiza, andaithizha.
Usiku uwo gandihokala gaga, at'u airi mandakala marere kitanda kimwenga, bai mumwenga andahalwa na ye mungine arichwe.
Anaache airi mandakala manasaga, bai mumwenga andahalwa na ye mungine arichwe.
Ana alume airi mandakala ma mundani mumwenga andahalwa na mungine arichwe.”
O anafundzie makimuza makiamba, “Maut'u gano gandakala hiho?” Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hadzihogwa kimba, ndo nderi mathungananaho.”
Siku mwenga Jesu akiambira o anafundzie fumbo riri, ili aafundishe kukala manav̱irya kuvoya hasiho kutsoka.
Akiamba, “Kwakala kuna jaji mumwenga kahi za mudzi mumwenga ariyekala k'amwagoha Mulungu hedu hatha kujali at'u.
Na bai kahi za mudzi uryahu vizho kwere kuna mwanamuche gungu ariyekala achenda kwa yuyahu jaji kila siku na kumwamba, ‘K'unip'a hachi yangu dzulu za yuno hadhui yangu?’

Bai zhahala muda mure, jaji yuyahu k'endzi kuhenda here ye mwanamuche ahendzazho, ela mwisho akiaza mo moyoni, ‘Vingahokala simwogoha Mulungu hedu hatha kujali mut'u yoyosi, ela hatha vizho kwa kukala yuyu gungu ananibudzya, be ninamup'a hachiye, kwani nisihohenda vizho be k'andaricha kunidzirira na mwishowe andanitsosha!’ ”

Bai zhahala muda mure, jaji yuyahu k'endzi kuhenda here ye mwanamuche ahendzazho, ela mwisho akiaza mo moyoni, ‘Vingahokala simwogoha Mulungu hedu hatha kujali mut'u yoyosi, ela hatha vizho kwa kukala yuyu gungu ananibudzya, be ninamup'a hachiye, kwani nisihohenda vizho be k'andaricha kunidzirira na mwishowe andanitsosha!’ ”
Jesu akienderera kuamba, “Kala jaji asemogoha Mulungu anadima kutsoshwa dza vizho.
Vidze Mulungu andakosa kuap'a hachi at'ue mwenye, mamuririrao usiku na mutsana ili mapate wavizi? Vidze Mulungu andatoa kuaviza?
Namwambira kamare, iye andahakikisha kukala madzapata hachi yao kidza haraka. Ela hamwenga na vizho, vidze Mwana wa Mudamu adzaho hano dhuniani andaona kuluhiro jeri?”
Gonya Jesu akiambira fumbo riri ao madzionao kukala ni ahachi na enye kuav̱udhya at'u angine.
Jesu akiandza vivi, “Kwereko at'u alume airi mariokwenda kahi za ro Hekalu kuvoya Mulungu, bai kahi za ao airi, mumwenga were ni Farisayo na mungine ye were ni muthozi wa kodi.

Bai ye Farisayo akirungarara na akivoya voyo riri kimoyo-moyo akiamba, ‘Nakulazhira muv̱era Mulungu, kwa kukala mimi si dza here at'u angine, si munyang'anyi, si mulongo, kidza si muzindzi dza at'u angine marizho. Nakulazhira muv̱era kwa kukala si dza here riri rithozi ra kodi haha.
Mino kahi za wiki ndzima, nafunga siku mbiri, kidza ninakup'a sehemu ya kumi ya zhosi nipatazho.’

Ela ye muthozi wa kodi k'ahendere vizho, arizhohenda ni kwamba waima kure, na hatha ko kulola ko dzulu mulunguni zhamushinda. Wadzipiga makonde ga laga kwa ko kushononeka zhomu akiamba, ‘Nionera mbazi Mulungu, mimi ni mwenye dambi!’ ”

Jesu arihogonya kunena vizho, akiamba, “Jeri wenye namwambira, yuyu muthozi wa kodi be wakwenda kwakwe mudzini akikala adzahendywa muhachi ni Mulungu, ela ye Farisayo k'avikalire vizho bule, mana mut'u ahendzaye kudzanula, andatserezwa, ela mut'u adzitserezaye andanulwa.”
Vikara at'u mere manamurehera ahoho aagut'e. Ela o anafundzie marihoona vizho makiadumulira.
Ela Jesu arihoona vizho, akiaiha o ahoho na akiambira o anafundzie, “Aricheni o ahoho athithe madze kwangu, musiakahaze bule, mana wo uthawali wa Mulungu ni wa at'u dza vizho aa.
Namwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u ariye k'andauhokera uthawali wa Mulungu dza here muhoho muthithe, k'andawangira ng'o.”
Bai mut'u mungine ariyekala ni kilongozi wa Kiyahudi akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Mwalimu mudzo, nihendedze hatha niupate uzima wa kare na kare?”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Kwanoni unaniha mudzo? K'akuna mudzo asihokala Mulungu thu basi.”
Ela dzulu za swaliro, uwe unamanya malagizo ga Mulungu, “Usizinge, usalage, usiiye, usimboze ushahidhi wa ulongo, na aishimu babayo na mameyo.”
Ye kilongozi wa Kiyahudi arihosikira vizho akiamba, “Gaga gosi nagagwira hangu nichere muhoho.”

Jesu arihosikira gago akimwamba, “Uwe uchere unahungukirwa ni kit'u kimwenga, nacho ni kiki, guza zhosi urizho nazho, gonya uhale zo p'esa uagazhire akiya, nawe undakala na akiba ko mulunguni. Ukigonya vizho ndzo unithuwe.”
Bai ye mut'u arihosikira vizho, akidzalwa ni kigondzi, mana were ni shaha k'amuna.
Jesu akimulolat'o, gonya akiamba, “Ni vikomu zhomu kwa mashaha kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.
Kwani ni rahisi ngamira kukira kahi za t'undu ya shindano kuriko shaha kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.”
Bai o marihosikira vizho makiamba, “Hatha ni h'ani adimaye kuokoka be zho?”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Kisodimikika kwa mudamu, kwa Mulungu kinadimikika.”
P'et'ero akiamba, “Lola, fwaricha midzi yehu fukikuthuwa uwe.”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri, k'akuna mut'u ariyericha nyumba, muche, ndugu, azhazi, hedu ana kwa ut'u wa uthawali wa Mulungu,
ariye k'andarifwa. Andahokera k'ana nyinji zenye vivi kare, na kidza andapata uzima wa kare na kare kahi za urumwengu udzawo.”
Gonya Jesu akiavuha k'anda aryahu anafundzie kumi na airi akiambira, “Lolani vivi be funenda Jerusalemu. Na kuko, kila kit'u kirichoorwa ni o manabii dzulu za ye Mwana wa Mudamu be kindathimira.
Iye andalazhwa kwa o at'u mario si Ayahudi, nao mandamusholera, mamuv̱udhye, mamutsuhire mahe,
mamupige, gonya mamwalage, ela siku ya hahu andafufuka.
Maut'u gaga k'agaang'alirire bule o anafundzie. Yo mana ya kuamba vizho were idzafitswa, na hatha k'amamanyire ananena dzulu za kit'u chani.”
Bai Jesu arihokala a hehi na mudzi wa Jeriko, zhakala haho k'anda-k'anda ya ngira were hakelesi mwanamulume mumwenga kipofu ariyekala anavoya-voya.
Bai iye kipofu arihosikira ro duu na lo londzo-londzo lwa at'u mario were manakira wauza kala kunani.
Na o at'u makimwamba, “Ni Jesu wa Nazareth'i, anakira.”
Ye kipofu arihosikira vizho, akiluta mumiro akiamba, “Jesu Mwana wa Daudi, nionera mbazi!”
O at'u mariokala ko mbere makimudumulira makimwamba anyamale. Ela ye hatha akikaza kuluta mumiro akiamba, “Mwana wa Daudi, nionera mbazi!”
Jesu akiima na akilagiza ye kipofu arefwe. Bai arihokudza hehi Jesu akimuza akimwamba,
“Vidze unamala nikuhendereni?” Naye akidzigidzya akiamba, “Bwana, namala nione.”
Jesu akimwamba, “H'aya ona! Kuluhiroro ridzakuhendya uhole.”
Na haho henye, akikwacha kuona na akimuthuwa Jesu kuno anamulika Mulungu. Bai ro kundi ra at'u ririhoona vizho, ramulika Mulungu.
Jesu achangira mudzi wa Jeriko, naye akikala anakira kahikahi za wo mudzi.
Bai hakikala hana mut'u ariye were ni mubomu wa athozi a kodi dzinare were ni Zakayo, naye were ni shaha k'azhadimikika.
Naye were anamala kumona Jesu amanye chamba ni mut'u ariyedze, ela vikimushinda mana were ni mut'u mufuti mwenye na ro kundi ra at'u rere rinamuziya.
Kwa vizho akiuka malo achenda ko mbere, na achendakwera mukuyu ili adime kumona Jesu, kwani Jesu were andakira na ngira iyo.
Bai Jesu arihofika ho hat'u haho, walola dzulu na akimwamba Zakayo, “Zakayo, thima mara mwenga! Kwani vivi rero be suthi nikale mujenio.”
Kusikira vizho Zakayo wathima mara mwenga na akimuhala Jesu achenda naye kwakwe mudzini kuno ana raha ut'u wa kwangalaza.
Ela o at'u, ut'u uu k'auafwahirire bule, kwani makwatya kunung'unika na kuamba, “Mut'u yuyu adzakwenda ujeni kwa mut'u ariye be ni mudambi zhomu!”

K'uzhona zho Zakayo akiungarara na akimwamba Bwana vivi, “Lola Bwana! Kulaiza virero be nusu ya ushaha wangu nindaip'a akiya, na mut'u yoyosi niriyemukenga na nikimuthoza kiwango kibomu, be mut'u iye nindamuriha k'ana ne zenye ya zho nirizhomuhalira.”
Jesu akimwamba Zakayo, “Rero wokolwi udzangira kahi za nyumba ii, kwani yuyu naye ni wa lukolo lwa Burahemu.
Na Mwana wa Mudamu wakudza kuamala na kuakola aryahu mariongamika.”

Bai o at'u marihokala machere manaaza go maut'u gaga, Jesu waenderera kunena na akiambira fumbo, kwa kukala were Jesu a hehi na mudzi wa Jerusalemu na o at'u makiona kukala wo uthawali wa Mulungu be undahenda kuhenda poo.

Kwa vizho Jesu akikwatya kunena ro fumbo akiamba, “Kwereko na mut'u ariyekala wazhalwa kahi za nyumba ya kithajiri. Bai akiuka kwenda ts'i ya kure akagerwe cheo cha kukala muthawali, gonya auye kwao mudzini.
Bai kabila k'adzaandza charoche akiaiha ahumikie kumi na akiap'a kila mumwenga shilingi ya dhahabu,
na akiambira, ‘H'aya hendani biashara na zizi p'esa muhaka nindihouya.’
Ela bai aryahu at'u ambao were akiuya ni adze aathawale were k'amamwendzi bule, kwa vizho makihuma at'u makaambe, ‘K'afumwendzi akale muthawali wehu yuyu.’

“Ela hatha hamwenga na vizho yuyu mut'u wahendwa akale muthawali na gonya akiuya mudzini. Bai arihouya waaiha aryahu ahumikie arioap'a ziryahu p'esa ili amanye kala mazihendera kazi na zikireha faidha yani.
Bai ye wa kwandza akidza na akiamba, ‘Bwana iryahu shilingi ya dhahabu yareha faidha ya shilingi nyingine kumi za dhahabu.’

Bai ye mut'u ariyekwendahendywa muthawali akimwamba ye muhumiki, ‘Wahenda ut'u udzo sana, uwe u muhumiki mudzo! Bai kwa kukala wakala mwaminifu kwa maut'u mathithe, nindakuhendya ukale mubomu wa midzi kumi.’
Gonya ye wa hiri akidza, akiamba, ‘Bwana iryahu shilingi yo ya dhahabu yareha faidha ya shilingi nyingine ts'ano za dhahabu.’
Ye Bwanawe akimudzigidzya akimwamba, ‘Uwe nawe kala mubomu wa midzi mitsano.’
Kula iye akidza mungine, akiamba, ‘Bwana, shilingiyo ya dhahabu siino, naihala nikiifunga kithambaani na nikiifitsa.
Kwani were unanigoshera mana uwe u mut'u mukali, unahendza kuhala vit'u virizho si zhako, kidza unahendza kuvuna ut'u uriwo k'uulayire.’

Kusikira vizho ye bwanawe akimwamba, ‘Ii, muhumiki mui we! Nakupiga ulongo kwa ludhimilo mwenye. Uwe were unamanya kukala ni mwomu, nahendza kuhala vit'u virizho si zhangu, kidza nahendza kuvuna ut'u uriwo siulayire,
vikara kwanoni k'uihalire yo p'esa yangu na ukendayika bengi, ili nikiuya niyone idzazhala faidha?’
Arihogonya kunena vizho akiagalukira o at'u mariokala maimire haho na akiambira, ‘Hedu muhokeni yo shilingi ya dhahabu na mumup'e ye ariye na kumi.’
O at'u makimudzigidzya makiamba, ‘Aa, samba ye ana kumi kare Bwana?’
Ye Bwana akiamba, ‘Namwambira kamare, kila ariye nacho, andagerwa, ela iye ariye k'ana kit'u, andahokwa hatha cho aricho nacho.
Na vikara dzulu za aryahu mahadhui angu mariokala k'amendzi nikale muthawali wao, namala muarehe haha na mualage nalolera.’ ”
Jesu arihogonya kunena vivi wathangulia kumbuka kwenda Jerusalemu.
Bai achenda hatha arihokala a hehi na kadzidzi ka Beth'ifage na ka Beth'ania kahi za Murima uifwao wa Mizeituni, akiahuma anafundzie airi mathangulie,
naye waahuma na malagizo gaga, “Endani hatha kadzidzi mudzikoerekezana nako. Muchangira mundaona mwana wa ndzowe ariye k'adzapandwa ni mut'u adzafungwa, muvuguleni mumurehe haha.
Mut'u yoyosi andiyemuza kwanoni munamuvugula, mwambeni, ‘Bwana ana haja naye.’ ”
Kwa vizho aryahu mariohumwa machenda na marihofika kila kit'u kikikala here arizhokala Jesu adzaambira.
Bai marihokala manamuvugula ye mwana wa ndzowe, hakimbola o enye makiamba, “Mbona munamuvugula ye mwana wa ndzowe kaheri?”
O anafundzi makidzigidzya makiamba, “Bwana ana haja naye.”
Bai makimureha kwa Jesu, makihala go maamba gao makigahandika ho dzulu za ye mwana wa ndzowe, gonya makimukweza Jesu ho dzulu.
Vikara arihokala akwendani, o at'u mahala maamba gao makigahandika mo ngirani.
Bai arihokala adzafika hehi mutharamuko wa Murima wa Mizeituni, ro kundi rosi ra anafundzie rikikwatya kumulika Mulungu kwa sauthi bomu kuno mana fwahiro kwa yo miujiza mariyokala mayona.
Makiamba,
“Naalikwe iye muthawali adzaye kahi za dzina ra Bwana!
Dheri narikale ko mulunguni,
na nguma yende kwa Mulungu ariye dzulu!”
Bai Mafarisayo angine kahi za ro kundi makimwamba Jesu vivi, “Mwalimu ambire o anafundzio manyamale hedu!”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ao makinyamala, be namwambira kamare gaga mawe gandapiga londzo kare.”
Vikara Jesu arihofika hehi na wo mudzi, na arihoulola ho mbereze, warira kwa ut'u wa o at'ue.
Akiamba, “Kala munamanya vivi rero virizho vingamurehera dheri! Ela bai k'amudima kuzhona,
kwa kukala siku zinadza, adhui enu mandamuzingira na kumuziza musipate hat'u ha kumbolera.
Nao mandamunonga-nonga kamare hamwenga na wo mudzi wenu. K'ahana iwe ririro k'arindapetulwa, kwa kukala k'amumanyire ho Mulungu arihomudzirira.”
Gonya Jesu achenda kahi za ro Hekalu na achendaainga o at'u osi mariokala managuza vit'u mumo.
Akiambira, “Zhaorwa kukala, ‘Nyumba yangu indakala nyumba ya mavoyo,’ ela ninwi mudzaihendya p'anga ya kuzama aivi.”
Bada ya gago Jesu akiandza kufundisha kahi za ro Hekalu kila siku. Bai o alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria na vilongozi a o at'u makikala manamala kumwalaga,
ela makikosa ngira ya kumwalagira, kwani o at'u osi were manamusirikizat'o sana hasiho kukirwa ni neno hatha mwenga.
Siku mwenga Jesu were anafundisha at'u kahi za ro Hekalu na kuhubiri Uv̱oro Udzo. Alombi abomu, na alimu a Sheria, na athumia a Kiyahudi makidza.
Makimwamba, “Fambire hedu, gano maut'u gano unagahenda kwa wadimi wani? Na ni h'ani ariyekup'a wadimi uno?”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha mimi nindamuza swali, nambirani hedu,
Vidze wo wadimi ariohumira Johana Mubat'izaji kubat'izira at'u, wala kwa Mulungu hedu wala kwa anadamu?”
O alombi abomu na o athumia makiojana makiamba, “Fukiamba wala kwa Mulungu, andafuza, ‘Kwanoni k'amumukuluhirire?’
Na hukiamba, ‘Wala kwa anadamu,’ aa at'u osi mandahupiga mawe kwani manaamini kukala Johana were ni nabii.”
Kwa vizho makimudzigidzya Jesu makiamba k'amamanya ko urikolaa.
Jesu akiambira, “Hatha mimi nami sindamwambira wo wadimi nihumirao kuhendera maut'u gaga.”

Jesu akienderera na akiambira o at'u fumbo riri, akiamba, “Kwereko na mut'u ariyelaya munda wa mizabibu, gonya akiukodishira ak'urima angine, ye mwenye achenda ts'i nyingine achendakala kuko kwa muda mure.
Makathi ga mavuno garihofika, akihuma muhumikiwe ende kwa aryahu ak'urima, akagerwe fungu ra zo zabibu. Ela aryahu ak'urima makimupiga, makimuja kihuhu.
Kuona vizho ye mwenye munda akihuma muhumiki mungine, ela iye naye makimupiga, makimuhendera makuruhu, gonya makimudzya kihuhu.
Ye mwenye munda akimuhuma muhumikiwe wa hahu, ela o ak'urima makimwangiza ranga gonya makimwamboza mo mundani, makimugwaga ko ndze.
Kusikira vizho ye mwenye munda akiaza, ‘Mut'u mino be hatha ndahendadze vino? Nindizhohenda ni vivi, nindamuhuma ye mwanangu nimuhendzaye, hangine nikwenda makamuishimu.’
Ela o ak'urima marihomona ye mwana akudzani makiambirana, ‘Yuno be hatha se andiyeuhala ufwa uno munda? Alume nahumwalage yuyu, ili uu munda ukale wehu.’
Kwa vizho makimugwira makimwamboza ndze ya wo munda makimwalaga. Vidze yuya mwenye munda andaahendadze arya ak'urima?
Ut'u andiouhenda ni kwamba andakudzaalaga aryahu ak'urima, gonya wo munda aap'e at'u angine.” Bai o at'u marihosikira vivi makiamba, “Hatha! K'avindakala bule vizho.”
Kusikira vizho Jesu akialolat'o gonya akiauza akiamba, “Vidze go Maoro gaambago, ‘Ro iwe ririrokahalwa ni aaki vivi be ridzagaluka ndo iwe bomu ra p'embe,’ manaye ni noni?
Kila mut'u andiyerigwerera iwe riro, andabandika-bandika, ela mut'u yoyosi rindiyemugwerera rindamusaga tikitiki.”
Bai saa iyo kare o alimu a Sheria, na alombi abomu makijeza kumwangiza Jesu mikononi, mana mamanya kukala fumbo riro were ridzanenwa kwao ao, ela makigoha o at'u.

Kwa vizho makikala manalola madime kupata mwanya mudzo. Bai makiahuma at'u madzihendeshe kukala k'amana malengo mai, na were th'amaa yao ni kwamba Jesu andanena ut'u undiomuhendya agwirwe na angizwe mikononi mwa ye luwali wa Kirumi.

Kwa vizho o at'u mariokala manahenda kudzihendesha makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Mwalimu, hunamanya kukala gago unenago na kufundisha be ni ga karakara, kidza k'una upendheleo, ela unafundisha ngira ya Mulungu jeri.
Vikara fwambire. Kulazha kodi kwa Kaisari kwehu sino, ni karakara hedu si karakara?”
Jesu akiwona kare wo ulachu wao na akiambira,
“Hedu nanyesani yo p'esa.” Arihonyeswa akiuza, “Vidze ino sura iriyo hano na ro dzina ni zha h'ani?” Nao makidzigidzya makiamba, “Ni zha Kaisari.”
Jesu akiambira, “H'aya bai, zha Kaisari, mup'eni Kaisari mwenye, na zha Mulungu, mup'eni Mulungu.”
Na kwa ut'u uwo makishindwa ni kuona makosa gogosi kahi za gago arigonena mbere za at'u, kwani jibu ra Jesu raangalaza hatha makinyamala zii.
At'u angine maifwao Masadukayo ambao manaamba kukala k'akuna kufufuka makudza kwa Jesu na swali,
makiamba, “Mwalimu, Musa wafuorera kukala, mut'u akifwererwa ni nduguye, na asiye ye muche kare bila ahoho, ye nduguye mut'u ni amuhale ufwa ili amuzhalire ahoho ye mufwadzi.
Vikara kwereko na at'u alume afungahe mario were ni ndugu mwenga, bai ye muzhere akihala muche naye akifwa na akimusia ye muche hasiho kuzhala naye ahoho.
Kwa vizho ye wa hiri akimuhala ufwa ye muche.
Badaye akihalwa ni ye wa hahu, ela osi afungahe mafwa bila kusiya ahoho.
Mwisho ye muche naye akiathuwa.
Vikara at'u mandihofufuka, ye mwanamuche andakala mukaza h'ani? Kwani o ndugu osi mamuhala.”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Kuhala na kuhalwa ni kwa at'u haha urumwenguni.
Ela bai o at'u mandioonewa kukala manav̱irya kufufulwa kahi za yo siku ya mwisho na kutoa kahi za urumwengu udzawo, k'amandahala hedu kuhalwa.
Kwani mandakala karakara na malaika, k'amandafwa bule ao ni ana a Mulungu kwa kukala madzahenda kufufulwa.

Kwani hatha Musa naye ananena lwazu kamare kukala at'u mandafufulwa, kahi za haryahu arihondhika dzulu za kiryahu kitsakuzi kirichokala kinaaka, anamwiha ye Mulungu, Mulungu wa Burahemu, na Isaka, na Jakobu.
Mana Mulungu ni Mulungu wa at'u mario moyo, si wa at'u mariofwa. Kwa vizho at'u aa ma moyo kwa kukala kwakwe ye Mulungu be at'u osi ma moyo.”
Alimu a Sheria angine mariokala haho marihosikira jibu ra Jesu makiamba, “Udzadzigidzyat'o kamare mwalimu.”
Bada ya vizho k'ahana mut'u ariyedzisikira kumuza Jesu swali kaheri.
Gonya Jesu akiamba, “Vinadimikikadze at'u kuamba kukala ye Masihi ni Mwana wa Daudi?
Kwani hatha ye Daudi mwenye waora kahi za chuwo cha Zaburi vivi,
‘Bwana Mulungu wamwamba Bwana wangu,
“Keresi mukono wangu wa kurya
muhaka mahadhuio niathambaraze kamare
ts'ini za magulugo.” ’
H'aya vikikala Daudi mwenye anamwiha ‘Bwana,’ anadimadze kukala ni mwanawe?”
Vikara marihokala at'u osini madzahega sikiro kumusirikiza, Jesu waagalukira o anafundzie na akiambira,

“Dzimanyirireni na o alimu a Sheria ambao manafwahizwa ni kutsembera kuno madzavala miguwo mire, na kidza manafwahizwa ni kulamuswa na ishima mo masokoni na mana ngwiri na vihi zha ishima mo kahi za masinagogi. Na lola mendaho kahi za nyumba, be manahendza kwendakeresi zho vihi zha ishima.
H'aya visithoshe, ao vizho manaahoka ache magungu vit'u zhao, na kudzihendesha adzo kwa kuvoya mavoyo mare-mare. Adhabu yao indakala k'ali zaidhi.”
Vikara Jesu were a mo kahi za Hekalu akilola kuku na kuku na akiona at'u mario were ni mathajiri managwaga sadaka zao kahi za cho kiya cha sadaka.
K'avitoere akimona mwanamuche ariye were ni gungu kidza mukiya anagwaga vipeni viri.
Jesu arihoona vizho akiambira o at'u akiamba, “Namwambira ujeri, yuyu mwanamuche gungu adzagwaga nyinji kukira osi,
mana o angine madzamboza kafungu thu ka wo ushaha mario nao, ela yuno ye ni masikini nyasi, ela adzagwaga zhosi arizho nazho.”

Badaye angine kahi za o anafundzie makikala manasumurira viryahu ambazho ro Hekalu raakwa t'ot'ot'o na viryahu garizho madzo go mawe garigoakirwa na viryahu virizho vidzo zho vit'u virizhombozwa here sadaka kahi za ro Hekalu. Jesu arihosikira vizho akiadzigidzya akiamba,
“Munazhona zho, wakathi unadza ambawo k'ahandasala iwe dzulu za iwe, kila kit'u kindabandwa-bandwa.”
O anafundzi marihosikira vizho makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Vidze maut'u gano gandahendeka rini? Ni muv̱ano wani undiwonyesa kukala makathi gadzafika ga maut'u gaga kuhendeka?”

Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Dzimanyirireni hasidze mut'u akamukenga. Kwani at'u anji mandakudza kwa dzina rangu, na mandadziamba ao ndo iye Masihi, kidza mandaamba, ‘Wo wakathi be udzafika.’ Ela hatha mandihonena vizho, siakuluhireni bule.
Na mundihosikira uv̱oro wa viha na fujo, sogoheni, kwani ni hatha gakale gago, ela wo mwisho undakala uchere mbere.”
Gonya Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Kabila rindauka kupigana na kabila ringine. Uthawali undapigana na uthawali mungine.
Ts'i indathethema ut'u wa kwangalaza, na kundakala na ndzala na mapigo ga makongo kila hat'u. Kundahendeka maut'u ga kwagosha-gosha na ga kitai-kitai ko mulunguni.
Ela kabila maut'u gaga k'agadzahendeka, at'u mandamugwira na mamutese. Mandamuhirika kahi za masinagogi na kumwangiza jela. Mandamuhirika mbere za athawali na maluwali kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu.
Na iyo indakala ni nafasi kwenu ninwi ya kumboza ushuhuda dzulu zangu.
Musikale na wasiwasi dzulu za zho mundizhoadzigidzya.
Kwani mimi nindamuhendya mudzigidzye kuhumira maneno gandigoahendya o mahadhui enu makose ut'u wowosi wa kumwamba zho mudzizhonena sozho.
Nanwi mundalazhwa hatha ni azhazi enu enye, na ndugu zenu na amanyi enu na hatha asena enu enye, na angine kahi zenu mandalagwa.
Visithoshe, mundamenwa ni kila mut'u kamare kwa ut'u wa dzina rangu.
Ela hamwenga na vizho, mundakala na urindzi munji na hatha ludzere lumwenga lwenye k'alundatoka bule.
Kwa vizho mukienderera kukuluhira mundathizha roho zenu.”
“Kidza mundihoona shikari anji madzauzingira wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu, be manyani kukala wakathiwe wa kunongwa-nongwa be udzafika hehi jeri-jeri.

Vikara wakathi uwo undihofika, at'u mandiokala Judea namachimbirire ko mirimani, na ao mandiokala kahi za wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu suthi mawambole kare. Na ao mandiokala ma mashambani ni masiwangire bule wo mudzi,
kwa kukala siku zizo at'u mandaadhibiwa here Maoro gaambazho.

Wakathi uwo vindakala vii-vii zaidhi kwa ano m'ama mandiokala mana mimba na mandiokala manaamwisa. Kwani be kundakala na mashaka ga kwangalaza kahi za ts'i na k'oro zosi za Mulungu zindakala dzulu za at'u aa.

Angine mandalagwa kwa kuthemwa-themwa mishu, na angine o mandagwirwa mahalwe mateka mende kahi za kila kabila ra at'u. Na wo mudzi wa Jerusalemu nawo, undakudzazhogwa-zhogwa ni at'u mario si Ayahudi, muhadhi wakathi wao wa kuthawala ugome.

“Kidza ro dzuwa na wo mwezi na zo nyenyezi, zhosi vindathimwa ni maut'u ga kitai-kitai. Hano ho ts'i ho, ts'i zindakala zingelele kwani zindagoshezhwa ni kururuma kwa bahari na kupiga kwa maimbi mabomu.
Na lolani, at'u mandangirwa ni woga hatha magwe mazime mioyo. K'amandamanya ni ut'u wani udzirirao urumwengu, mana nguvu za dzulu mulunguni zindathukuswa.
Ndo haho mandamona Mwana wa Mudamu akudzani kahi za ingu, hamwenga na nguvu nyinji na nguma.
H'aya bai maut'u gaga gandihoandza kuhendeka, be sogoheni, at'u ninwi rungararani na mulole ko dzulu na th'amaa mana wakathi wa Mulungu kumukombola undakala udzafika hehi!”
Jesu akienderera kunena na akiambozera fumbo riri. Akiamba, “Lolani mutini hedu na hatha mihi yosi mingine.
Wakathi imbozaho makodza, ni kukala ninwi enye munamanya kamare wakathi wa mavuno udzafika hehi.
Kwa vizho ninwi nanwi, mukiona maut'u gaga gosi, manyani kukala uthawali wa Mulungu u hehi.
“Nami namwambira kamare, kizhazi kiki k'akindakira kabila maut'u gaga gosi kuhendeka.
Mulunguni na ts'i, zhosi vindahenda mwisho, ela maneno gangu k'agana mwisho bule.”

“Nanwi dzimanyirireni, musihale wakathi wenu mukauhenda wa kurya na kunwa kukira muhaka, hedu hatha kudzishuhulisha zhomu na maut'u ga haha dhuniani, kwani mukihenda vizho, be iyo siku inadima ikahenda kumudulukiza na kumugwira here muhambo.
Kwani siku iyo be indaadzirira at'u osini matoao kahi za urumwengu muzima.
Kwa vizho bai kalani matso na muvoye ili mupate nguvu za kugakirira maut'u gaga gandihohendeka, kidza mudime kuima mbere za ye Mwana wa Mudamu.”
Jesu were akaafundisha at'u mutsana kahi za ro Hekalu siku zizo, na dzulo richangira were akawombola wo mudzi na kwendakala kut'u kuifwako Murima wa Mizeituni na kuukiza wo usiku kuko.
Na o at'u nao were makarauka kwenda kahi za ro Hekalu kila siku kumusirikiza Jesu.
Vikara wakathi wa sikuk'uu ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u ambayo pia inaifwa P'asaka were udzafika hehi.
K'uzhona bai o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria makikala manamala mwanya wa kumwalagira Jesu kisiri kwani were ni aoga na at'u.
Ndo Shethani akimwangira-ngira Juda Isikariote ariye were ni mumwenga wa o anafundzi kumi na airi a Jesu.
Naye Juda wakwenda vivii muhaka kwa alombi abomu na abomu a arindzi a ro Hekalu na achendapanga nao viryahu angazhodima kumusaliti Jesu kwao.
Bai marihosikira vizho mafwahirwa hatha makilagana naye kumup'a p'esa.
Juda akikubali na akiandza kumala nafasi mbidzo ya kumusalitira Jesu hasiho kukala na kundi rorosi ra at'u.
Ndo yo siku ya Mikahe Iso Ts'ats'u ikifika ambayo pia ndo siku ya kutsindza ng'ondzi za sikuk'uu ya P'asaka.
Ndo Jesu akimuhuma P'et'ero na Johana akiamba, “Endani hedu mukahuthayarishire viryahu hundizhorya ii sikuk'uu ya P'asaka.”
P'et'ero na Johana marihosikira vivi makimuza Jesu makiamba, “Vidze, unahendza fukakuthayarishire hiko?”
Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Endani vivi hatha muchangira wo mudzi thu mundaona mwanamulume adzatsukula muthanga wa madzi, bai mundihomona muthuweni nyuma muhaka yo nyumba andiyongira.
Mundihokala mudzangira mo nyumbani, muzeni ye mwenye nyumba muambe, ‘Mwalimu adzaamba, cho chumba cha ajeni ambacho iye na anafundzie mandarya sikuk'uu ya P'asaka ni hicho?’
Andihosikira vizho andamwanyesa chumba kibomu cha gorofani kiricho kina kila kit'u. Bai mukichona kwatyani kupanga-panga mumo.”
Kwa vizho o anafundzi makiuka na makikwatya kwenda, nao makiona zho arizho were Jesu adzaamba zhenye. Ndo makipanga-panga kwa ut'u wa yo sikuk'uu ya P'asaka.
Bai wakathi urihofika, Jesu wakwendakelesi hamwenga na o ahumwie kurya chakurya.
Kidza Jesu akiambira, “Mut'u mimi were na thamani zhomu kurya sikuk'uu ya P'asaka hamwenga nanwi kabila sidzaandza kupata mateso!
Kwani namwambira kamare sindaithatha kaheri ii sikuk'uu muhaka indihopata manaye kamare-kamare kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.”
Gonya Jesu akihala cho kikombe cha divai achamboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu na akiambira o ahumwie akiamba, “H'aya halani mutsumbulirane.
Nami namwambira ujeri, sindanwa kaheri divai muhaka uthawali wa Mulungu undihokudza.”
Arihogonya vizho akihala mukahe, akimboza muv̱era, gonya akiumogola-mogola na akiagolozeza akiamba, “Uu ndo mwiri wangu [umbozwao kwa ut'u wenu, kalani mukiurya kwa kunikumbukira mimi.”
Bai marihogonya kurya, akihala cho kikombe cha divai akiap'a, akiamba, “Kikombe kiki ndo kilagane kisha kidzichoikwa kwa milatso yangu ambayo indamwagwa kwa ut'u wenu.]
Ela lolani bai iye mut'u anisalitiye be yu haha, na hatha ninarya naye.
Kwani Mwana wa Mudamu andalagwa karakara na ahendzazho Mulungu, ela shauriye iye mut'u amusalitiye.”
O anafundzie marihosikira vizho makikwatya kuuzana-uzana o enye kwa enye mamanye chamba ni h'ani andiyehenda ut'u dza uwo.
Kidza hakimbola k'anani kahi za o anafundzi dzulu za ni h'ani kahi zao anahalirwa dza here mubomu wao.
Ndo Jesu akiambira kukala, “Athawali a at'u mario si Ayahudi mathawala at'u ao na ukali, kidza o vilongozi ao manaifwa, ‘Aheshimiwa.’
Ela ninwi bai ni musikale dza ao bule. Hat'uhe, iye ariye ni mubomu kahi zenu suthi akale muthithe wa osi. Kidza iye kilongozi suthi akale dza here muhumiki.

Vidze ariye mubomu kahi za ano at'u airi ni hiye? Vidze ni yuyahu akelesiye akambozerwa chakurya hedu ni iye mwambozi wa chakurya? Samba ni iye akelesiye na akambozerwa. Ela mimi bai ni dza here mut'u ahumikaye kahi zenu.
Ninwi ndinwi mudzioenderera kukala hamwenga nami kahi za majezo nigapatago.
Nanwi namup'a wo uthawali dza here Baba arizhonip'a.
Ninwi mundarya na munwe kahi za meza yangu kahi za uthawali wangu na kidza mundakelesi kahi za vihi zha endzi na muhukumu zo kabila kumi na mbiri za Iziraeli.”
Kidza Jesu akiamba, “Simoni, Simoni! Lola Shethani adzamumala ili amuhehet'e dza here mut'u ahehet'azho ngano.
Ela hamwenga na vizho mimi nidzakuvoyera vivi Simoni kwamba uenderere kukuluhira. Kidza bai undihoniuyira mimi, hakikisha kukala udzaangiza nguvu o nduguzo.”
Simoni arihosikira vizho akidzigidzya akiamba, “Bwana, mut'u mimi ni thayari fukafungwe hosi hedu hatha nalagwe hamwenga nawe.”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Nakwambira ujeri P'et'ero, undanikana k'ana t'ahu kabila jogolo k'aridzaika usiku wa rero, na undaamba kukala k'unimanya bule.”

Gonya Jesu akiagalukira o anafundzie akiauza akiamba, “Munakumbukira harya nirihomuhuma na nikimwamba, musitsukule p'esa, hedu mukoba hedu hatha virahu zhenye? Vidze murihohendazho mwatsowa kit'u chochosi?” O anafundzi makidzigidzya makiamba, “K'ahutsowere kit'u.”
Jesu akiambira, “Ela vivi bai ariye na p'esa hedu mukoba na avihale, na ariye k'ana mushu naaguze ro valore na augule.
Kwani go Maoro gaambago kukala, ‘Wathalwa jao mwenga na enye dambi,’ vivi be suthi gathimizwe kwangu. Kwa kukala go garigoorwa dzulu zangu be gandakala jeri.”
O anafundzi marihosikira vizho makiamba, “Bwana! Lola haha kare huna mishu miri.” Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “H'aa, vinathosha vizho.”
Badaye Jesu hamwenga na anafundzie wakwenda Murima wa Mizeituni here garizhokala mazowerage.
Bai marihofika kuko Jesu waambira o anafundzie akiamba, “Voyani sidze mukangira majezoni.”
Arihogonya kunena vizho akiashalahukira na achenda hat'u ambaho ukurewe ni dza uryahu wa mut'u adzevuguriza iwe. Arihofika haho akipiga mavindi na akivoya voyo riri,
“Baba, kala ni mahendzogo niusira gaga mateso gaga, ela visikale here nihendzazho mimi, ela navikale here uhendzazho uwe, visikale here nihendzazho mimi bule.” [
Ndo malaika kula mulunguni akimwambolera na akimwangiza nguvu.
Na kidza kahi za hali ya kukala angelele akikaza kuvoya kwa nguvu zaidhi, na lola achambola mavukuhi garigokala gadzahalana na madeswe ga milatso, gakidweka ho ts'i.]
Bai arihogonya kuvoya waauyira o anafundzie na achendaathekeza madzalela kwa cho kigondzi kinji na marere.
Jesu arihoona vizho akiauza akiamba, “Mbona murere kaheri? H'aya ukani muvoye sidze mukangira majezoni.”
Bai arihokala achere kunena, kukidza kundi ra at'u ririrokala rinalongozwa ni Juda, ariyekala ni mumwenga wa o anafundzi kumi na airi. K'uzhona zho akidza na akimudonera Jesu.
Ela Jesu arihoona vizho akimuza Juda akiamba, “Juda hatha unamusaliti ye Mwana wa Mudamu kwa kuhenda kumudonera kamare?”
Ndo o anafundzie mario were ma hamwenga naye marihoona vizho makimwamba, “Bwana! Fuatheme-theme na myushu ano?”
Hakimbola mumwenga wao, akimuthema muhumiki wa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye hatha akimutosa sikiro.
Ela Jesu akiamba, “Aa! Mbai, vinathosha vizho.” Gonya akirigut'a ro sikiro na akihola kare.
Jesu akiambira o alombi abomu, na abomu a arindzi a ro Hekalu hamwenga na athumia a Kiyahudi mario were madzire mamugwire, akiamba, “Mbona mudzire na mishu na njogoma here mudzaogwira jambazi?
Kila siku were ni hamwenga nanwi kahi za ro Hekalu na were k'amunigwira. Ela vivi bai ni wakathi wenu, ni wakathi ambawo nguvu za kiza zinathawala.”
Bai o at'u makimugwira Jesu na makimuthongozha muhaka nyumbani kwa ye Mulombi mubomu mwenye. P'et'ero ye akihenda kuathuwa kwa kure.
Vikara ho kahikahi za wo muhala hakikala hadzakotw'a moho na hana at'u manauoha. P'et'ero achenda na achendakelesi hamwenga nao.

Bai P'et'ero arihokala akelesi haho muhendzi wa kazi mumwenga wa kiche wamona, kwa vizho akimulolat'o, akimulolat'o kaheri gonya akiambira o andziye akiamba, “Yuyu mwanamulume be were yu hamwenga na yuyahu adziyegwirwa!”
P'et'ero arihosikira vizho akiamba, “M'ama, mut'u yuyahu be simumanya kamare!”
K'avitoere hachambola mut'u mungine akimona ye P'et'ero na akiamba, “Uwe be u mumwenga waho kahi za aryahu at'u.” P'et'ero akidzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha. Si mumwenga waho bule ts'awe!”
Kidza bada ya here saa ndzima kukira, hachambola mungine akisita kunena akiamba, “Jeri wenye kamare yuyu mwanamulume yuyu were a hamwenga na yuyahu adziyegwirwa. Kwani yuyu naye ni Mugalilaya t'i.”
P'et'ero arihosikira vizho akiamba, “Ts'awe, simanya unanena ut'u wani be vivi.” Na haho henye, kabila k'adzatosa, jogolo rikiika.

Ndo ye Bwana Jesu akigaluka na akimulola ye P'et'ero ko kwa uso. P'et'ero akikumbukira zho arizhokala adzambirwa ni ye Bwana Jesu, kukala, “kabila jogolo k'aridzaika uu usiku wa rero, undanikana k'ana t'ahu.”
Bai P'et'ero achambola ko ndze na achendarira na utsungu munji.
Vikara o at'u mariokala manamurinda Jesu makikwatya kumuhendera kav̱udhye na kumupiga.
Mamuhala na makimufunga kizuzu, makimupiga gonya makimwamba, “H'aya fwambire! Ni h'ani ye adziyekupiga vino kare?”
Na lola at'u ao maenderera kumutsuha nyomba nyinji ye Jesu.
Vikara kurihocha, o athumia a Kiyahudi, alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria mathunganana. Ndo Jesu akirefwa hatha haho mbere za ro Baraza ra athumia.
Makimuza makiamba, “H'aya fwambire, we ndiwe ye Masihi?” Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha nikamwambira kisha k'amundakuluhira bule,
na kidza hatha nikamuza swali k'amundanidzigidzya.
Ela kula vivi ye Mwana wa Mudamu andakelesi mukono wa kurya wa Mulungu mwenye nguvu.”
Makimuza makiamba, “Vikara ndo fuambe we u Mwana wa Mulungu?” Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Zho munenazho kukala ndimi be ni vizho.”
Ndo kusikira vizho makiamba, “Vino funa haja ya ushahidhi? Mana siswi enye fudzasikira here adzizhonena na kanwake!”
Ndo ro kundi rosi ra at'u rikiungarara na rikimuthongozha Jesu muhaka kwa luwali P'ilato.

Marihofika kuko, makikwatya kumushithaki na kuamba, “Mut'u yuyu fwamugwira anaavuga akili at'u ehu. Kidza hatha anaambira at'u kukala masimboze kodi kwa Kaisari na kuno anadziamba kukala iye nde ye Masihi, yani muthawali.”
Kwa vizho P'ilato arihosikira vizho akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Vidze we ndiwe muthawali wa Ayahudi?” Jesu akimudzigidzya akimwamba, “Uwe udzanena.”
Na P'ilato akiagalukira o alombi abomu na ro kundi ra at'u na akiambira, “Mut'u yuyu simona na kosa rorosi ra kumuhendya ahukumiwe.”

Kusikira vizho, o at'u makikaza kamare kuamba, “Mut'u yuyu anavuga akili at'u kukirira na go mafundishoge na kuahenda mathinye bugwa kahi za Judea ndzima. Ut'u uu wauandza Galilaya na vino hatha adzavifisha kuku kamare.”
P'ilato arihosikira vivi waauza o at'u chamba ye mut'u madzemushithaki ni Mugalilaya.
Ndo arihombirwa kukala Jesu anambola kahi za jimbo rithawalwaro ni Herode, akiona baha alagize ahirikwe kwa iye Herode, ariye wakathi uwo were a mo Jerusalemu.
K'uzhona zho Herode arihomona Jesu wafwahirwa zhomu kwa kukala kwa muda mure were anathamani kumona. Naye kwa kukala were wasikira manji dzuluze were ana thamani kumona anahenda miujiza.
Kwa vizho Herode arihomona Jesu, wamuza-muza maswali manji, ela Jesu k'amudzigidzyire bule.
Kuno ko, o alombi abomu na alimu a Sheria maimire haho na manasita kuamba Jesu ana makosa.
Ndo Herode na shikarie makikwatya kumuv̱udhya na kumuzuma Jesu. Gonya makimuvika rivalo ridzo ra kithawali na makimulazha aujwe kwa luwali P'ilato.
Kula siku iyo Herode na P'ilato makigwirana usena, mana haho nyuma-nyuma were be k'amapatana kamare.
Bai marihofika kwa P'ilato, P'ilato waaiha hamwenga o alombi abomu na o vilongozi a o at'u,

na akiambira vivi, “At'u ninwi mudzanirehera mut'u yuyu ambaye munaamba anaavuga akili at'u na kuhenda mathinye bugwa. Nidzamuza maswali mbere zenu na lola nikamona kukala kahi za gago gosi mudzigomushithaki nago, be k'ahana kosa rorosi arirohenda.
Hatha Herode naye kidza k'amonere na kosa ndosa akamudzya kuku kwehu. Kwa vizho k'ahendere ut'u wowosi uwi wa kumuhendya alagwe.
Nindizhohenda ni kulagiza apigwe vikotho gonya arichizwe.”
Vikara kahi za kila sherehe ya P'asaka, P'ilato were k'ana budhi kuavugulira mufungwa mumwenga.]
Ela o at'u makipiga mikululu na kuamba, “Yuyu mwalage! Fuvugulire ye Baraba!”
(Baraba were ni mut'u ariyefungwa jela kwa kukala wakalamo kahi za bugwa ririrohendeka mo Jerusalemu na kahi za maut'u ga kulaga at'u.)
P'ilato were ahendzazho ni kumurichiza Jesu, kwa vizho akijaribu kunena na ro kundi ra at'u kaheri,
ela o hatha makithuwa o wa, “Musulubishe! Musulubishe!”

P'ilato arihosikira vizho akiuza lwa hahu akiamba, “Asulubiwe kwa adzakosani kibomu? Nidzamulola na nikamona k'ana kosa ra hatha kukala ahukumiwe kwalagwa, kwa vizho ndalagiza apigwe vikotho na gonya arichizwe.”
Ela o at'u makikaza kamare kupiga mikululu na kuamba, asulubiwe. Na lola mwisho zo k'ululu zao zikishinda.
Kwa vizho P'ilato akimuhukumu kwalagwa ye Jesu here marizhokala manahendza.
Ndo akivugulirwa Baraba ariye were wafungwa kwa kuthinya bugwa na kwalaga, naye were nde mahendzaye avugulwe. Gonya P'ilato akimuhala Jesu na akimulazha kwao here marizhokala manamala.

Kwa vizho o shikari a Kirumi makimuhala Jesu machenda naye mende makamwalage. Bai marihokala makwendani makithungana mut'u aifwaye Simoni Muk'irene. Mut'u yuyu were anangira mo mudzini kula mashambani. O shikari marihomona mamugwira na makimuhika wo musalaba kithuroni, autsukule, kuno Jesu a mbere ye a nyuma.
Kidza ngororoki bomu ya at'u yakala inamuthuwa Jesu nyuma-nyuma. Kahi za ii ngororoki mwere muna anaache mariokala manapiga k'ululu na kurira kwa ut'u wa go garigokala ganamukalira Jesu.
Jesu arihoona vizho waagalukira o anaache na akiambira, “H'enwi ano m'ama a Jerusalemu, at'u ninwi musirireni kwa ut'u wa kunishikithikira mimi, ela dziririreni ninwi enye hamwenga na ana enu.
Kwani lolani siku za thabu zinadza ambaho at'u mandaamba, ‘Baha ao anaache mario ni t'asa, baha ao mario k'amazhalire ahoho, hedu hatha kuamwisa ana!’
Gonya mandanena na mirima na mayambe, ‘Nwi mirima h'aya fugwerereni!’ Na zho virima vithithe-vithithe mandazhambira, ‘Hedu hufinikireni!’
Kwani ikikala at'u manadima kuhenda maut'u gaga kwa muhi mwitsi vidze makivihenda kwa muhi mufu vindakaladze?”
Kidza were hana ahendi a mai airi, bai aa nao mathongozhwa hamwenga na Jesu kwendalagwa.
Ndoo vivii, hatha hat'u haifwaho Ribeshe ra Kitswa, bai haho makimusulubisha Jesu. Naye wasulubiwa hamwenga na ahendi a mai airi, mumwenga mukono wa kurya, na mungine mukono wa kumots'o. [
Ndo Jesu akiamba, “Baba asamehe! Mana k'amamanya ro mahendaro.”] O shikari makizigazha zo nguwo za Jesu. Nao mahenda vivi kwa kuhenda kuzipigira k'ura.

Na o at'u makikala ma haho manavilolera zho vikalazho, kuno ko o vilongozi a Kiyahudi makikala manamusholera Jesu na kuamba, “H'aya k'aokola angine, vivi be ni adziokole mwenye kala nde iye Masihi jeri ariyetsagulwa ni Mulungu.”
Na o shikari nao makihenda dza vizho zhenye mamuv̱udhya Jesu, kwani mamuthuwa hehi na makimup'a siki,
makimwamba, “H'aya dziokole mwenye kala u muthawali wa Ayahudi jeri!”
Kidza ho dzulu za kitswache hakotw'a kibao kirichokala chaorwa maneno gaga:
Vikara mumwenga kahi za o ahendi a mai ariyekala adzanganywa haho, wamusholera Jesu akimwamba, “Vidze we siwe ye Masihi bule? H'aya dziokole mwenye gonya ufuokole naswi!”
Ye mungine ye arihosikira vizho akimudumulira ye mwandziwe akiamba, “We fuambe kumwogoha Mulungu bule? Siswi hosini ahahu fwahukumiwa vimwenga.
Na bai siswi zho furizhohukumiwa ni karakara, kwani zho fuhendwazho be vinalengana na go mai furigogahenda, ela yuyu be k'ahendere rii rorosi.”
Gonya akimwamba Jesu, “Nikumbukira bai Jesu, undihokudza kahi za uthawaliwo!”
Jesu akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Nakwambira ujeri wenye, vivi rero kare fundakwenda hosini p'ehoni.”
Ganakala gago were ni saa t'andahu, bai ts'i yosi yagit'ana kiza muhadhi saa chenda,
mana ro dzuwa raricha kuala na yo p'azia ya nguwo kahi za ro Hekalu ikitharuka h'waa p'ande mbiri.
Gonya Jesu akipiga k'ululu akiamba, “Baba, yo roho yangu ninayika mikononi mwako.” Naye ko kugonya kunena vizho thu, akimarigizika kare.
Bai ye mubomu wa shikari arihoona vizho virizho were vidzahendeka wamulika Mulungu na akiamba, “Ni jeri mut'u yuyu were k'ana makosa gogosi.”
Vikara ro kundi ra at'u mario were madzirelolera zho vikalazho marihoona go maut'u gago gakihendeka, mauya midzini kwao kuno manathukusa vitswa zhao kwa kushikithika.
Na o at'u mario were ni asena a Jesu, ambao angine were ni aryahu anaache mariokala madzamuthuwa Jesu kula Galilaya, maima kure vichache na makilolera maut'u gaga.

Vikara kwereko na mut'u mumwenga ariyeifwa Josefu naye were anambola mudzi mumwenga wa Ayahudi uifwao Arimath'ea. Iye were ni mut'u mudzo kidza ni muhachi, na were anauthariza uthawali wa Mulungu. Idzaho were ni mumwenga waho kahi za ro Baraza ra athumia, iye k'aaungire mukono kahi za gago marigogahenda.

Vikara kwereko na mut'u mumwenga ariyeifwa Josefu naye were anambola mudzi mumwenga wa Ayahudi uifwao Arimath'ea. Iye were ni mut'u mudzo kidza ni muhachi, na were anauthariza uthawali wa Mulungu. Idzaho were ni mumwenga waho kahi za ro Baraza ra athumia, iye k'aaungire mukono kahi za gago marigogahenda.
Bai wakwenda hatha kwa P'ilato na achendaumala mwiri wa Jesu akauzike.
Arihoruhusiwa wakwendamuthinya akimulinga-linga ts'andza ya kitani, na achendamwika kahi za mbira iriyohenda kutsongwa iweni. Mbira ii were k'aidzahumirwa bule.
Ganakala gago were ni siku ya Mathayarisho, mana siku ya Sabato were i hehi na kwangira.
Na aryahu anaache mariokala mamuthuwa Jesu hangu Galilaya, makwenda na Josefu na machendayona yo mbira na makiona viryahu mwiriwe urizhoikwa.
Ndo makiuya midzini kwao na machendathayarisha mavumba na marashi ga kudzaumwagira mwiri wa Jesu. Na irihofika siku ya Sabato makioya here Sheria iambazho.
Vikara irihofika siku ya kwandza ya wiki o anaache mauka na madzach'a maitsi machenda ko mbirani na go mavumba marigokala madzagathayarisha mende makamumwagire here adha rao ririzho.
Marihofika kuko machendaona ro riiwe ra kubiningizira yo mbira ridzapingiliswa kure na yo mbira.
Ela hatha vizho machangira mo ndani, mariholola k'amawonere bule wo mwiri wa Bwana Jesu.
Marihokala machere haho kudangana-dangana, lola mahenda kuona anaalume airi maimire hehi nao. At'u alume aa mere madzavala nguwo za kumetha-metha.

Bai o anaache mapiga mavindi makidzizanya kuno nyuso zao zinalola ho ts'i kwa ut'u wa woga munji mariokala nawo. O at'u alume machambola kuuza makiamba, “Mbona munamumala mut'u ariye moyo kahi za at'u mariofwa?
K'aho bule be haha, adzafufuka! Amba munakumbukira zho arizhokala akimwambira arihokala achere nanwi ko Galilaya?
Kukala Mwana wa Mudamu andalazhwa mikononi mwa at'u enye dambi, kidza andasulubiwa, ela indihofika siku ya hahu andafufuka kaheri.”
Ndo haho o ana ache makikumbukira go maneno ga Jesu.
Bai marihouya kula ko mbirani makwendaambira o anafundzi kumi na mumwenga na o angine osi gaga maut'u gaga.
Anaache aa were ni Maryamu Magidalena na Joana, na Maryamu mameye Jakobu. Aa hamwenga na o angine mariokala hamwenga nao ndo mariokwendaambira o ahumwi dzulu za maut'u gaga.
Ela o ahumwi makiona go marigonena o ana ache be k'agana mana yoyosi, kwa vizho k'amaakuluhirire bule.

Ela hamwenga na vizho, P'et'ero waungarara na akikot'a malo kwenda ko mbirani. Arihofika kuko akizama akilola na akizona zo nguwo za sandza zi h'akeye. Ndo akiuka akikwatya kuuya kuno anaaza mo moyoni, “Ut'u uno udziwohendeka ni ut'u wani?”
Vikara siku iyo vizho, hakikala hana anafundzi airi a Jesu manenda kadzidzi kaifwako Emau. Kadzidzi kaka were ka here maili fungahe vivi kula Jerusalemu.
Anafundzi aa were manenda kuno manasumurira dzulu za kila kit'u ambacho were chahendeka.
K'uzhona zho marihokala manasumurira, Jesu waasongerera na akinenda hamwenga nao,
ela ao k'amadimire kumumanya bule kwani matso gao were gadzaziywa.
Ndo Jesu akiuza akiamba, “Munasumurira dzulu za ut'u wani nwi kuno munenda?” Kusikira vizho makiima thii, kuno nyuso zao zidzakundzika kwa huzuni.
Mumwenga wao kahi za aa airi were nde Kileopa. Vikara yuyu akimuza Jesu akiamba, “Unamala uambe u mujeni muno Jerusalemu hatha k'umanya maut'u garigohendeka vino dzuzi-dzuzi?”

Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Ni maut'u gani be go?” O anafundzi makimudzigidzya makiamba, “Ni maut'u garigomukalira mut'u aifwaye Jesu wa Nazareth'i. Mut'u yuyu were ni nabii na were ana nguvu mbere za Mulungu na mbere za at'u osi. Nguvu zizi zaoneka kahi za kunenakwe na hatha kahi za mahendoge.
Bai o alombi abomu na o vilongozi ehu, makimulazha ili ahukumiwe kwalagwa, ndo akisulubiwa.
Siswi were huna th'amaa kukala iye nde ariye angakombola ts'i ya Iziraeli! Zaidhi ya gago ni kwamba rero ni hahu hangu gakale gaga.
Na ut'u ungine ni kwamba ano m'ama ehu angine madzahushangaza. At'u ao madzarauka ko mbirani madzach'a,
ela madzihofika kuko, k'amawonere bule wo mwiri wa Jesu. Ndo makadza na makahuthalira uv̱oro wa kukala madzaona maono ga malaika na makaambira kukala ye Jesu a moyo!
Badaye angine ehu makenda vivii, hatha ko mbirani. Madzihofika kuko makaona zho madzizhoamba o anaache zhenye, ela ye Jesu mwenye k'amamonere bule.”
Jesu akiambira, “Mbona mu azuzu namuna ino? Mbona muna kiziho na kukuluhira go garigonenwa ni manabii ho kapindi?
Vidze were k'avimala ye Masihi apate thabu na badaye angire kahi za ngumaye?”
K'uzhona zho Jesu akikwatya kuang'aziza gosi garigo kahi za Maoro ganenago dzuluze. Jesu waandza na zhuwo zhosi zha Musa na hatha Maoro ga manabii osi, akiaeleza.
Vikara marihokala madzafika hehi na ko kadzidzi marikokala manenda, Jesu were ni here andiyekira ende ko mbere ya ko kadzidzi.
Kuona vizho makimusitira makiamba, “H'aa, ni zhani bai, kala naswi kwani hatha dzuwa rinenda kupothokani na dzulo rinangira kare.” Kwa vizho Jesu k'akahalire achenda hamwenga nao.
Vikara arihokala adzakelesi kuhumira chakurya hamwenga nao, wahala mukahe akimboza muv̱era kwa Mulungu gonya akiumogola na akiap'a.
Haho ndo matso gao gakigunuka na makimumanya ye Jesu. K'avitoere, ko kumumanya thu, achangamika kare haho kwa haho
Na lola makikwatya kuuzana-uzana na kuamba, “Vidze kurya ngirani amba mioyo yehu were ina raha zhomu, adzihokala ananena naswi na kufung'azira garya garigo kahi za Maoro?”
Bai makiungarara kare na makikwatya kuuya Jerusalemu. Marihofika kuko makionana na aryahu ahumwi kumi na mumwenga hamwenga na anafundzi angine a Jesu.
Na o airi kuonewa thu makiambwa, “Aa ni jeri benwi! Ye Bwana be adzafufuka jeri na hatha akamwambolera Simoni.”
Gonya o airi nao makithala garyahu ambago were gadzaakalira mo ngirani kwenda Emau, na viryahu ambazho mamumanya ye Jesu arihomogola mukahe.
Na lola hatha were k'amadzatosa wo moro wao, poo ye Jesu mwenye na akiima kahi zao. Akialamusa akiamba, “Dheri narikale kwenu.”
Lola makihondoka na makidzalwa ni woga, kwani maona manaona p'ep'o be o.
Ela Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Mbona munabudzyika kaheri? Kwanoni mioyo yenu i thele kutsakuluhira?
H'aya nilolani go magulu na yo mikono yangu hedu, samba ndimi mino! Nigut'ani mulole hedu, kwani p'ep'o k'ana mwiri hedu hatha misoza, dza here nirizho mimi.”
Arihogonya kunena vizho, akianyesa go magandzage na go maguluge.
Ndo marihokala machere k'amadzakuluhira kwa ut'u wa ro fwahiro bomu na ko kushangaa, Jesu akiauza akiamba, “Vidze muna ut'u wowosi wa kurya hano?”
Bai makihala kisiku cha kumba ra kukanja makimup'a.
Jesu akikihala cho kisiku cha kumba na akikirya manalola.

Gonya akiambira, “Maut'u gaga genye be ndo nirigokala nikimwambira nirihokala nichere hamwenga nanwi, kukala kila kit'u kirichoorwa dzulu zangu kahi za Sheria ya Musa na zhuwo zha manabii na hatha kahi za zhuwo zha zaburi suthi vithimire.”
Gonya akiahendya madime kung'alirwa ni go Maoro.
Kidza akiambira, “Vivi ndizho ambazho zhaorwa, kukala ye Masihi were suthi apate thabu na kidza afwe na siku ya hahu afufuke kula kifwani.
Na at'u osini a kila kabila, kuandzira mudzi wa Jerusalemu mahubiriwe kahi za dzinare kwamba mathubu na mausizwe dambi zao.
Ninwi bai mu mashahidhi a maut'u gaga.
Na lolani mimi mwenye bai nindamuhirikira viryahu virizholagwa ni Baba. Ela kabila vizho, kalani haha Jerusalemu muhaka mundihovikwa nguvu za kula dzulu mulunguni.”
Badaye akialongoza kuwombola wo mudzi muhaka kadzidzi ka Beth'ania, marihofika kuko Jesu akinula mikonoye na akiahasa.
Bai arihokala achere kuahasa akiahaukira na akinulwa achenda mulunguni.
O anafundzi makimuabudu gonya makiuya Jerusalemu na fwahiro bomu.
Nao makala kahi za ro Hekalu siku zosi kumulika Mulungu.
John: Haho chaho kwakala neno, na iye Neno wakala kwa Mulungu, na ye Neno wakala ni Mulungu.
Hangu ho chaho ye Neno were a kwa Mulungu.
Vit'u zhosi zhaumbwa kwa kukirira kwakwe. Na k'ahana kit'u hatha kimwenga kirichoumbwa hasiho kukirira kwakwe.
Iye Neno were nde chaho cha uzima, na uzima uu wareha mulangaza kwa anadamu.
Mulangaza uu, unang'ala kizani na kiza k'akiwadimire.
Bai kwereko mut'u mumwenga ariyehumwa ni Mulungu, dzinare ni Johana.
Mut'u yuyu wakudza kwamba aambirize at'u dzulu za wo mulangaza, kwamba kukirira kwa iye Johana at'u osi madime kukuluhira.
Iye mwenye were siye mulangaza bule, ela wakudzaambiriza at'u dzulu za uwo mulangaza.
Na uwo mulangaza wa jeri ung'alirawo kila mut'u, were unadza urumwenguni.
Iye were a urumwenguni, na uwo urumwengu waumbwa kukirira na iye, ela kidza o at'u a urumwengu k'amamumanyire bule.
Mut'u iye wakudza kwa a kwakwe enye, ela o mario akwe k'amamuhokerere.
Ela mwero wa osi aryahu mariomuhokera na kumukuluhira waap'a wadimi wa kukala ana a Mulungu.
Ana aa k'amazhalirwe kwa ngira ya kibinadamu, hedu kwa mahendzo ga mut'u, ela mazhalwa ni Mulungu.
K'uzhona zho, Neno akikala mut'u na akitoa hamwenga naswi. Bai hukiona ngumaye. Nguma ii were ni yakwe kwa kukala were nde Mwana wa h'akeye kula kwa babaye, naye were adzere nema na ujeri.

Kwa vizho Johana wamboza ushahidhi dzuluze, akiluta mumiro akiamba, “Yuyu nde yuyahu niriyekala ninamwamba nirihoamba kukala, ‘Iye adzaye nyuma zangu be ni mubomu kuriko mimi, kwa kukala wakalako hatha kabila mimi sidzakalako.’ ”
Bai siswi hosi fwahokera nema ya kukup'ulirwa kula kwa uthimiri wa kwakwe.
Kwani Sheria yalazhwa kukirira kwa Musa, ela nema na ujeri zhakudza kukirira kwa Jesu Masihi.
K'ahana mut'u ariyemona Mulungu, ela ye Mulungu Mwana, ariye ni Mwana wa h'akeye ariye lagani hakwe nde ariyehumanyisa iye Mulungu.
Bai vivi ndizho Johana arizhoamba wakathi Ayahudi marihoahuma alombi na Alawi kula Jerusalemu kwamba makamuze maambe, “U h'ani we?”
Marihofika kuko, Johana k'akahalire kuadzigidzya, ela waambira lwazu-lwazu akiamba, “Mimi si iye Masihi bule.”

Marihosikira vizho makimuza kaheri makiamba, “Vikara u h'ani? U Elija?” Johana akidzigidzya akiamba, “Mimi si Elija bule.” Makimuza kaheri makiamba, “We u iye nabii?” Johana akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Hatha bule.”
Mwisho kamare makimuza makiamba, “Vikara u h'ani? Hup'e jibu hukaambire aryahu at'u madziohuhuma. Vidze unaambadze dzuluzo?”
Johana akidzigidzya akiamba, “Here nabii Isaya arizhonena,
Mimi ni mut'u alutaye mumiro ko nyika na kuamba,
‘Mutengezereni Bwana ngira ya kugoloka.’ ”
O at'u mariokwenda kwa Johana, were madzahumwa ni Mafarisayo.
Bai makimuza Johana makiamba, “Kala k'u Masihi na k'u Elija, hedu ye nabii humutharizaye, mbona unabat'iza at'u?”
Johana akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Mimi ninabat'iza at'u kwa madzi, ela kahikahi zenu haimire mut'u musiyemumanya.
Na iye bai ndiye adzaye nyuma yangu ambaye mimi siv̱irya hatha kumuvula virahuzhe.”
Maut'u gaga gahendeka kuko Beth'ania, nyangamo ya hiri ya muho wa Jorodani arikokala Johana anabat'iza at'u.
Siku ya hiriye Johana akimona Jesu anadza na arihomona akiamba, “Lolani thiyu ye Mwana Ng'ondzi wa Mulungu ausaye dambi ya urumwengu.
Yuyu ndiye niriyekala ninaamba haho nirihonena nikiamba, ‘Iye mut'u adzaye nyuma zangu, ni mubomu kuriko mimi, mana wakalako hatha kabila mimi sidzakalako.’
Mut'u mimi sidimire kumanya kala andakala h'ani, ela nakudza nibat'ize at'u na madzi kwamba adime kuonyeswa kwa Aiziraeli.”
Gonya Johana achamboza ushahidhi akiamba, “Naona ye Roho akitserera kula mulunguni dza here giya na akimuthulama.
Sikamumanyire, ela ye ariyenihuma nibat'ize at'u na madzi wanambira vivi, ‘Ye mut'u ambaye undaona Roho anatserera na kumuthulama, be ndiye iye andebat'iza at'u kwa Roho Mweri.’
Nami nidzazhona na ninamboza ushahidhi kwamba yuyu nde Mwana wa Mulungu.”
Bai siku ya hiriye kaheri, Johana were aimire haho na anafundzie airi,
bai arihomona Jesu anatsembera akiamba, “Lolani thiye ye Mwana Ng'ondzi wa Mulungu.”
O anafundzi airi makimusikira Johana ananena vivi, makimuricha na makimuthuwa Jesu.
Jesu akigaluka na akiaona o anafundzi airi manamuthuwa, akiauza akiamba, “Munamalani nwi?” Makidzigidzya makiamba, “Ukalahi kwani Rabi?” (Rabi manaye ni mwalimu.)
Jesu akiamba, “Ndzoni muhaone hedu.” Kwa vizho machenda naye na makiona ho akalaho na makikala hamwenga naye siku iyo. Ganakala gaga were ni murongo wa saa kumi za dziloni.
Mumwenga wa aryahu airi mariomusikira Johana ananena na machenda na Jesu, were ni Anderea, nduguye Simoni P'et'ero.
Kit'u cha kwandza arichohenda Anderea wakwendamona nduguye Simoni na akimwambira vivi, “Hudzamona ye Masihi bewe.” (Mana ya Masihi ni mut'u ariyetsagulwa ni Mulungu.)
Gonya Anderea akimuhirika Simoni kwa Jesu. Bai Jesu akimulola na akiamba, “Uwe u Simoni mwana wa Johana, ela dzinaro rindakala K'efa.” (K'efa manaye ni P'et'ero yani iwe.)
Siku ya hiriye akiona baha ende Galilaya. Bai akimona Filipu, na Jesu akimwamba Filipu, “Nithuwa hedu.”
Filipu wakala ni mut'u wa Beth'isaida, kut'u arikotoa Anderea na P'et'ero.

Ndo Filipu akiuka kwenda kwa Nath'anieli na achendamwamba, “Nath'anieli hudzamona iye ambaye Musa waora maut'u dzuluze kahi za cho chuwo cha Sheria, na kidza ambaye manabii maora dzuluze. Dzinare ni Jesu wa Nazareth'i, mwana wa Josefu.”
Nath'anieli arihosikira vizho akiuza akiamba, “Vino kuna kit'u kidzo kidimacho kwambola kula Nazareth'i jeri?” Filipu akimwamba, “Ndzo ulole.”
Jesu arihomona Nath'anieli anamudzirira akiamba, “Lolani, thiyu Muiziraeli jeri-jeri ambaye k'ana ulongo wowosi ndanimwe.”
Nath'anieli akimuza akiamba, “Udzanimanyadze?” Jesu akidzigidzya akiamba, “Nidzakona haryahu udzihokala u ts'ini za uryahu mutini. Na hatha Filipu were k'adzakwiha.”
Nath'anieli akimudzigidzya akiamba, “Rabi, uwe u Mwana wa Mulungu, u muthawali wa Iziraeli.”
Jesu akiamba, “Unakuluhira kwa kukala nidzakwambira dzakona udzihokala u ts'ini za mutini? Be undaona maut'u mabomu kukira gaga.”
Jesu akienderera kunena akiamba, “Ninamwambira ujeri, mundaona mulunguni ku lwazu na malaika a Mulungu manambuka na kutharamuka kwa Mwana wa Mudamu.”
Bada ya siku mbiri kukikala na harusi kuko K'ana, mudzi wa Galilaya; na mameye Jesu akikala a kuko.
Jesu naye na anafundzie masungwa yo harusi.
Bai divai ya yo harusi irihogoma mameye Jesu akimwambira, “Divai idzaagomera kuryahu.”
Jesu akimwamba, “Kwanoni unanambira zho m'ama? Wakathi wangu k'audzafika bule.”
Ye mameye akiambira o ahumiki akiamba, “Tengezani rorosi andiromwambira.”
Bai kwereko kuko mabiga mahandahu ga mawe garigoikwa kwa adha ra Ayahudi ra kuoga. Kila mwenga were rinangira geleni mirongo miri hedu mirongo mihahu za madzi.
Bai Jesu akiambira o ahumiki akiamba, “Dzazani mabiga gaga na madzi.” Kwa vizho makigadzaza mulembelembe.
Gonya Jesu akiambira o ahumiki, “Vikara hekani mukamup'e ye kilongozi wa yo sherehe.” Bai makiheka makimuhirikira,

na ye kilongozi akithatha go madzi garigokala gadzagaluka divai. K'amanyire idzambolahi, ingahokala o ahumiki mariokala madzaheka go madzi were manamanya zho vidzizhokala. Bai ye kilongozi akimuvuha k'anda ye bwana harusi,
na akimwamba, “Kawaida mut'u ni kumboza divai mbidzo kwandza ndo gonya kala at'u madzanwa zhomu zhenye, akamboza yo mbii-mbii, ela we vivi udzayika yo mbidzo hatha vivi ndo unayomboza.”
Bai uu ndo muujiza wa kwandza kamare ariouhenda Jesu. Nawo wauhenda K'ana, mudzi uriwo ko Galilaya, bai akinyesa ngumaye na o anafundzie makimukuluhira.
Bada ya vivi Jesu na mameye na nduguze na anafundzie makitharamuka Kaperinaumu kwa siku mbiri t'ahu.
Gonya wakathi wa sikuk'uu ya Kiyahudi ya P'asaka urihofika hehi, Jesu wambuka kwenda Jerusalemu.
Bai arihokwenda kahi za ro Hekalu akiona at'u haho, managuza ng'ombe na ng'ondzi na magiya. Kidza were kuna angine mariokala manabanda p'esa, makeresi na meza zao.
Jesu akisuka kikotho cha nyugwe na akiainga osi mo Hekaluni hamwenga na zo ng'ombe na ng'ondzi zao. Na kidza akizipetula-petula zo meza zao, na zo p'esa zosi zikimwagika!
Akiadumulira o mariokala managuza magiya akiamba, “H'aya gauseni gaga mumu! Siigaluzeni nyumba ya Baba na kuihendya soko!”
Gonya o anafundzi marihoaza dzulu ya zho arizhohenda Jesu, makikumbukira viryahu virizhondhikwa kahi za Maoro zhaambazho,
“Mulungu, hat'u ha kukuvoya ha moyoni mwangu zhomu hatha sina zha kuhenda.”
Ndo o Ayahudi makimwamba, “Undafwanyesa muujiza wani hatha fumanye una wadimi wa kuhenda gaga?”
Jesu akiadzigidzya akiamba, “Ribandeni riri Hekalu, nami nindariaka kaheri kwa siku t'ahu.”
O vilongozi makimwamba, “Hekalu riri raakwa kwa muda wa miaka mirongo mine na mihandahu, undadima jeri kuriaka kwa siku t'ahu we?”
Ela Jesu were ananena vivi kuhusu Hekalu ra uwo mwiriwe.
Bai arihofufuka, anafundzie makumbukira kukala ut'u uu were waunena kare. Ndo makikuluhira garyahu Maoro na riryahu neno arironena Jesu.
Bai Jesu arihokala a kuko Jerusalemu wakathi uwo wa sikuk'uu ya P'asaka, wahenda miujiza minji kwa nguvu za Mulungu. Kwa ut'u uwo at'u anji makimukuluhira.
Ela Jesu k'aakuluhirire, kwani waamanya at'u osi t'ot'ot'o.
K'akukalire na haja ya mut'u kumwambira dzulu ya at'u, mana wamanya garigokala mioyoni mwao.
Bai kwereko mut'u mumwenga aifwaye Nikodemu. Nikodemu were ni kilongozi wa Ayahudi ariyekala kahi za chama cha Mafarisayo.
Siku mwenga wakwenda kwa Jesu na usiku, achendamwamba, “Rabi hunamanya kukala u mwalimu ariyehumwa ni Mulungu. Mana k'akuna adimaye kuhenda ii miujiza uhendayo hasiho Mulungu kukala hamwenga naye.”
Jesu akimwamba, “Ninakwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u asihozhalwa mara ya hiri, k'adima kuwona uthawali wa Mulungu.”
Nikodemu akiuza akiamba, “Mut'u adimadze kuzhalwa kaheri kala adzakala muthumia? Vidze anadima kwangira kaheri ndanini mwa mameye na akazhalwa?”
Jesu akimwamba, “Ninakwambira ujeri wenye, mut'u asihozhalwa kwa madzi na Roho k'adima kwangira kahi za uthawali wa Mulungu.
Kizhalwacho ni mwiri, ni mwiri na kizhalwacho ni Roho, ni roho.
Usangalale kwa zho nidzizhonena kwamba, ‘Suthi muzhalwe lwa hiri.’
Lola p'eho nikuvuma kokosi ihendzako. Unadima kuisikira ivumazho, ela k'udima kumanya ilako hedu yendako. Bai ndo virizho na kila mut'u azhalwaye ni Roho.”
Nikodemu akiamba, “Maut'u gano ganadima kukaladze?”
Jesu akiamba, “U mwalimu wa Iziraeli, ela ko maut'u gaga k'ugamanya?
Ninakwambira ujeri, hunanena humanyago na hunamboza ushahidhi wa hurigogaona, ela hatha hamwenga na vizho ninwi at'u k'amukubali ushahidhi wehu.
Nidzamwambira maut'u ga urumwenguni na k'amukuluhira. Vidze, ela mundakuluhira nikimwambira maut'u ga mulunguni?
“K'akuna mut'u ariyekwenda mulunguni, hasihokala iye ariyethima kula mulunguni ambaye ni Mwana wa Mudamu.
Here Musa arizhomwanula ye nyoka wa ng'andu ko nyika, ndizho Mwana wa Mudamu arizho suthi anulwe,
kwamba kila mut'u amukuluhiraye akale na uzima wa kare na kare.
“Kwa mana Mulungu wauhendza urumwengu zhomu hatha akimulazha Mwanawe wa h'akeye ili kila amukuluhiraye asingamike, ela akale na uzima wa kare na kare.
Mulungu k'amuhumire Mwanawe urumwenguni ili adze auhukumu, ela uokolwe kukirira kwa iye.
Kila amukuluhiraye ye Mwana k'ahukumiwa, ela kila asiyemukuluhira adzahukumiwa kare, kwa kukala k'amukuluhirire Mwana wa h'akeye wa Mulungu.
“Bai chausa cha hatha at'u mahukumiwe ni kiki; wo mulangaza wakudza urumwenguni, ela o at'u makihendza kiza kuriko wo mulangaza kwa kukala mahendo gao ni mai.
Kwani kila mut'u ahendaye mai nikuutsukirirwa wo mulangaza, na k'andakudza ho mulangazani sidze mahendoge gakaoneka.
Ela kila mut'u ahendaye ga hachi nikudza mulangazani kwamba adzigogahenda gaoneke lwazu kukala adzagahenda kukirira kwa Mulungu.”
Bada ya gaga, Jesu na anafundzie mambola Jerusalemu na akikala hamwenga nao kwa muda kahi za jimbo ra Judea na akibat'iza at'u.
Johana naye were anabat'iza at'u kuko Enoni hehi na Salimu, kwani were kuna madzi manji kuko, na at'u manadza makibat'izwa.
Wakathi uwo Johana were k'adzangwe kwangizwa jela bule.
Bai kuchambola h'uwoh'uwo kahi za anafundzi a Johana na Muyahudi mumwenga dzulu za adha ra kuoga.
Ndo makidza kwa Johana na makimwambira, “Rabi, unamukumbukira yuya mut'u ariyekala nawe nyangamo ya hiri ya Jorodani, yuya uriyenena dzuluze? Lola vivi anabat'iza na kila mut'u anamuthuwa!”
Johana akiamba, “K'akuna adimaye kukala na kit'u hasiho kukigerwa kula mulunguni.
Ninwi enye mu mashudhia gangu kukala naamba, ‘Mimi si Masihi,’ ela naamba, ‘Nahumwa mbereze.’

Mimi ni here muhiriki wa bwana harusi. Ye bwana harusi nde mwenye bibi harusi. Muhiriki wa bwana harusi nikuima na kusirikiza, na nikufwahirwa asikiraho sauthi ya bwana harusi. Vivi ndo hatha nina raha zhomu.
Vinav̱irya ngumaye ingezeke na yangu ihunguke.
“Ye mut'u adzaye kula dzulu ni mubomu kuriko at'u osi; naye mut'u wa haha ts'i ni wa haha ts'i, na nikunena maut'u ga haha ts'i. Ela iye adzaye kula mulunguni ni mubomu kuriko osi.
Mut'u iye anena vizho arizhoona na kusikira, ela k'akuna akubaliye ushahidhiwe.
Kila akubaliye ushahidhiwe anathibitisha kukala Mulungu ni jeri.
Bai iye ahumwaye ni Mulungu nikunena maneno ga Mulungu, kwa kukala Mulungu nikumup'a unji wa Rohore.
“Iye Baba anamuhendza Mwanawe na adzazhika vit'u zhosi mikononi mwakwe.
Kila amukuluhiraye ye Mwana yuna uzima wa kare na kare, ela kila amukahalaye k'andawona uwo uzima uwo, ela k'oro za Mulungu zi dzuluze.”
